title: Lenovo Legion 7 2024 (14th Gen Intel Core i7-14700HX, RTX 4060, 16GB, 1TB, 16" 3.2K 165Hz)
short_description: The Lenovo Legion 7 2024 (16IRX9) is a gaming laptop that comes with a solid set of hardware. This includes a combination of a 14th Gen Intel Core i7-14700HX processor and an NVidIA GeForce RTX 4060 discrete graphics card. In addition to that, you also get 16GB RAM and 1TB SSD on this thing. It can be upgraded further to exactly double the memory and storage capacity. On the front, it dons a 16-inch IPS LCD panel that stretches 3.2K in resolution and offers a 165Hz refresh rate and 100% DCI-P3 colour gamut. Along with all this impressive hardware, you get a 99.9Wh battery with a 230W AC adapter to keep things up and running.
description:
Are you looking for a powerful laptop that can sort all your computing needs for years to come? Then you might want to take a look at this Lenovo Legion 7 2024 (16IRX9) with Intel i7-14700HX processor and RTX 4060 graphics card.

Lenovo Legion 7 2024 (16IRX9) Overview

Design and Display 

Lenovo Legion 7 2024 (16IRX9) is a gaming machine and comes in an all-aluminium body. This thing weighs nearly two and a half kilos. As for the ports, you get plenty — four USB-A one of which supports Always On, three USB-C, an HDMI port, one combo audio jack, a card reader, and a power-in socket.The Lenovo Legion 7 2024 (16IRX9) comes with a wide 16-inch display of 3.2K (3,200 x 2,000) resolution with a high 165Hz refresh rate. It is an IPS panel with a 16:10 aspect ratio, 430 nits peak brightness, and a 100% DCI-P3 colour gamut. The keyboard is a custom 4-Zone RGB backlight, whereas the whole thing ships in Eclipse Black colour.

Performance and the rest

Other than that, the Lenovo Legion 7 2024 (16IRX9) ensures smooth performance with the combination of 14th Gen Intel Core i7-14700HX processor and NVidIA RTX 4060. The processor has 20 (8 performance + 12 efficiency) cores, 28 threads, and 33MB of L3 cache. It can also go up to 5.5 GHz of max clock speed. As for the GPU, NVidIAs RTX 4060, with a maximum TGP of 130W, can handle graphic-intensive workloads easily.  In addition, Lenovo has also included an LA3 AI chip to improve FPS in games.In addition to the solid CPU and GPU combo, the Lenovo Legion 7 2024 (16IRX9) ships with dual-channel memory. This particular model comes with 16GB DDR5-5600 RAM, which can be further upgraded to 32GB. Furthermore, there are two M.2 2280 slots, one of which is preoccupied with a 1TB NVMe PCIe Gen 4 SSD. For power, it packs an integrated 99.9Wh battery that supports Super Rapid Charge. This technology can juice the laptop to 30% in just 10 minutes via the 230W adapter that ships in the box.

title: Lenovo Legion Slim 5 2024 (Ryzen 7 8845HS, RTX 4060, 16GB, 512GB/1TB, 16" WQXGA 165Hz)
short_description: Introducing the Lenovo Legion Slim 5 2024 (16IRX8) laptop: a sleek gaming powerhouse. With an aluminum build, 16\" WQXGA display, Ryzen 7 processor, and NVidIA RTX 4060 GPU, it offers top-notch performance. If you are looking for a laptop with an excellent display with powerful performance, check this out!
description:
Lenovo Legion Slim 5 2024  Overview

Heres a short description of the design aesthetic, chipset, and battery life of the Lenovo Legion Slim 5 2024 (16IRX8) laptop with Intel i7, RTX 4060, and 165Hz screen.

Design and Display 

Lenovo Legion Slim 5 2024 has the build of a gaming machine. It has an all-aluminium build and weighs a hefty 2.5 kilos. As for the ports, you get a lot— 2 USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-Cs (with DisplayPort1.4), 3 USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 ports, and a headphone port. Similarly, there is also an  HDMI 2.1, an RJ45 port, and a power-in socket.The Lenovo Legion Slim 5 2024 (16IRX8) comes with a wide 16" display of WQXGA (2560 x 1600) resolution with a high 165Hz refresh rate. It has a tall 16:10 aspect ratio as well. The keyboard has a custom 4 Zone RGB backlight, whereas the keycaps are black.

Performance and Memory

Alongside the smooth 165Hz screen, the Lenovo Legion Slim 5 2024 ensures smooth performance with the combination of Ryzen 7 8845HS and NVidIA RTX 4070. The Ryzen 7 8845HS processor has 8 cores and 16 threads. It has 16MB of L3 cache. It can also go up to 5.1 GHz of max clock speed. As for the GPU, NVidIAs RTX 4070, with a maximum TGP of 140W, can handle graphic-intensive workloads easily.  In addition, Lenovo has also included an LA1 AI chip to improve fps in games.The laptop has Lenovos Coldfront 4.0 technology to cool this CPU/GPU combo. Lenovo Legion 5  ships with 16GB of fast DDR5 RAM, which can be further upgraded to up to 32 GB. There are 2 M.2 2280 slots for secondary memory, one of which is preoccupied. The Legion Pro 5i 2024 packs a 4-cell 80Wh battery that supports Super Rapid Charge,  via the 170W adapter that ships in the box.

title: Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch (M2 Pro/Max)
short_description: The MacBook Pro 14-inch (2023) is a laptop geared toward creators and alike. Powered by the new and powerful Apple M2 Pro and M2 Max chips, the brand claims that the graphics performance of these SoCs has increased by up to 30% over their predecessors. The MacBook 14 can be configured with up to 96GB of RAM and 8TB of storage. Although the availability of the memory and storage configuration may vary by region. Aside from that, it is very similar to its predecessor in most ways. It has the same 14.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR screen and an aluminum chassis. An upgrade on this iteration is the MacBook now supports WiFi 6E and HDMI 2.1. And there are three Thunderbolt 4 ports, one SDXC card slot, and a 3.5mm headphone jack for connectivity. As usual, Apple sells the MacBook Pro 14-inch (2023) in Silver and Space Grey variants.

title: Lenovo Legion Y7000P 2024 (14th Gen Intel Core i7-14650HX, RTX 4060, 16GB, 1TB, 16" 2.5K 165Hz)
short_description: Lenovo Legion Y7000P 2024 is a gaming laptop that comes with a good set of hardware. This series normally does not arrive in Nepal, hence, this laptop is quite rare in that regard. That being said, it comes with a 14<sup>th</sup> Gen Intel Core i7-14650HX processor coupled with an NVidIA RTX 4060 discrete graphics card. On top of that, it packs 16GB DDR5-5600 RAM and 1TB PCIe Gen 4.0 SSD. Both the memory and storage can be upgraded to exactly double the capacity. Meanwhile, on the front, you get a 16-inch IPS LCD panel with a 165Hz refresh rate and a sRGB colour gamut. In the tank, a 99.9Wh battery powers the entire thing with a 230W charger to bring things at level when the juice runs out.
description:
Are you looking for a powerful laptop that can sort all your computing needs for years to come? Then you might want to take a look at this Lenovo Legion Y7000P 2024 with Intel i7-14650HX processor and RTX 4060 graphics card.

Lenovo Legion Y7000P 2024 Overview

This series of laptops is usually limited to China only. However, this somehow made its way to Nepal. Hence, it is more or less a limited edition laptop, if you will. But specs-wise, it is quite similar to its Legion 5 siblings.

Design and Display 

Lenovo Legion Y7000P 2024 is a gaming machine but comes in a rather subtle appearance. It goes with that simple yet iconic company and series branding on the lid. As for the ports, you get a decent selection — two USB-A one of which supports Always On, two USB-C, an HDMI port, one combo audio jack, a card reader, and an ethernet port.The Lenovo Legion Y7000P 2024 comes with a wide 16-inch display of 2.5K (2,560 x 1,600) resolution with a high 165Hz refresh rate. It is an IPS panel with a 16:10 aspect ratio and a 100% RGB colour gamut. The keyboard is a 4-Zone RGB backlit one, whereas the whole thing ships in Storm Grey colour.

Performance and the rest

Other than that, the Lenovo Legion Y7000P 2024 ensures smooth performance with the combination of 14th Gen Intel Core i7-14650HX processor and NVidIA RTX 4060. The processor has 16 (8 performance + 8 efficiency) cores, 24 threads, and 30MB of L3 cache. It can also go up to 5.2 GHz of max clock speed. As for the GPU, NVidIAs RTX 4060, with an 8GB GDDR6 VRAM, can handle graphic-intensive workloads easily. In addition, Lenovo has also included an LA1 AI chip to improve FPS in games.In addition to the solid CPU and GPU combo, the Lenovo Legion Y7000P 2024 ships with 16GB DDR5-5600 RAM, which can be further upgraded to 32GB. Furthermore, there are two M.2 2280 slots, one of which is preoccupied with a 1TB NVMe PCIe Gen 4 SSD. For power, it packs an integrated 99.9Wh battery that comes with a 230W adapter that ships in the box.

title: Dell Vostro 15 3500 2021 (11th Gen i3-1115G4, 4GB, 256GB, 15.6" FHD)
short_description: Dell Vostro 15 3500 (2021) is a 15.6-inch Ultrabook designed for those on a tight budget. It is powered by Intel's 11th Gen Core i3-1115G4 CPU, which has a turbo frequency of up to 4.1 GHz. The graphics processing is handled by Intel's integrated UHD GPU. This particular model is available with 4GB of RAM and 256GB of SSD storage. The laptop weighs only 1.78 kg and comes in only a black color variant. It is powered by a 3-cell 41Whr battery and can accept a 45W AC adaptor.
description:
The Dell Vostro 15 3500 (2021), powered by 11th Gen Intel Core i3-1115G4 CPU, is a budget-friendly business laptop that offers decent performance and features for everyday tasks.

Dell Vostro 15 3500 (2021) Overview

Performance

The Dell Vostro 15 3500 (2021) is powered by an 11th Gen Intel Core i3-1115G4 processor, which has a base frequency of 3.00GHz and a boost frequency of 4.10GHz. The processor has 6MB of cache and 4 threads, making it suitable for multitasking and web browsing. For handling graphics, there is an integrated Intel UHD Graphics card, which can handle basic graphics tasks and casual gaming.The laptop comes with 8GB of DDR4 RAM, which can be upgraded to 16GB if needed. The RAM runs at 2666MHz with integrated graphics. The laptop also has a 256GB M.2 PCIe NVMe SSD, which offers fast boot times and data transfers.

Design and Display

The Dell Vostro 15 3500 2021 (i3) sports a sleek and sturdy design with a titan grey color. It weighs 1.78 kg and measures 19.90 mm in height at the front and 19.90 mm at the rear. It is easy to carry around and fits in most backpacks.The laptop features a 15.6-inch FHD display with a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels and a refresh rate of 60 Hz. The display has an anti-glare coating and a narrow border design, which enhances the viewing experience. The display also supports a wide viewing angle of up to 80 degrees, thanks to the WVA technology.

Ports and Connectivity

The laptop has a variety of ports and slots for connectivity and expansion. It has two USB 3.2 Gen 1 port, one USB 2.0 port, one HDMI 1.4 port, one flip-down RJ-45 port, one audio jack, and one SD card slot. Along with that, you also get  Wi-Fi and Bluetooth wireless technologies.There is a full-size keyboard with a numeric keypad that is spill-resistant and comfortable to type on. Meanwhile, its touchpad supports multi-touch gestures.

Battery and Others

The laptop has a 3-cell battery that can last up to 7 hours on a single charge, depending on the usage and settings. You get a 45-watt AC adapter for charging.

title: Mivi DuoPods D4
short_description: The Mivi DuoPods D4 comes in a cool dual-tone design and boasts IPX4 water and dust resistance. The audio on these earbuds is offered by 13mm drivers while the connectivity is handled by Bluetooth v5.3. For a clear calling experience, you also get an environmental noise cancellation feature. These earbuds offer you up to 50 hours of playtime. Lastly, they offer a low-latency gaming mode that you can access by triple-tapping on the earbuds.
description:
Mivi DuoPods D4 Overview:

Design

The Mivi DuoPods D4 comes in an in-ear design with a dual-tone finish with silicone tips. The earbuds come with a smooth glossy finish. Similarly, the upper half of the stem comes with touch controls. The earpiece also houses smaller speaker grills on the side. Additionally, the buds offer IPX4 dust and water resistance.The charging case of the Mivi DuoPods D4 comes in a cylindrical/ovular shape and also has a dual-tone finish. The case features the company logo and four LEDs as the battery indicator. It also houses a USB Type-C at the base for charging. These buds are available in four colourways: Black, Blue, White, and Mint.

Audio and the rest

Dual 13mm drivers power these earbuds in terms of audio capabilities. Additionally, these earbuds feature AI ENC ensuring clearer calls. Meanwhile, for connectivity, they feature Bluetooth v5.3 with a low-latency mode that you can access by triple-tapping.In terms of playback time, you can get up to 50 hours of playtime from them. The Mivi DuoPods D4 also offer fast charging with 10 minutes of charge allowing you 500 minutes of usage. These earbuds also offer dual-connectivity mode letting you connect with up to two devices at a time.

title: Promate ProWatch-B18
short_description: The Promate ProWatch-B18 is a similar watch to the M18, with an aluminum build and features silicone and metal mesh straps. The 1.8-inch IPS LCD panel has a 240 x 286 px resolution but lacks Always On Display. It offers Bluetooth calling, RTL8762DT and AC6963 chipsets, 192 KB of memory, and 128MB of flash storage. Health features include a heart rate sensor, a blood oxygen level sensor, a sleep tracker, and a pedometer sensor for step counting. The Promate ProWatch-260 M18 has 37 sports modes for tracking workouts and sports.
description:
Promate ProWatch-B18 Overview:

Display and Design

Firstly, you get a similar build to the M18 in the Promate ProWatch-B18. The watch is made of aluminum. And like the M18, users can choose between silicone and metal mesh straps. Furthermore, there is a digital crown with the addition of another button. Also, for water and dust protection, the same IP68 rating is certified.However, the display is a downgrade. The ProWatch-B18 has a 1.8-inch IPS LCD panel with a 240 x 286 px resolution. However, it doesn't have Always on Display. And yes, you can choose from 100+ watch faces. Moreover, the watch arrives in Black, Blue, and Graphite color options.

Features

Moving on to the features one can enjoy with this watch, the first one that comes to mind is Bluetooth calling using BT 5.1. Users with this watch can pick up calls, dial calls, and talk with the receiver without ever having to open the phone. This is all thanks to the mic and speaker built into this watch. On the performance side, RTL8762DT and AC6963 chipsets power the B18. There is 192 KB of memory and 128MB of flash storage.As for health features, the watch is fitted with a heart rate sensor, a blood oxygen level sensor, a sleep tracker, and a pedometer sensor for step counting. 37 sports modes are available as well in ProWatch-B18 for tracking your workouts and sports.

Battery

Depending on your activity, the Promate ProWatch-B18's 260mAh battery allows for usage for 15-20 hours. A charging dock is also included with the box itself.

title: Realme Narzo 50
short_description: Realme Narzo is a budget-oriented gaming smartphone powered by a MediaTek Helio G96 chipset. Complementing this is a fluid 120Hz refresh rate on the front that also supports 6-level of adaptive refresh rate. Likewise, the handset is stuffed with a big 5000mAh battery that supports 33W fast charging.
description:
Realme Narzo 50 Overview, Price:

Here, we will discuss the full specifications and price of the Realme Narzo 50.

Design, Display

In a nutshell, the Narzo 50 is a rebranded version of the Realme 8i smartphone. The back has a matte finish with textured stripe patterns and a rectangular camera bump. Similarly, the front has a left-aligned punch-hole cut out and the screen size measures 6.6-inches.It's an IPS LCD panel with a 120Hz refresh rate and 180Hz touch sampling rate. In addition, the smartphone has six-level refresh rate—30Hz, 48Hz, 50Hz, 60Hz, 90Hz, 120Hz—that aids in battery life. The Realme Narzo 50 is available in Speed Black and Speed Blue color configurations.

Performance

Under the hood, it's powered by a MediaTek Helio G96 processor. It's a 12nm node mobile silicon with two Cortex-A76 cores and six Cortex-A55 cores. Similarly, the graphics are handled by Mali-G57 MC2 GPU. Moreover, the smartphone boots on Realme UI 2.0 based on Android 11. The memory option includes up to 6GB of LPDDR4X RAM and up to 128GB of UFS 2.1 internal storage.

Cameras, Others

In terms of the camera, the device has three of them at the back. This includes a 50MP primary sensor, and two 2MP B&W and macro lenses. Meanwhile, the aforementioned notch houses a 16MP selfie camera.Fueling the handset is a 5000mAh battery that supports 33W fast charging. And, the company has included a compatible charger inside the box.

title: Amazfit GTS 2
short_description: The Amazfit GTS 2 is a rectangle version of the GT 2 series, featuring a glossy plastic bottom shell and aluminum alloy body. It features a 5 ATM, tempered glass, and anti-fingerprint vacuum coating for added protection. The watch offers health and fitness tracking with 90+ sports modes, 6 of which is auto detectable. Other sensors include WLAN at 2.4 GHz, Bluetooth 5.0, and the Zepp App. The watch also features BioTracker 2 PPG, accelerometer, gyroscope, geomagnetic sensor, ambient light sensor, and air pressure sensor.
description:
Amazfit GTS 2 Overview:

Design and Display:

The Amazfit GTS 2 is the rectangular version of the GT 2 series. It boasts a high-gloss plastic bottom shell and an aluminum alloy body. The devices secure a 5 ATM along with tempered glass and an anti-fingerprint vacuum coating for extra protection from water, smudges, and fingerprints, of course. These are also lighter than their round version, weighing only 24.7g.For display, the GTS 2 ships with a 1.65-inch AMOLED screen with 348 x 442 px resolution and 341 PPI. And yes, this display has 3D glasses alongside a diamond-like coating (oDLC), making it scratch resistant.

Health and Fitness Tracking

On the fitness side of things, you have real-time heart rate monitoring, SpO2, sleep monitoring, stress tracking, sedentary reminders, and so on. You can use the automatic heartbeat measurement at intervals of 1, 5, 10, or 30 minutes.Not only that, the GTS 2 has 90+ sports modes built into it, including swimming, cycling, walking, and skiing. Some of them are automatically recognized by the watch itself, such as outdoor running, treadmill, walking, outdoor cycling, pool swimming, and elliptical. And paired with the GPS built inside the watch, the precise data is not a problem.

Sensors

Other than GPS, you are met with WLAN at 2.4 GHz. Additionally, to connect to your device, the GTS 2 provides you with Bluetooth 5.0 and the Zepp App to assist with that connection. Additionally, BioTracker 2 PPG tracks your health information, such as heart rate and blood oxygen. Further, the accelerometer, gyroscope, geomagnetic sensor, ambient light sensor, and air pressure sensor sense your movement activities.

Battery

With a much smaller battery than its rounded version, the Amazfit GTS2 lasts around 6 days of typical usage on a full charge. Even with heavy usage, the 246 mAh battery will stick with you for 3 days. And when the cell drains, you can just stick it onto the magnetic charging stand for about 2 hours to get from 0 to 100%.There is also a new version of this watch, which you can check out here.

title: Beats Studio Buds
short_description: The Beats Studio Buds are an in-ear earbud with an oval-shaped shell, weighing 5.1 grams and available in Red, Black, and White. They feature 8.2mm diaphragm drivers for stereo separation and minimal harmonic distortion, and Apple's Spatial Audio for a cinematic experience. The buds have physical buttons for music playback, call management, and transparency mode. They also support iOS and Android devices, including Beats' Find My feature for Android devices.
description:
Beats Studio Buds Overview:

Design

The Beats Studio Buds sport an in-ear design akin to the AirPods Pro, minus the elongated stem. Encased in an oval-shaped shell, they feature a front-facing indicator LED. Inside the case are the two buds, weighing 5.1 grams. To fit your ears, the package ships with three silicone tip sizes. Additionally, these buds are available in Red, Black, and White.

Audio

On the audio front, Studio Buds are driven by 8.2mm diaphragm drivers. These advanced drivers, coupled with a two-chamber acoustic architecture, provide stereo separation and minimal harmonic distortion across the entire frequency spectrum, as per the company.Furthermore, the Studio Buds unlock Apple's Spatial Audio, offering a more captivating and cinematic auditory experience, though this feature is exclusive to Apple Music subscribers. Additionally, the TWS delivers active noise cancellation and transparency modes.

Controls

The Beats Studio Buds boast physical buttons on each earbud, facilitating various controls. A single tap handles music playback and call management, while a double tap lets you skip to the next track, and a triple tap returns you to the previous one. The transparency mode can be activated via a long press on the "b" button. Moreover, they support hands-free Siri functionality.

Battery

Beats claims Studio Buds can endure up to eight hours on a single charge, with the case providing two additional charging cycles. This brings the total playback to up to 24 hours. When active noise cancellation is engaged, the earbuds maintain a battery life of up to five hours.

Rest of the specs

Beyond these key features, the Studio Buds offer compatibility with both iOS and Android devices. Notably, they mark Beats' debut into the world of Apple's Find My and Find My Device on Android, allowing users to pinpoint the last known location of their earbuds within Bluetooth range, ensuring you never misplace them again

seo_description_facebook: Beats Studio Buds full specifications, price, comparison, and more. Find out the complete specs and price of the Beats Studio Buds

title: HiFuture FutureMate Pro
short_description: HiFuture FutureMate Pro is an open-ear TWS with wings for easy ear placement. It has an IPX5 water-resistance rating and comes in black and white colors. Qualcomm's QCC3040 chipset is what powers them, featuring aptX adaptive support and Bluetooth 5.2. The earbuds have a 70 mAh battery in each earpiece and a 500 mAh battery in the case, allowing them to last around 20 hours.
description:
HiFuture FutureMate Pro Overview:

Design

Starting with, HiFuture FutureMate Pro is an open-ear TWS. The wings go up and around the buds to hold them near the ears. If you don't know what an open-ear is, this type of earphone leaves your ear fully open, making you fully aware of your surroundings while immersing yourself in the music.On the other side, the FutureMate Pro provides an IPX5 water-resistance rating. Moreover, they arrived in two different colors, Black and White.

Audio

On the audio side, Qualcomm's QCC3040 chipset powers the FutureMate Pro. This is why the earbuds have aptX adaptive support and come with Bluetooth 5.2. Here, the APTX Adaptive adapts the bitrate and the latency according to the content being consumed. Likewise, 15.4mm neodymium drivers are what they use to deliver the music. Users even get to use ENC while calling.

Battery

For endurance, the HiFuture FutureMate Pro fits a 70 mAh cell into each earpiece. With an additional 500mAh battery in the case, the TWS as a whole lasts around 20 hours. Charging is kinda slow, though! Recharging them back to full takes a theoretical duration of 5 hours.

title: Amazfit Bip U
short_description: The Amazfit Bip U is a 2.5D Gorilla Glass 3 smartwatch with a 1.43-inch display and an HD color screen with 320 x 302 px resolution. Users can customize 50 watch faces, and the watch is rated at 5 ATM for water resistance. Available in Black, Pink, and Green, it offers health tracking features like 24/7 heart rate monitoring, SpO2, sleep/stress monitoring, and PAI Health Assessment. The Bip U also features 60 sports modes, which can be analyzed using Zepp's app.
description:
Amazfit Bip U Overview:

Display and Design

On the display side, the Amazfit Bip U has 2.5D Gorilla Glass 3 with a 1.43-inch display. It is advertised to have an HD color screen. Further, you get an impressive 320 x 302 px resolution on a TFT panel. Additionally, users can choose from 50 watch faces for customization.And yes, the watch is square. A button on the right side controls the Bip U. Furthermore, the smartwatch has a 5 ATM rating, keeping it safe under 50 meters of water. Besides, it is available in three colors: Black, Pink, and Green.

Features

In terms of health tracking, every basic feature, such as 24/7 heart rate monitoring, SpO2, sleep/ stress monitoring, and PAI Health Assessment, is available in Bip U. This is all thanks to the sensors provided in Bip U: BioTracker 2 PPG, Accelerometer, and Gyroscope. The geomagnetic sensor is only available in its Pro version. And for fitness, there are around 60 sports modes, including outdoor running, treadmill, walking, outdoor cycling, yoga, cricket, etc. All of these can be analyzed using Zepp's app. This app also allows for other features such as application notifications, incoming call alerts, etc.

Battery

The Amazfit Bip U packs a 230 mAh lithium-ion polymer cell to fuel all this up. In a typical scenario, this wearable runs for nine days without hesitation. Additionally, the charger inside the box charges the device within 2 hours.

title: HP Envy x360 14 2023 (13th Gen i7-1355U, 16GB, 1TB, 14" FHD Touch)
short_description: HP Envy x360 14 (2023) is a 2-in-1 powered by a 13th Gen Intel Core i7-1355U processor. It comes with 16GB of fast RAM and 1TB M.2 2280 SSD. It has an FHD display and good build quality. You can fold the laptop into a tablet using the device's 360-degree hinge and use it with the HP Stylus. This is HP's offering to creative professionals or office workers seeking a sleek and portable everyday carry.
description:
HP Envy x360 14 (2023) Overview:

HP Envy x360 14 (2023) with the Intel i7 chip is an affordable 2-in-1 with a great display and battery life. It weighs just 1.5 kilos, making it an ideal everyday carry. With its fast memory and capable processor, it'll breeze through most office and creative work. Here's a brief description of the build, chipset, and connectivity options on the HP Envy x360 14 (2023) with the Intel i7-1355U processor.

Display and Design 

HP Envy x360 14 (2023) sports a 14" IPS panel of FHD (1920x 1080) resolution. It is a 60Hz display that can also reach 250 nits of brightness. The laptop's 360° hinge allows it to fold on itself to be used like a tablet. Having a multi-touch screen, you can also draw or take notes with the HP stylus.

Performance and Memory 

Under the hood, HP Envy x360 14 (2023) has the 13th Gen Intel Core i7-1355U processor. It features Intel's integrated Iris Xe graphics. The RAM is fast DDR4 memory. This variant comes with 16GB RAM and 1TB of M.2 SSD.

Connectivity and Extras

title: Redmi 10 Prime
short_description: Redmi 10 Prime is a budget smartphone that delivers great battery life—thanks to the 6000mAh battery. Xiaomi has also included a dual speaker setup for better multimedia consumption. For binging movies and such, there is a big 6.5-inch screen with Full HD+ resolution. The display also boasts a refresh rate of 90Hz, which allows for smoother scrolling throughout the user interface. Furthermore, the phone offers Corning Gorilla Glass 3 protection on the front, as well as dust and splash resistance. Overall, the Redmi 10 Prime is a good phone in its price range.
description:
Redmi 10 Prime Overview, Price:

Here, we will discuss the full specifications and price of the Redmi 10 Prime. [It's worth noting that the Redmi 10 Prime is the same phone as the Redmi 10 Prime 2022, which was recently released in Nepal.] 

Design, Display

To begin with, the Redmi 10 Prime features a glossy finish on the back with a rectangular camera module. The device is quite thick at 9.56mm and weighs 192 grams. Nonetheless, there are slight curves at the back that aids in hand grip. It is available in three colors—Phantom Black, Bifrost Blue, and Astral White.On the front, it has a 6.5-inch hole-punch cutout screen with Full HD+ resolution. The screen features a refresh rate of 90Hz that can switch between 45Hz, 60Hz, and 90Hz depending on the content on the screen. Protecting the display is a Corning Gorilla Glass 3, and the phone is dust and splash-proof too.

Performance

Under the hood, it's powered by a MediaTek Helio G88 processor. It's a 12nm mobile silicon and comprises 2 x Cortex-A75 cores and 6 x Cortex-A55 cores clocked at 2.0GHz and 1.8GHz, respectively. Graphics, on the other hand, is taken care of by the Mali-G52 MC2 GPU. The G88 fares well in terms of day-to-day tasks.The memory option includes up to 6GB of RAM and 128GB of internal storage. In terms of software, it comes pre-installed with MIUI 12 and the core platform is Android 11.

Cameras, Others

Redmi Note 10 Prime features a quad-camera setup at the back. This includes a 50MP primary sensor, an 8MP ultra-wide, and a couple of 2MP sensors for depth and macro shots. For selfies, there is an 8MP sensor on the aforementioned punch-hole cutout.Fueling the handset is a 6000mAh battery that supports 18W fast charging. However, Xiaomi ships a 22.5W fast charger inside the box. Anyways, charging the phone takes around 2 hours and 30 minutes to completely charge the cell. For connectivity, it supports dual-band WiFi and Bluetooth 5.1.

seo_description_facebook: Redmi 10 Prime price, full specifications, and more. Find out the complete specs, price of the Redmi 10 Prime here.

Realme Narzo 50A brings a 6.5-inch HD+ screen with a waterdrop notch at the top. The phone has noticeable bezels around the screen that result in an 88.7% screen-to-body ratio. Further, the screen can get as bright as 570 nits peak brightness under the sunlight mode.Everything from the rear panel to the frame of the Narzo 50A consists of plastic. That being said, the company has tried to spice up the design by incorporating a dual-tone finish. There are stripes that form a wavy from the bottom of the huge camera bump.

Performance

Under the hood, Realme Narzo 50A packs the MediaTek Helio G85 chipset. Talking about the CPU, it has two Cortex-A75 (@2.0GHz) and six Cortex-A55 (@1.8GHz). Likewise, the chipset even has support for MediaTek's HyperEngine gaming technology. The phone boots on Realme UI 2.0 based on Android 11.

Cameras, Others

In terms of optics, Realme Narzo 50A has a triple camera configuration on the back, headlined by a 50MP primary sensor. This is accompanied by a 2MP depth lens and another 2MP macro sensor. The front has an 8MP sensor in a punch-hole for selfies and video calls.Fueling the smartphone is a 6000mAh battery that supports 18W charging Connectivity options include 4G, dual-band Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5.0, GPS, and USB Type-C.

Performance

Unfortunately, the Realme UI R edition is not as good as the standard version of Realme UI. Thus, it is quite a hassle to use.

Cameras, Others

In terms of optics, the Realme C25Y features a 50MP primary sensor and two 2MP lenses for portrait and macro photography. Similarly, the front waterdrop notch houses an 8MP selfie camera. Also, it has a 5,000mAh battery with 18W fast charging, a mono speaker, and a 3.5mm headphone jack.

title: Samsung Galaxy A13

description:
Samsung Galaxy A13 Overview:

Design, Display

The Galaxy A13 comes with a polycarbonate back and Gorilla Glass 5 protection on the front. Over at the back, the device has individual protruding camera lenses. Performance

Likewise, it is also available in 4/64GB and  6/128GB variants.The Galaxy A13 boots on One UI 4.1 Core based on Android 12 out of the box. The Core version is a stripped-down One UI designer for low-power budget smartphones.

Cameras, Others

Moving on, the Galaxy A13 has a quad-camera setup at the back. This includes a 50MP f/1.8 primary, a 5MP f/2.2 ultra-wide (123° field of view), a 2MP macro, and a 2MP depth sensor. Then there's an 8MP f/2.2 selfie camera inside the aforementioned notch.A 5,000mAh battery powers the Galaxy A13.  For charging and data transfer, there is a Type-C port at the bottom. The phone supports 15W charging, although a compatible power brick isn't included inside the box.

title: Marshall Action III
short_description: The Marshall Action III is a high-quality speaker with a metal grille and leather pattern, available in Black, Cream, and Brown colors. It features a stereo configuration with dynamic drivers and a frequency range of 45–20,000 Hz. The speaker supports Bluetooth 5.2 and a 3.5 mm input, allowing users to stream music and customize sound through the Marshall Bluetooth app. It supports Bluetooth LE Audio and offers a 10-meter wireless connectivity range.
description:
Marshall Action III Overview:

Design

Measuring 260 x 170 x 150 mm and weighing 2.85 kg, the Action III joins the lineage of Marshall's Action series. The speaker uses a metal grille at the front with a logo, and the body features an iconic leather pattern. Another thing that's adding to the style are the available color options, including Black, Cream, and Brown.All the controls are located on the top panel, allowing for easy access. With its volume, bass, and treble control knobs, along with a power switch, play/pause, source buttons, and a 3.5 mm input, the Action III puts the power of audio customization at your fingertips. 
  • Check out other Marshall speakers here.

Audio

With dynamic drivers and a frequency range of 45–20,000 Hz, this speaker provides a range of audio experiences. The Action III boasts a stereo configuration. To boost the transducers inside, the audio product houses one 30 Watt Class D amplifier for the woofer and two 15 Watt Class D amplifiers for the tweeters.

Connectivity

Connectivity options include both wireless and wired connections. With Bluetooth 5.2 and a 3.5 mm input, users can stream their favorite music however they want. Action III allows sound customization via both the controls on the unit and the dedicated Marshall Bluetooth app available on Android and iOS. It does support Bluetooth LE Audio and offers a range of 10 meters (30 feet) for wireless connectivity

It comes with a fairly attractive design and a big 5000mAh battery. But besides that, the Nord N20 SE is quite an underwhelming budget phone. You're getting an HD display with a teardrop notch which houses an 8MP selfie camera. Talking about cameras, OnePlus has given a 50MP primary and a 2MP depth sensor at the back. It is powered by MediaTek's Helio G35 processor alongside 4GB RAM and 64GB storage (expandable). The phone runs on Android 12 with OxygenOS 12.1 on top.

title: iPhone 14 Pro Max
short_description: iPhone 14 Pro Max is Apple's biggest and most expensive iPhone of 2022. It brings a massive 6.7\" OLED display with the new \"Dynamic Island\" hole-punch cutout, alongside a revamped camera system and more. Dynamic Island is Apple's next iteration of housing and hiding the front camera and other sensors, while also introducing a distinct design language. The upgraded camera array on the iPhone 14 Pro Max now consists of a 48MP primary sensor, a 12MP ultrawide, and a 12MP telephoto camera. You can now shoot Cinematic Mode videos at up to 4K HDR @ 30 fps, whereas the iPhone 14 series also introduces something called \"Action Mode\" for steadier videos. As expected, the iPhone 14 Pro Max is powered by Apple's latest A16 Bionic chip. It also boasts a big 4,323mAh battery, which is interestingly slightly smaller than what you get on the cheaper iPhone 14 Plus.

title: Aqfit W15
short_description: The AQFiT W15 Smartwatch is a sleek, stylish device with a Zinc-Magnesium alloy body, food-grade silicone strap, and carbon fiber back case. It features a 1.33-inch HD IPS round display with 5ATM and IP68 waterproof ratings. The watch also serves as a comprehensive health tracker, offering 24/7 heart rate, blood oxygen, sleep tracking, and a pedometer. It has a 220 mAh cobalt lithium battery with 8–10 days of battery life and a long standby time of up to 60 days. It offers various sports modes and Bluetooth 4.2 connectivity.
description:
Aqfit W15 Overview:

Design and Display

The AQFiT W15 Smartwatch boasts a sleek design with a Zinc-Magnesium alloy body. Its food-grade silicone strap ensures a comfortable fit during extended use. The watch also features an artistic design with a carbon fiber back case, according to the company.The large 1.33-inch HD IPS round display offers a resolution of 240 x 240. Moreover, its 5ATM and IP68 waterproof ratings mean you don't have to worry about any water damage during normal usage. At the front, you are provided with 9H tempered glass.

Health features

The AQFiT W15 is not just a stylish accessory; it also serves as a comprehensive health tracker. Equipped with the latest Nordic chipset NFR52832 and ST LIS2DH12TR sensor, this smartwatch offers 24/7 heart rate monitoring, blood oxygen (SPO2) monitoring, sleep tracking, and a pedometer to count your steps.Not only does the tracker include sensors, but it also includes a feature to remind you to stay hydrated, which can be particularly helpful in busy times. Besides, the watch provides data on the number of calories burned throughout the day.

Battery

Powered by a 220 mAh cobalt lithium battery, the AQFiT W15 offers 8–10 days of battery life. This means that you can use the watch without constantly worrying about recharging it. Especially, the long standby time of up to 60 days is convenient for users who are always in a hurry.

Rest of the specs

Other than that, the watch includes a variety of sports modes, allowing users to track their activities, whether it's running, walking, cycling, or engaging in other sports and fitness activities. The anti-lost feature assures that you won't misplace your smartwatch. Additionally, it uses Bluetooth 4.2 for connectivity.
seo_title_facebook: Aqfit W15 Price, Full Specifications, Comparisons
seo_description_facebook: Aqfit W15 price, full specifications, and more. Find out the complete specs, features, and price of the Aqfit W15 smartwatch.

title: HiFuture FutureGo Pro
short_description: The HiFuture FutureGo Mix2 is a circular smartwatch with a round, 1.43\" AMOLED screen with a resolution of 466 x 466 pixels. It features an in-built speaker, microphone, Bluetooth 5.3, and a single chip for BT calling. The watch also offers health features like a real-time heart rate monitor, a pedometer, a sleep monitor, and 19 sports modes.
description:

Design and Display

HiFuture FutureGo Pro ships with a stainless steel cover and a zinc alloy middle frame. Additionally, it is certified with 3 ATM water protection. Plus, you get a stainless steel band 22mm wide.Flipping to the front, the FutureGo Pro is set with a round 1.32" FHD AMOLED display. Talking of the screen resolution of 360×360.

Bluetooth calling

Moreover, this smartwatch has an in-built speaker and a microphone. Combined with Bluetooth 5.3 and a single chip for BT calling, the company claims to have low power consumption. The FutureGo Mix2 also has recent call logs which allows calling and even saving some contacts as favorites.

Features and the rest

On a further note, you get what most watches provide in terms of health features. There is a real-time heart rate monitor and a pedometer. But there are no mentions of the SpO2 sensor. It even comes with a sleep monitor and 19 or more sports modes.Furthermore, users can remotely control the music and camera of their smartphone. About battery life, the cell powering the HiFuture FutureGo Mix2 has a 400 mAh capacity and can be used for 12 days.

title: Xiaomi 15
short_description: The Xiaomi 15 offers powerful performance with the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, a stunning 6.36-inch 120Hz OLED display, and up to 16GB RAM and 1TB storage. Its 50MP triple-camera setup ensures great photos, while the 5,400mAh battery supports fast charging. A premium choice for performance and design.
description:
Xiaomi is one of the most popular smartphone manufacturers in the world that garnered the attention of the world with “flagship killer” phones. Like similar companies before it, it gradually shifted to the flagship space itself with a series of phones named after itself. The Xiaomi 15 is the companys flagship offering for the year 2025.

Xiaomi 15 Overview

Snapdragon 8 Elite

As I mentioned earlier, Xiaomi 15 is the first-ever phone to pack the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset inside. Apart from the new naming scheme, this processor comes in the 3nm fabrication, making it the first Qualcomm silicon to have this lithography.Furthermore, the chipset has a new in-house Oryon CPU architecture with two prime and six performance cores. It does not have any efficiency cores, whatsoever. In the meantime, the prime cores clock in at a whopping 4.32GHz, while the performance cores rest at 3.53GHz. For reference, the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 peaked at 3.3GHz, which is less than the frequency output of Snapdragon 8 Elite’s weaker cores.All this is to say, the Snapdragon 8 Elite brings a significant performance boost to the Xiaomi 15.

Design and Display

Appearance-wise the Xiaomi 15 does not deviate much from its predecessor. It has the same flat frames with flat edges. The camera island remains in the same position retaining the squircle shape. It is IP64-rated and available in a plethora of colour choices.The regular lineup includes Lilac, Light Green, Black, White, and Bright Silver. The latter looks very unique with its flashy metallic colour and groovy patterns. You can also get the Xiaomi 15 in three limited-edition options clad in leather and encrusted with diamonds. You can choose from Glacier White, Elephant Grey, and Orange shades.On the front, it has a 6.36-inch 8T LTPO OLED display that is curved on the edges. It is surrounded by minimal bezels that are just 1.38 mm thick. Additionally, this screen stretches 1.5K in resolution and offers up to 120Hz refresh rate. Similarly, users get to enjoy a touch sampling rate and a peak brightness of up to 300Hz and 3,200 nits respectively. The Xiaomi 15 is triple TÜV Rheinland certified and is easy on your eyes. Meanwhile, the Xiaomi “Dragon Crystal” Glass adds durability to the screen.

Additional Hardware

Moving on to additional internal hardware, you can configure the Xiaomi 15 in four different trims. Those being 12GB + 256GB, 12GB + 512GB, 16GB + 512GB, and 16GB + 1TB. The memory in here is an LPDDR5X, while the storage is UFS 4.0. Xiaomi does not mention anything about its patented Ultra Space, which offers extra storage space in your phone. It was available in last year’s flagship and the Xiaomi 14T series though.The Xiaomi has a 5,400 mAh silicon-carbon battery in the tank and supports 90W wired and 50W wireless charging. Likewise, it can reverse charge other devices wirelessly too. The Xiaomi 15 features a larger heat dissipation unit to keep things cool and smooth.

Camera

This phone is also stacked in the camera department. It is equipped with three shooters altogether, the main one being a 50MP unit with a Light Hunter 900 sensor underneath. The auxiliary lenses on the Xiaomi 15 are a telephoto lens and an ultrawide snapper — both of 50MP resolution. The former doubles down as a macro shooter as well, capable of getting as close as 10cm. Meanwhile, it has a 32MP camera on the front for selfies.

title: HiFuture Ultra 3
short_description: The HiFuture Ultra 3 is a rugged smartwatch with carbon fibre base coating and IP68 water and dust resistance. It is ideal for adventure sports fanatics and thrill-seekers. It comes with a silicone strap and a 2-inch screen with an IPS panel. Other than that, it offers over 100 sports modes, heart rate and blood oxygen monitoring, and Bluetooth calling. This smartwatch can last you an average of 7 days on a single charge.
description:
Are you someone who does a lot of adventure sports? And as such are you looking for a rugged and sporty smartwatch to match your adventurous lifestyle? Then the HiFuture Ultra 3 might just be what you are looking for!

HiFuture Ultra 3 Overview

Design and Display

The HiFuture Ultra 3 is a rugged smartwatch that comes with a silicone strap. The case here is an octagon with two buttons on the left and a grippy structure on the right. The watch features a carbon fibre finish on the back for added protection while boasting IP68 water and dust resistance. As a result, this watch can handle being submerged under shallow waters and is ideal for all you thrill-seekers out there!On the front, this smartwatch comes with a 2-inch screen. It is an IPS panel spanning 240 x 296 pixels in resolution. Though other key aspects have not been mentioned, the company assures unparalleled clarity and vibrancy with the screen. The HiFuture Ultra 3 comes in three colour options: Thunder Black, Carmine Red, and Cadmium Orange.

Features and the rest

This smartwatch comes packed with a decent selection of health and fitness tracking features. For fitness tracking, you get over 100 sports tracking modes including the likes of walking, running, swimming, and jumping. With a wide selection of sports modes, this watch will keep up with your fitness journey.In the meantime, for health tracking, we are getting 24/7 true heart rating monitoring as well as SpO2 monitoring through HiFuture's fifth-generation blood oxygen sensors. Other than health and fitness tracking, the HiFuture Ultra 3 offers a wireless calling feature over Bluetooth. The company has not specified the Bluetooth version this smartwatch running on. Lastly, this smartwatch is capable of offering you 7 days of usage.

title: Lenovo wp_ideapad Slim 3 2023 (13th Gen i3-1305U, 8GB, 256GB, 15.6" FHD)
short_description: Lenovo ideaPad Slim 3 2023 is a budget laptop with a 15.6\" IPS screen powered by Intel Core i3-1305U and comes with 8GB of RAM and 256GB of storage. This particular model is suitable for students and users who want a laptop that can do basic note-taking and a bit of multitasking at ease at an affordable price.
description:
The 2023 variant of Lenovo ideaPad Slim 3 comes with the Intel Core i3-1305u processor in a 15.6-inch IPS Screen. Lets dive in for a detailed overview of the specifications.

Lenovo ideaPad Slim 3 2023 Overview

Design and Build

Lenovo ideaPad Slim 3 (2023) comes with three color options: Artic Grey, Abyss Blue, and Frost Blue. The base 15.6” model measures 17.9mm thick and has a starting weight of 1.62 kg. Lenovo ideaPad Slim 3 has an FHD IPS panel with 300 nits of brightness and a viewing angle of 85°.

Performance and Extras

Lenovo ideaPad Slim 3 2023 comes with 13th Gen Intel Core i3-1305u accompanied by integrated Intel UHD graphics. It is a 5C/6T CPU with a maximum clock speed of up to 4.5GHz.This new chip brings support for LPDDR5 memory, which Lenovo is happy to ship the ideaPad Slim 3. On the downside, the memory is soldered. That means you won’t be able to upgrade it beyond the default 8GB. For storage, the laptop ships with a 256GB SSD.Lenovo ideaPad Slim 3 housed a 47Wh battery with 65W power.  Talking about ports, Lenovo has included 2x USB-A, 1x USB-C, 1x HDMI, 1x combined audio jack, and an SD card reader. The laptop also has Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2 for wireless connectivity.

title: HiFuture Aura
short_description: The HiFuture Aura is a women-centric smartwatch with a 1.04-inch AMOLED display, tempered glass, and a metallic frame. It has a feminine design, and adjustable strap, and comes in Glisten Gold, Murk Black, and Pristine Silver. Compatible with Android 7.0 and iOS 12.0, it's IP68 dust/water-resistant, supporting various activities. Features include multiple watch faces, sports modes, a 24-hour heart rate monitor, sleep tracker, SpO2 calculation, Bluetooth calling, and alert messages. With a 160mAh battery, it charges in 2 hours. The package includes the watch, magnetic charging cable, user manual, and strap adjustment tool.
description:
HiFuture is a Chinese accessories brand that has a wide catalog ranging from basic stuff like earbuds, and smartwatches to more niche products like smart glasses. One such offering from HiFuture is the Aura smartwatch.

HiFuture Aura Overview

Design and Display

The watch features a 1.04-inch AMOLED screen with a resolution of 340×340 pixels. It boasts a touchscreen display protected by tempered glass with an anti-fingerprint coating and is encased in a metallic frame.Additionally, the watch has a very feminine look, indicating its focus on a female audience. It has a thickness of 20mm, which is decent. The strap is adjustable to fit wrists with dimensions ranging from 150mm to 200mm and comes with a clasp buckle. Likewise, it is available in three color options: Glisten Gold, Murk Black, and Pristine Silver.

Features

The HiFuture Aura is compatible with devices having Android 7.0 and above or iOS 12.0 and above. Also, it comes with an IP68 dust and water-resistant rating, making it suitable for daily use and various environments including outdoor activities, sports, and even in rainy or dusty environments.The watch supports multiple watch faces, sports modes, and health features, including a 24-hour heart rate monitor, sleep tracker, real-time SpO2 calculation, and more. It also enables Bluetooth calling and alert messages and can connect to other mobile phones using Bluetooth 5.0.

HiFuture Aura: Battery and On the Box

The HiFuture Aura is equipped with a 160mAh battery that can be charged from 0% to 100% in around 2 hours using magnetic charging.Moreover, in the box, you will find the HiFututure Female watch itself, a magnetic charging cable, a user instruction manual to help you get started, and a strap adjustment tool, among other accessories.

title: Dell Vostro 14 3400 2021 (11th Gen i5-1135G7, 8GB, 256GB, 14" FHD)
short_description: The Dell Vostro 14 3400 is a business laptop with a stylish design. It is powered by an Intel Core i5 processor and Iris Xe graphics. In terms of memory, Dell sells it in Nepal with 8GB RAM and 256GB storage. It has a 14-inch screen with Full HD resolution and its WVA (wide-viewing-angle) panel provides very little color shift even when viewing the screen from the sides. Furthermore, with a weight of only 1.64 kg, it is easy to carry in your office bag as well.
description:
If you are looking for a reliable and affordable laptop for your small business, you might want to consider the Dell Vostro 14 3400 (2021) with an 11th Gen Intel Core i5 processor. It also has a sleek and durable design, with a spill-resistant keyboard and a fingerprint reader for added security.

Dell Vostro 14 3400 (2021) Overview:

Display

The Dell Vostro 14 3400 has a Full HD display with a matte coating that reduces glare and reflections. The display quality is decent, with good contrast and brightness levels, but it is not very color accurate or vivid. The viewing angles are also narrow, so you might have to adjust the screen position to get the best image.The keyboard of the Dell Vostro 3400 is a standard one, though there is also an option for a white backlight. The touchpad is smooth and responsive, and it supports multi-touch gestures. The laptop also has a good selection of ports, including USB-C, USB-A, HDMI, Ethernet, and an SD card reader.

Performance

This 14-inch laptop offers decent performance for the everyday user, thanks to its Intel Core i5-1135G7 processor. This 11th Gen Tiger Lake CPU has four cores and eight threads with an 8MB L3 cache. Accompanying it is a 8GB of DDR4 RAM, and 256GB of SSD storage.

Battery

The battery life of the Dell Vostro 14 3400 (i5) has an average 42Wh battery. It is said to last about 6 hours of mixed usage on a single charge. This is enough for most workdays, but you might want to bring the charger with you if you plan to use the laptop for longer periods. You get a 65W power adapter bundled in the box.
  • Also Check: Dell Laptops Price In Nepal 2023 [Updated]
The Dell Vostro 14 3400 is a great choice for small business owners who need a reliable and affordable laptop that can handle their daily tasks. It has a solid performance, a durable design, and a decent display. It is not very suitable for gaming or creative work, but it can handle some light photo and video editing. The Dell Vostro 14 3400 powered by 11th Gen Intel Core i5 CPU is a laptop that delivers what it promises: value for money.

title: Fitbit Sense 2
short_description: After almost 2 years, Fitbit finally launched the successor to its \"Sense\" smartwatch back in August 2022. This flagship smartwatch has a sleek, lightweight design and is available in three color options: Shadow Grey / Graphite Aluminum, Lunar White / Platinum Aluminum, and Blue Mist / Soft Gold Aluminum. Fitbit claims it is both 10% slimmer and 15% lighter than its predecessor. More on the design, the Sense 2 replaces the solid-state button with a mechanical one. Along with all the other basic health-tracking features, this smartwatch also supports skin temperature readings, ECG measurements, and more. Its built-in NFC makes hands-free payment quite easy, which is complemented by support for Fitbit Pay and Google Wallet support. Fitbit claims the Sense 2 can run up to 6 days on a single charge. Whereas just 12 minutes of charge should be enough to get you through a full day.

title: Lenovo Legion Pro 5i 2023 (13th gen i9 13900HX, RTX 4070, 16GB, 1TB, 16" WQXGA 240Hz)
short_description: The Legion 5 Pro is a new range of laptops that is set to replace the vanilla Legion 5 lineup. The first Legion 5 Pro laptop was introduced at CES 2023 with 13th Gen Intel \"Raptor Lake\" processors and RTX 40-series GPU. The CPU-GPU combo is paired with Lenovo's in-house cooling solution and AI Engine to maximize fps in games.
description:
Lenovo Legion Pro 5i 2023: Overview 

Here's a brief overview of the design aesthetic, CPU/GPU, and battery life of the Lenovo Legion Pro 5i 2023 with i9 and RTX 4070.

Build and Display 

Lenovo Legion Pro 5i has the build of a gaming machine. It has an all-aluminium build and weighs a hefty 2.5 kilos. The wide 16" display of WQXGA (2560x1080) resolution has a high 240Hz refresh rate. It has a tall 16:10 aspect ratio as well. The keyboard has a custom 4 Zone RGB backlight, whereas the keycaps are black in color.

Performance and Memory

Lenovo Legion Pro 5i 2023 is powered by Intel's 13th gen Core i9 processor along with NVidIA's RTX 4070. The 13900HX processor, here, has 24 (8 performance + 8 efficiency) cores and 32 threads. It has 36MB of L3 cache. It can also go up to 5.4 GHz of max clock speed. As for the GPU, NVidIA's RTX 4070, with a maximum TGP of 140W, can handle graphic-intensive workloads easily. In addition, Lenovo has also included LA1 AI chip to improve fps in games.The laptop has Lenovo's Coldfront 4.0 technology to cool this CPU/GPU combo. Lenovo Legion Pro 5i ships with 16GB of fast DDR5 RAM, which can be further upgraded to up to 32 GB. There are 2 M.2 2280 slots for secondary memory, one of which is preoccupied.

Battery and Connectivity 

Legion Pro 5i (2023) packs a 4-cell 80Wh battery that lasted about 5.3 hours (hybrid mode) on MobileMark 2018 test. It supports Super Rapid Charge, which can charge the cells up to 80% in 30 minutes via the 230W adapter that ships in the box.As for the ports, you get a lot— 2 USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-Cs (with DisplayPort1.4), 3 USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 ports, and a headphone port. Similarly, there is also an  HDMI 2.1, an RJ45 port, and a power-in socket.

description:
Are you looking for a laptop that combines performance, portability, and style? Then you might want to check out the Dell Inspiron 16 5620 (2022) with Intel Core i5-1240P CPU and NVidIA MX570 graphics.

Dell Inspiron 16 5620 (2022)

Performance

The Dell Inspiron 16 5620 (2022) is powered by the 12th Gen Intel Core i5-1240P processor. It has 12 cores, 16 threads, and up to 4.40 GHz Turbo speed. This processor delivers fast and smooth performance for everyday tasks and entertainment. Handling the graphics side is an NVidIA GeForce MX570 graphics card with 2GB VRAM. As for the memory and storage, you get 8GB of DDR4 RAM and 512GB of PCIe NVMe SSD storage.

Design and Ports

The laptop boasts a sleek and elegant design, with a platinum silver exterior and a titan gray backlit keyboard. Weighing 1.87 kg and it has a thin profile of 15.67 mm at the front and 17.95 mm at the rear. You get a variety of ports and slots, including USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, USB 3.2 Gen 2x1 Type-C with Power Delivery and DisplayPort, HDMI 1.4, an audio jack, and an SD-card slot.

Display

This laptop features a 16-inch FHD display with a 16:10 aspect ratio, which offers more vertical space for multitasking and productivity. The display also has anti-glare and ComfortView technologies, which reduce eye strain and enhance viewing comfort.

Others

Fueling the Dell Inspiron 16 5620 is a 4 Cell, 54Wh battery with 65 Watt AC adapter. For wireless connectivity, there is an Intel Wi-Fi 6E AX211, which supports faster and more reliable wireless connectivity. And you also get Stereo speakers with Waves MaxxAudio Pro, which deliver clear and immersive sound quality. Besides that, the laptop features a 1080p FHD camera with dual-array microphones.The Dell Inspiron 16 5620 2022 is a great choice for anyone who wants a laptop that can handle both work and play with ease.

title: Dell Inspiron 13 5310 2021 (11th Gen i7-11370H, 16GB, 512GB, 13.3" QHD)
short_description: Dell Inspiron 13 5310 (2021) is a mid-range ultraportable laptop that blends premium aesthetics with a powerful Tiger Lake H-Series chipset. It comes with an 11th-generation Intel Core i7-11370H CPU with 16GB of LPDDR4x RAM, and 512GB of M.2 PCIe NVMe SSD. Furthermore, at 1.28kg weight, this laptop feels almost nonexistent in your backpack. Content creators will also admire its 16:10 aspect ratio display with QHD resolution and 300 nits of peak brightness. Other notable features include WiFi 6 support and Thunderbolt 4 ports.
description:
If you are looking for a powerful and portable laptop, you might want to check out the Dell Inspiron 13 5310 (2021) with 11th Gen Core i7 processor. It also has a matte Full HD display with a 16:10 aspect ratio, a large 54 Wh battery, and two Thunderbolt 4 ports.

Dell Inspiron 13 5310 (2021) Overview:

Design

The Dell Inspiron 13 5310 (2021) has a sleek and elegant design, with a silver aluminum case and a black keyboard. The laptop weighs only 1.28 kg and measures 296.7 x 210 x 15.9 mm, making it easy to carry around. There is a sturdy hinge that allows it to open up to 135 degrees. Plus, a fingerprint reader is integrated into the power button for quick and secure login.

Performance and Ports

This 13.3-inch laptop features an 11th Gen Intel Core i7-11370H processor, 16GB of RAM, and 512GB of SSD storage. While the graphics are handled by Intel Iris Xe.The laptop has a decent selection of ports, including one USB-A 3.2 port, two USB-C 4.0 ports with Thunderbolt 4 support, one HDMI 1.4 port, one audio jack, and one proprietary charging port. There is no SD card reader or an Ethernet port, which might be inconvenient for some users.

Display

The Dell Inspiron 13 5310 (2021) has a 13.3-inch IPS LCD display with a resolution of 2560 x 1600 pixels and a refresh rate of 60Hz. The display has a 16:10 aspect ratio, which gives more vertical space for productivity and web browsing. The panel is also matte, which reduces glare and reflections.The display has good brightness, contrast, and color accuracy. It covers 100% of the sRGB color space and 72.9% of the DCI-P3 color gamut. Additionally, it has a response time of 35 ms, which is not ideal for gaming or fast-paced videos.

Others

It is powered by a 54Wh battery, accompanied by 65W charging. You also get dual stereo speakers with a power of 2x2W, located on the bottom of the case. Other attributes include two microphones and a webcam above the display, with an HD resolution.

title: Amazfit Bip 5
short_description: The Bip 5 is Amazfit 2023's offering in the Bip 5. The smartwatch has a 1.91-inch TFT screen with a pixel density of 260 PPI. It also has 2.5D tempered glass along with an anti-fingerprint coating. The watch includes Amazfit's BioTracker PPG optical sensor, which allows for 24-hour heart rate monitoring. It can also monitor blood oxygen levels, and it has over 124 sports modes. The Bip 5 features four-way navigation support that aids in route-tracking when you're out exercising. According to the listing, the Amazfit Bip 5 has a 300mAh battery that can last up to 10 days with normal use. As for durability, it has an IP68 rating that can put up with most of outdoor exposure.
description:
Amazfit has been one of the most well-known names in the smartwatch segment. They offer different series of watches ranging from budget-friendly goodies to top-of-the-line heavy hitters. Amazfit offers budget as well as mid-range offerings in the Bip series. Having said that, the Amazfit Bip 5 is the company's mid-range addition to the series for the year 2023.

Amazfit Bip 5 Overview

Design and Display

Amazfit Bip 5 is a mid-range offering from the company that comes in a squarish shape and three colour options. It measures 45.94 x 38.09 x 11.20 mm in dimensions and weighs just 26 grams. Additionally, it has a plastic bottom case and offers IP68 dust and water resistance.On the front, it houses a 1.91-inch TFT LCD screen with 320 x 380 resolution. Furthermore, it has a pixel density of 260 PPI and boasts an anti-fingerprint coating. In addition to that, it features 2.5D tempered glass as protection for the screen.

Hardware and Software

The Amazfit Bip 5 draws its power from a 300 mAh battery cell that can provide you with up to 10 days of typical usage, as per the company. In the meantime, it can be charged via magnetic charging cable in approximately 2 hours that's included in the box. It also has a BioTracker PPG biometric sensor along with a 3-axis acceleration sensor.In terms of software, it comes with the in-house Zepp OS 2.0. You can download over 70 different mini-apps and games into your smartwatch. The Amazfit Bip 5 is compatible with devices running on Android 7.0, and iOS 14.0 or later versions. You can tap into even more functionality via the Zepp App.

Health Tracking and Features

This offering from Amazfit comes with over 120 different sports modes. Out of which the watch recognises 7 of them on its own. It better tracks your movement with the help of four satellite positioning systems. It also does all the basic stuff like displaying notifications and tracking your vitals. The Amazfit Bip 5 also offers features like menstrual cycle tracking, breathing exercise, and health reminders in addition to that. Most importantly, it offers Bluetooth v5.2 wireless connectivity through which you can smoothly make and receive calls.

title: Lenovo IdeaPad 3 2022 (Ryzen 7 5825U, 16GB, 512GB, 14" FHD)
short_description: Lenovo's Ideapad 3 14 (2022), packing Ryzen 7 5825U processor, is the notebook of choice if you're looking for a light laptop for school or work. It comes with 16GB DDR4 RAM and 512GB SSD. With this processor and memory combo, this guy will breeze through any schoolwork you throw at it. Though, as with most other thin and light notebooks, dedicated graphics is absent, and you'll have to make do with AMD's integrated Radeon graphics.
description:
Lenovo IdeaPad 3 (2022): Overview

Here's a brief description of the design aesthetic, processor, and battery life of the Lenovo IdeaPad 3 2022 (Ryzen 7 14" ) laptop.

Build and Display

The Ideapad 3 2022 offers an all-plastic body. It is 20mm thick and weighs around 1.43 kg. The matte screen measures 14" diagonally and boasts 300 nits of brightness. There is an empty HDD slot for additional storage and a fingerprint reader for security.

Performance and Memory

Lenovo Ideapad 3 (2022) is powered by a Ryzen 5825U processor. This is a "Barcelo" refresh of the Cezanne-based Ryzen 5800U. The new processor brings higher base and boost frequencies. It comes with 16GB DDR4 RAM but unfortunately, it is non-upgradable. For storage, you get a 512GB M.2 SSD and an empty 2.5 " disk slot for storage expansion.

Battery and Connectivity 

In the tank of the Ideapad 3 2022 (AMD) is a 38Wh battery pack. It can play local 1080p video for up to 13.3 hours and lasted 8.5 hours in MobileMark 2018 benchmark at 200 nits. The Ideapad ships with a 65-Wh power adapted, adding up to 2 hours of usage on a quick 15-minute charge using Rapid Charge Boost.As for wired connections, you get three USB ports, including one Type-C, one HDMI, one SD card reader, and a combined audio jack.
seo_title_facebook: Lenovo IdeaPad 3 2022 (Ryzen 7 5825U, 14\" FHD) Price in Nepal

title: Wings Phantom 250
short_description: The Wings Phantom 250 is a unique design with an ovoid-shaped charging case, accented headlights in green and blue, and an in-ear design. It features premium graphene drivers with an impedance of 32 ohms, providing clear footsteps and headshot sounds. The headphones also offer a dedicated gaming mode with a latency of up to 40 ms and two microphones for clear voice. Also, the Phantom 250 is equipped with Bluetooth 5.2.
description:
Wings Phantom 250 Overview:

Design

The Wings Phantom 250 is a unique design, as the company always tries to be different. The main uniqueness comes from the case. Describing the charging case, it is ovoid-ish in shape. The two "headlights" at the front have two accent colors based on the color variation you choose—Green in Black and Green in Blue.On the buds too, you can see the subtle accent on the top of the stem with the Wings logo just below it. As for comfort, the Phantom 250 features an in-ear design. In addition to that, the buds are a bit safer from water splashes and such, thanks to the IPX5 rating. And the product altogether weighs approximately 43g, which is considered lightweight.

Audio

On the audio side of things, the Phantom 250 covers a frequency range of 20 Hz to 20 kHz, all possible due to what they call "premium" graphene drivers. These drivers, one on each earpiece, are 13mm in size and have an impedance of 32 ohms. As the buds are focused on gaming, Wings promises clear footsteps and headshot sounds.Similarly, this Wings Phantom 250 offers a dedicated gaming mode with a latency of up to 40 ms. To activate it, it is easy—you just have to long-press the right earbud for 5 seconds. Additionally, two microphones on each bud mean the voice is clear to the receiver, especially with the built-in ENC.

Rest of the specs

While the buds alone last 8 hours on a single charge, the charging case adds more life to the Phantom 250. To be exact, the case extends its battery life by 24 hours, making its total playtime 32 hours.Furthermore, the earpieces charge within an hour. Plus, the case itself charges in 1.5 hours using a USB-C cable. Besides, the Phantom 250 ships with Bluetooth 5.2.
seo_title_facebook: Wings Phantom 250 Price and Specification in Nepal
seo_description_facebook: Wings Phantom 250 full specifications, price, comparison, and more. Find out the complete specs and price of Wings Phantom Pro

title: Wings Phantom 410
short_description: The Wings Phantom 410 is a lightweight, IPX5-rated earbud that features a 13-mm driver with a customized EQ. It supports AAC and has two ENC mics for clearer calls. The earbuds last for 16 hours of playback, and when combined with the charging case, they provide 70 hours of battery backup. The device uses Bluetooth 5.3 for connectivity and USB-C for the cable. Additionally, it is available in Black and Blue.
description:
Wings Phantom 410 Overview:

Design

Wings tests out a different design in each of its products, and the Phantom 410 is no exception. The case looks like some sort of shell with a display on the front. This display indicates the percentage of charge the case currently has and also the battery level of the two earbuds that come within.Speaking of which, the earbuds are an in-ear fit, and silicone tips are the ones holding them in. Additionally, the buds are IPX5 rated. The product weighs 40 grams altogether, and even though the exact size of individual items is unknown, it should be quite lightweight. Furthermore, the colors available are Black, White, and Blue.

Audio

You do have a 13-mm driver on each of the earpieces. These boast customized EQ with "bass, balanced and vocal", according to the company. The Phantom 410 actually even supports AAC, which is a plus for iPhone users. On a further note, it ships with two ENC mics for clearer call quality.Obviously, the TWS also has a dedicated gaming mode with 40 ms of low latency, as the company itself is focused on that side.

Rest of the specs

Moving on, the battery life is massive—the most I have ever seen in the TWS. First of all, the buds alone in the Phantom 410 last a whopping 16 hours of playback. When you add the unique charging case into the mix, you get an immense 70 hours of battery backup.Even after the bud's cell is fully empty, it gets back to full within an hour. Similarly, the case recharges back to health in an hour and a half. Further, the Wings Phantom 410 uses Bluetooth 5.3 for connectivity and USB-C for cable.

title: Remax CozyBuds 6C
short_description: The Remax CozyBuds 6C is a modern earbud with a transparent casing, stem, ultra-sensitive touch sensor, and half-in-ear design. It features a 13-mm driver unit with 32 ohms of impedance, a high-quality microphone, and Bluetooth 5.3 technology for wireless connectivity. The earbuds have a 25mAh battery capacity, providing 4 hours of playback time and 24 hours of use with a charging case. They require just 2 hours to charge fully.
description:
Remax CozyBuds 6C Overview:

Design

The Remax Cozybuds 6C features a transparent casing, making it modern and sleek. Not only that, but the bud's stem also features a similar design. In addition to that, the stems house an "ultra-sensitive" touch sensor for controls.Moreover, the earbuds have a half-in-ear design. And they're available in three color options: Black, White, and Orange, catering to various style preferences.

Audio and Connectivity:

Moving on, the Cozybuds 6C boasts a 13-mm driver unit with 32 ohms of impedance. The drivers are rated at 2 mW power and provide highs as high as 20kHz and lows as low as 20Hz. Plus, they have a high-quality microphone for clear phone calls, according to the company.It uses Bluetooth 5.3 technology for wireless connectivity, offering a stable connection with a range of up to 10 meters. Besides, the Remax CozyBuds 6C is compatible with both Android and iOS devices.

Battery

The earbuds themselves have a 25mAh battery capacity, which provides approximately 4 hours of playback time. But here's the cool part: the charging case can recharge them up to four times, giving you a total of up to 24 hours of use. This increases the total back up to 24 hours of playtime. And the CozyBuds 6C require just 2 hours to charge fully.

title: Lenovo IdeaPad 3 2021 (11th Gen i3 1115G4, 8GB, 256GB, 15.6" FHD)
short_description: IdeaPad 3 is Lenovo's budget offering to casual users, students, and office workers. It features a large 15.6\" display alongside a plastic body and a 38Wh battery. This particular model (15ITL6) features the 11th Gen Core i3 CPU paired with integrated Intel UHD graphics. Likewise, you get 8GB of RAM and a 256GB SSD.
description:
Lenovo IdeaPad 3 2021: Overview

Here's a brief description of the design aesthetic, processor, and battery of the Lenovo IdeaPad 3 2021 laptop with Intel Core i3 processor.

Design and Display 

Being a budget device, Lenovo IdeaPad 3 features an all-plastic build made up of ABS top and bottom. It comes in 4 different color options, including Abyss Blue, Artic Grey, Galaxy Blue, and Sand. It weighs around 1.65 kilos, so it's relatively portable and suitable for everyday carry.The display is, unfortunately, a TN panel instead of an LCD one. It is a 15.6" non-touch panel that can reach a maximum brightness of 250 nits. It has an anti-glare coating and covers 45% of the NTSC color gamut.

Chipset and Memory

Intel's 11th-gen i3-1115G4 powers the Lenovo Ideapad 3 2021. This SoC has 2 cores and 4 threads with a max boost frequency of 4.1GHz. Besides that, it has 6MB of L3 cache memory. On the GPU front, it has Intel's integrated UHD graphics.With this laptop, you get 8GB of DDR4 memory which can be upgraded down the line to 12 GB. For storage, this ships with 256GB of M.2 SSD, which can be expanded as well.

Battery and Connectivity

IdeaPad 3 2021 has a 38Wh battery. It has decent battery life relative to its competitors. The device lasted 5.5 hours in the MoblieMark 2018 benchmark and can play local 1080p video for up to 8.5 hours. It ships with a 65W adapter provided in the box.For wired connections, you get a USB 2.0 Type-A, a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C, an HDMI, a card reader, and a 3.5mm headphone/microphone jack.

title: Amazfit GTR 4
short_description: Launched in September 2022, Amazfit GTR 4 is the company's flagship smartwatch. It is nearly identical to the Amazfit GTS 4, except that it has a round dial instead of a squarish one. The GTR 4 is pretty lightweight, weighing only 34 grams with the default strap. And Amazfit offers it in multiple fashionable colors, including Superspeed Black, Vintage Brown, and Racetrack Grey. It accepts a universal 22mm strap and the default options include fluoroelastomer, leather, and nylon material. On the front, there's a 1.43\" AMOLED display with an anti-fingerprint coating. The GTR 4 has over 150 sports modes and it is 5 ATM water resistant too. It comes with a six-satellite positioning system, while Amazfit even lets you import trail routes onto the watch itself. There's also a built-in speaker and microphone for making and receiving phone calls on the go. According to Amazfit, the GTR 4's 475mAh battery can last up to 14 days under normal usage.

title: Amazfit Band 7
short_description: Amazfit Band 7 is Amazfit's latest fitness band. It has a massive 1.47\" AMOLED display, and the company claims that its viewable area is 112% larger than the previous generation. It comes with 50+ watch faces to choose from, whereas you can even set your desired photo as the watch face. This band bags 5 ATM water resistance so you can go swimming wearing it without any worries. Amazfit Band 7 has a 232mAh battery that gives you 18 days of backup on a single charge. In terms of fitness tracking, you get over 120 workout modes to choose from. The Band 7 also has Alexa built-in for hands-free interaction. This fitness band runs on Amazfit's own Zepp OS platform and is compatible with both Android and iOS devices.
description:
Amazfit Band 7 Overview:

Design and Display

The Amazfit Band 7 is a fitness band with a long display. It ships with a huge 1.47-inch AMOLED display with a resolution of 198 x 368 and a pixel density of 282 PPI. It also has 50 different watch faces (8 editable) and Always on Display (AOD) support. This even comes with an anti-fingerprint coating and tempered glass for protection.On the design side of things, you get a 12.2 mm thick band weighing 28g with a strap. In addition, Band 7 from Amazfit is rated 5 ATM for water resistance. The only color option available here in Nepal is Black. However, this thing was launched in multiple other color options out of Nepal.

Fitness / Health Tracking

The Band 7 gets 120 sports modes out of the box, four of which are automatically recognizable. The automatically recognized ones are walking, running, elliptical, and rowing machines. Unfortunately, the watch doesn't have GPS built-in. Hence, you need a phone connected for accurate data.On the other hand, the BioTracker 3.0 PPG biometric sensor is responsible for measuring the user's heart rate and even SpO2 level. Moreover, this band lets you get stats about your sleep cycle, steps, and PAI. This can all be monitored via the Zepp App.

Battery and Charging

The Amazfit Band 7 ensures you 18 days' worth of typical usage, all thanks to its 232 mAh battery. If you turn on the battery-saver mode, it can last for 28 days straight. For charging, there is a magnetic charger inside the box.

title: Asus TUF Gaming A15 2024 (Ryzen 7 7435HS, RTX 3050, 8GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD 144Hz)
short_description: The Asus TUF Gaming A15 (FA506NFR) features a 15.6-inch IPS display with a 144Hz FHD resolution, housed in a redesigned chassis available in Mecha Grey and Jager Grey. It is powered by the AMD Ryzen 7 7435HS processor, an 8-core, 16-thread CPU with a boost clock of up to 4.5GHz, and an NVidIA RTX 3050 GPU with 4GB GDDR6 VRAM. The laptop includes 8GB or 16GB of DDR5-4800 RAM, expandable up to 32GB, and 512GB PCIe 4.0 SSD storage. Cooling is enhanced by dual Arc Flow fans, five copper heat pipes, and four exhaust vents for improved airflow. It runs on a 4-cell 90Wh battery with fast charging, reaching 50% in 30 minutes, and offers Wi-Fi 6, Bluetooth 5.2, and multiple ports, including HDMI 2.1 and USB.
description:
Asus TUF Gaming A15 (2024) Overview

Here’s a brief description of the design aesthetic, chipset, and port selection of the Asus TUF Gaming A15 (2024) laptop with the AMD Ryzen 7435HS  and NVidIA RTX 3050 GPU.

Design and Display

Although not as significant, Asus has also made changes to the chassis of the new TUF Gaming A15. The 2024 model is smaller than its predecessor and features distinct color options. Mecha Grey and Jager Grey feature two different finishes and logo placement. In addition, it has a single-zone Mini LED illuminated RGB keyboard and a four-way indicator above it. Opening the metal lid, you are greeted with a 15.6-inch IPS screen. Here, you can choose between 144Hz FHD and 165Hz QHD. This particular model is the former one.

Performance and Memory

This particular variant of Asus TUF Gaming A15 is powered by Ryzen 7 7435HS and NVidIA RTX 3050. It is a Zen 3+-based CPU with six cores, 12 threads, and a maximum boost speed of 4.55GHz. On the graphics front, you can choose from three NVidIA RTX 40-series GPUs. This one packs the RTX 3050 with 4GB GDDR6 VRAM and a maximum TGP of 75W, considering the 60W Dynamic Boost.Like last year, all the models come with a MUX switch, allowing users to bypass the integrated GPU for higher graphics performance in gaming. New to this year is the Advanced Optimus, which automates the whole process.

Cooling and Memory

To keep with the added power, the Asus TUF Gaming A15 (2024) comes with improved thermals. The colling setup includes dual Arc Flow fans with 84 blades as sharp as 0.1mm. This results in 13% more airflow compared to last year. In addition, the laptop has up to five copper heat pipes and four exhaust vents.As for memory, the laptops ships with 8GB or 16GB of DDR5-4800 RAM. The SO-DIMM slots are user-accessible, and you can expand it up to 32GB. Likewise, you get 512GB PCIe 4.0 SSD storage.

Rest of the Specs

Fueling the new TUF Gaming A15 2024 is a 4-cell 90Wh battery. With the fast charging support, it can go from 0% to 50% in just 30 minutes. Connectivity options on the laptop include four USB ports, one HDMI 2.1, one RJ-45, one combo audio jack, and a Kensington lock. The laptop has Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2 for wireless connection. The audio setup includes two 2W speakers with Dolby Atmos and Hi-Res Audio.

title: Remax SleepBuds Z2
