title: Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 4 2022 (12th Gen i7 1255U, 16GB, 512GB, 14" FHD)
short_description: The E14 series is Lenovo's offering to business clients and corporations looking for an affordable company device. Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 4 is an ultralight device with an efficient and powerful CPU meant for work-from-anywhere (WFA). The laptop has a compact form factor coming in at just around 1.6 kg and is powered by Intel 12th-gen i7-1255U, complemented by 16GB of DDR4 RAM and 512GB SSD.
description:
Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 4 (2022) : Overview

Design and Build 

ThinkPad E14 has a hybrid build. The aluminum top makes it feel premium, but the bottom is ABS plastic. It has a 14" FHD display with 45% NTSC coverage. The E14 features an LED backlit keyboard, a Windows Precision glass touchPad, and a familiar Trackpoint. It is relatively light at around 1.6 kg or about 3.5 pounds. It is 324 mm in width, 221mm deep, and has a height of 19mm.

Performance and Memory

ThinkPad E14 Gen 4 is powered by Intel's 12th gen Core i7-1255U processor. It has 10 Cores and 12 Threads. The chip has a base frequency of 3.5 GHz and a max boost frequency of 4.7 GHz.The graphics part is handled by the Integrated Intel Iris Xe Graphics.Lenovo ThinkPad E14 comes with 16GB of soldered DDR4 RAM, but luckily, there is an empty SO-DIMM slot where you can add up to a 32GB stick. Thus ThinkPad E14 can have a maximum of 48GB RAM. You get 512GB SSD with Opal 2.0 security on purchase, which can be further expanded to 2 TB ( 2x 1TB M.2 2242 ) via the extra  M.2 2242 slot.

Battery and Connectivity

What powers the machine is a 57 Wh Li-Po battery. It can play local 1080p video for up to 15.6 hours at 150 nits of brightness. It performed decently on the MobileMark 2018 benchmark as well lasting 11.5 hours at 200 nits.As for connectivity, you get a USB 4 (Thunderbolt 4) port that supports data transfer, Power Delivery 3.0, and DisplayPort 1.4a. You also get an old-fashioned USB 2.0 Type-A port alongside a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A port, 1 HDMI port, and an Ethernet port. A 3.5mm headphone/microphone jack is also present to meet your audio needs. On the wireless side of things, you get WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.1.

title: Honor X8b
short_description: Honor X8b packs Snapdragon 680 while offering ample storage of 512GB. It also offers memory power of up to 8GB alongside an additional 8GB virtual extension. On the front, you get a large 6.7-inch FHD+ resolution AMOLED screen. The Honor X8b comes stacked in optics, with a 108MP shooter as the primary rear camera. It is assisted by a 5MP ultrawide and a 2MP macro lens on the back. Meanwhile, on the front, you are a 50MP shooter coupled with an LED flash. Lastly, it packs a 4,500 mAh battery.
description:
Honor X8b Overview

Design and Display

The Honor X8b comes with a squircle camera island on the back with three camera cutouts and a flash. It has a flat frame and features a centre-aligned pill-shaped camera cutout on the front. Looking at the overall design, it is clear that the Honor X8b has taken cues from the iPhones. Other than that, it is available in Glamorous Green, Titanium Silver, and Midnight Black colour options. The first option has a leather finish, whereas the others have a glossy finish.On the front, we have a 6.7-inch AMOLED panel with a 20.1:9 aspect ratio. It also boasts an FHD+ resolution with 1,080 x 2,412 pixels. It offers a peak brightness of 2000 nits, 3240Hz PWM dimming, and a 100% DCI-P3 colour gamut.

Performance

Under the hood, the Honor X8b comes with the Qualcomm Snapdragon 680 chipset. It is a 6nm processor that can achieve a peak clock speed of 2.4 GHz. It comes with 8GB memory and three different storage options: 128GB, 256GB, and 512GB. Here, you can virtually extend an additional 8GB of RAM. There is no information on if storage can be expanded. On the software front, the Honor X8b comes with MagicOS 7.2 based on Android 13.

Camera and the rest

This smartphone comes with a huge 108MP primary camera coupled with a 5MP ultrawide camera and a 2MP macro lens on the back. This camera offers you with 3x lossless zoom. In the meantime, it features a 50MP shooter alongside a flash under the centre-aligned pill-shaped camera cutout on the front.The Honor X8b has a 4,500 mAh Lithium-polymer cell with 35W charging capability. In terms of wireless connectivity, it comes with dual SIM, 4G LTE, dual-band WiFi, Bluetooth v5.0, NFC, and five-way navigation support. On the other hand, we have USB 2.0 Type-C for wired connection. The Honor X8b offers added security through 2D face recognition and a side-mounted fingerprint sensor.

title: JBL Tune Flex
short_description: JBL Tune Flex is an open-fitted TWS earphone featuring silicone tips for an ergonomic fit. With powerful 12-mm drivers, these provide you with JBL's Pure Bass Sound. And additionally, features such as noise cancellation and Ambient Aware / TalkThru modes are built-in for seamless interaction.
description:
JBL Tune Flex Overview:

Ergonomic Design

JBL Tune Flex is an open-fitted TWS earphone fitted with silicone tips, ensuring an ergonomic fit. With an IPX4 rating, you can enjoy your music without concerns about any water splashes. Moreover, these earphones are lightweight, weighing just around 9.6 grams.On a similar note, the charging case for the Tune Flex is also lightweight, measuring approximately 38.6 grams. The case features a sleek and compact design, making it easy to carry anywhere.While there are three color options available, only the white and black variants were available in Nepal. However, now, JBL has added a bunch of new ghost-themed color options such as ghost black, ghost white, and ghost purple.

Audio

The JBL Tune Flex flexes its 12-mm drivers, delivering JBL's renowned Pure Bass Sound. These boast an impedance of 32Ω. Nonetheless, the specific codecs employed by these earphones remain undisclosed.Additionally, the JBL Tune Flex comes equipped with built-in noise-cancellation functionality, all thanks to a four-microphone setup. With the inclusion of Ambient Aware and TalkThru modes, you can conveniently interact with people around you without needing to remove your earphones.

Playtime with extension measures

Regarding the battery department, the JBL Tune Flex offers approximately 4.5 hours of talk time, which almost doubles when used solely for music playback. Specifically, you can expect around 8 hours of playtime with these TWS earphones. Even with the active noise cancellation (ANC) feature enabled, the maximum playtime remains at 6 hours.To extend the battery life, the accompanying charging case provides an additional 24 hours (18 hours with ANC enabled). Recharging the earphones and the case takes only a couple of hours to reach a full charge.

short_description: The Marshall Minor III is where the company emphasizes usability and a great sound experience. This TWS is a semi-in-ear design with knurled brass-colored metal stems. description:

Design

Marshall Minor III is a semi-in-ear design when it comes to fit. The stems comprise knurled black and brass-colored metal, which looks good if you ask me. You can see the signature M printed on the back of the earpieces. This is where the touch sensor of the TWS lies. The buds are provided with an IPX4 rating for protection from normal water splashes and sweats. Additionally, the case gets a leather-like design with a metal button at the bottom. Besides, three color options are available: Black, Cream, and Burgundy.

Audio related features

Leading the audio front are 12 mm custom-tuned drivers with 32Ω impedance. The Minor 3 promises to provide Marshall's signature sound without the clutter. Other than that, there is no mention of the number of included microphones here. Though SBC and aptX are provided as codecs, there is no AAC for iOS users.Regardless, this product does not have noise cancellation. Basically, the explanation from the company is that the product focuses primarily on usability and a great sound experience.

Battery and charging

The Minor III, on 1.5 hours of charge, gives you 5 hours of playtime. Paired with the case, the battery life extends to 30 hours of music. title: JBL Endurance Peak II
short_description: The JBL Endurance Peak II is a TWS designed for workouts, offering an in-ear fit and \"Powerhook\" hooks for support. It has an IP67 rating, ensuring durability during workouts. The buds weigh around 26 grams, and the case weighs 77 grams, making carrying it harder. The Endurance Peak II features 10-mm drivers with 16Ω impedance, JBL's Pure Bass sound, and Bluetooth 5.0 profiles.
description:
JBL Endurance Peak II Overview:

In-ear fit

The JBL Endurance Peak II is a TWS designed for workouts and such. So, it is no surprise that it provides an in-ear fit along with hooks to support the fit. JBL calls them "Powerhook".Supporting the endurance part of Endurance Peak II, they provide you with an IP67 rating. This means you do not have to worry about dust and water ruining your buds during workouts. Further, the buds themselves are heavy, weighing around 26 grams.Similarly, the case is also heavy—heavier than other cases I have seen till now. This weighs 77 grams (around 2.7 oz), so carrying it around will be a bit harder. Besides, four color options are provided: Blue, Black, White, and Coral Orange.

Audio and Connectivity

On the other hand, the Peak II ships with 10-mm drivers with 16Ω impedance. These drivers have a sensitivity of 95 dB and a frequency response range of 20 Hz to 20 kHz. Furthermore, they come with JBL's Pure Bass sound to fuel your workout.Besides, Bluetooth 5.0 is provided in Endurance Peak 2. This comes with Bluetooth profiles such as A2DP 1.3, AVRCP 1.5, and HFP 1.7.

30 Hours of Backup

The Peak 2 has a 6-hour battery backup in its earpieces. However, what keeps the number high is the case, which provides you with 24 hours of playtime on a single charge. Added to the fact that the case charges to full in 2 hours, you never have to worry about it not charging during workouts.

title: Apple MacBook Air 15 2023 (M2 chip, 15.3" Liquid Retina)
short_description: Apple MacBook Air 15 (M2) is a slight upgrade to the original 13-inch Macbook Air M2 model. The laptop houses a flat chassis instead and a notch on the front for a 1080p webcam. The M2 chip also promises a significant performance boost thanks to its improved efficiency and performance cores. The battery is now 66.5 Wh accompanied by a 30W dual USB-C and 70W USB-C charging. Moreover, it utilizes Thunderbolt 3/USB 4 port combos for connectivity with MagSafe charging.
description:
Apple MacBook Air 15 M2 Overview:

If you're looking for a laptop that combines performance, portability, and design, you might want to check out the new MacBook Air 15-inch with an M2 chip. This is Apple's latest addition to its MacBook Air lineup, and it offers some impressive features that make it stand out from the crowd.

Display

The MacBook Air 15 2023 M2 sports a larger 15.3-inch Liquid Retina display that supports 1 billion colors and a 16:10 aspect ratio. It also bags the True Tone technology that adjusts the color temperature to match the ambient light. On top of that, there is P3 wide color gamut that delivers vivid and accurate colors for photos and videos.

M2 Chip

Under the hood, the laptop is powered by Apple's M2 processor, which is the second generation of Apple silicon. The M2 chip has an 8-core CPU that delivers up to 1.4x faster performance than the previous M1 model, and up to 15x faster than the fastest Intel-based MacBook Air. Handling the graphics side is a 10-core GPU that can handle graphics-intensive tasks like gaming, video editing, and animation with ease.The M2 chip also brings incredible power efficiency to the MacBook Air 15-inch M2. The ultrabook is powered by a 66.5Wh battery with up to 18 hours of Apple TV app movie playback.

Remaining Specs

The MacBook Air 15 M2 also has some other features that make it a great laptop for everyday use. It sports a 1080p FaceTime HD camera and a Magic Keyboard with Touch id. Besides that, you get MagSafe charging port that snaps into place magnetically.As for the colors, it comes in four options: Silver, Space Gray, Midnight, and Starlight. Each color has a matching MagSafe charging cable that adds some flair to your desk. And the laptop is made of 100 percent recycled aluminum, which makes it environmentally friendly as well as durable.

description:
Lenovo is a staple brand in the corporate sector with its sleek and minimal ultrabooks. One of the popular offerings from the brand is their Thinkbook series. Here, we will look at the Lenovo ThinkBook 14 G6 (2024) with the Intel i7-1355U processor.

Lenovo ThinkBook 14 G6 2024 Overview

Design and Display

title: Remax TWS-40
short_description: The Remax TWS-40 is a compact earbud with a snug fit and in-ear silicone tips. It features 13mm drivers with a 32-ohm resistance, Bluetooth 5.0, and various modes like music, gaming, and calling. The case has a 400 mAh battery, providing 70 hours of standby time, while at the same time, the earbuds have a 65 mAh battery, offering up to 8 hours of playtime.
description:
Remax TWS-40 Overview:

Design

On the design side, the Remax TWS-40 provides a snug fit with in-ear silicone tips. The stem is quite long here and features a LED. As for the IP rating, it doesn't have one.Moving on, the case is 50.4mm wide, 54.6mm long, and 28.3mm thick. The identical strips of LEDs are to the left and right of the logo, located in the middle of the lid. And the TWS-40 gave two color options here: White and Black.

Audio and Connectivity

Inside the TWS-40 are the 13mm drivers with a 32-ohm resistance. This is rated at 2mW power and has a frequency response of 50Hz to 20kHz. Furthermore, Bluetooth 5.0 here supports A2DP, HFP, HSP, and AVRCP.Further features include different modes such as music, gaming, and calling. Additionally, the Zero Latency System in TWS-40 from Remax Nepal makes the gaming mode more smooth.

Battery

Additionally, the 400 mAh cell in the case equates to 70 hours of standby time. On the other hand, the earbuds have a 65 mAh battery and a playtime of up to 8 hours, depending on your use case. The charging takes a long time, though, as Remax TWS-40 is rated to charge within 2.5 hours.

title: OnePlus 12R
short_description: OnePlus 12R is the semi-flagship offering from the Chinese brand for the year 2024. This phone has a single-tone curved design with a glass back. It dons a 1.5K AMOLED panel on the front protected with Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 2. It also boasts an IP64 water and dust resistance. Under the hood, it packs the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chipset. It is coupled with up to 16GB RAM and 256GB storage. It has very capable cameras with a 50MP Sony IMX890 primary lens, an 8MP ultrawide, and a 2MP macro shooter. Powering the phone is a 5,500 mAh battery with 100W wired charging capability.
description:
OnePlus 12R Overview

We are all aware that the OnePlus series of phones are the company's flagship offerings. Similarly, the “R” variant is a water-down version of the phone. As such, the OnePlus 12R is a semi-flagship offering from the company for the year 2024!

Design and Display

As mentioned earlier, the OnePlus 12R is a water-down version of the OnePlus 12, and it is visible in the design of the phone as well. The OnePlus 12R has a single-tone curved finish and features a glass back. It comes with a large circular camera island housing three cameras on the back. It boasts an IP64 rating and comes in two colourways i.e. Cool Blue, and Iron Grey.We have a 6.78-inch LTPO AMOLED display on the front with minimal bezels and a hole-punch camera cutout. This panel has a 2K resolution spanning 1264 x 2780 pixels and boasts a 450 PPI pixel density. Additionally, it offers a dynamic refresh rate of up to 120Hz, high-frequency PWM dimming of 2160Hz, peak brightness of 4500 nits, and a 100% DCI-P3 colour gamut. Lastly, a Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 2 offers additional protection to the display.

Performance

Under the hood, the OnePlus 12R packs the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chipset. It is an octa-core silicone built on a 4nm process that can achieve a peak clock speed of 3200 MHz. In terms of GPU, we are getting the Adreno 740.Furthermore, it comes in two configurations 8GB + 128GB, and 16GB + 256GB. It also comes with a 9,140 mm2 vapour chamber to keep the phone cool and smooth. Meanwhile, on the software end, it ships with OxygenOS 14 based on Android 14.

Camera and the rest

The OnePlus 12R boasts a triple camera setup on the back, led by a 50MP Sony IMX890 primary sensor. It is coupled with an 8MP ultrawide and a 2MP Macro lens. Meanwhile, up on the front, we are getting a 16MP shooter for the selfies.A 5,500 mAh battery powers the phone and accepts 100W of wired charging. Meanwhile, it supports dual-SIM, 5G, WiFi 7, Bluetooth v5.3, and NFC for wireless connectivity. On the other hand, you only get a sole USB 2.0 Type-C port for wired connections.

title: iPhone 13 Pro Max
short_description: The iPhone 13 Pro Max is the top-of-the-line handset in the 13-series. It's geared for those who want to get the most out of their smartphone—be it in terms of cameras or performance.
description:
iPhone 13 Pro Max Overview, Price:

Here, we will walk through the full specifications and price of the iPhone 13 Pro Max.

Design and Display

Starting with the display, the 13 Pro Max—like its predecessor—has a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display. However, unlike the 12 Pro Max, it features a higher 120Hz refresh rate. This contributes to smoother animations and scrolling. You also get scratch-resistant Gorilla Glass protection on the front and rear. Also, there is an IP68 rating for water and dust resistance.The iPhone 13 Pro Max is built in a glass sandwich design, with stainless steel frames. It is available in the following colors: Graphite, Gold, silver, and Sierra Blue.

Performance

The handset is powered by the new Apple A15 Bionic silicon, which has a 6-core CPU and a 5-core GPU. Furthermore, there is a 16-core Neural Engine that is said to execute 15.8 trillion operations per second (TOPS) for faster machine learning. Battery-wise, you get a 4352mAh battery that charges through a USB 2.0 Lighting Port with 20W power.

Camera, Others

In terms of the camera, it sports a triple camera arrangement, each with a 12MP sensor. The main sensor has larger pixels (1.9 µm) size that allows it to capture more light. The 12MP ultra-wide lens has a field of view of 120 degrees while it can also take macro images from 2cm away. iPhone 13 Pro Max also boasts a larger 77mm telephoto lens that provides 3x optical zoom.To take selfies, it has a 12MP TrueDepth camera inside a redesigned notch that’s 20% smaller than its predecessor.As far as connectivity is concerned, it supports the latest WiFi 6 (802.11ax), 5G, Bluetooth 5.0, e-SIM (dual), GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, QZSS, and BeiDou. And, not to forget, the company doesn't ship a compatible charger inside the box. So, you will need to purchase it separately.Check out the full specifications and price of the iPhone 13 Pro Max below:

title: Asta Wolf Moon
short_description: The Asta Wolf Moon smartwatch features a 44mm metal case with a crown for navigation and a silicone strap. It has an IPX4 rating and a 1.83-inch TFT display with Gorilla Glass protection. Available in Black and Pink, it has health tracking, multiple sports modes, and Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity for Android and iOS. The 200mAh battery provides up to 12 days of standby time and six days of usage on a single charge.
description:
Asta Wolf Moon Overview:

Design and display

Starting with the design, the Moon smartwatch features a metal watch case measuring 44mm. The right side of the frame embeds a crown that helps with navigation. Moreover, the package includes a silicone strap for binding the watch to the wrist. In terms of durability, this smartwatch comes with an IPX4 rating, protecting against splashes and light rain.
Moving on to the display, the Asta Wolf Moon has a 1.83-inch TFT display boasting a resolution of 240x280 pixels and a peak brightness of 450 nits. Additionally, this screen gets protection from Gorilla Glass. For options, the watch is available in Black and Pink color choices.

Health Tracking

Here, the Moon smartwatch delivers a health monitor that runs all day to track your heartbeat. However, the company hasn't mentioned any other health-tracking features. Furthermore, there are even multiple sports modes that come built into the watch.

Bluetooth

Connectivity is accomplished via Bluetooth 5.0 and is compatible with Android and iOS. Not only for receiving calls, you can even use it to make them directly from the watch with the ability to view caller names and numbers. Talking about connectivity, Asta Wolf Moon can be set up with the Fit Pro app.

Battery

The Asta Wolf Moon boasts a 200mAh battery, providing up to 12 days of standby time and six days of usage time on a single charge. When it's time to recharge, the magnetic charging mechanism takes approximately 4 hours to reach a full battery.

title: Xiaomi 14
short_description: Xiaomi 14 is the 2024 flagship offering from the company, yet it is a base variant of the series. It comes with a 6.36-inch AMOLED panel with 1.5K resolution and 120Hz adaptive refresh rate. Under the hood, it packs the latest Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3. description:
Xiaomi is one of the most popular smartphone manufacturers in the world that garnered the attention of the world with “flagship killer” phones. Like similar companies before it, it gradually shifted to the flagship space itself with a series of phones named after itself. The Xiaomi 14 is the companys flagship offering for the year 2024.

Xiaomi 14 Overview

Design and Display

The Xiaomi 14 comes in a mostly flat design with slight curves at the edges. It has a large squircle camera island on the back that houses three shooters and an LED flash. Meanwhile, on the front, the phone brands minimal and symmetrical bezels adding to the beauty of the display.Since we are already talking about the display, the panel on the Xiaomi 14 is AMOLED measuring 6.36 inches diagonally. It spans 2,670 x 1,200 pixels achieving 1.5K resolution with a pixel density of 460 PPI. Other than that, it offers a dynamic refresh rate of 1–120Hz, a touch sampling rate of 240Hz, and a peak brightness of 3,000 nits.

Performance and Camera

Qualcomms flagship Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor serves as the engine of the phone. This chip comes with 4nm fabrication, eight cores, and a peak clock speed of 3.3 GHz. Additional performance hardware on the Xiaomi 14 includes 12GB LPDDR5x-8533 RAM and up to 512GB UFS 4.0 storage. You also get to enjoy the Xiaomi IceLoop system handling heat dissipation. On the software front, it runs on the homegrown HyperOS.This phone comes stacked in the camera department, thanks to its partnership with Leica. The primary sensor here is the Light Fusion 900 image sensor with a 50MP lens and OIS capability. The auxiliary shooters on the Xiaomi 14 include a 75mm Leica floating telephone lens coupled with a 50MP Leica Ultrawide camera. Meanwhile, on the front, you get a 32MP shooter with AI face unlock capability.

title: JBL Clip 4
short_description: The JBL Clip 4 is a newer addition to the series, featuring an oval shape and dual-tone finish carabiner. It has an IP67 rating and features speaker grilles, a JBL logo, and rubberized stripes for easy use. The audio system has a 40mm transducer and Bluetooth 5.1 connection, but no aux-in port for wired connections. The 1100mAh battery lasts up to 10 hours and charges via a USB-C cable.
description:
JBL Clip 4 Overview

Design

JBL Clip 4 features a little redesign to its series, bringing an oval shape compared to the circular one we were getting. The carabiner now has a dual-tone finish. It is fully oval now and a bit sturdier than before. Clip 4 has an IP67 rating against dust and water damage.Unlike Clip 3, both the front and back of its successor have speaker grilles. The former has a JBL logo with button controls as well. The JBL Clip 4 also provides you with rubberized stripes at the back, making it easier to rest on surfaces.

Audio and Connectivity

On the audio side, Clip 4 has a 40mm (nearly 1.5") transducer. This outputs 5W of RMS power and responds between 100Hz and 20Hz frequencies. Moreover, it links to your device via a Bluetooth 5.1 connection. Unfortunately, for wired connections, there is no aux-in port.

Battery and the rest

JBL Clip 4’s battery can last up to 10 hours, all thanks to the 1100mAh cell it comes with. Additionally, it charges via a USB-C cable inside the box at 5V/500mA ~ 2.5W power. This takes around 3 hours to charge overall.

description:
JBL Flip 6 Overview:

Design

According to JBL, the Flip 6 comes with a bold JBL logo to denote its bolder audio. Additionally, the speaker features a smoother edge, and that's all for the redesign.Moving on, it is IP67 dust and waterproof, making it suitable for environments with dust and water. Audio and Connectivity

Dual drivers are used in Flip 6, one of which is a 45 x 80mm woofer and another is a 16mm tweeter. The former outputs 20W, while the latter is rated at 10W RMS for a maximum of 30W power. Moreover, there are two passive radiators for a powerful bass.As for connectivity, the JBL Flip 6 comes embedded with Bluetooth 5.1. It also boasts support for PartyBoost, enabling users to link two or more compatible speakers for an immersive audio experience. In addition, this speaker can link with up to two devices simultaneously. The JBL Portable app further enhances the user's control over sound customization.

Battery

The JBL Flip 6 fuels up using a 17.28Wh (3.6V/4800mAh) battery, promising a music playback duration of over 12 hours. When it comes to recharging, this speaker takes only around 2 and a half hours to reach a full charge through its USB Type-C port.Notably, the Type-C port is designed with protective features to safeguard against damage and alert users in case of moisture contact.

description:
JBL PartyBox 110 Overview:

Design

Similar to the Partybox 100, the JBL Partybox 110 is a big speaker with dimensions of 290×288×551mm. It weighs around 10.84kg, significantly heavier than its predecessor. The trebles can go as high as 20kHz, and the bass can go as low as 45Hz.The Partybox 110 has Bluetooth 5.1 for wireless connections. There is also a wired way, an AUX port, and a USB-A port to serve the speaker with audio. Furthermore, the "True Wireless Stereo" mode allows this audio device to link with another compatible speaker for stereo sound.

Battery

JBL Partybox 100 comes with a battery, and so does its successor, Partybox 110. This iteration has a 36Wh cell that sticks around for a maximum of 12 hours. Besides, with fast charging, this speaker jumps from 0% charge to 100% within 3.5 hours.

short_description: The Predator Helios 300 2023 (PH16-71) is a gaming laptop from Acer for 2023. This particular model comes with a 13th Gen Intel Core i9-13900HX CPU under the hood. This variant has a 15.6\" LED-backlit LCD panel with a 165Hz refresh rate. Handling the graphics is an NVidIA RTX 4070 with 8GB GDDR6 VRAM. It is accompanied by 16GB of DDR5 RAM and 1TB NVMe PCIe Gen 4.0 SSD. Fueling the setup is a 90Wh battery with a 300W AC adapter.
description:
If you are looking for a powerful gaming laptop that can handle any game you throw at it, you might want to check out the Acer Predator Helios 300 2023. Lets dig into the details of the Acer Predator Helios 300 2023 with Intel Core i9-13900HX, RTX 4070, a 16-inch model, including its specifications, features, price, and availability in Nepal.

Acer Predator Helios 300 2023 (PH16-71) Overview

Design and Display

The Acer Predator Helios 300 2023 has a sleek and sturdy design, with a black metal chassis and blue accents. The lid has the Predator logo and two stripes that light up when the laptop is on. You get a per-key RGB backlighting keyboard that you can customise with the PredatorSense software. There is a fingerprint reader in the top left corner as well.The Acer Predator Helios 300 2023 has a 16-inch WQXGA display spanning 2,560 x 1,600 pixels. The panel here is an IPS LCD with no touchscreen support. Moreover, you get a standard refresh rate of 165Hz, 300 nits brightness, 3ms response rate, and a full DCI-P3 colour gamut.

Performance and the rest

This particular model of the Acer Predator Helios 300 2023 is powered by the 13th-Gen Intel Core i9 13900HX processor coupled with NVidIA GeForce RTX 4070. The main CPU here comes with 24 cores, 32 threads, and a 36MB L3 cache. In the meantime, it clocks in a maximum frequency of up to 5.40 GHz. On the other hand, the discrete GPU you get here comes with 8GB GDDR6 VRAM.Memory-wise, you get a 16GB DDR5-4800 SDRAM with an option to expand up to 64GB. On the storage side of things, Acer Predator Helios 300 2023 comes with a 1TB PCIe Gen 4 SSD. You also get to upgrade the storage up to 2TB. In the tank, you get a 90Wh 4-cell Li-ion battery and a 300W AC adapter. The port selection includes one HDMI, two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, one USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A, one USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C, and one LAN port.

title: Lenovo IdeaPad 3 2022 (12th Gen i5 1235U, 8GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD)
short_description: The 2022 iteration of the Lenovo IdeaPad 3 (14IAU7) is among the best mainstream laptops for students and officers that balances power, build quality and affordability. This particular laptop is powered by Intel’s 12th generation i5-1235U processor with integrated Intel Iris Xe graphics. It comes with 8GB RAM and 512GB SSD. The cool thing about this laptop is that it can have up to 2TB of storage if you choose to install a 1TB 2.5″ HDD and upgrade the SSD to 1 TB. It features a 14″ FHD LCD panel enclosed inside a plastic chassis, which feels robust nonetheless.
description:
Lenovo Ideapad 3 (2022): Overview

Here's a brief description of the design aesthetic, processor, and battery life of the Lenovo Ideapad 3 2022 (i5, 14" FHD) laptop.

Design and Build 

Despite being in the budget laptop category, Lenovo Ideapad 3 looks much like a premium device. Its brushed matte finish gives it a polished look. It is well-built with no hinge or flexing issues. It's not cumbersome at 1.63 kilos and is pretty convenient to use.The large 15.6" display is an IPS panel of FHD resolution (1920x1080). It can go up to 300 nits in brightness and covers 45% of the NTSC color gamut. The keyboard unfortunately lacks a backlight and the trackpad is a bit off-center.

Performance and Memory

The Lenovo Ideapad Gaming 3 2022 is powered by Intel's 12 th gen Core i5 processor. The Intel core i5-1235U is an efficient mobile processor that can deliver smooth performance for day-to-day tasks and office work.This laptop comes with 8GB of DDR4 RAM but it can be upgraded to up to 16GB. At purchase, you get 512GB of M.2 2280 SSD for long-term storage. The fun part is you can replace that SSD with a 1 TB now and also add an additional 2.5" HDD. So you can have up to 2 TB of storage on this laptop (1TB SSD + 1TB HDD).

Battery and Connectivity 

Lenovo Ideapad Gaming 3 15IAU7 ships with a 38Wh battery. It's not a very big battery but it can still play local 1080p video for up to 7.1 hours at 150 nits of brightness. It performed OK on the MobileMark 2018 benchmark lasting a total of 5 hours.As for port selection, you get an old-fashioned USB 2 type-A port, a USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A port, a USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 port, an HDMI 1.4b port, a Card reader, and a 3.5mm headphone/microphone jack.For wireless connectivity, you have your standard Wifi 6 and Bluetooth 5.1 technology.

title: JBL PartyBox 310
short_description: The JBL PartyBox 310 is a 17.42kg, hefty speaker with a handle and wheels for easy mobility. It features an IPX4 rating for splash protection and a metallic grille to protect woofer cones. The speaker has a large audio system with two 6.5\" woofers and two 2.5\" tweeters, producing 240W RMS. It supports Bluetooth 5.1, wired connectivity, and \"True Wireless Stereo\" mode for stereo audio. The battery is a 72Wh lithium cell, providing 18 hours of power and 3.5 hours of charging.
description:
JBL PartyBox 310 Overview:

Design

Unlike the Partybox 100s, the JBL Partybox 310 is not a portable speaker. It is quite hefty, as it weighs around 17.42kg and has a decent width and height. That's why it has a handle and wheels to make it easier to drag around. Additionally, the speaker features an IPX4 rating for splash protection.The design pattern is similar to any other Partybox, though! The body of Partybox 310 is made up of plastic, while there is a metallic grille at the front. Yes, the grille is to protect woofer cones. One more thing is that the cones are surrounded by RGB lighting.On the top is a groove to hold devices, alongside buttons to control. The ports are, however, at the back of the speaker.

Audio and Connectivity

The audio part of Partybox 310 comprises pretty large drivers. There are two 6.5" woofers and two 2.5" tweeters tuned with JBL's Pro Sound. All four transducers combined produce an output of 240W RMS.The JBL Partybox 310 features Bluetooth 5.1, enabling wireless connections. Additionally, it offers wired connectivity options through an AUX port and a USB-A port for audio input, and it supports two microphones as well.What's more, it supports "True Wireless Stereo" mode, allowing it to pair with another compatible speaker for a stereo audio experience.

Battery

For battery, the JBL Partybox 310 has a 72Wh lithium cell that powers the device for 18 hours straight. Moreover, charging is quick, charging the whole speaker back in 3.5 hours.

title: HiFuture MusicBox
short_description: The HiFuture MusicBox is a speaker with RGB light rings and two color options. It has an IPX7 rating and multiple buttons for volume, power, Bluetooth, and play/pause controls. The speaker has a 100w output. It supports Bluetooth 5.3 and has a 12000mAh battery that lasts a day at moderate volume and charges at 3.5 hours with a USB-C port.
description:
HiFuture MusicBox Overview

Design and Audio

The HiFuture MusicBox comes in a portable form factor shaped like a briefcase. Additionally, this speaker features two handle grips where you can hook a strap and carry it around like a side bag. It has slapped the company logo on one side and the product name and ports on the other. Meanwhile, it also features RGB LED lights for you to set up party vibes.In terms of audio, this speaker offers 100W output through its quad-speaker setup. The HiFuture MusicBox features two tweeters and two woofers to handle vocals and bass respectively. This speaker also comes equipped with a built-in digital signal processor (DSP) that supports multi-band EQ allowing you to personalise your sound.

Features and the rest

This wireless speaker can be connected to your device such as a smartphone through an unspecified Bluetooth version. Couple that with the built-in microphone, you can go hands-free and receive calls straight from the HiFuture MusicBox. On top of that, you can also perform duets and group sing-alongs with this speaker by connecting the two wireless dynamic microphones that ship with it.
  • Meanwhile, check out all the prices and specs of HiFuture speakers and accessories
Another interesting feature of the HiFuture MusicBox is that it also doubles down as a power bank. It packs a 12,000 mAh battery that allows you to charge your mobile devices. In the meantime, it comes with a decent selection of port options, including an AUX jack, one USB Type-A and USB Type-C each, and a TF card reader. Lastly, the HiFuture MusicBox also offers True Wireless Stereo (TWS) technology by pairing two speakers to a device at the same time.

title: Lenovo LOQ 15 (Intel i5-13420H, RTX 3050, 16GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD 144Hz)
short_description: With its cutting-edge Intel SoC platform and 13th Gen Intel Core i5 processor, this laptop delivers blazing-fast performance, complemented by 8GB of RAM and expandable memory slots for up to 16GB of 5200MHz DDR5 RAM. It boasts immersive visuals powered by the Nvidia GeForce RTX 3050 graphics card, while the HD 720p camera and High Definition Audio with Realtek® ALC3287 codec ensure clear visuals and immersive sound. Sporting a sleek Storm Gray design and weighing just 2.4 kg, it offers both style and portability, enhanced by a range of connectivity options including Gigabit Ethernet, Wi-Fi 6, and Bluetooth 5.1. Backed by Lenovo Support, this laptop is an ideal choice for both work and entertainment needs.
description:
Lenovo LOQ 15 (2023) Overview:

Heres a brief description of the Lenovo LOQ 15 (2023) with the Intel i5-13420H CPU and RTX 3050 GPU.

Performance

Powered by the Intel SoC (System on Chip) platform and Intel Core i5 13th Gen processor, this laptop ensures blazing-fast performance for all your computing needs. With 8GB of RAM and expandable memory slots allowing for up to 16GB of 5200MHz DDR5 RAM, multitasking becomes effortless. Storage options include a speedy 512GB SSD, with support for up to 1TB SSD M.2 2242 PCIe® 4.0×4 NVMe®, guaranteeing ample space for your files and applications.

 Audio and Connectivity

Equipped with an Nvidia GeForce RTX 3050 graphics card, this laptop delivers stunning visuals and smooth gaming experiences. The HD 720p camera, complemented by an E-shutter and fixed focus, ensures clear video conferencing sessions. Audio quality is top-notch, thanks to the High Definition (HD) Audio with Realtek® ALC3287 codec and stereo speakers optimized with Nahimic Gaming Audio, providing immersive sound for gaming and multimedia.Featuring a professional Storm Gray case and compact design, this laptop offers both style and portability. The 6-row keyboard with multimedia Fn keys and numeric keypad ensures efficient typing, while the Windows 11 Home operating system provides a user-friendly interface. With a range of connectivity options including Gigabit Ethernet, Wi-Fi 6, and Bluetooth 5.1, along with standard ports for various peripherals, staying connected is effortless. Lenovo Support ensures reliable service and assistance whenever needed, making this laptop a reliable companion for work and play.Check out more Lenovo Laptops, HERE!

title: Lenovo LOQ 2024 (Intel i5-12450HX, RTX 3050, 12GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD 144Hz)
short_description: The Lenovo LOQ 2024 (15IAX9) is a gaming laptop that comes with a good set of hardware. This includes a combination of a 12th Gen Intel Core i5-12450HX processor and an NVidIA GeForce RTX 3050 discrete graphics card. In addition to that, you also get 12GB RAM and 512GB SSD on this thing. It can be upgraded further to quadruple the memory and double the storage capacity. On the front, it dons a 15.6-inch IPS LCD panel that stretches FHD in resolution and offers a 144Hz refresh rate and 100% DCI-P3 colour gamut. Along with all this impressive hardware, you get a 60Wh battery with a 135W AC adapter to keep things up and running.
description:
Are you looking for a gaming laptop that is easy on your pockets? Then the Lenovo LOQ (2024) with the Intel i5-12450HX CPU and RTX 3050 GPU might be of interest.

Lenovo LOQ 2024 (15IAX9) Overview

Design and Display

Lenovo LOQ 2024 (15IAX9) is a gaming laptop that comes in a rather sleek design with a noticeable protrusion on the back. The chassis is made out of PC-ABS, however, it does boast the MIL-STD-810H certification. It comes in Luna Grey colouring and weighs nearly two and a half kilos. As for the ports, you get plenty — three USB-A, one USB-C, an HDMI port, one combo audio jack, an ethernet, and a power-in socket.The Lenovo LOQ 2024 (15IAX9) comes with a wide 15.6-inch display of FHD (1,920 x 1,080) resolution with a high 144Hz refresh rate. It is an IPS panel with a 16:10 aspect ratio, 300 nits peak brightness, and a 100% sRGB colour gamut. The keyboard has white backlighting whereas the touchpad comes with PTP support.

Performance and the rest

Other than that, the Lenovo LOQ 2024 (15IAX9) ensures smooth performance with the combination of 12th Gen Intel Core i5-12450HX processor and NVidIA RTX 3050. The processor has eight (four performance + four efficiency) cores, 12 threads, and 12MB of L3 cache. It can also go up to 4.4 GHz of max clock speed. As for the GPU, NVidIAs RTX 3050, with a maximum TGP of 65W supports graphical workloads. In addition, Lenovo has also included an LA1 AI chip to improve FPS in games.In addition to the CPU and GPU combo, the Lenovo LOQ 2024 (15IAX9) ships with dual-channel memory. This particular model comes with 12GB DDR5-4800 RAM, which can be further upgraded to 32GB. Furthermore, there are two M.2 2280 slots, one of which is preoccupied with a 512GB NVMe PCIe Gen 4 SSD. For power, it packs an integrated 60Wh battery that supports Super Rapid Charge Pro. This technology can juice the laptop to 50% in just 30 minutes via the 135W adapter that ships in the box.Check out more Lenovo Laptops, HERE!

title: Vivo V30 5G
short_description: The Vivo V30 5G features a curved design resembling the Vivo S18, with a large rectangular camera island divided into upper and lower halves. Its 6.78-inch AMOLED display offers four color options. Powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 chipset, it comes in configurations up to 12GB RAM + 512GB storage, running FunTouch OS 14 based on Android 14. The device boasts a camera setup including dual 50MP rear shooters and a single 50MP selfie snapper. It is powered by a 5,000 mAh battery with 80W FlashCharge support, making it the thinnest phone with such a large battery capacity.
description:
Vivo has launched a new addition to their V series of phones in the form of Vivo V30. Here is a brief description of this premium midrange offering from the Chinese manufacturer.

Vivo V30 5G Overview

Design and Display

The Vivo V30 5G has a similar design to another Vivo phone i.e. Vivo S18. Given that, the phone comes in a curved body and houses a large rounded rectangular camera island. This camera island is then divided into two halves, the upper of which is occupied by the camera unit. Meanwhile, the lower half has Aura Light as well as a regular LED flash.On the front, we are getting an AMOLED panel that goes 6.78 inches diagonally. Additionally, it is expected to have 1260 pixel resolution horizontally while boasting a peak brightness of 2,800 nits. In terms of colour, the Vivo V30 5G comes in four options with different finishes. The “Waving Aqua” comes with water-like ripple patterns while the “Noble Black” has a reflective frosted finish. Similarly, “Bloom White” flaunts petal patterns whereas the “Lush Green” variant changes its shades.

Performance

In the performance department, the Vivo V30 comes with the Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 chipset. This processor is based on TSMC’s 4nm process and clocks in at a maximum of 2.63 GHz. Furthermore, it comes in four configurations altogether including 8GB + 128GB, 8GB + 256GB, 12GB + 256GB, and 12GB + 512GB. Lastly, it ships with the FunTouch OS 14 based on Android 14.

Camera and the rest

The smartphone comes jam-packed with very capable cameras on paper. All the cameras on this phone are 50MP in resolution, dual on the rear and a single selfie snapper on the front. The primary shooter is a 50MP OmniVision OV50E sensor that is 1/1.55” in size. It is coupled with a 50MPultrawide shooter with autofocus support. The front camera also comes with autofocus and sits underneath a centre-aligned hole-punch camera.Powering the phone is a 5,000 mAh battery that supports 80W FlashCharge. The company is advertising the Vivo V30 as the thinnest phone to pack such a large battery.

title: Anker Soundcore Rave Partycast
short_description: The Anker Soundcore Rave Partycast is a classic speaker with a modern vibe, featuring rounded edges and circular lighting. It weighs 4.6kg but is portable due to a handle. Powering it is a 5.25-inch woofer, tweeter, and passive radiator, producing 80W and 101 dB of loudness with BassUp technology. It supports Party Cast technology and offers 18 hours of playback on a single charge.
description:
Anker Soundcore Rave Partycast Overview

Design

Anker Soundcore Rave PartyCast kind of resembles a classic speaker design with a modern vibe. It has rounded edges and circular lighting (which they call a light show) surrounding the top and bottom cones. Plus, an IPX7 rating protects this device from water.The Rave Partycast weighs around 4.6kg, which is pretty heavy. However, the handle at the top is enough to make it portable. Plus, there is only one color option: Black.
  • Check out: Anker Products in Nepal

Audio and Connectivity

Powering the Rave PartyCast from Soundcore is a 5.25-inch woofer, a 2-inch tweeter, and a 5.25-inch passive radiator. All of them combined output a total power of 80W. Combined with BassUp technology, it can produce 101 dB of loudness with bass.With Party Cast technology, the speaker can link with 100+ speakers that support this. Not only does the music sync, but the LEDs also sync to the beat. There is also a Soundcore app to customize your listening experience in Rave PartyCast.BatteryThe Rave PartyCast's battery capacity is unknown. However, Anker promises 18 hours of playback on a single charge.

title: Honor Watch 4
short_description: The Honor Watch 4 is a square watch with a 1.75-inch AMOLED display featuring 85 sports modes and 12 workout modes. It also tracks health metrics and offers connectivity via Bluetooth 5.2 and satellite positioning systems. The Chinese variant has eSIM and NFC capabilities, but these won't be released globally. The watch has a reasonable battery life of 451 mAh, rated for 10 days of typical usage, but may be reduced to 3 days with frequent use. It charges using a magnetic POGO pin connector.
description:
Honor Watch 4 Overview:

Design and Display

The Honor Watch 4 boasts a square design with a single button on the right side, and just below that is the speaker. Crafted from 6 Series aluminum, it offers a glossy finish on the middle frame. Available in three appealing colors: Obsidian Black, Cloud Water Blue, and Morning Glory Gold.On the display front, you'll find a 1.75-inch AMOLED panel with a 450x390 pixel resolution, delivering a pixel density of 340 PPI. The Watch 4's screen refreshes at a smooth 60 Hz and offers an array of over 400 watch face customizations.

Sports Modes and Fitness Tracking

One of its strengths lies in its sports modes. The Watch 4 from Honor brings an impressive selection of sports modes, totaling 85, along with 12 specialized workout modes, covering essential activities such as walking, running, swimming, cycling, and more! It also tracks vital health metrics like heart rate, sleep patterns, stress levels, and blood oxygen levels.

Connectivity

Now, when it comes to connectivity, Watch 4 seamlessly pairs with your smartphone via Bluetooth 5.2 and utilizes five satellite positioning systems to ensure accurate location tracking.The standout feature of the Chinese variant of the Honor Magic Watch 4 is its eSIM and NFC capabilities. This will not be available in the global variant, though!

Battery and others

The battery life is reasonable, with a 451 mAh cell rated for 10 days of typical usage. However, frequent use of the eSIM and GPS may reduce this to 3 days. This Watch 4 charges using a magnetic POGO pin connector and runs on the latest version of Honor's MagicOS, i.e., 7.2.

title: Lenovo Legion 5 2021 (Ryzen 7 5800H, RTX 3060, 16GB, 1TB, 16 WQXGA 165Hz)
short_description: Lenovo Legion 5 (2021) is a gaming laptop with a pretty subtle visual profile. As a result, it blends in a professional environment rather easily as well. This gaming laptop is powered by AMD's Ryzen 5000 series CPU and NVidIA's RTX 30 series GPU.
description:
Lenovo Legion 5 (2021) Overview:

Here's a brief description of the design aesthetic, chipset, and port selection on the Lenovo Legion 5 2021 with the Ryzen 7.

Design, Display

The 2021 edition of Legion 5 features an all-plastic build quality. There's a subtle "Legion" branding on the top left corner of the laptop's lid and a "Lenovo" branding on the bottom right. As for cooling, Lenovo says its "Legion Coldfront 3.0" technology helps deliver great performance with zero throttling even under long gaming sessions. The slightly more premium Legion 5 Pro has an even better thermal system, by the way.Anyway, this cooling solution includes two fans with quad-channel exhaust and a large air intake vent at the bottom and underneath each keyboard switch. The laptop comes in two finishes: Phantom Black and Phantom Blue. But you can also find the Stingray White color option in certain markets.Upfront, you're getting a 15.6" Full HD IPS LCD screen with an anti-glare coating on top. Likewise, the Legion 5 (2021) is available with two display configurations in total:
  • 120Hz refresh rate, 250 nits brightness
  • 165Hz refresh rate, 300 nits brightness, 100% sRGB, Dolby Vision

Performance

In terms of performance, Lenovo Legion 5 2021 brings AMD + NVidIA combo with Ryzen 7 5800H CPU. GPU options, on the other hand, range from RTX 3050 to RTX 3070. Only the RTX 3050 Ti (95W) and RTX 3060 (130W) variants are currently available in Nepal. These GPUs have been complemented with 4GB and 6GB of GDDR6 VRAM, respectively.As for memory, you can install up to 32GB DDR4-3200 RAM here. The Legion 5 (2021)'s base model usually arrives with 512GB SSD but you can bump it up to 2TB M.2 NVMe SSD as well.

Others

Moving on, this gaming laptop features a Legion TrueStrike keyboard with 4-zone RGB lighting. You can customize the lighting pattern under the Lenovo Vantage app. Port options on the Legion 5 (2021) include 4x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, 2x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C, 1x HDMI 2.1, 1x RJ45, 1x 3.5mm combo audio jack, and an E-shutter button on the right. Contrary to a physical webcam shutter, this button toggles the camera on/off.When it comes to battery, this gaming laptop has been paired with either a 60 or 80 Wh battery depending on the GPU configuration. Similarly, they fuel up via a 230W or a 300W AC adapter, respectively.

title: Lenovo ThinkPad T14s Gen 3 2022 (Ryzen 5 PRO 6650U, 16GB, 512GB, 14" WUXGA)
short_description: Lenovo's latest offering to business clients and corporations comes in the form of T14s in Nepal. Lenovo ThinkPad T14s Gen 3 is an ultralight device with a powerful CPU meant for work-from-anywhere (WFA). The laptop has a compact form factor coming in under 1.23 kg and is powered by Ryzen 6000 Pro series processors. The Ryzen 5 Pro 6650U is complemented by 16GB of fast LPDDR5 RAM and 512GB SSD.
description:
Lenovo ThinkPad T14s Gen3: Overview

Here's a brief description of the build, chipset, and battery life of the Lenovo ThinkPad T14s with the Ryzen 5 Pro processor.

Design and Build 

ThinkPad T14s has the build of a premium device. It has an all-body aluminum chassis and a 14" WUXGA display with 45% NTSC coverage. The ThinkPad T14s has an LED backlit keyboard, a Windows Precision glass touchPad, and a familiar Trackpoint. It is light at just 1.23 kg or about 2.6 pounds. It is 318 mm in width, 227mm deep, and has a height of 17mm.

Performance and Memory

Under the hood of the Lenovo ThinkPad T14s Gen 3 (2022), is an AMD Ryzen 5 Pro 6650U processor. It has 6 Cores and 12 Threads. The chip has a base frequency of 2.9 GHz and a max frequency of 4.5 GHz.Integrated AMD Radeon 660 GPU handles the graphic workload. Lenovo ThinkPad T14s comes with 16GB of soldered LPDDR5 RAM, so unfortunately, it cannot be upgraded any further. You get 512GB SSD on purchase, which can be further expanded to 2 TB via the one M.2 2280 slot(pre-occupied).

Battery and Connectivity

What powers the machine is a 57 Wh Li-Po battery. It can play local 1080p video for up to 18.1 hours at 150 nits of brightness. It performed well on the MobileMark 2018 benchmark as well lasting 14.6 hours at 200 nits.As for connectivity, you get 2 USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 ports that support data transfer, Power Delivery 3.0, and DisplayPort 1.4a. You also get  2 USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, and 1 HDMI port. A 3.5mm headphone/microphone jack is also present to meet your audio needs. On the wireless side of things, you get WiFi 6E and Bluetooth 5.1.

title: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3 2021 (Celeron N4020, 4GB, 256GB, 15.6" FHD)
short_description: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3 15IGL05 is an entry-level laptop with Intel's Celeron N4020 processor. It's a dual-core processor without hyper-threading. It features a 15.6-inch HD screen with options for IPS and TN panels. The laptop comes with non-upgradeable single-channel RAM and dual-storage configuration. This particular model only has 4GB of RAM and 256GB storage.
description:
Lenovo Ideapad Slim 3i (2021): Overview

Here’s a brief description of the design aesthetic, processor, and battery life of the Lenovo Ideapad Slim 3i (2021) laptop with the Intel Celeron N4020 chip.

Display and Build 

Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i sports a 15.6-inch display IPS LCD panel of FHD resolution (1920 x 1080) resolution. The screen has an anti-glare finish and can reach a maximum brightness of 220 nits. It’s easy to carry around at around 1.7 kilograms. IdeaPad Slim 3i is 362mm in width, 253mm deep, and has a height of 20mm.

Performance and Memory

The Lenovo Ideapad Slim 3i 2021 is powered by Intel’s Celeron processor. The Intel N4020 is an efficient mobile processor that can deliver smooth performance for day-to-day tasks and office work.IdeaPad Slim 3 (i3) comes with 4GB of DDR4 RAM, but it can be upgraded to up to 12 GB. At purchase, you get 256batteGB of M.2 2280 SSD for long-term storage. The fun part is you can replace that SSD with a 1 TB later down the road.

Battery and Connectivity 

Lenovo Ideapad Slim 3i 2021 ships with a 35Wh battery. It’s not a very big battery, but it can last you a couple of hours with casual workloads.As for port selection, you get an old-fashioned USB 2 type-A port, a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A port, an HDMI 1.4b port, a Card reader, and a 3.5mm headphone/microphone jack.Wireless connectivity on the Lenovo Ideapad 3 constitute of your standard Wifi 5 and Bluetooth 5.0 technology.

Moreover, the speaker weighs 340 grams.For control options, the Mini 3 Pro has separate buttons for volume up/down, power toggle, play/pause, and Bluetooth pairing. It resists a bit of water, thanks to its IPX7 rating. The color options available are Black, Blue, Grey, and Red.

Anker Soundcore Motion Boom Overview:

Design

The Anker Soundcore Motion Boom boasts a sturdy handle at the top and two legs at the bottom. It has a grille on the front with its signature "soundcore" logo at the bottom. For control, the audio device includes buttons for volume adjustment, power toggle, play/pause, and Bluetooth pairing. title: Harman Kardon Onyx Studio 7
short_description: The Harman Kardon Onyx Studio 7 is a portable speaker with a unique aluminum ring and 3.2kg weight. It features buttons for power, volume, Bluetooth, and playback. description:
Harman Kardon Onyx Studio 7 Overview:

Design

Harman Kardon Onyx Studio 7 boasts a unique design with an aluminum ring, which makes it look similar to Saturn to some extent. The ring also works as a handle for you to carry around. Additionally, 3.2kg is not quite light, but nonetheless, the product is easy to carry around thanks to the handle.The front side of the speaker features buttons for power, volume up/down, Bluetooth, and a play button. One downside of having Onyx Studio 7 is that it isn't rated to protect against water. Other than that, there are three color options: Black, Gray, and Blue.

Audio and Connectivity

For audio, there is a 120mm woofer as well as two 25mm tweeters. The dual tweeter contributes to the speaker producing stereo sound. Additionally, the company claims the drivers reproduce the frequencies between 50Hz to 20kHz. Also, Onyx Studio 7 outputs an RMS power of 50W.In terms of connectivity, Harman Kardon's Onyx Studio 7 ships with an outdated Bluetooth 4.2. Another thing to note is that the device comes with only an SBC codec. Nevertheless, this portable speaker can connect to multiple devices at the same time without interrupting each other.

Battery

On the battery side, Onyx Studio 7 has an 11.70Wh (3250mAh) lithium polymer cell that goes on for 8 hours straight. But charging takes significantly longer, even with 38W charging support. It takes the speaker 5 hours to completely fuel the cell.

title: Xiaomi 11 Lite NE 5G
short_description: Xiaomi 11 Lite NE 5G is launched as the slimmest and lightweight 5G smartphone of the year 2021. It has a slim 6.8mm chassis and a glass sandwich design, with Corning Gorilla Glass 5 protection on the front. There is also IP53 rating for water and dust resistance. The smartphone boasts a contrast-rich AMOLED display on the front. This screen is complemented by a pair of stereo speakers. Moreover, it delivers a respectable day-to-day performance with the Snapdragon 778G chipset onboard. Whereas, it is also suitable for gaming on relatively less taxing titles like PUBG Mobile and Call of Duty.
description:
Xiaomi 11 Lite NE 5G Overview:

Here, we will discuss the full specifications, price, and availability of the Xiaomi 11 Lite NE 5G.

Design, Display

Xiaomi 11 Lite NE 5G's main attraction is its lightweight and appealing design. It just weighs 158 grams and is as thin as a wafer at just 6.81mm. The company even claims that the 11 Lite NE 5G is the slimmest and lightweight 5G smartphone in 2021.Regardless, despite the small size, Xiaomi has managed to cram in a rather big 6.55-inch AMOLED screen with Full HD resolution. The display also boasts a refresh rate of 90Hz and a touch sampling rate of 240Hz. As a result, the content seems crisp and has a near-perfect contrast level. Furthermore, the screen is HDR 10+ and Dolby Vision certified, with a brightness of 800 nits.

Performance

Xiaomi 11 Lite NE 5G also fares well in terms of performance, thanks to the Snapdragon 778 chipset under the hood. With a 6nm fabrication node, it's an energy-efficient processor with flagship-grade Cortex-A78 and Cortex-A55 cores. Furthermore, you can choose between 6GB and 8GB of LPDDR4X RAM, as well as 128 or 256GB of UFS 2.2 storage.In terms of software, the phone boots on MIUI 12.5 based on Android 11. Nonetheless, Xiaomi has pledged up to three years of software support and an additional year of security updates.

Camera, Others

[caption id="attachment_113884" align="alignnone" width="900"] Front[/caption]Camera hardware includes a 64MP primary sensor, an 8MP ultrawide lens, and a 5MP ultrawide lens on the rear. This setup can record up to 4K@30fps videos. Likewise, on the front, there is a 20MP lens for selfies. It just caps out at 1080@60fps resolution in terms of videos.Fueling the Xiaomi 12X is a bit smaller 4,250mAh battery that supports 33W fast charging. Moreover, despite being an AMOLED panel, the 11 Lite NE 5G has a side-mounted fingerprint scanner. Xiaomi has included a stereo speaker setup for a better multimedia consumption experience though.

title: Asta Wolf Sonic
short_description: The Asta Wolf Sonic earbuds are a sleek and modern design with in-ear buds enclosed in a rectangular casing. The TWS comes in various colors and has an IP54 rating for protection against dust and water splashes. With advanced 10mm drivers and 32 ohms of impedance, it delivers exceptional audio quality with Bluetooth V5.2 technology and a dedicated gaming mode.
description:
Asta Wolf Sonic Overview:

Design

The Asta Wolf Sonic earbuds boast a sleek and modern design, featuring in-ear buds enclosed in an ellipsoid casing. The stem gets a metallic finish and the tips are silicone. Further, the case has four LED indicators for charge level.The casing and earbuds come in a variety of colors, including White, Black, Pink, and Purple. The color extends to the ear tips and the inside of the case, adding a touch of elegance to your listening experience. With an IP54 rating, the Asta Wolf Sonic earbuds are built to withstand the elements, offering protection against dust and water splashes.

Audio and Connectivity

Equipped with advanced 10mm drivers and an impedance of 32 ohms, the Asta Wolf Sonic delivers exceptional audio quality. From deep bass tones at 20Hz to crisp highs at 20kHz, these earbuds provide an average range of frequencies.The Bluetooth V5.2 technology ensures stable connectivity, allowing you to pair Sonic buds with your devices. Gamers will appreciate the dedicated gaming mode, which reduces latency to 55 ms, providing a lag-free gaming experience. Additionally, dual microphones with ENC technology guarantee clear calls, even in noisy environments.

Battery

A 40mAh battery powers Sonic earbuds, providing up to 7 hours of continuous playtime on a single charge. With the included 320mAh charging case, you can extend your listening experience to 28 hours before needing to recharge the case. When it's time to top up the battery, the earbuds take only 50 minutes to charge, while the case fully charges in just 1 hour.

title: Amazfit Cheetah Pro
short_description: The Amazfit Cheetah Pro is a smartwatch with a Run Track Black variant, a titanium alloy bezel, and a fiber-reinforced polymer middle frame. It weighs 43g and features a 1.45\" AMOLED screen with Corning Gorilla Glass 3 and an anti-fingerprint coating. The smartwatch also features the Zepp Coach, powered by AI. The smartwatch has a 440mAh battery, allowing up to 14 days of usage. It supports WLAN, Bluetooth 5.0, dual-band GPS, and Bluetooth calling.
description:
Amazfit Cheetah Pro Overview:

Design and Display

The Cheetah Pro smartwatch features only the Run Track Black variant. It flaunts a titanium alloy bezel and a fiber-reinforced polymer middle frame. The watch measures 47x47x11.8mm, coupled with its mere weight of 43g (including the strap). It boasts two buttons, including a crown button for navigation. The strap is made of nylon, 22mm in width, and includes a classic pin buckle.Ensuring durability, the Cheetah Pro boasts a 5 ATM water-resistance grade, making it suitable for underwater activities. Its display is a 1.45" AMOLED screen with a resolution of 480x480 and a pixel density of 331 PPI. The screen is fortified with Corning Gorilla Glass 3 and an anti-fingerprint coating for added protection.Zepp CoachThe Amazfit Cheetah Pro boasts the Zepp Coach, powered by AI. This personalized coach tailors running schedules and plans according to the user's specific objectives, continuously adapting weekly based on the individual's progress.Furthermore, Amazfit is planning to introduce, in select markets, an AI chatbot under the Zepp Coach as a demo program. It will be adept at responding to both voice and text commands, delivering an immersive one-on-one coaching experience. Users will also enjoy features like Virtual Pacer, Race Achievement Prediction, and Run Track Mode for an enhanced workout experience

Health and Sports Features

The Cheetah Pro integrates a range of sensors, including a BioTracker PPG biometric sensor, acceleration sensor, gyroscope sensor, geomagnetic sensor, barometric altimeter, and ambient light sensor. These sensors aid in health monitoring such as heart rate, blood oxygen saturation, stress levels, and more, offering a holistic view of one's health metrics.Also, the Pro version of Cheetah offers an extensive array of sports features, including advanced running support, 156 sports modes, and 25 strength training movements. Health features cover 24-hour monitoring of vital health metrics, sleep quality monitoring, and more. Additionally, lifestyle features encompass voice assistants, smartphone assistance, weather updates, and sedentary reminders.

Battery Life and Others

The smartwatch is powered by a 440mAh battery, enabling a typical usage scenario of up to 14 days. Charging the device is hassle-free with its magnetic charging base, requiring approximately 2 hours for a full charge. With different usage scenarios, the battery life varies, ranging up to 45 days in clock mode and up to 7 days in heavy usage scenarios.For connectivity, the watch supports WLAN 2.4GHz, Bluetooth 5.0, and a dual-band GPS. The smartwatch is compatible with Android 7.0 and above as well as iOS 12.0 and above, utilizing the Zepp App for seamless integration and control. The Cheetah Pro also supports Bluetooth calling and up to 2.3GB of music storage.
seo_title_facebook: Amazfit Cheetah Pro Price, Full Specifications, and Comparisons
seo_description_facebook: Amazfit Cheetah Pro price, full specifications, and more. Find out the complete specifications and price of the Amazfit Cheetah Pro smartwatch.

title: Asta Wolf Warrior

description:
Asta Wolf Warrior Overview:

Design

The Asta Wolf Warrior Bluetooth earbuds carry forward the brand's commitment to a sleek and modern design. Encased in a stylish ellipsoid matte housing, these buds try something different here. What makes this pair of earbuds unique are the tips. This looks like the "cut-down" version of silicone tips with elongated tubes.Available in classic White, Black, or Dark Green, the Asta Wolf Warrior maintains a minimalist aesthetic. Audio and Connectivity

The Asta Wolf Warrior Bluetooth Earbuds come with 12mm drivers and an impedance of 32 ohms. These cover a normal frequency range of 20Hz to 20kHz. Moreover, the earbuds feature dual microphones with ENC (Environmental Noise Cancellation) technology, ensuring crystal-clear calls even in noisy surroundings.For connections, the Bluetooth V5.2 SMART technology ensures a stable wireless connection to your devices. This means the connection in Warrior TWS lasts within a 15-meter radius. Additionally, the dedicated gaming mode significantly reduces latency to just 50 ms, enhancing your gaming experience. As for the wired connection, a Type-C port is there on the case for juicing up the budd.

Battery

What sets them apart is the 350mAh charging case, which increases your total listening time to 28 hours before needing to recharge the case.Furthermore, charging is quick and convenient, with the earbuds requiring just 50 minutes to charge, while the case fully charges in 1 hour. Similarly, with the charging case, you can recharge your earbuds 3–4 times, ensuring you're never without your music.

description:
The Dell Vostro 15 3500 (2021), powered by 11th Gen Intel Core i5-1135G7 CPU, is a budget-friendly business laptop that offers decent performance and features for everyday tasks.

Dell Vostro 15 3500 (2021) Overview

Performance

The Dell Vostro 15 3500 (2021) is powered by an 11th Gen Intel Core i5-1165G7 processor, which has a base frequency of 2.4GHz and a boost frequency of 4.2GHz. The processor has 6MB of cache and 4 threads, making it suitable for multitasking and web browsing. For handling graphics, there is an integrated Intel UHD Graphics card, which can handle basic graphics tasks and casual gaming.The laptop comes with 8GB of DDR4 RAM, which can be upgraded to 16GB if needed. The RAM runs at 2666MHz with integrated graphics. The laptop also has a 256GB M.2 PCIe NVMe SSD, which offers fast boot times and data transfers.

Design and Display

The Dell Vostro 15 3500 (2021) sports a sleek and sturdy design with a titan grey color. It weighs 1.78 kg and measures 19.90 mm in height at the front and 19.90 mm at the rear. It is easy to carry around and fits in most backpacks.The laptop features a 15.6-inch FHD display with a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels and a refresh rate of 60Hz. The display has an anti-glare coating and a narrow border design, which enhances the viewing experience. The display also supports a wide viewing angle of up to 80 degrees, thanks to the WVA technology.

Ports and Connectivity

The laptop has a variety of ports and slots for connectivity and expansion. It has two USB 3.2 Gen 1 port, one USB 2.0 port, one HDMI 1.4 port, one flip-down RJ-45 port, one audio jack, and one SD card slot. Along with that, you also get  Wi-Fi and Bluetooth wireless technologies.There is a full-size keyboard with a numeric keypad that is spill-resistant and comfortable to type on. Meanwhile, its touchpad supports multi-touch gestures.

Battery and Others

The laptop has a 3-cell battery that can last up to 7 hours on a single charge, depending on the usage and settings. You get a 45-watt AC adapter for charging.

title: Marshall Emberton II

description:
Marshall Emberton II Overview:

Design

Marshall Emberton II follows along with their leather pattern, which has a rubbery feel. This rugged-type design is the signature of Marshall. All of the controls are at the top. A multi-directional knob controls music playback, and the Bluetooth button on the left is for pairing. Further on the right is the LED battery indicator.Similarly, the Emberton II also has an IP67 rating. This means the product can, most of the time, resist water and dust. Battery

On a normal day, Emberton II lasts more than 30 hours on a single charge. Additionally, the quick charge it supports recharges the device within 3 hours. If you are in a hurry, 20 minutes of charging the speaker gets you 4 hours of playback.

title: Marshall Action II
short_description: The Marshall Action II is a compact, leather-like speaker with an iconic Marshall logo embossed on the front grille. description:
Marshall Action II Overview:

Design

With its iconic Marshall logo embossed on the front grille, the Action II speaker embraces the classic aesthetics of the brand. Plus, the whole body features a leather-like design. Measuring 260 x 160 x 150 mm and weighing 2.85 kg, the speaker is a compact addition to the Action series. All of the controls are on top of the Marshall Action II. Available in Black, White, or Brown, the speaker complements various interior styles.

Audio

The Action II features a dynamic driver type with a frequency range spanning from 50Hz to 20kHz. Equipped with one 30-watt Class D amplifier for the woofer and two 15-watt Class D amplifiers for the tweeters, it outputs stereo audio for more alive audio.

Connectivity

It supports various connectivity options, including Bluetooth 5.0 for wireless streaming and a 3.5 mm input for wired connections. Action II also supports the customization of sound through both the speaker controls and the dedicated Marshall Bluetooth app (Android|iOS).Regarding power, the Action II operates on a mains input voltage ranging from 100 to 240V. However, it does not possess a battery and thus doesn't support portability or usage without a direct power source.

title: Marshall Woburn III
short_description: The Marshall Woburn III is a hefty, home-only speaker with a leather pattern and metallic grille. It weighs 7.45kg and measures 400mm in length, 317mm in width, and 203mm in height. The speaker lacks IP ratings and is not portable. It features volume, bass, treble, skip forward/backward, source, play/pause, and a dedicated power button. The speaker has a large 6-inch woofer, two 2-inch midrange transducers, and two 0.75-inch tweeters for better audio output. It has 15W Class D amps for all drivers and 90W RMS power for the woofer. The speaker can be connected using Bluetooth 5.2 and has three wired connections.
description:
Marshall Woburn III Overview:

Design

Marshall Woburn III, similar to any other Marshall speaker, has the same classic design: a leather pattern on the body as well as a metallic grille and logo at the front. This might be the heftiest speaker from Marshall out there, weighing around 7.45kg and measuring 400mm in length, 317mm in width, and 203mm in height.Other than that, as a home-only, non-portable speaker, the device doesn't have any IP ratings or such. If you pour water on Woburn III by mistake, there is a chance of the device not working at all.

Controls

Moving to the controls, there are every single button and knob at the top. Woburn III contains volume, bass, treble, and skip forward/backward control knobs, as well as source and play/pause buttons. There is a dedicated switch for the power button too.
  • Check out other Marshall speakers here.

Audio

Being huge, the Marshall Woburn III also houses a large number of drivers and amplifiers to support the drivers. At first, it has a large 6-inch woofer, followed by two 2-inch midrange transducers. Further, there are two 0.75-inch tweeters for better audio output. Each of the drivers also has an amp connected to it.While there are 15W Class D amps for all of the midrange drivers and tweeters, the amp for the woofer is rated to have 90W RMS power. And with all of that combined, the bass can get as low as 35Hz, and the trebles can go as high as 20kHz. Plus, the speaker can create a stereo output.

Connectivity

Marshall Woburn III can be connected to your device using Bluetooth 5.2. The Bluetooth here takes low energy, and the connection lasts 10 meters away from the speaker. Additionally, via the Marshall Bluetooth app, users can customize sound preferences. Also, there are three ways to connect it using wires, including a 3.5mm jack, an RCA connector, and an HDMI port.One of the downsides of the Woburn III is that the speaker doesn't contain any sort of battery. You need an AC source to keep it powered.

title: Honor Watch GS 3
short_description: Honor Watch GS 3 is the world's first smartwatch to feature an 8-channel heart rate engine—most watches feature only two channels. The setup consists of an optical PPG sensor with feeds data to two of the eight channels. The data is processed by an AI-based on 20 built-in scenarios utilizing the remaining channels. Honor claims that the final data has a minimum accuracy of 97%. It is a smartwatch design with health tracking in mind. However, you also get other premium features that you would expect from a flagship smartwatch.

title: iPad Air 5 (2022)
short_description: Apple iPad Air 5 (2022) is the most powerful iPad Air so far as it ditches the Bionic chip in favor of the M1 Silicon. The latter is a desktop-grade System On Chip (SoC) that Apple first debuted in its MacBooks and is expanding to other product lineups. Talking about the iPad Air 5 it brings 60% improved CPU performance and a 2x faster GPU compared to its predecessor. It even brings improvement in cameras.
description:
iPad Air 5 (2022) Overview:

Here, we will discuss the full specifications and price of the iPad Air 5 (2022).

Design, Display

Design-wise, Apple iPad Air 5 (2022) is quite similar to its predecessor. It brings an aluminum body, which is available in five colors: Space Gray, Starlight, Blue, Pink, and Purple.Over on the front, it has a 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display with a resolution of 2360 x 1640 pixels. It is a fully laminated screen based on IPS LCD technology. The screen even brings Apple's True Tone technology, oleophobic coating, and Wide P3 color gamut. Likewise, it boasts 500 nits of peak brightness and is compatible with the second-gen Apple Pencil.

Performance

Under the hood, Apple iPad Air 5 (2022) packs the first-gen Apple M1 chip, further bridging the gap between iPad Air and the Pro model. The SoC brings 8-core CPU, 8-core GPU, and a new AI engine. If Apple is to be believed, the Air 5 (2022) can outperform its predecessor by up to 60%. The inclusion of the M1 chip means it's the first iPad Air to come with a 5G option.  However, 5G models are not yet available in Nepal.

Battery

Fueling the iPad Air 5 (2022) is a 28.6 Wh Li-Po battery. Apple claims it can last up to 10 hours of web browsing or video streaming on Wi-Fi. Further, you can expect 9 hours of web browsing using cellular data on the cellular model. It supports 20W charging via the USB 3.1 Gen 2 Type-C port.In addition to charging, one can even use it to connect the iPad to an external display up to 6K resolution and 60Hz,

Others

Apple has swapped the 7MP front camera on the last-gen iPad Air with a 12MP sensor on the 2022 model. It now has support for Center Stage. Likewise,  there is a 12MP wide camera with an f/1.8 aperture on the back.

title: Realme Pad
short_description: Realme Pad is the company's first tablet that is aimed at budget-oriented consumers. This tablet is powered by a MediaTek Helio G80 processor, which performs admirably in day-to-day operations. The all-aluminum build gives it a premium look, and the big-enough 10-inch display improves your content consumption experience. This is supplemented by a quad-speaker configuration that also supports Dolby Atmos and a slew of other audio certifications. description:

Others

title: Samsung Galaxy Buds+
short_description: The Samsung Galaxy Buds Plus is an in-ear wireless earphone with no stem. They have three mics for ambient sound and ENC. The battery lasts about 6 hours and the case adds around 7 hours of playtime. Additionally, it supports charging from both the port and wirelessly.
description:
Samsung Galaxy Buds Plus Overview:

Okay, let's get into the overview of the Samsung Galaxy Buds Plus.

Design

Samsung's Galaxy Buds+ has a similar design to the Galaxy Buds. Here as well, the buds is in-ear fit with no stem. Both the ear tips and wing tips are provided in different sizes, giving you the option of finding one that fits your ear perfectly. The earbuds are a little heavier than their previous version—6.3 g, to be exact. And the case has lost little to no weight, making it 39.6 g in weight. It is available in five colors—black, white, red, blue, and the delayed dark blue.

Sound Quality

The Galaxy Buds Plus improves on the already impressive two microphones on each earpiece of the Samsung Galaxy Buds, increasing their count to 3 yet there is no Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) provided. However, more mics are helpful as they improve the sound quality of your voice when calling while filtering unnecessary background noise. In addition to that, the ambient mode gets a boost, making the sounds you want to hear more apparent to the ears. Besides, the codecs supported are SBC, AAC, and Samsung’s SSC.

Battery and connectivity

The Galaxy Buds+ can hold 85 mAh of battery, a huge gain over its non-premium version. It can last for over 11 hours of regular use or 7.5 hours of voice calls. Additionally, the capsule provides you with 270 mAh of backup, meaning an additional 11 hours of playback. Besides, you can connect Buds+ with Android and iOS devices using the Galaxy Wearable App. The connectivity is made through Bluetooth 5.0, which can maintain a connection up to 10 meters away.Rest of the specsMoreover, the Samsung Galaxy Buds Plus includes sensors such as an accelerometer, a hall sensor, and a proximity sensor. Aside from that, the Galaxy Buds case supports USB-C fast charging alternatively, you can charge it wirelessly as well.
