title: Infinix Note 40
short_description: Infinix Note 40 is a unique offering in its price range. While the design looks usual for the most part, it comes with what the company calls “Active Halo”. It is basically RGB Lighting for the phone and sits alongside the flash. The display is a 6.78-inch AMOLED panel with a 120Hz refresh rate, 1,300 nits peak brightness, and FHD+ resolution. For performance, it packs the MediaTek Helio G99 Ultimate processor with 8GB RAM and 256GB storage. The cameras include a 108MP primary shooter and a 32MP front-facing unit. Lastly, it packs a 5,000 mAh battery with 45W wired charging support. However, what truly sets this phone apart from others is that it also has MagSafe-like wireless charging capability of 20W.
description:
Are you looking for a good midrange smartphone? Then you might want to check out the Infinix Note 40! Moreover, this phone comes with a unique feature that sets it apart from the rest of the offerings in its price range. Lets discuss further.

Infinix Note 40 Overview

Design and Display

In terms of Infinix Note 40 looks pretty uninspiring. It has the standard flat frames with a squircle camera island. But it has something interesting going on here. It comes with an “Active Halo” that sits alongside the flash and glows up in different conditions like when you get a call or message, or when your phone is charging. Other than that, the phone has an IP54 rating and ships in Titan Gold and Obsidian Black colours.On the front, it has a 6.78-inch panel with quite slim bezels. The panel on the Infinix Note 40 is an AMOLED with up to 120Hz refresh rate. Moreover, the screen offers a brightness of up to 1,300 nits and a DCI-P3 colour gamut along with FHD+ resolution. Likewise, it is capable of a 1,500Hz instant touch sampling rate, however, only operates with a frequency of up to 360Hz. The screen is also capable of 2,160Hz PWM dimming.

Performance and the rest

The MediaTek Helio G99 Ultimate processor drives the primary performance on this phone with eight cores, 6nm fabrication, and a peak clock speed of 2.2GHz. Additional hardware on the Infinix Note 40 includes up to 8GB RAM coupled with up to 256GB storage. Other than that, you can virtually extend the memory by up to 8GB while the situation regarding storage expansion is up in the air.In terms of optics, this phone comes with three cameras on the back. It has a large 108MP primary shooter and is coupled with two absolutely useless dummy units. In the meantime, you get a 32MP unit on the front. In the tank, the Infinix Note 40 packs a 5,000 mAh battery with 45W charging support. Not only that, it is also capable of 20W wireless MagCharge. This feature is similar to Apples MagSafe with built-in magnets allowing for the phone to attach to the charge. Or you could also attach accessories to your phone. Lastly, it is a 4G-only phone.

title: iPhone 13
short_description: The iPhone 13 strikes an excellent blend of power, features, and battery life. So, if you don't want to spend more on a fairly capable handset, the iPhone 13 should be a great choice for you.
description:
iPhone 13 Overview:

Design and Display

The iPhone 13 features the same 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display as its predecessor. However, the company has trimmed the front notch by 20% this time around. It boasts Corning Gorilla Glass protection on both the front and back; while the frames are made up of aluminum. Yet, unlike the Pro models, the non-pro models of the iPhone 13 do not include a 120Hz refresh rate.

Performance

The Apple A15 Bionic chip is the most significant upgrade in the iPhone 13. This new processor is fabricated on TSMC’s 5nm process node and packs 15 billion transistors. It features a 6-core CPU and a 4-core GPU, and its 16-core Neural Engine can perform 15.8 trillion operations per second (TOPS). Likewise, it is fueled by a 3,240mAh cell that supports 20W wired, 15W MagSafe Wireless, and 7.5W Qi Wireless charging. As is customary, you have to buy the charger separately.

Camera, Others

On the camera front, you get a pair of 12MP lenses on the rear. It can catch 47% more light than last year, and also has sensor-shift Optical Image Stabilization (OIS). On the front is a 12MP TrueDepth camera. The iPhone 13 also enjoys cinematic mode which automatically shifts the focus between subjects based on their movement.Moreover, the connectivity option includes WiFi 6 (802.11ax), 5G, Bluetooth 5.0, e-SIM (dual), GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, QZSS, and BeiDou.

title: Motorola Edge 50 Pro

title: Motorola Moto Razr 50 Ultra
short_description: The Motorola Moto Razr 50 Ultra features a sleek foldable design with a 6.9-inch LTPO AMOLED main display and a 4-inch external display, both with high brightness and refresh rates. It’s powered by the Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset, runs Android 14, and offers up to 512GB storage with 12GB RAM. The camera setup includes dual 50 MP rear sensors and a 32 MP front camera. It has a 4000 mAh battery with 45W wired and 15W wireless charging. Key extras include stereo speakers, NFC, and IPX8 water resistance.
description:
Heres a quick overview of the Motorola Moto Razr 50 Ultra:

Motorola Moto Razr 50 Ultra Overview

Design and Display

The Motorola Moto Razr 50 Ultra comes with a sophisticated design and a choice of Spring Green (Dill), Midnight Blue (Navy Blazer), and Peach Fuzz colours. Its build features a plastic front when unfolded, a glass front when folded (protected by Gorilla Glass Victus), a silicone polymer back (eco-leather), and an aluminium frame (6000 series) with a stainless steel hinge. The device is IPX8 rated, offering water resistance up to 1.5 meters for 30 minutes.The phone showcases an impressive foldable LTPO AMOLED main display measuring 6.9 inches—this screen has a 165Hz refresh rate, with a peak brightness of 3000 nits. For added durability, the external display is a 4-inch LTPO AMOLED panel with similar colour depth and HDR10+ support, protected by Gorilla Glass Victus.

Performance

Under the hood, the Moto Razr 50 Ultra is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset, which includes an octa-core CPU (1x 3.0 GHz Cortex-X4, 4x 2.8 GHz Cortex-A720, and 3x 2.0 GHz Cortex-A520) and the Adreno 735 GPU. It runs on Android 14 and is set to receive up to three major Android updates. The phone offers the configurations of 512GB with 12GB RAM, utilizing UFS 4.0 storage technology.

Camera

The Moto Razr 50 Ultra is equipped with a dual rear camera setup: a 50 MP wide sensor with an f/1.7 aperture and optical image stabilization (OIS), and another 50 MP telephoto lens with an f/2.0 aperture offering 2x optical zoom. The cameras support 4K video recording at 30/60fps, as well as 1080p video at up to 960fps, with features like HDR10+ and gyro-EIS. On the front, theres a 32 MP selfie camera with an f/2.4 aperture that can record in 4K at 30/60fps and 1080p at 30/60fps.

Battery and Extras

The device houses a 4000 mAh battery with 45W wired charging capability. It also supports 15W wireless charging and 5W reverse wired charging. It features stereo speakers with Snapdragon Sound technology for audio and omits a 3.5mm headphone jack. The Moto Razr 50 Ultra includes NFC for contactless payments, USB Type-C 2.0 for connectivity, and features a variety of sensors including a side-mounted fingerprint scanner, accelerometer, gyro, proximity sensor, and compass.
seo_title_facebook: Motorola Moto Razr 50 Ultra Price, Full Specifications, Comparision

title: boAt Airdopes 181
short_description: The boAt Airdopes 181 is an in-ear design with a touch-controlled stem, IPX4 rating, spherocuboid case, 10-mm dynamic drivers, ENx tech, gaming mode, battery backup, ASAP charging, Bluetooth 5.2, IWP, and Voice Assistant support. Two 35 mAh batteries, one on each bud, power up your listening experience for 4 hours, and the 300 mAh case increases it to 20 hours.
description:
boAt Airdopes 181 Overview:

Design

Starting with the fit, the boAt Airdopes 181 uses an in-ear design with a touch-controlled stem. It provides a basic IPX4 rating for sweat and water protection. Additionally, the case is spherocuboid in shape and doesn't provide any ingress protection rating. Four color options are provided here: Carbon Black, Bold Blue, Cool Grey, and Spirit White.

Audio

For the audio, the Airdopes 181 brings you 10-mm dynamic drivers. Moreover, the ENx tech makes the calls clearer and provides a good call experience, according to the company. Another highlight is the gaming mode, which they call BEAST mode, which promises to reduce the latency to 60 ms for gamers out there.

Battery 

Moving on to the battery, the boAt Airdopes 181 is powered by a 35 mAh battery that backs up your music for 4 hours. Further, the 300 mAh case increases the backup to 20 hours. Charging for even 10 minutes gives you 90 minutes of playback in Airdopes 181, thanks to ASAP charging. In addition to that, the buds themselves take around 45 minutes to an hour to charge. Likewise, the charging case charges within 1.5 hours.

Others

Other features include Bluetooth 5.2, Insta Wake n' Pair, and Voice Assistant support.

title: Tecno Camon 20
short_description: The Tecno Camon 20 features a 6.67-inch FHD+ AMOLED display, an octa-core MediaTek Helio G85 processor, 8GB of RAM, and 256GB of storage. It has a 5000mAh battery with 33W fast charging, a 64MP triple rear camera system, and a 32MP front camera. Running HiOS 13.0 on Android 13, it also offers IP53 resistance, dual stereo speakers, and an in-display fingerprint sensor, making it a good choice for budget-conscious customers.
description:
Heres a quick overview of the Tecno Camon 20,

Tecno Camon 20 Overview:

Display and Design

The Tecno Camon 20 boasts a 6.67-inch AMOLED display with a 60 Hz refresh rate. It possesses a resolution of 1080×2400 pixels, with FHD+ quality.Weighing 185 gm, the phone measures 162.71 x 75.89 x 7.82mm. It’s available in three colors: Glacier Glow, Predawn Black, and Serenity Blue colors. For dust and splash resistance, the device offers a rating of IP53.
  • Read our Tecno Camon 20 review here.

Performance and Storage

The Camon 20 equips an octa-core MediaTek Helio G85 processor. It is available in a sole variant of 8GB of RAM and 256GB of memory. You can expand the RAM up to 8GB using the virtual memory feature. With these, we can obviously expect smooth performance even while multitasking.

Battery and Connectivity

The smartphone houses a 5000mAh non-removable battery with 33W fast charging support. But Tecno only includes an 18W charger in the box. The connectivity option here is Wi-Fi, Bluetooth v5.00, USB Type-C, 3G, and 4G with support for Band 40. For audio, the device supports a dual stereo speaker setup and an in-display fingerprint sensor.

Camera, Software, and Others

On the rear, the Tecno Camon 20 sports a triple camera setup with a 64MP primary camera, a 2MP depth sensor, and a QVGA camera. For selfies and front views, it offers a 32 MP camera with dual flash.On the software side, the phone runs on HiOS 13.0 based on Android 13. The phone is equipped with various sensors, such as an accelerometer, ambient light sensor, and compass/magnetometer.

title: Huawei FreeBuds SE 2
short_description: The Huawei FreeBuds SE 2 are half-in-ear buds with a polycarbonate finish, IP54-rated case, and touch controls. They come in Isle Blue and Ceramic White colors and use 10-mm dynamic drivers for stable audio. Huawei claims it passed 26 reliability tests and offers call noise cancellation. The 41 mAh cell on each bud provides a 9-hour backup, while the case provides 31 hours of additional charge.
description:
Huawei FreeBuds SE 2 Overview:

Design

Starting with the looks of Huawei FreeBuds SE 2, they are half-in-ear buds with a polycarbonate finish. Nevertheless, this time, the buds do not come with ear tips, different from the FreeBuds SE which introduced tips in open-fit buds. Similarly, the stems here have touch controls integrated into them.Here, not only the buds but the case is also made using polycarbonate. Furthermore, the buds are IP54-rated, meaning you get protection from both the water and the dust. There are only two light color options to choose from: Isle Blue and Ceramic White.

Sound

The FreeBuds SE 2 makes use of 10-mm dynamic drivers for audio output. Huawei has claimed it has passed 26 strict reliability tests, hence providing stable audio. Additionally, these wearables come with call noise cancellation, utilizing microphones and an AI noise reduction algorithm.

Rest of the specs

Moving on, handling the endurance department is the 41 mAh cell found on each bud. This ensures a 9-hour backup just with the buds, which is an obvious upgrade over its predecessor. When you bring the case into the mix, it is a different scenario.Repeatedly charging and using the buds back and forth adds an additional 31 hours of charge, bringing the total playback of FreeBuds SE 2 to 40 hours. Besides, you can get up to 3 hours of playtime with just 10 minutes of charging.

title: Amazfit GTR 2
short_description: The Amazfit GTR 2 is a round smartwatch with an aluminum or stainless steel body, depending on the variant. It is waterproofed to 5 ATM and weighs 31.5 grams (sport) / 39 grams (classic). The watch features a 1.39-inch AMOLED screen with a resolution of 454 x 454 and a pixel density of 326 PPI. The smartwatch's health tracking features include 247 heart tracking, /SpO2 tracking, Personal Activity Intelligence (PAI), and sleep monitoring. The wearable also has GPS integrated for sports mode, providing more precise data paired with motion tracking. The watch offers 90 different sports modes, including swimming, cycling, walking, and skiing.
description:
Amazfit GTR 2 Overview:

Design and Display:

The Amazfit GTR 2 is a round smartwatch with an aluminum or stainless steel body, depending on the variant you buy. For the classic one, steel makes up for the body, while the sports version boasts an aluminum one. The device is protected by a 5 ATM waterproofing grade, while also weighing just around 31.5 grams (sport) / 39 grams (classic). And you are given two buttons to control the watch.On the display side, the GTR 2 boasts a 1.39-inch AMOLED screen with a resolution of 454 x 454 and a pixel density of 326 PPI. For drops, fingerprint touches, and such, the device comes with tempered glass and an anti-fingerprint vacuum coating.

Health and Fitness Tracking

Onto the back of the smartwatch, you get the biometric tracker. The optical PPG sensor does monitor your heartbeat 24/7. Not only that, it warns you when your heartbeat rate gets abnormal or significantly high. Other than that, the GTR 2 gives you SpO2 tracking, Personal Activity Intelligence (PAI), and sleep monitoring.For sports mode, the wearable ships with GPS integrated within it. Hence, the GTR 2 measures more precise data paired with motion tracking and such. In addition, you are provided with 90 different sports modes, including swimming, cycling, walking, and skiing. Some of them support auto-recognized by the watch itself, such as outdoor running, treadmill, walking, outdoor cycling, pool swimming, and elliptical.

Connectivity

As already mentioned, the smartwatch is equipped with GPS to connect with the satellite. Along with that, GTR 2 has WLAN 2.4 GHz to join the network and Bluetooth 5.0 to connect with your Android or iOS device. The Zepp App helps out with this process and also provides you with analytics and such.

Battery

The Amazfit GTR 2 endures for around 11 days of typical use, all thanks to its 471 mAh cell. On basic usage, it can survive more than a month without charge—38 days to be exact. On the other hand, after 6.5 days of heavy tasks, the watch needs 2.5 hours of charge to get back to full using its magnetic charger.There is also a new version of this watch which you can check out here.

title: Tecno Spark 10C
short_description: The Tecno Spark 20 features a flat design with a 6.56-inch 90Hz HD+ display and IP53 rating. Powered by the MediaTek Helio G85, it offers up to 8GB RAM, 256GB storage, and runs HiOS 13 on Android 13. The phone includes a 50MP rear camera, 32MP front camera, and a 5,000mAh battery with 18W charging. It also supports dual-band WiFi, Bluetooth 5.2, and includes stereo speakers, a 3.5mm jack, and USB Type-C.
description:
Heres a quick overview of the Tecno Spark 10C.

Tecno Spark 10C Overview

Design and Display

This smartphone’s design is nearly identical to that of the Spark 10. Hence, it too has boxier frames and an iPhone-style camera module. And the thickness is rated at 8.5mm. Up front, there is a 6.6″ IPS LCD HD+ display with 90Hz Refresh Rate. It is available in three colors: Meta Black, Meta Blue, and Meta Green.

Performance

Tecno Spark 10C is powered by a 12nm Unisoc T606 chipset, featuring a maximum clock speed of 1.6GHz. This 4G silicon is further paired with 4GB or 8GB of RAM and 128GB of onboard storage. On top of that, users can expand the RAM virtually up to 16GB. And Tecno has shipped this phone pre-installed with HiOS 8.6 based on Android 12.

Cameras

Talking about the cameras, the Tecno Spark 10C sports a dual-rear camera setup, led by a 16MP sensor and an unspecified secondary sensor. For selfies, there is an 8MP camera on the front. Both the front and rear cameras can record videos at 1080p @ 30fps.

Rest of the specs

Spark 10C is fueled by a 5000mAh big battery with 18W fast charging support. In terms of wireless connectivity, this smartphone packs dual-band Wi-Fi 5 and Bluetooth 5.0. Moreover, there is a side-mounted fingerprint scanner for biometrics and security.

title: PC Build Under 2.5 Lakh (AMD)
short_description: Here is a list of the best PC components available in Nepal for less than Rs. 250,000 (2.5 Lakhs). The build includes a Ryzen 9 5900X processor with 12 cores and 24 threads. This certainly generates a lot of heat, so Fantech's LC240 Liquid Cooling solution is adequate for this build to keep the CPU temperature under control. Moreover, the system comes with an MSI MPG X570 GAMING EDGE motherboard with an AMD AM4 socket. A GeForce RTX 4070 Ti GPU with 12GB GDDR6 VRAM and 285W TGP handles graphics tasks. Furthermore, the configuration includes 32GB DDR4 RAM and a 1TB Gen 4 NVMe SSD.
description:
PC Build Under 250000 in Nepal (AMD)

If you’re looking for a high-performance PC under Rs. 250,000 in Nepal, then the AMD Ryzen 9 5900X, RTX 4070 Ti build is an excellent choice. This build features a powerful CPU, high-end graphics, and ample RAM, making it perfect for demanding tasks such as 4K video editing and high-end gaming.The AMD Ryzen 9 5900X is a 12-core processor with 24 processing threads. It has a base clock of 3.7 GHz and can reach up to 4.8 GHz on one core in turbo mode. It is up to 24% more efficient than its comparative Zen 2 equivalents, and achieves, on average, 6.8% faster gaming performance than Intel’s 10-core i9-10900K.Similarly, the RTX 4070 Ti is a high-end graphics card, capable of delivering smooth and fluid gameplay even at UHD resolutions. It features 7,680 cores with base/boost clocks of 2.3 / 2.6 GHz, 12 GB of memory, a 192-bit memory bus, 60 3rd gen RT cores, 240 4th gen Tensor cores, DLSS 3 (with frame generation), a TDP of 285W. The 4070-Ti is around 50% faster than the 3070-Ti and offers similar performance to the 3090-Ti at less than half the price.To complement the processors, this build includes an ample amount of RAM (32 GB DDR4 @3200MHz) to prevent any performance bottlenecks due to memory limitations. The 1TB SSD provides plenty of space for your files, games, and other software.This build doesn’t include other accessories needed for a complete setup, such as a monitor, mouse, keyboard, headphones, etc. If you’re planning to use this PC primarily for gaming and editing, we recommend choosing a high-end monitor with a high refresh rate and good color coverage.Here are some things this guy can do:
  • 4K video editing in Premiere Pro and After Effects: This build can handle even the most demanding 4K video editing tasks with ease.
  • 1440P gaming at ultra settings: It can deliver smooth and fluid gameplay at 1440P resolutions with ultra settings.
  • 4K gaming: You can even venture into 4K gaming. You could probably achieve 60+ fps in many titles and maybe even dabble in light 8K gaming.
In conclusion, this PC Build Under 250000 in Nepal (AMD) is ideal for those seeking a powerful workhorse. With such powerful components, this PC should last you a minimum of 6/7 years without much trouble.

title: Amazfit GTR 2e
short_description: The GTR 2e is a rounded version of the 2e smartwatch from Amazfit, featuring an aluminum alloy body and titanium alloy case with a 5 ATM waterproof rating. The front features an AMOLED display with a resolution of 454 x 454 pixels and a pixel density of 326 ppi. The GTR 2e also features health and fitness tracking features, including 24/7 heart rate, SpO2, stress and sleep management, PAI, and temperature tracking. The wearable also offers 90 sports modes, six of which are auto-detected.
description:
Amazfit GTR 2e Overview:

Design and Display:

The GTR 2e from Amazfit, being the GTR model, is the rounded version of the 2e smartwatch. This uses aluminum alloy for the body and titanium alloy for the case. A 5 ATM waterproof rating is certified for this product, similar to its rectangular version. Additionally, you can choose between Black, Gray, and Green according to your taste.On the front, where the most interaction happens, you are met with an AMOLED display. This 1.39" screen sports a resolution of 454 x 454 pixels and a pixel density of 326 ppi. For protection too, the GTR 2e has tempered glass and an anti-fingerprint vacuum coating on the display.

Health and Fitness Tracking

When it comes to health and fitness tracking features, this smartwatch features 24/7 heart rate, SpO2, stress and sleep management, PAI, etc. You do get a temperature here in 2e, as opposed to its superior version, GTR 2. Besides, the wearable also has 90 sports modes, six of which are auto-detected by the watch.

Connectivity

Alongside everything mentioned above, Amazfit has to provide a way to connect with the phone. Hence, there is Bluetooth LE 5.0 ready for you in the GTR 2e. All you have to do on your side is install the Zepp App and connect to your phone. That's it! This allows you to get statistics on your fitness, customize your watch face, etc.You have an additional wireless connection option: GPS with GLONASS. Aside from that, another option for connection is to attach it to the socket using the magnetic charger it ships with.

Battery

From a persistence point of view, the 471 mAh cell should survive a whopping 24 hours in typical usage. Even in heavy usage, the Amazfit GTR 2e claims to last 12 hours and 45 days on basic usage. The best part is that it takes only 2.5 hours to fully recharge.

title: boAt Airdopes 141
short_description: The boAt Airdopes 141 is an in-ear design with a polycarbonate stem that supports touch controls. The audio features include an 8-mm dynamic driver and support for the SBC and AAC codecs. The major thing here is the battery, which lasts around 6 hours on a single charge, and the case bumps that to 42 hours. Additionally, the buds utilize Insta Wake n' Pair technology.
description:
boAt Airdopes 141 Overview:

Design

The boAt Airdopes 141 is an in-ear design with a stem that supports touch controls. These feature a polycarbonate finish with IPX4 sweat protection. You might recognize this design from the Ultima Atom 192. Actually, they are both the same! Nonetheless, it provides a sleek and lightweight body.Three color variations are delivered: Cyan Cyder, Black, and White Purity.

Audio

Moving on, these earbuds boast an 8-mm dynamic driver with a frequency range of 20 Hz to 20 kHz and support the AAC codec. There is no doubt that Airdopes 141 would not provide you with Active Noise Canceling. However, they support Environmental Noise Cancellation (ENC) for better call quality.

Battery

The 30 mAh battery in the Airdopes 141 lasts around 6 hours on a single charge. Moreover, the charging case with a 600 mAh battery bumps that threshold to 42 hours, almost two days of backup. Furthermore, the ASAP fast charge technology causes the device to charge for 1 hour and 15 minutes of playback in just 5 minutes.

Others

In addition to the above features, these buds connect to your phone using Bluetooth 5.2. Their Insta Wake n' Pair is a handy feature, as just opening the case allows the buds to connect to your phone. Further, the boAt Airdopes 141 charges using a USB-C cable.

Design

The Havit SK835BT is a compact cuboid, featuring a size of 180 x 70 x 70 mm and weighing 0.56 kg. The speaker is constructed to be waterproof, with an IPX5 rating, providing added durability. It comes in only one classic black color.

title: Dell Inspiron 15 3501 2021 (11th Gen i5-1135G7, MX330, 8GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD)
short_description: Dell Inspiron 15 3501 (2021) is a budget laptop with an all-plastic build and a 15.6-inch WVA Full HD display. It is powered by the Intel Core i5-1135G7 processor and Nvidia GeForce MX330 graphics with 2GB of GDDR5 VRAM. The memory configuration includes 4GB of RAM and 1TB of HDD storage. Yet, it is also available on higher memory variants depending on the region. Furthermore, with a weight of only 1.83 kg, it is easy to carry in your office bag as well.
description:
If you are looking for a laptop that can handle your everyday tasks and also offer some gaming performance, you might want to check out the Dell Inspiron 15 3511 2021.

Dell Inspiron 15 3511 2021 Overview

Design and Display

The Dell Inspiron 15 3511 2021 is a stylish laptop that weighs 2.93 kg and has a thickness of 18.9 mm. It has a silver metal finish on the lid and the palm rest, and a black plastic base. You get a 15.6-inch full HD display with an anti-glare coating and a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels. The display has narrow bezels on three sides, giving it an 83% screen-to-body ratio.

Performance

The Dell Inspiron 15 3511 2021 is powered by an Intel Core i5-1135G7 processor, which is a quad-core chip with a base frequency of 2.4 GHz and a boost frequency of 4.2 GHz. The processor also has an integrated Intel Iris Xe graphics card, which can handle basic graphics tasks and some light gaming. You also get a Nvidia GeForce MX330 graphics card, which is a dedicated GPU with 2GB of GDDR5 memory.In terms of memory, it has 8GB of DDR4 RAM, which is enough for multitasking and running multiple applications at once. The RAM can be upgraded up to 16GB by opening the bottom panel of the laptop. You get a 512GB SSD, which offers fast boot times and loading speeds.

Ports and Conneectivity

The laptop has a decent selection of ports, including two USB 3.2 Gen 1 ports, one USB 2.0 port, one HDMI 1.4 port, one SD card reader, one headphone/microphone combo jack, and one power jack. It also has a webcam with a privacy shutter and dual-array microphones on the top bezel of the screen.

Battery

The Dell Inspiron 15 3511 2021 has a 3-cell 42 Wh battery that can last up to six hours on a single charge, depending on your usage and settings. The laptop comes with a 65 W power adapter that can charge the battery from zero to 80% in about an hour.The Dell Inspiron 15 3511 2021 is a good choice for users who want a laptop that can handle their daily work and entertainment needs, as well as some gaming on the side.

title: OPPO Reno 12
short_description: The Oppo Reno 12 5G is a lightweight smartphone with a sleek design, featuring a 7.25mm thickness and a 6.7-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10+ support, and 1200 nits peak brightness. It has a triple-camera setup with a 50MP main sensor, 8MP ultra-wide, and 2MP macro, plus a 32MP front camera. Powered by the Dimensity 7300 chipset, it includes up to 12GB of LPDDR5X RAM, 256GB of UFS 3.1 storage, and a 5000mAh battery with 80W fast charging. The phone also comes with an IP65 rating and in-screen fingerprint scanner.
description:
Heres a quick overview of the latest Oppo Reno 12 5G

Oppo Reno 12 Overview

Design and Display

The Oppo Reno 12 has a thickness of 7.25gmam and weighs only 179 grams, falling into the lightweight category. Simply on the design side, the smartphone comes in three colors, with both glass on the front on the back with plastic frames. Moreover, the Reno 12 is also IP65-rated for dust and water protection.On the display front, you get a nice 6.7-inch AMOLED with a 120Hz refresh rate. The smartphone can achieve a peak brightness of 1200 nits and also supports HDR10+. Moreover, it has a resolution of 2412*1080 with 394 ppi. Similarly, it also comes with an in-screen fingerprint scanner and Corning Glass 7i glass protection.

Camera and Battery

The Oppo Reno 12 features a triple camera setup with a 50MP Sony LYT-600 main camera with OIS support, an 8MP ultra-wide lens, and a 2MP macro unit. Unlike its sibling, it doesn’t feature a 50MP 2X telephoto camera. Meanwhile, for selfies and video support, you also get a 32MP front camera with autofocus. Fueling the phone is a 5000mAh battery with 80W fast charging support.

Performance and Storage

While, the Reno 11 and Reno 11 Pro were powered by the Dimensity 8200 and Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1 chipsets respectively, the Reno 12 runs on the newly unveiled Dimensity 7300 processor. It is an octa-core processor with four Cortex-A78 cores at up to 2.5GHz and four Cortex-A55 cores at 2.0GHz.  It is accompanied by LPPDDR5X memory up to 12GB and UFS 3.1 storage up to 256GB.

title: Dell Inspiron 16 5630 2023 (13th Gen i7-1360P, 16GB, 512GB/1TB, 16" FHD+)
short_description: Dell Inspiron 16 5630 (2023) is an ultrabook with an Intel Core i7-1360P CPU. It has 12 cores, 16 threads, and a maximum clock speed of 5.00 GHz. AC Adapter

title: iPad 10.2 (2021)
short_description: Apple has made some noteworthy changes in the 9th gen iPad 10.2. The base model now comes with 64GB of internal storage compared to its predecessor which came with only 32GB. Besides, the tablet boasts an A13 Bionic chipset and a 10.2-inch IPS Retina display. Moreover, the iPad 10.2 has cellular models which cost around USD 130 more than the WiFi-only variant. The iPad 10.2 also supports the first-generation Apple Pencil and keyboard. Unfortunately, there is no type-C connection nor a bezel-less display.
description:
iPad 10.2 Overview, Price:

Here, we will discuss the full specifications and price of the iPad 10.2 (2021).

Design

The iPad 10.2 features the same old metal back and frame as its' predecessor. It also has thick screen bezels on the front. The iPad 10.2 has a 7.5mm thickness and weighs 487 grams for the WiFi-only variant. The WiFi+Cellular model is 11 grams heavier. The iPad 10.2 comes in two colors: Space Gray and Silver.

Display

Like the design, the iPad 10.2 keeps the same display as its predecessor. It has a 10.2-inch Retina IPS LCD screen with 1620 x 2160 pixel resolution and a brightness of 500 nits. Aside from that, the 4:3 aspect ratio means you'll have to deal with quite huge black bars when watching YouTube videos.However, a notable upgrade in the 2021 iPad 10.2 is True Tone support which enables the screen to automatically switch the color temperature based on the ambient lighting.

Performance

Performance-wise, the iPad 10.2 is powered by the A13 Bionic chip, which was featured on Apple's flagship handset for 2019—the iPhone 11 series. In terms of storage, the base variant has been upped to 64GB from 32GB while it maxes out at 256GB. Note that, there is no 128GB variant, nor is there support for expanded storage via microSD card. On the software front, it runs on iPadOS 15.

Battery

Built‐in is an 8557mAh 32.4 watt-hour rechargeable Li‑Po battery. Apple claims up to 10 hours of surfing the web on Wi‐Fi or watching video on the WiFi-only model and 9 hours on the WiFi+Cellular models.

Others

Moving on, the iPad 10.2 (2021) features a total of two cameras, an 8MP front sensor, and a 13MP rear sensor. It contains dual speakers for audio, as well as a 3.5mm headphone jack connection. Last but not the least, there is a Touch id sensor below the display for security.

title: OPPO Reno 12F 5G
short_description: The Oppo Reno 12 F is a feature-rich smartphone ideal for photography, stable connectivity, and everyday performance, with a 6.67-inch 120Hz OLED display, Dimensity 6300, AI tools like AI Eraser 2.0 and BeaconLink for Bluetooth calls, a 50MP triple-camera setup, 32MP front camera, 5000mAh battery (45W charging), IP64 rating, and 5G support.
description:
Oppo Reno 12 F Overview

Design and Display

Beginning with the design, the Oppo Reno 12 F goes for a flat frame body with a hole-punch cutout display. The rear panel gets a glossy finish in the Olive Green shade while the Amber Orange variant bears an attractive wave-like pattern. And the circular camera module gets a bit of a fancy treatment with Halo Light. Oppo calls it the Cosmos Ring design, inspired by luxury watches. Meanwhile, you get an IP64 rating against dust and water damage.Upfront, there is a 6.67-inch OLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate and FHD+ resolution. An AGC DT-Star2 glass is also present for added protection. Moreover, the phone has a wet touch feature, allowing you to use it even when your hands are wet.

Performance

Under the hood, the phone is powered by the Dimensity 6300. Oppo has paired the chip with 8GB of RAM and up to 512GB of internal storage. Likewise, the smartphone boots Oppo’s ColorOS 14.1, built on top of Android 14.

AI Features

The primary highlight of the Reno 12 F is its AI features. With AI Eraser 2.0, you can erase unwanted objects and people in the background with ease. And the AI LinkBoost feature is ensured to provide a seamless and steady connection even in weak network environments, thanks to the 360-degree surrounding antenna design.

Make calls using Bluetooth

Another interesting thing about this phone is the BeaconLink feature. This technology allows phone calls using Bluetooth, without the use of a mobile signal or internet. Turning this feature one can make calls within 200 metres.

Camera and Battery

In terms of optics, there is a triple-camera setup, headlined by a 50MP primary shooter, 8MP ultrawide (112° FOV), and a 2MP macro unit. Moreover, there is a 32MP snapper upfront for taking selfies and video calls.Fueling the phone is a 5000mAh battery paired with 45W of fast charging. Connectivity features include 5G, WiFi 5, Bluetooth 5.3, GPS, NFC, and a USB Type-C port. Moreover, there is an in-display fingerprint scanner for biometrics security.

description:
Asta Wolf Retro Ultra Overview:

Design

The Asta Wolf Retro Ultra is the extended version of the Retro speaker from the same company. It boasts a compact design in a wooden rustic brown finish, measuring 380mm x 98mm x 102mm and having an IPX4 rating for increased portability. There is a phone holder and buttons on the top of the speaker.

Audio and Connectivity

Equipped with Bluetooth v5.3+EDR, the Wolf Retro Ultra offers wireless connectivity up to 10 meters. It features a 66mm driver and a 4 ohm impedance, providing a stereo output between 60 Hz and 18 kHz.Retro Ultra also supports TF cards up to 32GB and allows pairing with two Bluetooth-enabled devices. The speaker also includes USB, FM radio, and auxiliary ports, along with a microphone.

Battery

Powered by a 2500mAh battery, the Asta Wolf Retro Ultra offers 6–8 hours of playtime at 70% volume and has a standby time of 450 hours. Charging the device takes 2-3 hours through a Micro USB port with a power input of DC 5V (1A).
seo_title_facebook: Asta Wolf Retro Ultra Price in Nepal: Specs and Comparisons
seo_description_facebook: Asta Wolf Retro Ultra speaker price, full specifications, and more. Find out the complete specifications and price of the Retro Ultra portable speakers.

title: Vivo X200 Pro
short_description: Vivo X200 Pro is the companys latest flagship phone to hit the global market. And as always, theres a major emphasis on cameras here. It has a 50MP main, a 50MP ultrawide, and a 32MP selfie camera, but the biggest highlight of the Vivo X200 Pro is definitely its 200MP periscope telephoto lens. That thing is excellent for portraits and street photography. The X200 Pro is also a proper performance champ thanks to the Dimensity 9400 chip, whereas it also has a durable design, a fantastic 120Hz AMOLED display, and a huge 6000 mAh battery.
description:
Vivo X200 Pro Overview

Design and Display

The Vivo X200 Pro is a proper flagship phone so as youd expect, Vivo hasnt compromised at all in terms of anything here. You get a solid glass sandwich build with aluminum frames, while this thing is both IP68 and IP69 dust/water resistant as well. In the international market, the X200 Pro is available in either "Titanium Gray" or "Cosmos Black" color options.As for the display, youre looking at a 6.78" AMOLED panel with a 120Hz refresh rate and up to 4500 nits of peak brightness. This is a BOE-made panel, which also has an impressive 0.1 – 120Hz variable refresh rate technology. On top of all this, the Vivo X200 Pros display has HDR10+ and Dolby Vision certification too.

Performance and Storage

The Vivo X200 Pro is powered by the Dimensity 9400 chip, which makes it among the few flagship phones that ships with a MediaTek processor instead of one made by Qualcomm. This has been coupled with a whopping 16GB of LPDDR5X RAM and 512GB of UFS 4.0 storage.It boots on Funtouch OS 15 (Android 15) on global models, while the Chinese variant tastes OriginOS 15 instead. Vivo has also promised 4 years of OS and 5 years of security updates for the X200 series.

Camera and Battery

And in case you didnt know, the biggest highlight of the Vivo X200 Pro is definitely its cameras. Which has been headlined by a monstrous 200MP periscope telephoto lens capable of 3.7x optical zoom (85mm equivalent). It is followed by a 50MP Sony LYT-818 main sensor, a 50MP ultrawide sensor, and a 32MP selfie camera.That telephoto lens has also received "Zeiss APO" certification for excellent chromatic and spherical aberration correction, while Vivo X200 Pros lenses also have Zeiss T* coating. And on our tests, we were thoroughly impressed by the X200 Pros cameras, especially in terms of portraits. Whereas it can also shoot great videos, including at up to 4K 120 fps. Just like the iPhone 16 Pro Max.Vivo has also managed to fit in a massive 6000 mAh battery here, thanks to the third-gen silicon anode tech. All that without making the phone too heavy or too thick. It supports 90W wired and 30W wireless charging.
seo_title_facebook: Vivo X200 Pro Price, Full Specifications, Comparisons
seo_description_facebook: Vivo X200 Pro price, full specifications, comparisons, and more. Find out the complete specs, and price of the Vivo X200 Pro here.

title: Honor Magic V3
short_description: The Honor Magic V3 is a slim, powerful foldable phone, measuring just 9.20 mm when folded and 4.35 mm when open. It features dual OLED displays with a 120Hz refresh rate, 3840 PWM dimming, and wide PCI-D3 color gamut. The outer screen is 6.43 inches, while the inner screen expands to 7.92 inches. Powered by a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chip, it includes 16GB RAM, 512GB storage, and a 5,000 mAh battery with 66W charging. The camera setup includes a 50MP main, 50MP ultrawide, and 20MP telephoto lens, plus two 16MP selfie cameras.
description:
Honor Magic V3 Overview

Design and Display

Talking of the design, the Honor Magic V3 is a book-style foldable that is as thin as a regular phone. In fact, this thing has been on a diet and lost 0.7mm from its thickness, coming from 9.9mm in the previous generation. Other than that, its back panel has a leather finish, a large octagonal camera dial, and IPX8 dust and water resistance.The displays on this thing include a larger 7.92-inch folding inner and a 6.43-inch cover screen. Both the panels are LTPO OLED with 1–120Hz refresh rate. Meanwhile, the outer display has a higher PWM dimming at 4,320Hz compared to 3,840Hz of the inner screen. Likewise, the outer display can go as bright as 5,000 nits and dons a Rhino Glass protection. The inner display isn’t entirely naked though, as it is layered with a film which is coated with nano-aluminium oxide. This coating apparently increases the screen’s wear resistance by fivefold, which if true, is absolutely great!

Performance

Under the helm, you get Qualcomm’s 2024 flagship offering — Snapdragon 8 Gen 3. This CPU clocks in at a maximum of 3.3GHz, and is the second most powerful processor per Nanoreview. The Honor Magic V3 is also equipped with an in-house C1+ chip that enhances the phone’s network reception.Additionally, the phone is available in three different configurations. Those being, 12GB + 256GB, 16GB + 512GB, and 16GB + 1TB. It has an independent storage chip with a dual TEE security system as well which ensures the user’s data privacy. The Honor Magic V3 houses a titanium vapour chamber as well, which keeps its temperature in check and smoothes the performance.

Camera and Battery

The camera department includes three rear shooters and two selfie units. On the back, it has a 50MP primary camera coupled with a 40MP ultrawide shooter and a 50MP periscope telephoto unit. Furthermore, it is capable of 3.5x optical and 100x times digital zoom. Both the inner as well as outer front cameras on the Honor Magic V3 are a 20MP sensor that also handles face recognition.This phone packs a 5,150mAh capacity battery with 66W wired, 50W wireless, and reverse wireless charging support. Though it looks quite modest on paper, it is Honor’s proprietary silicon-carbon battery. The company uses bits of silicon in their battery anode resulting in larger power density, faster charging, and tolerance to freezing weather conditions. The Honor Magic V3 specifically packs the third generation of this battery tech that crams an industry-leading 10% silicon content.

title: boAt Airdopes 161
short_description: boAt's Airdopes 161 is an in-ear design with a cylindrical stem and an IPX5 water protection rating. It ships with a 10-mm driver with boAt's signature sound, is wirelessly connected via Bluetooth 5.1, and has a USB-C port. The battery lasts around 17 hours of playback, and the ASAP charging feature gets it back for 2 hours of playtime in only 10 minutes. It also has a microphone, one-click voice assistant activation, and a 1-year warranty.
description:
boAt Airdopes 161 Overview:

Design

boAt's Airdopes 161 is an in-ear design with a cylindrical stem. This stem supports touch controls. And the buds are certified with an IPX5 water protection rating. Additionally, the case it packs in is vertical with a rectangle-ish shape and rounded corners.Color options: Cool Sapphire, Pearl White, Pebble Black

Audio and Connectivity

Okay, the Airdopes 161 does come with a 10-mm driver with the boAt's signature sound. This delivers the sound from your device, which is wirelessly connected via Bluetooth 5.1 up to a distance of 10 m. Other than that, it can charge using the USB-C port found at the bottom of the case.

Rest of the specs

The battery, all in all, lasts for around 17 hours of playback. Moreover, the ASAP charging feature gets it back for 2 hours of playtime in only 10 minutes.And yes, there is a microphone provided in Airdopes 161 for calls and recordings, of course. One-click voice assistant activation and Insta Wake n' Pair are other handy features here. Plus, you get a 1-year warranty from the company!Here are some of the other accessories by boAt.

title: Ultima Magnum E500
short_description: The Ultima Magnum E400 smartwatch, from a Nepali brand, boasts a luxurious stainless steel design with strap options in steel and fluoroelastomer. It features a 1.43-inch AMOLED display, IP68 dust and water resistance, 200+ customizable watch faces, 100+ sports modes, and comprehensive health tracking. Powered by a 280mAh battery, it offers 5-7 days of life and supports wireless charging, alongside a new companion app.
description:
Here is a quick overview of the latest Ultima Magnum E500 smartwatch.

Ultima Magnum E500 Overview

Design and Display

As for the design, Ultima has kept a premium build profile with a stainless steel frame. It also comes with a circular body but with a golden rim for added glamour. On the sides, you get three buttons for navigation. This time, you get a metallic strap plus a leather strap bundled inside the box. Moreover, there is an IP68 rating against dust and water protection.
In terms of display, you are greeted with a 1.43-inch AMOLED panel with 466×466 resolution. It supports 800nits of brightness for sunlight readability and 326PPI pixel density.

Tracking Features

Getting to the health and tracking features, the Magnum E500 consists of heart rate, blood oxygen, stress monitoring, sleep tracking, female menstrual tracking, and so on. For sports and exercise freaks, you get more than 100 sports modes including running, walking, basketball, yoga, cycling, hiking, and such.

Battery, Connectivity, and Others

Fueling the smartwatch is a 390mAh battery under the hood. It takes all-around 2 hours with a 10W POGO Pin charger. In terms of connectivity, the smartwatch runs on Bluetooth 5.3 and the CoFit companion app. Other smart features include AI voice assistant, camera control, calculator, Find My Phone, Raise to Wakeup, sedimentary reminders, and so on.

title: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3 2021 (11th Gen i3 1115G4, 4GB, 256GB, 14" FHD)
short_description: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i (14ITL-5) is a budget laptop with a 14\" IPS screen. The laptop comes powered by the 11th Gen Intel Core i3-1115G4 processor with integrated graphics. Likewise, you get just 4GB of soldered RAM, which you can upgrade up to 12GB using the vacant SO-DIMM slot. Furthermore, the laptops has 256GB of built-in SDD. It is fueled by a 45W battery and comes with a privacy shutter and a fingerprint scanner.
description:
Lenovo Ideapad Slim 3i (2021): Overview

Here’s a brief description of the design aesthetic, processor, and battery life of the Lenovo Ideapad Slim 3i (2021) laptop with the Intel i3 1115G4 chip.

Display and Build 

Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i sports a 14-inch display IPS LCD panel of FHD resolution (1920 x 1080) resolution. The screen has an anti-glare finish and can reach a maximum brightness of 250 nits. It’s easy to carry around at around 1.5 kilograms. IdeaPad 3i is 327mm in width, 241mm deep, and has a height of 20mm.

Performance and Memory

The Lenovo Ideapad Slim 3i 2021 is powered by Intel’s 11 th gen Core i3 processor. The Intel core i3-1115G4 is an efficient mobile processor that can deliver smooth performance for day-to-day tasks and office work.IdeaPad Slim 3 (i3) comes with 4GB of DDR4 RAM, but it can be upgraded to up to 12 GB. At purchase, you get 512GB of M.2 2280 SSD for long-term storage. The fun part is you can replace that SSD with a 1 TB later down the road.

Battery and Connectivity 

Lenovo Ideapad Slim 3i 2021 ships with a 45Wh battery. It’s not a very big battery, but it can last you a couple of hours with casual workloads.As for port selection, you get an old-fashioned USB 2 type-A port, a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A port, a USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 port, an HDMI 1.4b port, a Card reader, and a 3.5mm headphone/microphone jack.Wireless connectivity on the Lenovo Ideapad 3 constitute of your standard Wifi 6 and Bluetooth 5.0 technology.
seo_title_facebook: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i 2021 (i3 11th Gen 1115G7, 14\" FHD)

title: Asta Wolf Banger
short_description: The Asta Wolf Banger is a portable speaker with a rectangular design, IPX4 splash-proof housing, and a 52mm driver for 5W power. It supports 32GB TF cards and FM radio. The speaker has a 2000mAh battery, offering 12 hours of playtime and 500 hours of standby time. Charging takes 2-3 hours via a Type C port with a DC 5V input
description:
Asta Wolf Banger Overview

Design

The Asta Wolf Banger showcases a rectangle design in black, blue, or green color options. It measures 108 x 53.5 x 111.5 mm. The speaker is designed to be highly portable and comes with an IPX4 splash-proof property. The front has a grille, and you can hang it on a lanyard to carry it around.

Audio and Connectivity

The Wolf Banger comes equipped with a 52mm driver that delivers 5W of power with an impedance of 4 ohms. Additionally, it provides wireless connectivity using Bluetooth 5.0 and a range of 10 meters.The Banger supports TF cards up to 32GB and has a frequency range spanning from 87 to 108 Hz. It also supports dual pairing/TWS and features FM radio capability.

Battery

The Asta Wolf Banger offers around 12 hours of playtime at 70% volume with its 2000mAh cell and provides a standby time of 500 hours. Charging the device takes 2-3 hours through a Type C port with a power input of DC 5V (1A).
seo_title_facebook: Asta Wolf Banger Price in Nepal: Specs and Comparisons
seo_description_facebook: Asta Wolf Banger speaker price, full specifications, and more. Find out the complete specifications and price of the Asta Wolf Banger portable speakers.

title: Samsung Galaxy S22+
short_description: Samsung launched the Galaxy S22 series in the global market during the \"Galaxy Unpacked\" event in February 2022. Among the three phones announced, the Galaxy S22+ sits between the standard S22 and the S22 Ultra.
description:
Samsung Galaxy S22+ Overview, Price:

Design, Display

Samsung Galaxy S22+ has a similar design as last year's Galaxy S21 Plus. But this time, the company has used a squared-off finish with round edges like the latest iPhones. The phone measures just 7.6mm thick while weighing 196 grams. It is also IP68 certified against dust and water damage. Since this is a flagship phone, the Galaxy S22+ uses premium build materials throughout the device.You'll find Corning Gorilla Glass Victus+ both on the front and the back of the phone, whereas its frames are made of Armored Aluminum for additional durability. Upfront, Samsung has gone with a 6.6-inches Dynamic AMOLED 2X panel with a 120Hz refresh rate and up to 240Hz touch sampling rate.The company says this screen can hit up to 1750 nits of peak brightness. Furthermore, it also supports the new "Vision Booster" feature that adjusts the screen's colors and contrast levels to ensure top-notch visibility even under direct sunlight.

Performance

Powering the phone is either Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 or Exynos 2200 chip. Both are manufactured under Samsung's 4nm process node and have been coupled with 8GB LPDDR5 RAM alongside 128/256GB UFS 3.1 storage.This time, Samsung has shipped the Snapdragon variant of the Galaxy S series in markets like Nepal and India, while it previously used to be limited to select regions like the US, China, and South Korea only.Galaxy S22+ runs on Android 12-based One UI 4.1. Samsung has promised 4 years of Android and 5 years of security updates for the Galaxy S22 series as well.

Cameras, Others

The phone has a triple camera setup at the back that includes a 50MP main sensor. This is followed by a 12MP ultrawide, and a 10MP telephoto lens with 3x optical zoom. For selfies, it brings a 10MP sensor inside the hole-punch cutout. Galaxy S22+ gets its juice from a modest 4500mAh battery that supports 45W fast charging. It also supports 15W wireless and 4.5W reverse wireless charging.
seo_title_facebook: Samsung Galaxy S22+ Price, Full Specifications
seo_description_facebook: Samsung Galaxy S22+ (S22 Plus) price, full specifications, and more. Find out the complete specs, price of the Samsung Galaxy S22+ here.

title: Samsung Galaxy A03 Core
short_description: Samsung Galaxy A03 Core is an entry-level device from the South Korean brand. It's the first Core-branded phone to ditch the traditional bezel design for a waterdrop notch. Since it is an entry-level phone, Samsung has opted for a low-powered processor and Android GO Edition.
description:
Samsung Galaxy A03 Core Overview:

Design, Display

As expected from a phone of this price range, Samsung Galaxy A03 Core features an all-polycarbonate body. That being said, Samsung has tried to spice things up by incorporating a textured back, which helps secure a firm grip. Likewise, it even imitates the camera bump of the more expensive S-series phones. But the Galaxy A03 Core is quite heavy, weighing 211 grams.Over on the front, the phone sports a 6.5-inch PLS TFT LCD panel with a resolution of 720 x 1600 pixels. Since this is an HD display, it doesn't have Widevine L1 certification for high-res content streaming on Netflix and other OTT platforms. Anyway, there's an Infinity-V notch for the selfie camera here.

Performance

Under the hood, Galaxy A03 Core packs the Unisoc SC9863A processor. It's an entry-level chipset based on TSMC's 28nm process. It features two clusters of Cortex-A55 cores clocked at 1.6GHz and 1.2GHz, respectively.The Galaxy A03 Core boots on One UI Core based on the Android 11 Go edition. That's because it only has 2GB of RAM, which isn't quite enough for the full-fledged One UI experience. It is available with a single 32GB internal memory option, while you can expand it by up to 1TB using an external micro SD card.

Cameras, Others

Galaxy A03 Core has a total of two cameras. The one on the back uses an 8MP sensor with an f/2.0 aperture lens. It can record 1080p videos at 30 fps. The 5MP front-facing camera has an f/2.2 aperture and has fixed focus. Powering the phone is a massive 5000mAh battery which should easily last two days under normal usage.However, it only supports 7.75W charging via the micro USB port. As a result, the phone takes more than 3 hours to go from 0 to 100%. Other highlights of the Samsung Galaxy A03 Core include a single speaker setup, 3.5mm headphone jack
seo_title_facebook: Samsung Galaxy A03 Core Price, Full Specifications
seo_description_facebook: Samsung Galaxy A03 Core price, full specifications, and more. Find out the complete specs, price of the Samsung Galaxy A03 Core here.

title: Samsung Galaxy F23 5G
short_description: Samsung Galaxy F23 5G is the follow-up to last year's F23. The phone brings a lot of changes, both good and bad ones, compared to its predecessor. The new processor promises better performance, while also adding 5G support. On the other side, F23 uses a TFT LCD panel, packs a smaller 5,000mAh battery, and doesn't ship with any charger.
description:
Samsung Galaxy F23 5G Overview:

Design, Display

Samsung Galaxy F23 5G sports a 6.6-inch 120Hz display with noticeable bezels and a waterdrop notch on top. The TFT LCD panel is certinaly a downgrade from the Super AMOLED panel on the F22. In our usage, we found the F23's dispaly on par with other mainstream IPS LCD panels in terms of colors and viewing angles.The body of the phone, including the frames, is all made of plastic with two color options: Forest Green and Aqua Blue. It measures 8.4mm and weighs around 198 grams.

Performance

Inside, Galaxy F23 5G is powered by Snapdragon 750G, which brings some healthy upgrade both in terms of performance and camera capabilities. It handles F23's 120Hz just fine and is well optimized for mainstream games like PUBG: Mobile and COD: Mobile.The chip also has an integrated 5G modem with support for 12 different 5G bands, which by the way, is more than most companies are offering at this price range.Samsung Galaxy F23 5G is available in 4/128 and 6/128GB variants. There is also a dedicated Micro SD card slot that you can use to expand the memory up to 1TB.

Cameras, Others

Galaxy F23 5G flaunts a triple camera setup at the back, consisting of a 50MP primary, 8MP ultrawide and a 2MP macro camera. You can record 4K 30 fps videos using the primary camera. There is no Optical Image Stabilizaton, but you can use Super Steady feature for FHD 30fps recording.Samsung Galaxy F23 5G gets its juice from a 5,000mAh battery. Although the phone supports 25W adaptive fast charging, you won't find any charger in the box.On the bright side, it boots on Android 12-based One UI 4.1 out of the box. Samsung is even promising 2 major OS upgrades and 4 years of security patches on top.
seo_title_facebook: Samsung Galaxy F23 5G Price, Full Specifications
seo_description_facebook: Samsung Galaxy F23 5G price, full specifications, and more. Find out the complete specs, price of the Samsung Galaxy F23 5G here.

title: Samsung Galaxy M53
short_description: Galaxy M53 is Samsung's latest mid-range phone. As the name suggests, it is the successor to last year's Galaxy M52. For a mid-year refresh, the company hasn't really introduced any big upgrades here. Compared to the Snapdragon 778G chip on its predecessor, Samsung has gone with MediaTek's Dimensity 900 this time. Interestingly enough, the Galaxy M53 also has a vapor chamber cooling system inside—which is quite rare for a Samsung phone. Another big highlight here is the 108MP primary camera. This is followed by an 8MP ultrawide, a 2MP macro, and a 2MP depth sensor. It has the same 6.7\" 120Hz Super AMOLED Plus display as last time, alongside a large 5000mAh battery. Unfortunately, you won't be getting a power adapter inside the box with the Galaxy M53.

title: Tecno Pova 6
short_description: The Tecno Pova 6, carrying a gaming-centric design similar to the Pova 6 Pro, features a 6.78-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, FHD+ resolution, and TÜV Rheinland Low Blue Light Certification. It is powered by the Helio G99 Ultimate chipset, with up to 12GB of RAM, 256GB of storage, and runs on HiOS 14 based on Android 14. The device includes a 108MP dual rear camera setup and a 32MP front camera, both capable of 1080p video recording. It has a 6,000mAh battery with 70W fast charging, an IP53 rating for water resistance, and supports 4G, WiFi 5, Bluetooth 5.1, GPS,  NFC, and includes an in-display optical fingerprint scanner.
description:
Tecno Pova 6 Overview

Design and Display

The Tecno Pova 6 continues to carry the funky gaming vibe from the Pova 6 Pro. In fact, this guy looks quite identical to its Pro sibling. Yes, the same flat middle frame, Glyph interface-like LED strips, and a hole-punch display on the front! And for the ingress protection, the device secures an IP53 rating as well.Talking of the panel, it is a 6.78-inch AMOLED panel with a 120Hz refresh rate and FHD= resolution. You also get 2160Hz high-frequency dimming and TÜV Rheinland Low Blue Light Certification here.

Performance

Under the hood, the Pova 6 packs a Helio G99 Ultimate chipset. This 6nm fabbed 4G processor features two Cortex-A76 cores running at 2.2GHz and six Cortex-A55 cores clocking at 2.0GHz. Handling the graphics here is a Mali-G57 MC2 GPU.As a gaming phone, you get a 2871.78mm² VC heatsink and 1700W graphite thermal conductivity to keep the thermals in check. Plus some gaming-centric features from the Game Space 4.0! In terms of memory and storage, this phone is available with 8/12GB of RAM and 256GB of internal storage. Likewise, on the software side, booting the Pova 6 is Tecno’s HiOS 14 based on Android 14.

Camera

Getting to the optics, the smartphone houses a dual camera setup. It is headlined by a 108MP primary sensor and a 2MP depth-sensing unit. Upfront, there is a 32MP snapper for selfies and video calls. Both the main and selfie cameras are only capable of shooting 1080p videos at 30fps.

Battery, Charging, and Others

Fueling the Pova 6 is a sizeable 6,000mAh battery with 70W fast charging support. Thankfully, Tecno also ships a compatible 70W charger in the box. For connectivity, the phone supports 4G, WiFi 5, Bluetooth 5.1, GPS, NFC, a 3.5mm audio jack and a USB Type-C port. Moreover, you get an in-display optical fingerprint scanner for biometrics security.
seo_title_facebook: Tecno Pova 6 Price, Full Specifications, Comparison

title: Tecno Spark 20 Pro+
short_description: The Tecno Spark 20 Pro+ is a mid-range smartphone featuring a sleek design with an IP53 rating for dust and splash resistance. It offers a 6.78-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, powered by the MediaTek Helio G99 Ultimate chipset, 8GB RAM, and 256GB storage. The device has a 108MP main camera, a 32MP front camera, and advanced audio features. It also includes a 5000mAh battery with 33W fast charging.
description:
Heres a quick overview of the Tecno Spark 20 Pro+

Tecno Spark 20 Pro Plus Overview

Design and Display 

The Tecno Spark 20 Pro+ comes in a visually attractive design with a curved finish. Additionally, its IP53 rating ensures resistance to dust and splashes. The Spark 20 Pro+ will be available in visually appealing color options, including Temporal Orbits, Lunar Frost, Radiant Starstream, and Magic Skin 2.0 Green. The latter option comes with a vegan leather back panel. While the rest come in a dual-tone finish the second and third options feature some eye-catching patterns.Featuring a 6.78-inch AMOLED display, the Spark 20 Pro+ delivers a vibrant visual experience with a 120Hz refresh rate and a peak brightness of 1000 nits. The 1080 x 2436 pixel resolution and an impressive 89.0% screen-to-body ratio contribute to an immersive display. The inclusion of an Always-On display enhances user convenience.

Performance

Running on the latest Android 14 operating system, the smartphone is equipped with a powerful MediaTek Helio G99 Ultimate chipset. The octa-core CPU, comprising 2x slightly higher than 2.2 GHz (overclocked) Cortex-A76 and 6×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55, ensures smooth and efficient performance, complemented by the Mali-G57 MC2 GPU.With a spacious internal storage of 256GB and 8GB of RAM, the Spark 20 Pro+ provides ample space for apps, multimedia content, and multitasking. Users can further expand storage using microSDXC cards.

Cameras

The device features a main camera setup with a 108 MP wide lens (f/1.8 aperture) and a 0.08 MP auxiliary lens. Quad-LED flash and HDR support enhance photography, while video recording capabilities include 1440p@30fps and 1080p@30fps. The 32 MP wide lens selfie camera, equipped with Dual-LED flash, supports 1080p@30fps video recording.

Audio and Connectivity

The Spark 20 Pro+ promises an immersive audio experience with stereo speakers and advanced audio features, including 24-bit/192kHz Hi-Res and hi-res wireless audio. Connectivity options encompass Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, Bluetooth 5.2, GPS, GLONASS,  NFC, and FM radio. The device is equipped with a USB Type-C port for charging and data transfer.

Battery and Charging

Fueled by a robust 5000 mAh non-removable battery, the Tecno Spark 20 Pro+ ensures extended usage. The 33W wired charging capability adds a quick and efficient charging solution for users on the move.

title: Tecno Spark 30
short_description: The Tecno Spark 30 shares a similar design with its predecessor, featuring flat edges, a circular camera module, and an IP64 dust resistance rating. It has a 6.78-inch FHD+ display with a 90Hz refresh rate and 800 nits brightness. Powered by the MediaTek Helio G91 chipset, it offers 8GB of RAM (expandable by 8GB virtually) and up to 256GB storage, alongside a 5,000 mAh battery with 18W charging. Its 64MP main camera uses a Sony IMX682 sensor, while a 13MP front camera includes a dual-colour flash. The phone also features stereo speakers with Dolby Atmos, 4G connectivity, and NFC support, running on Android 14.
description:
Are you looking for an affordable phone that checks most of the boxes? And also one with a bit of a flair? Then you might want you check out the Tecno Spark 30:

Tecno Spark 30 Overview

Design and Display

The Tecno Spark features flat edges and a circular camera module. A horizontal patterned strip goes through the camera island, which also has intricate patterns. Notably, this phone offers IP64 dust and water resistance and comes in two colours: Stellar Shadow and Astral Ice. However, in Nepal, the latter option is not available. You can get a yellow-coloured limited edition Bumblebee variant instead.
The Tecno Spark 30 sports a larger 6.78-inch display, likely using an LCD panel. It offers a 90Hz refresh rate. Additionally, you get an FHD+ resolution stretching 1,080 x 2,460 pixels. It can also achieve 800 nits of peak brightness, and support touch commands with wet or oily hands.

Performance and the rest

Performance-wise, the Tecno Spark 30 uses the MediaTek Helio G91 chipset. This phone features 8GB of RAM, which can be expanded by an additional 8GB virtually. Storage options include 128GB and 256GB, but only the higher option is available in Nepal. Meanwhile, a 5,000 mAh battery powers the device with 18W charging speed.In terms of photography, the phone has a 64MP primary camera with a Sony IMX682 sensor, which enhances image quality. However, there are no secondary lenses. There is a 13MP selfie camera on the front, utilising the screen as a dual-colour temperature flash.The Tecno Spark 30 also features stereo speakers with Dolby Atmos audio. It comes with WiFi 5, Bluetooth v5.0, 4G cellular, NFC, and an IR blaster for wireless connectivity. Finally, the phone runs Android 14, though details on software updates remain unavailable.

title: Realme GT Neo 3
short_description: Realme GT Neo 3 is the successor to the GT Neo 2 from last year. The phone's major USP (Unique selling proposition) is the UltraDart 150W fast charger, which can charge the handset from 0 to 50% in just five minutes. it is the first phone to support 150W fast charging. Furthermore, it is one of the first phones in the world to use the MediaTek Dimensity 8100 chipset. The GT Neo 3 was initially released in China and has made it to the global market since then.
description:
Realme GT Neo 3 Overview:

Design, Display

To begin with, the Realme GT Neo 3 flaunts a 6.7-inch AMOLED panel on the front. It's an FHD+ resolution 10-bit panel with 100% DCI-P3 coverage and support for a 120Hz refresh rate. The device also has an independent display chip, which adds frames to the scenes. These extra frames will make games seem smoother while also consuming less power.In terms of design, the Neo 3 has an AG Glass surface on the back and comes in three colors: Blue, Silver, and Black. The first two color options have racing track-inspired lines that go through the camera island and Realme's branding. Whereas, the latter has a matte finish on the back.

Performance

The device is powered by MediaTek Dimensity 8100 SoC. This chip is built on the TSMC's 5nm technology and includes four Cortex-A78 and four Cortex-A55 cores. Meanwhile, the graphics are handled by the Mali-G610 MC6 GPU.For better thermals, there's a nine-layer heat dissipation structure that consists of a VC heatsink, 3D graphite layer, and diamond thermal gel. Realme GT Neo 3 has LPDDR5 RAM and UFS 3.1 storage, with a maximum of 12GB RAM and 256GB internal storage.

Cameras, Others

However, the device's charging speed is its most striking feature. The phone supports 150W charging, which can charge it to 50% in 5 minutes. TÜV Rheinland has also certified it for safe fast charging. On the other hand, Realme is also offering the GT Neo 3 with comparatively slower 80W Super VOOC charging and a larger 5,000mAh battery.In terms of optics, the smartphone has a triple camera configuration on the back, with a 50MP Sony IMX766 sensor (w/ OIS, 4K, and other features) partnered with an 8MP ultrawide angle lens and another 2MP macro sensor. The front has a 16MP sensor in a punch-hole for selfies and video calls.Aside from that, the handset has X-axis linear motor for haptics and an in-display fingerprint sensor for biometrics. Connectivity options include 5G, Wi-Fi 6E, Bluetooth 5.2, GPS, NFC, and a USB Type-C.

title: Tecno Spark 30C
short_description: The Tecno Spark 30C features a center-aligned camera design with an IP54 rating and comes in three colors, including a vegan leather option. It has a 6.67-inch HD+ display with a 120Hz refresh rate and is powered by the MediaTek Helio G81 chipset. Available in configurations of 4GB, 6GB, or 8GB of RAM with 128GB or 256GB storage, it boasts a 50MP main camera, an 8MP front camera, and a 5,000mAh battery with 18W fast charging.
description:
Heres a quick overview of the Tecno Spark 30C.

Tecno Spark 30C Overview

Design and Display

The Tecno Spark 30C looks pretty standard for a smartphone. There isn’t much going on over here, it has a large centre-aligned camera island. It is IP54-rated and is available in three outlooks: Orbit Black, Orbit White, and Magic Skin 3.0. The former has a monotone finish, while the middle option has a bit of gradient to it. The latter choice stands out the most, as it has vegan leather for its back panel.The display is also a standard game. It has a 6.67-inch screen, however, the panel type has not been specified by the company. It is likely an LCD, as it is the most sensible option. Regardless, the Tecno Spark 30C offers you an HD+ resolution and a smooth refresh rate of 120Hz. It also supports touch inputs even when the screen has water or oil on it.

Performance

Under the helm is the MediaTek Helio G81 chipset, which launched near the end of August. Even though it has been a while since it was launched, MediaTek still has not listed it on its website. This is why, we are taking Nanoreview as a reference for the information on the SoC. As per them, the silicon comes with eight cores, 12nm fabrication, and a peal clock speed of 2.0GHz. While the Redmi 14C did feature the Helio G81 Ultra, the Tecno Spark 30C is likely the first phone to have the standard version.This smartphone comes in three memory choices: 4GB, 6GB, and 8GB. Meanwhile, you can choose between 128GB and 256GB for the internal storage. Altogether, the Tecno Spark 30C is available in four configurations: 4GB + 128GB, 4GB + 256GB, 6GB + 128GB, and 8GB + 256GB. Users can virtually double the memory on this thing, however, it appears there is no option for storage expansion. Talking of the software, this phone boots on Android 14.

Camera and the rest

In terms of the camera, you get a primary 50MP unit at the back. It is assisted by a dummy lens, making it look like a dual-camera setup. However, that is definitely not the case. Likewise, it has a decent 8MP shooter on the front. In the tank, Tecno Spark 30C packs a 5,000mAh battery with 18W fast charging support. It has a stereo speaker setup with DTS tuning and apparently can deliver up to 300% louder volume. Lastly, the phone is equipped with an IR blaster too.

title: iPhone 13 Mini
short_description: The iPhone 13 is a pocket-friendly device for those who want a flagship-grade experience in a compact form factor.
description:
iPhone 13 Mini Overview, Price:

Design and Display

The 13 Mini is the smallest handset in the iPhone 13-series with a 5.4-inch display. Nonetheless, it's an OLED panel with a typical brightness of 800nits that can reach 1200nits during HDR video streaming. You also get a bathtub-style notch on the top, although Apple has decreased its size by 20% compared to its predecessor.Moreover, the smartphone features Apple's Ceramic Shield on the front and an IP68 rating for dust and water resistance. On the other hand, the frames are made of aluminum. The iPhone 13 Mini is available in Starlight, Midnight, Blue, Pink, Red, and Green color options.

Performance

On the performance front, you get the top-of-the-line Apple A15 Bionic chipset, which can easily handle day-to-day tasks and doesn't break a sweat even in graphics-intensive games. In terms of battery, the 13 Mini is stuffed with a 2438mAh cell with the same charging capacity as the other handsets in this series—20W adapter, 15W MagSafe wireless, and 7.5W Qi magnetic wireless charging.

Camera, Others

Furthermore, it sports two 12MP cameras on the back, one main and one ultrawide sensor. The latter can capture images with a 120-degree field of view, while the primary lens has sensor-shift OIS for steady footage. For selfies, there's a 12MP lens on the aformentioned notch.Besides this, the iPhone 13 Mini has a stereo speaker setup with Dolby Atmos support. Likewise, it relies solely on Face id for biometric authentication.Check out the full specifications and price of the iPhone 13 Mini below:

description:
If you are looking for a powerful and portable laptop, you might want to consider the Dell Inspiron 14 5420 (2022) with 12th Gen Intel Core i7-1260P processor.

Dell Inspiron 14 5420 (2022) Overview:

Display and Design

title: JBL Tune 230NC
short_description: The JBL Tune 230NC is an in-ear fit earpiece with silicone tips and exhibits an IPX4 rating. The earpieces come in four color options: Blue, Black, White, and Sand. SBC and AAC codecs, as well as ANC for noise cancellation, are among the audio features, with the 6-mm drivers leading the charge. The 4-mic system also allows for modes like Ambient Aware + TalkThru and noise cancellation for calls.
description:
JBL Tune 230NC Overview:

Box Contents

Starting with the box of JBL Tune 230NC, you would find a pair of buds, a USB-C cable, three sizes of ear tips, a charging case, a guidebook, and a warranty.

Design

Beginning with the buds themselves, Tune 230NC is an in-ear fit with different sizes of silicone tips found inside the box mentioned above. These earpieces weigh around 10.2 grams. Not the lightest out there, but not that heavy too. And the IPX4 rating is a plus.When it comes to the charging case's design, there is not much. These weigh around 47.3 g (10.2 oz). Furthermore, three LEDs are near the closing area to indicate the charge level. Four different color options are provided: Blue, Black, White, and Sand.

Audio related features

For audio, the JBL Tune 230NC boasts 6-mm drivers with a sensitivity of 105 dB and an impedance of 16Ω. SBC and AAC are provided as codecs.Similarly, there is ANC that can be enabled using the touch controls or the app for noise cancellation whenever you want to focus on the music. This is achieved by virtue of the presence of a 4-mic system.Additionally, modes found in 230NC like Ambient Aware and TalkThru help you know about your surroundings without having to remove the buds from your ears. Plus, the same mics also help you cancel noise from your voice whenever you are on a call.

Battery and charging

The battery life of the Tune 230NC seems pretty promising, as it provides 10 hours of battery life alone. This drops to 8 hours of life if you have ANC enabled all the time. Besides, we haven't even talked about the case yet. The case adds 30 hours of life to your music and 24 hours with ANC. That's triple the life of buds alone.Charging is also quick, with 10 minutes of charge providing you with 2 hours of playback thanks to Speed Charging.

title: Samsung Galaxy F54
short_description: Galaxy F54 is the latest upper mid-range phone from Samsung. It is basically a rebranded version of the Galaxy M54 that launched a while ago. And the biggest highlight of this phone is definitely its massive 6000mAh battery. So under regular usage, Galaxy F54 should easily last you a couple of days. Like the battery, it also brings a big 6.7\" Super AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate. Powering this phone is Samsung's home-grown Exynos 1380 processor. You can find this 5nm-based chip in other phones like the Galaxy A54 (review) as well. As for the cameras, you get three of them at the back. Leading this setup is a 108MP primary sensor with OIS, which is joined by an 8MP ultrawide and a 2MP macro shooter. There's a 32MP selfie camera up front.
description:
Samsung Galaxy F54 Overview:

Design and Display

Since Galaxy F54 is just a rebranded Galaxy M54, these phones share the same look and everything else. Matter of fact, most Samsung phones in 2023 look pretty similar. It's got a plastic back and plastic frames, while the display is protected by Gorilla Glass 5. Since Galaxy F54 5G enjoys a massive battery, the phone is somewhat bulky—measuring 8.4mm thick and weighing 199 grams.Up front, the phone has a big 6.7" Super AMOLED Plus display. There are minimal bezels on all four sides, while the hole-punch cutout for the selfie camera is pretty small too. This FHD screen also enjoys a smooth 120Hz refresh rate. And Samsung has also included the "Vision Booster" feature for better visibility outdoors.

Performance

In terms of performance, Samsung Galaxy F54 brings Exynos 1380 5G chip inside. Manufactured under a 5nm process node, its octa-core CPU consists of 4x Cortex-A78 (@2.4 GHz) and 4x Cortex-A55 (@2.0 GHz) cores. Then there's the Mali-G68 MP5 GPU for graphics. As for memory, the phone has 6/8GB RAM and either 128 or 256GB storage. The phone boots on Android 13-based One UI 5.1 out-of-the-box, while Samsung also promises 4 major OS and 5 years of security updates for Galaxy F54 5G.

Cameras

There's a triple camera setup here, including a 108MP primary sensor with OIS, an 8MP ultrawide, and a 2MP macro camera. Whereas the aforementioned hole-punch cutout houses a 32MP selfie shooter. You can shoot up to 4K 30 fps videos from both the primary and the selfie camera. And Samsung has also brought features like "Object Eraser" and "Photo/GIF Remaster" to this phone.

Rest of the specs

Galaxy F54 gets its juice from a big 6000mAh battery. It supports 25W fast charging but you're gonna have to buy a compatible power adapter separately since Samsung doesn't provide one in the box itself. For security, there's a side-mounted fingerprint sensor. Whereas wireless connectivity options for Galaxy F54 include WiFi 6, Bluetooth 5.3, and NFC.
