title: Apple MacBook Air M1
short_description: Launched in 2020, Apple MacBook Air M1 is among the first Macs to be powered by an Arm-based M1 chip. The silicon brings a wealth of performance gains that extends to the battery life, too. On the front is a 13.3-inch LED backlit IPS panel that supports TrueTone technology to dynamically adjust the white balance of the display to match the ambiance around you. All of this is housed within a small and compact aluminum chassis weighing only 1.29 kg. Although it has just been surpassed by the MacBook Air M2, it remains a good value for money given that the new MacBook costs USD 200 more.
description:
Compared to its predecessor, the design of the Apple MacBook AirApple MacBook Air M1 has remained the same. Even the dimension and weight are identical. The biggest difference between the two is the use of M1 silicon in the MacBook Air 2020. With this Apple is claiming up to 3.5x faster performance, up to 5x faster graphics, and up to 9x faster Machine learning tasks. Similarly, the storage controller and the latest flash technology in the M1 also result in 2x SSD performance.Here, the Apple MacBook Air M1 has a fan-less design. Thus, the device will remain silent no matter what you do in it. With M1’s latest ISP, the MacBook Air will have better noise reduction, greater dynamic range, improved auto white balance, and ML-enhanced face detection.Its 13.3″ Retina display supports P3 wide color and offers up to 400nits of brightness. As far as memory is concerned, Apple is offering up to 16GB of RAM and 2TB of SSD. TheApple MacBook Air M1 supports Wi-Fi 6 along with Bluetooth 5.0. Users also get three USB Type-C ports (including one Thunderbolt 3 port) and a headphone jack.
The M1 chip has a feature called the Secure Enclave. This feature is a strong and reliable security component. It has a key role in supporting the Touch id. The Touch id allows users to unlock their device in a fast, simple, and secure way.Additionally, the Touch id works smoothly with Apple Pay. Apple Pay is Apple’s service for mobile payments and digital wallets. With this integration, users can make secure online payments. They just need to use their fingerprints.This adds an extra level of convenience and security to their online transactions. So, the Secure Enclave in the M1 chip not only supports device unlocking but also secure online payments.
In addition to these impressive features, the Apple MacBook Air M1 also brings significant improvements in terms of battery life. The battery endurance of devices powered by the M1 chip has been enhanced to provide up to 18 hours of usage on a single charge. This is a substantial increase that allows users to use their devices for longer periods without worrying about running out of battery. Whether you’re working, streaming, or browsing, you can do more of what you love without being tethered to a power outlet.

title: Level51 XP (RTX 3080 Ti)
short_description: Level51 XP is among the most successful laptop from the Thailand-based OEM. The brand is known for building high-end custom gaming laptops and that reflects with the Level51 XP. In addition to the options to CPU and memory configurations, users also have the option to choose display panel of their choice along with the kind of Wireless module, keyboard, and even cooling setup.
description:
Level51 XP Overview, Price:

Design, Display

The chassis of the Level51 XP gaming laptop is fully made of a metal alloy. The laptop measures 25mm in thickness and weighs around 2.5 kg.Over on the front, you get a 15.6-inch display with a slight protrusion on the top for the webcam and stereo microphones. There are three display options to choose from. The most basic option includes an FHD display with a 300Hz refresh rate.Then there is a 1440p display panel with a 165Hz refresh rate. Finally, the high-end models come with a Mini-LED panel with 4K resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate.

Performance

As for performance, Leve51 XP comes with the latest Core i7-12700H CPU. Like the rest of the 12th Gen Intel CPU chip, this processor features hybrid architecture consisting of 6 performance cores and 8 efficiency cores. The CPU boasts a maximum clock speed of up to 4.7GHz.You can pair the CPU with two of the latest RTX 30-series GPUs. Here, you configure the laptop with either RTX 3060 (6GB GDRR6) or RTX 3080 Ti (16GB GDDR6).By default, Level51 XP comes with IC Diamond cooling for both CPU and GPU. However, for an extra fee, you can also opt to upgrade the thermal compound to Liquid Pro, which the company claims will improve the boost speed of the laptop.

Others

Moving on, Level51 XP features two DDR4 RAM modules that can be configured to a combined total of 64GB of memory. Similarly, you also get two M.2 SSD slots for storage. The laptop ships with Windows 11 out of the box. However, you also have the option to use your own license if you have one already.

title: Asus Vivobook 14 2021 (11th Gen i3-1115G4, 4GB, 256GB, 14" FHD)
short_description: Asus VivoBook 14 is a 14-inch Ultrabook for people on a tight budget. It is powered by Intel's 11th Gen Core i3-1115G4 processor that boasts up to 4.1 GHz of boost clock. As for the GPU, it features Intel's integrated UHD graphics. This laptop variant is available with 4GB of RAM and 256GB of storage in Nepal although it is customizable with up to 1TB of SSD and 1TB of HDD. Moreover, the laptop features a fingerprint sensor that has been integrated into the trackpad. The keyboard has 1.4mm key travel and is non-backlit in the base variant.
description:
Asus Vivobook 14 2021: Overview

Here’s a brief description of the build, chipset, and battery life of the Asus Vivobook 14 (2021) with 11th Gen Intel Core i3-1115G4 processor.

Display and Build

As the name suggests, Vivobook 14 features a 14-inch IPS display. The 60Hz panel covers 45% of the NTSC color gamut and can hit a peak brightness of 250 nits. Other than that, it has an FHD resolution (1920×1080) and an aspect ratio of 16:9. The laptop is relatively portable at 1.8 kgs and suitable for an everyday carry machine.

Performance and Memory

Under the hood, the Asus Vivobook 14 2021 has an 11th-gen Intel i3-1115G4 processor. This dual-core 4-thread processor can hit a maximum turbo frequency of 4.10 GHz. It is reliable enough for basic usages like web browsing or document edits but anything more than that might be less welcoming. Similar is the story with the integrated Intel UHD graphics.Other than that, you get 4 GB of RAM with the Vivobook 15 and a 256GB SSD. One of the plus points of this device is its upgradability, there’s an empty SO-DIMM slot where you can insert an 8 GB stick and upgrade the total RAM to 12 GB. Similarly, there’s also an empty 2.5″ HDD slot where you can add extra memory.

Battery and Connectivity

In the tank of the Vivobook 14, you get a 2-cell 37 Wh Lithium-ion battery. You can recharge it with the 45W adapter provided in the box.As for the port selection, you get 3 USB-As, a USB-C, an HDMI, an SD card reader, and a headphone/microphone combo jack. For wireless connectivity, there’s WiFi 5 and Bluetooth 5.1.

title: Dell Inspiron 15 3511 2021 (11th Gen i3-1115G4, 4GB, 256GB, 15.6" FHD)
short_description: The Dell Inspiron 15 3511 (2021) is a 15.6-inch Ultrabook designed for those on a tight budget. It is powered by Intel's 11th Gen Core i3-1115G4 CPU, which has a turbo frequency of up to 4.1 GHz. The graphics processing is powered by Intel's integrated UHD GPU. In Nepal, this laptop is available with 4GB of RAM and 256GB of SSD storage, although it can be customized with up to 2TB of SSD. The laptop weighs only 1.69 kg and comes in only a black color variant. It is powered by a 3-cell 41Whr battery and can accept a 65W AC adaptor.
description:
If you are looking for a reliable and affordable laptop for everyday use, you might want to consider the Dell Inspiron 15 3511 2021. This laptop features an 11th-generation Intel Core i3-1115G4 processor, 4GB of RAM, and 256GB of solid-state drive storage.

Design and Display

The Dell Inspiron 15 3511 2021 is a sleek and lightweight laptop that weighs only 1.83 kg and measures 19.9 mm in thickness. Dell has provided a silver finish and a durable plastic chassis with a full-size keyboard with a numeric keypad and a responsive touchpad.The laptop's display is one of its highlights. It has a 15.6-inch full HD screen with a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels and a brightness of 220 nits. The screen has narrow bezels on three sides, giving it an 83% screen-to-body ratio and a more immersive viewing experience.

Performance

The laptop's performance section is handled by an 11th-generation Intel Core i3-1115G4 processor, which has two cores, four threads, and a base frequency of 3.0 GHz that can boost up to 4.1 GHz. It also supports Intel UHD Graphics, which can handle some casual games and photo editing.In terms of memory, you get 4GB of DDR4 RAM and 256GB of M.2 PCIe NVMe solid-state drive storage, which is faster and more reliable than traditional hard drives. You can also add more storage by using the SD card slot or an external hard drive.

Battery and Ports

Fueling the laptop is a 3-cell 42 Whr battery that can last up to 6 hours on a single charge, depending on your usage and settings. It comes with a 45W AC adapter that can charge the battery from 0 to 80% in about an hour. As for the connectivity and I/O options, it includes Wi-Fi 5, Bluetooth 5.0, HDMI 1.4b, USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, USB 2.0 Type-A, USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C (with DisplayPort), RJ-45 Ethernet port, headphone/microphone combo jack, and an SD card reader.

title: Realme GT 2 Pro
short_description: Realme GT 2 Pro is a first-proper flagship from Realme. From the Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chipset to the 40x microscope camera, the company has made sure to stuff in the best possible hardware. The GT 2 Pro's 2K E4 AMOLED display's LTPO 2.0 technology allows the refresh rate to range from 1 to 120Hz. Furthermore, the phone has a one-of-a-kind Paper Tech Master design created in partnership with famous designer Naoto Fukasawa. It comes with up to 512GB of fast UFS 3.1 storage and up to 12GB of LPDDR5 RAM.
description:
Realme GT 2 Pro Overview:

Design, Display

The Realme GT 2 Pro is a slim and light phone that measures 8.2mm and weighs around 189 grams. The company collaborated with Naoto Fukasawa, a Japanese industrial designer, to design a rear panel made of bio-based material. Because the material utilized is paper, Realme refers to it as a "Paper Tech Master Design."On the front, there's a 6.7-inch 2K Samsung E4 AMOLED panel that features a 120Hz refresh rate. Corning Gorilla Glass Victus cover the screen to protect against accidental drops and scratches.

Performance

The phone is powered by Qualcomm's flagship 8 Gen 1 processor. It utilizes the new Armv9 architecture and 4nm technology, providing 20% faster CPU performance and up to 30% better GPU performance. To keep the temperature in check, Realme has used a 4129 mm² vapor chamber cooling. Realme GT 2 Pro uses LPDDR5 RAM and UFS 3.1 storage and is configurable for up to 12GB of RAM and 512GB of ROM.

Cameras, Others

The Realme GT 2 Pro houses three sensors in a rectangular camera bump. The phone has two 50MP cameras, one of which is among the world's first 150° FoV sensors on a smartphone. Moreover, the primary Sony IMX766 sensor supports optical image stabilization (OIS) and electronic image stabilization (EIS).Furthermore, there is a 2MP microscope lens capable of up to 40x magnification. Over on the front, a 32MP Sony IMX615 sensor is housed inside the punch-hole cutout.Moving on, the phone gets its energy needs fulfilled by a 5,000mAh battery that supports 65W fast charging. The in-display fingerprint scanner on the handset also functions as a heart rate sensor. Other features include stereo speakers, X-axis haptic motor, Wi-Fi 6 connectivity, and 360º NFC. Likewise, the phone boots on Android 12-based Realme UI 3.0. Also, Realme has promised three years of OS and four years of security updates.

title: Dell G5 5511 2021 (11th Gen i7-11800H, RTX 3050 Ti, 16GB, 512GB, 15.6" 165Hz FHD)
short_description: This Dell G5 5511 (2021) gaming laptop is equipped with an Intel Core i7-11800H CPU and Nvidia RTX 3050 Ti graphics. Memory options include up to 16GB of DDR4 RAM and 512GB of SSD. The RAM can be expanded up to 32GB. Furthermore, Dell has installed a 15.6-inch LCD display with a refresh rate of 165Hz on the front. Furthermore, it boasts WiFi 6 functionality as well as an HDMI 2.1 connection that supports up to 4K@120Hz streaming.
description:
Dell G5 5511 2021 Overview:

Performance

The Dell G55 5511 2021 gaming laptop packs a capable Intel Core i7-11800H processor. It is an octa-core chip that can boost up to 4.6 GHz, and the Nvidia GeForce RTX 3050 Ti graphics card has 4GB of GDDR6 memory and supports ray tracing and DLSS technologies. Accompanying the CPU is 16GB of RAM and 512GB of SSD storage here.

Design and Display

The Dell G5 5511 2021 has a sleek and elegant design, with a black metal chassis and blue accents. It weighs 2.4 kg and measures 21.6 x 36.4 x 2.4 cm, making it relatively portable for a gaming laptop. It has a full-size backlit keyboard with a numeric keypad and a large touchpad. The keyboard is comfortable to type on, and the touchpad supports multi-touch gestures.One of the highlights here is its 15.6-inch LCD display with a 165Hz refresh rate. It offers a sharp and vibrant picture quality with wide viewing angles and good contrast. And the smooth refresh rate makes the gaming experience more fluid and immersive, especially for fast-paced games like shooters and racing games.

Ports and Battery

The laptop has a good selection of ports, including three USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, one USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C port with Thunderbolt 4 support, one HDMI 2.1 port, one RJ-45 Ethernet port, one headphone/microphone combo jack, and one SD card reader. For wireless connectivity, you get Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.1 for wireless connectivity.This gaming laptop packs a decent 56 Wh battery. It can last up to six hours on a single charge, depending on the usage and settings. However, if you are gaming or using intensive applications, you will need to plug in the power adapter, as the battery will drain much faster.

short_description: Dell XPS 15 9510 (2021) is a beautiful 15.6-inch laptop featuring a Core i7-11800H CPU and an RTX 3050 Ti GPU. description:
Dell XPS 15 9510 2021 (i7 11800H) Overview:

The Dell XPS 15 9510 2021 is one of the latest models in the XPS series, known for its premium design and performance. Let's get into the short overview of the laptop.

Performance

The XPS 15 9510 2021 is a great choice for professionals who need a powerful laptop for multitasking, video editing, gaming, and other demanding tasks. The 11th Gen Intel Core i7-11800H processor can handle such tasks with its eight cores and 16 threads, while the graphics card RTX 3050 Ti can run most 1080p games at high settings. In terms of memory and storage, you get 16GB RAM and 1TB of SSD storage.

Design, Display, and Ports

The laptop has a sleek and sturdy design, with an aluminum chassis and a carbon fiber palm rest. It weighs about 1.8 kg and is 0.71 inches thick, making it portable and easy to carry around. On the display side, you are sorted with a 15.6-inch WVA LCD display.You get a backlit keyboard with large keys and a smooth touchpad with integrated buttons. The laptop has four Thunderbolt 4 ports, an HDMI 2.1 port, a headphone/microphone combo jack, and a microSD card reader. It supports Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.1 for wireless connectivity.

Battery and Others

The XPS 15 9510 2021 has a decent battery life, claimed to last about 8 hours on average use. Dell has bundled a 130W power adapter that can charge the laptop quickly. Besides that, the laptop equips a dual speaker setup with Waves MaxxAudio Pro software.

title: Asus Zenbook 14 2021 (11th Gen i7-1165G7, 16GB, 512GB, 14" FHD)
short_description: Asus Zenbook 14 (UX435) is an ultra-thin laptop powered by Intel's quad-core i7-1165G7 processor. This particular unit has Iris Xe integrated graphics while Asus also sells it with NVidIA's GeForce MX450 GPU. Despite the thin design, the ZenBook 14 includes one HDMI, two Thunderbolt 4 (USB-C), one USB-A port, and a MicroSD card reader. Its 14-inch display has a peak brightness of 400 nits and it covers 100% of the sRGB color gamut. Moreover, there is a 3D IR camera for Windows Hello login.
description:
Asus Zenbook 14 2021: Overview

Here’s a brief description of the design aesthetic, chipset, and battery life of the Asus Zenbook 14 2021 laptop with the i7-1165G7 processor.

Display and Build

The Zenbook 14, as the name suggests, sports a 14″ display. It is an IPS panel with a resolution of FHD and an aspect ratio of 16:9. Besides that, the screen covers 100% of the sRGB color space and can hit a peak brightness of 400 nits. The laptop only weighs 1.19 kg, so it’s easy to carry around as your travelling companion.

Performance and Memory

Under the hood, Asus Zenbook 14 (2021) has the 11th Gen Intel Core i7-1165G7 processor. This processor has 4 Cores and 8 Threads and can hit a max turbo frequency of 4.70 GHz. On the GPU front, you are greeted with Intel’s integrated Iris Xe graphics.Asus ZenBook 14 comes with 16GB of non-upgradable LPDDR4XX RAM. You also get a 512GB M.2 NVMe SSD.

Battery and Connectivity

In the tank, Asus ZenBook 14 has a 63Wh Lithium Ion Battery. You can recharge it with the 65W adapter provided in the box.For wired connections, there is a USB Type-A port, 2 Thunderbolt 4 ports, an HDMI port, an SD card reader, and a 3.5mm headphone/microphone jack. Wireless connectivity is possible thanks to the onboard Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5 technology.

title: Samsung Galaxy A52s
short_description: Galaxy A52s is a mid-range phone from Samsung launched in 2021. The smartphone is currently enjoying good discounts in markets like India and Nepal.
description:
Samsung Galaxy A52s 5G Overview, Price:

Here, we will discuss the full specifications and price of the Samsung Galaxy A52s 5G.

Design, Display

The Galaxy A52s has a 6.5-inch Super AMOLED display with Full HD+ resolution, 120Hz refresh rate, and a touch sampling rate of 240Hz. The display is covered by Corning Gorilla Glass 5, and the smartphone is dust and water-resistant according to IP67 standards.In terms of design, you get a matte finish on the back along with a rectangular camera module while the front has a centrally aligned punch-hole cutout. Likewise, it features a rather slender design at 8.4mm and weighs 189 grams. The Galaxy A52s come in four colors: "Awesome" Black, Green, Violet, and White. The white color variant, however, is not available in Nepal.

Performance

Under the hood, the smartphones is powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 778G chipset. It's an 6nm mobile platform which features 4 x Cortex-A78 cores and 4 x Cortex-A55 cores. This make Galaxy A52s a reliable day-to-day performer. The SoC is coupled with either 6GB or 8GB of RAM with 128GB and up to 256GB of internal storage. Not to forget, one can expand the storage as the phone enjoys a microSD card slot.On the software front, at the time of launch, the Galaxy A52s boots on Android 11 with Samsung's OneUI 3.1 on top. As per reports, Samsung has already pushed Android 12 update while it will continue receving platform upgrades till Android 14.

Cameras, Others

On to the cameras, here, you get a quad-camera setup led by a 64MP primary sensor. Accompanying this is a 12MP ultrawide lens, and a couple of 5MP macro and depth sensors. For selfies, there's a 32MP camera on the front.Beside this, juicing the phone is a 4500mAh battery with support for 25W fast charging. The A52s is a capable multimedia consumption device too—thanks to stereo speaker setup that goes with a contrast-rich AMOLED panel.Check out the full specifications and price of the Samsung Galaxy A52s 5G below:

As a result, Galaxy Tab A7 became widely popular among users. Key features of the Galaxy Tab A7 include its premium metallic body and option for LTE connectivity. Under the hood, it packed the Qualcomm Snapdragon 662 chipset which handled basic day-to-day well. The 7,040mAh battery is enough for most users to go through a day and it even has support for 15W wired charging. That being said, Samsung has compromised on the display department by opting for an TFT LCD panel.
description:
Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 Overview:

Design

Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 (2020) feels premium because of its aluminum build. The tablet measures 7.0mm in thickness and weighs around 476 grams. You can choose between three color options: Dark Gray, Silver, and Gold. However, being a two-year-old model you may not have the freedom to choose a color.

Display

Over on the front, there is a 10.4-inch LCD panel with a WUXGA resolution of 2000 x 1200 pixels. The bezels around the screen are quite thick which reduces the possibility of accidental touches. You can even notice the front-facing camera which is positioned in landscape orientation.

Performance

Under the hood, Samsung Galaxy Tab A7 (2020) packs the Snapdragon 662 processor which is based on an 11nm processor. The tablet is available with 3GB RAM. However, you can choose between 32GB and 64GB of internal storage. If this is not enough, you still have the option of expanding the storage up to 1TB using an external microSD card slot.

Audio

On the audio front, Samsung has included quad-stereo speakers on the Galaxy Tab A7 (2020). There is also the option to enable Dolby Atmos.

Battery

Coming to the battery, it packs a 7,040mAh battery which should last you through 13 hours of web browsing on a full charge. Though the tablet supports fast charging of up to 15 hours, you will have to spend a little extra to make use of it as there is no 15W charger in the box.

Others

There are a total of two cameras on the Galaxy Tab A7 (2020). The one on the back features an 8MP with autofocus. It is housed inside a rectangular island and there is no LED flash accompanying it. On the opposite side, you get a 5MP selfie camera that is also used for biometrics.

title: Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 2021 (Ryzen 7 5700U, 16GB, 512GB, 14" FHD Touch)
short_description: Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 14 is a portable machine with a 14-inch touch screen. It features familiar IdeaPad body with a flexible 360-degree hinge. As for performance, it packs AMD's Ryzen 5700U chipset with integrated Radeon graphics. The laptop has a backlit keyboard with a fingerprint scanner on the power button. It is fueled by a 52.5W battery with support for Rapid Charger boost.
description:
Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 (2021): Overview

Here’s a brief description of the design aesthetic, processor, and battery life of the Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 2021 laptop with the Ryzen 7 chip.

Design and Display

Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 2021 is a 2-in-1 device that can act both as a traditional notebook as well as a tablet. It comes in a mostly plastic build with aluminum on the cover. Its 360-degree hinge enables the Flex to fold into a Windows tablet. Unfortunately, you’ll have to buy the Digital Pen separately to utilize this feature fully. It’s not dauntingly thick or heavy at 18 mm and 1.5 kilos respectively.The 14″ screen is an IPS panel of FHD resolution (1920 x 1080 pixels). It can go up to 250 nits in brightness and supports multi-touch. It is also TUV certified for low blue light. Overall the build on the Flex 5 2021 (14ALC7)  is pretty similar to its predecessor and characteristic of the Flex series.

Performance and Memory 

Under the hood of the Lenovo IdeaPad Flex, 5 2021 is AMD's Ryzen 7 5700U processor. It has 8 cores which can push the chip from its base clock of 1.8 GHz to a maximum boost clock speed of 4.3GHz. The L3 cache on this device is 8 MB. On the GPU front, you get AMD's integrated Radeon graphics.Talking about memory, Flex 5 ships with 16GB of DDR4 RAM, which has a speed of 3200 MHz. It is soldered onto the motherboard, so you cannot upgrade beyond its default configuration. For long-term storage, you are equipped with a 512GB M.2 SSD. Again, there is no room for an HDD expansion.

Battery and Connectivity 

Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 2021 ships with a 52.5 Wh battery and a 65Wh adapter.  The device supports Quick Charge as well.For wireless connectivity, you get WiFi 5 and Bluetooth 5 technology. As for wired connections, you get 2 USB TYPE-A ports, 1 USB C port, 1 HDMI 1.4b port, a card reader slot, and a 3.5mm headphone/microphone jack.

title: Skullcandy Jib True 2
short_description: Skullcandy Jib True 2 TWS earbuds offer up to 33 hours of battery life with Tile finding technology for easy tracking. IPX4 water resistance ensures durability, while on-ear controls allow for convenient music and call management. With a 6mm driver delivering clear sound and Bluetooth® 5.2 connectivity, these lightweight earbuds provide comfort and portability for on-the-go use.
description:
Here is a brief look at the Skullcandy Jib True 2 TWS.

Skullcandy Jib True 2 Overview:

Battery and Features

With up to 33 hours of total battery life, the Jib True 2 is designed for extended use. The built-in Tile finding technology helps you locate your earbuds if misplaced. In addition, the IPX4 water resistance provides protection against sweat and light rain. You can control your music and calls with on-ear buttons for track selection, volume adjustment, and phone calls. You can also use either earbud independently for added convenience.

Sound and Connectivity

It is an in-ear headphones that features a 6mm driver diameter, delivering clear sound across a frequency range of 20Hz to 20KHz. With an impedance of 16Ω±15% and a sound pressure level of 95±3dB, they offer a balanced audio experience. The Total Harmonic Distortion (THD) of less than 3% ensures high sound quality. Bluetooth® 5.2 connectivity provides a stable and efficient wireless connection.Designed for comfort, Skullcandy Jib True 2 comes with ear gels in three sizes (S, M, L) for a secure fit. Weighing just 32g, they are lightweight and portable. The charging case provides additional power on the go, and the included Micro-USB charging cable keeps your earbuds charged.

description:

Display and Build

title: Samsung Galaxy A33 5G
short_description: Galaxy A33 5G is Samsung's latest mid-range phone in the Galaxy A series. It features a 90Hz Super AMOLED panel and a 48MP OIS quad-camera system among others. The phone is powered by Exynos 1280, which is the latest mid-range 5G chipset from Samsung.
description:
Samsung Galaxy A33 5G Overview, Price:

Here, we will discuss the full specifications and price of the Samsung Galaxy A33 5G.

Design, Display

Samsung Galaxy A33 5G brings a familiar design compared to last year's Galaxy A32. But while its predecessor's sensor layout stayed flat like that of the Galaxy S22 Ultra, the A33 5G now has a visible camera bump. As for the build quality, the handset has a polycarbonate back and frames. It phone weighs 186 grams while being 8.1mm thick. Moreover, it is also IP67 dust-and-water resistant.In terms of display, the Galaxy A33 5G has a 6.4-inches Full HD Super AMOLED panel with a 90Hz refresh rate. Likewise, it features an 'U'-shaped cutout in the middle to house the selfie camera.

Performance

The performance of the Galaxy A33 5G is driven by Samsung's in-house Exynos 1280 chipset. Its octa-core CPU architecture consists of two Cortex-A78 (2.4GHz) and six Cortex-A55 (2.0GHz) cores while Arm's Mali-G68 handles the GPU side of things. The phone can be configured with either 6GB or 8GB RAM and 128/256GB storage. Besides, it supports up to 1TB of external storage.Samsung Galaxy A33 5G boots on One UI 4.1 based on Android 12 right out the gate. The phone will receive 4 years of OS upgrades and 5 years of security updates as well.

Cameras, Others

Moving on, there's a quad rear camera setup here. This includes a 48MP f/1.8 main sensor with OIS, an 8MP f/2.2 ultra-wide lens with a 120° FoV, a 5MP macro, and a 2MP depth sensor.Then there's a 13MP f/2.2 selfie camera up front. Powering the phone is a 5000mAh battery that supports 25W fast charging. Unfortunately, you'll have to buy a compatible charger separately since Samsung doesn't ship one inside the box.Check out the full specifications and price of the Samsung Galaxy A33 5G below:

title: Samsung Galaxy Buds R170
short_description: The Samsung Galaxy Buds, released together with the S10 lineup, are in-ear wireless earphones with no stem. They have four mics for ambient sound and ENC. The battery lasts about 6 hours and the case adds around 7 hours of playtime. Additionally, it supports charging from both the port and wirelessly.
description:
Samsung Galaxy Buds Overview:

Okay, let's start with an overview of the Samsung Galaxy Buds.

Design

In terms of design, the Galaxy Buds are in-ear wireless earphones with no stem. The earbuds come with three rubber wingtip size options for comfort: small, medium, and large, and weigh only around 6 g. The case is a rectangle-ish-shaped capsule weighing nearly 40 g. It was only available in three color options: black, white, and yellow before Samsung added a new choice, Aura Glow Silver.

Audio

Samsung Galaxy Buds equips four mics, two on each earpiece, achieving ambient sound. Ambient sound is a feature of Samsung's earbuds, which enhances the sound from the surroundings to make it clearer to the ears. Moreover, this dual mic setup also enhances your call experience by providing your voice better to the receiver. The codecs supported here are SBC, AAC, and even their own codec, SSC.

Battery

For the battery, the Samsung Galaxy Buds can carry 58mAh cells. This battery lasts about 6 hours of typical usage or 5 hours of continuous calling, exclusive of the ambient sound. Additionally, the charging case provides you with around 7 hours of backup, which is mediocre if you compare it to today's TWS.

Connectivity

Besides, you can connect Samsung Galaxy Buds with Android and iOS devices. You are required to install Samsung Wearables from the App Store on iOS, though. You can control the buds from the app on Android too, but that is optional. Samsung also introduced "Connect Shift," a between-device connection feature to swap the earbuds between a watch and a phone.

Others

Other than that, Samsung provides the accelerometer, hall sensor, and proximity sensor. Bixby is the assistant by default, though you can change it to whichever fits you best. Aside from that, the Galaxy Buds case supports wireless charging that charges from 0 to full in about 1 hour. Alternatively, you can charge it using the USB-C port provided.
seo_title_facebook: Samsung Galaxy Buds Price and Specifications in Nepal
seo_description_facebook: Samsung Galaxy Buds' full specifications, price, comparison, and more. Find out the complete specs and price of the Samsung Galaxy Buds

title: Realme Buds Air 6
short_description: Realme Buds Air 6 series offers two models: Buds Air 6 and Buds Air 6 Pro. They both boast Hi-Res audio, active noise cancellation, advanced noise reduction, and fast charging. With strong bass and enhanced audio, they promise up to 40 hours of playback with the case. Additional features include six microphones, low-latency mode, and stylish color options.
description:
Realme Buds Air 6 Overview

Driver and Design

The Realme Buds Air 6 features a 12.4mm dynamic driver and an “independent bionic back cavity design” to deliver “shocking bass” and enhanced mid and low-frequency performance.The Realme Buds Air 6 Pro features a coaxial dual-unit design with an 11mm woofer and a 6mm micro-planar tweeter, ensuring an enhanced audio experience.Moreover, It boasts Hi-Res certification and LDAC codec for superior audio transmission.

Certification and ANC

With Hi-Res certification and LHDC 5.0, the Buds Air 6 ensures high-fidelity audio. Additionally, Realme claims, that these earbuds offer active noise cancellation (ANC) of up to 50 dB for a ” clear listening experience”.

Advanced Noise Reduction and Microphone Setup

Equipped with 4000Hz ultra-wideband noise reduction and adaptive scene-based noise reduction, the Buds Air 6 automatically adjusts noise cancellation based on surroundings. Furthermore, the six built-in microphones with AI noise reduction promise clearer conversations.

Battery Life and Fast Charging

For the Buds Air 6, Users can enjoy up to 40 hours of playback with the charging case, with 6 hours on a single charge in ANC mode.  In addition, these buds support fast charging, providing 7 hours of playback with just a 10-minute charge.

Extras

The Buds Air 6 also comes with a low-latency mode of 55ms. Furthermore, it is available color options include Serenity Green, Titanium Sky Orange, and Purple.

title: Samsung Galaxy M35 5G
short_description: The Galaxy M35 5G is the successor to the M34 5G from last year. This latest Galaxy smartphone features Samsungs in-house Exynos 1380, accompanied by a 8GB RAM and 256GB storage. Moreover, you also get a massive 6000 mAh battery with 25W charger. The Galaxy M35 5G is now officially available for purchase in Nepal.
description:
let’s dive into this overview discussing the latest Samsung Galaxy M35, including its official specifications, and more.

Samsung Galaxy M35 5G Overview

Design

The design of the Galaxy M35 5G’s rear panel is similar to that of the Galaxy M15 5G, notably by removing the side bulge and incorporating the buttons directly into its flat frame. It also features a triple rear camera along with an LED flash on the side. The Galaxy M35 5G sports thicker bezels and chin, yet it offers a punch-hole display, an enhancement from its predecessor.On the display side, the Samsung Galaxy M35 features a 6.6” OLED display with a peak brightness of 1,000 nits. Moreover, the M45 comes with FHD+ resolution and the standard 120Hz refresh rate.

Performance

The Samsung Galaxy M35 is powered by Exynos 1380 chipset. It is accompanied by an 8 GB of RAM and 256GB of storage. In addition, it runs on Android 14 out of the box and OneUI 6.1 skin on top. Samsung has also provided 4 years of OS updates and 5 years of security patches for the Galaxy M35

Battery and the Rest

The Galaxy M35 5G is equipped with a robust 6000mAh battery, which is a significant upgrade from the 5000mAh battery found in the Galaxy A35 5G. In addition, it gets its juice from a 25W charger. The Galaxy M35 is the first in its series to have stereo speakers, like the M55, and it supports Dolby Atmos. However, jumping into the bandwagon, Samsung has decided not to provide a headphone jack for the Galaxy M35.

Camera

On the rear, you’ll find a 50MP main camera with OIS, accompanied by an 8MP ultra-wide lens. Instead of a 5MP macro module, it features a 2MP one. For selfies, you get a 13MP front-facing camera. In addition, video recording capabilities include a 4K @ 30fps mode and 240fps at 720p.

title: Acer Aspire 5 2022 (12th Gen i3-1215U, 4GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD)
short_description: Acer Aspire 5 2022 (A515-57) is the latest budget laptop from Acer. It builds on last year's model with the latest 12th Gen Intel processors. This particular model packs the deca-core Core i5-1215U with two performance cores and six efficiency cores. Here, the P-cores have support for hyper-threading, taking the thread count to 8. Likewise, Acer has even added a Thunderbolt 4 port to the laptop. Other than that, the specifications of the Acer Aspire 5 2022 (A515-57) are quite similar to its predecessor.
description:
If you are looking for a general-purpose laptop to complete your casual household tasks or handle small-scale businesses, you might consider checking out Acer Aspire 5 (2022) edition with 12th Gen i3-1215U paired with 4GB of RAM and a 512GB SSD. The Acer Aspire 5 Series has been a go-to choice for people looking for affordable and basic laptops. Here are a few reasons why this laptop is an ideal choice for casual users.

Acer Aspire 5 (2022) Overview:

Design and Display

This laptop model features a 15.6" Full HD display with a 16:9 aspect ratio. The screen has a matte finish that prevents glare and fingerprints, and it isn't a touch screen. It operates at a smooth 60 Hz refresh rate, although there's no variable refresh rate option. It has vibrant colors with its 45% NTSC color gamut and a brightness of 250 nits.The design is sleek, available in Gold, Blue, and Black, and the laptop is lightweight at 1.77 kg with 17.90 mm of thickness, making it easy to carry.

Performance/ Memory

The Acer Aspire 5 (2022) is powered by Intel's 12th-Gen Intel Core i3-1215U featuring 6 cores. The graphics are powered by Intel's Iris Xe, which is built into the processor. It's good for things like watching videos and playing light games.The laptop has 4GB of memory (RAM), which is okay for basic use but might feel a bit slow if you do a lot at once. You can upgrade it to 16GB later if you want. The laptop has a 256GB SSD, which is fast storage for your files and programs. You can also add more storage in the future using its extra slots up to 512 GB.

Keyboard and Battery

The keyboard is a chiclet-style type and the trackpad supports Windows gestures and multi-touch functionality, offering smooth navigation and interaction. Furthermore, the laptop comes with a 65W AC adapter for charging. It is equipped with a 3-cell 50 Wh Li-ion battery for power.

Rest of the specs

The Acer Aspire 5 (2022) boasts a 720p HD webcam for clear video. It offers a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A port for I/O connections and a 3.5mm jack for audio needs. The laptop includes an SD card reader, TPM 2.0 chip for extra security and supports wired Ethernet connections as well. It can also connect wirelessly with WiFi 6E and Bluetooth 5.2.

title: Samsung Galaxy A53 5G
short_description: Samsung Galaxy A53 5G is an update over last year's Galaxy A52. The handset retains the same design but brings a new chipset, bigger battery, and a higher refresh rate screen.
description:
Samsung Galaxy A53 Overview, Price:

Here, we will discuss the full specifications and price of the Samsung Galaxy A53 5G.

Design, Display

Compared to its predecessor, Samsung has made little to no design changes on the new Galaxy A53 5G. The phone has a similar-looking rectangular camera bump with a matte finish on the back while the front has a punch-hole cutout in the center. It measures 8.1mm thick and weighs 189 grams. Likewise, the available color options are Awesome Black, Awesome White, Awesome Peach, and Awesome Blue.On the display front, the 120Hz sAMOLED screen of the Galaxy A53 5G replaces the 90Hz one on the Galaxy A52. However, the brightness level of 800 nits stays the same. This is an FHD+ (1080 x 2400 pixels) resolution panel with a pixel density of 405ppi. Additionally, Samsung has used Corning Gorilla Glass 5 on the front to protect the handset from scratches.

Performance

Moving on, the Galaxy A53 5G is powered by the in-house Exynos 1280 chipset. It's the company's latest mid-range silicon fabricated on a 5nm process and is aimed to enhance the overall multitasking experience. Similarly, the memory option includes up to 8GB of RAM and up to 256GB of internal storage. The handset also supports Samsung's "RAM Plus" feature, allowing RAM expansion up to 16GB.Things are going pretty well for Samsung's latest mid-range phone on the software front. Galaxy A53 5G is guaranteed to get 4 years of OS upgrades and 5 years of security updates, while it already boots on the latest Android 12.

Cameras, Others

Camera-wise, there's a quad-camera setup at the back led by a 64MP primary lens with optical image stabilization. Accompanying this is a 12MP ultrawide, a 5MP macro, and a 5MP depth camera. The 32MP camera on the front is housed on the aforementioned notch for selfies and clearer video calls.Besides this, the phone enjoys an IP67 rating making it dust and water-resistant. The Galaxy A53 5G can reach 50% in 30 minutes as its 5000mAh battery supports 25W fast charging.Check out the full specifications and price of the Samsung Galaxy A53 5G below:

description:
Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5i (2021): Overview

Here’s a brief description of the design aesthetic, processor, and battery life of the Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5i 2021 laptop with the Intel i7 chip and MX450 card.

Design and Display

Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 2021 is a 2-in-1 device that can act both as a traditional notebook as well as a tablet. It comes in a mostly plastic build with aluminum on the cover. Its 360-degree hinge enables the Flex to fold into a Windows tablet. Unfortunately, you’ll have to buy the Digital Pen separately to utilize this feature fully. It’s not dauntingly thick or heavy at 18 mm and 1.5 kilos respectively.The 14″ screen is an IPS panel of FHD resolution (1920 x 1080 pixels). It can go up to 250 nits in brightness and supports multi-touch. It is also TUV certified for low blue light. Overall the build on the Flex 5 2021 (14ITL05)  is pretty similar to its predecessor and characteristic of the Flex series.

Performance and Memory 

Under the hood of the Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 2021 is Intel’s 11th gen i7-1165G7 processor. It has 4 cores (2 performance + 8 efficiency) which can push the chip from its base clock of 2.8 GHz to a maximum boost clock speed of 4.7GHz. The L3 cache on this device is 12MB. Intel’s integrated Iris Xe graphics is responsible on the GPU front.Talking about memory, Flex 5 ships with 16GB of DDR4 RAM, which has a speed of 3200 MHz. It is soldered onto the motherboard, so you cannot upgrade beyond its default configuration. For long-term storage, you are equipped with a 512GB M.2 SSD. Again, there is no room for an HDD expansion.

Battery and Connectivity 

Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 2021 ships with a 52.5 Wh battery and a 65Wh adapter.  The device supports Quick Charge as well.For wireless connectivity, you get WiFi 5 and Bluetooth 5 technology. As for wired connections, you get 2 USB TYPE-A ports, 1 USB C port, 1 HDMI 1.4b port, a card reader slot, and a 3.5mm headphone/microphone jack.

description:
Dell Inspiron 15 5515 2021 (Ryzen 7) Overview

The Dell Inspiron 15 5515 2021 is a mid-range laptop that offers decent performance, a sleek design, and a decent battery life. Let's get into its short overview.

Display and Design

The laptop features a 15.6-inch Full HD (1920 x 1080) anti-glare LED-backlit display, which delivers sharp and clear images with good viewing angles and brightness. It also supports Dell CinemaColor, which enhances the color and contrast of the content. The laptop has a thin-bezel design, which gives it a modern and elegant look. And it weighs 1.73 kg and has a thickness of 17.9 mm.

Performance

Under the hood, you get an AMD Ryzen 7 5700U processor, which is an octa-core chip with a base clock of 1.8 GHz, a boost clock of up to 4.3 GHz, and an 8MB L3 cache. This particular model is paired with 8GB of DDR4 RAM and a 512GB PCIe NVMe SSD, which provide enough speed and storage for everyday tasks and some light gaming.

Ports and Connectivity

Getting to the I/O section, the laptop has a decent selection of ports and connectivity options. You get two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, one USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C port (with DisplayPort and Power Delivery), one HDMI 1.4 port, one headphone/microphone combo jack, one SD card reader, and one power jack. Whereas for wireless connectivity, it supports Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.1.

Battery and Others

The laptop has a 54 Wh battery, which can last up to 8 hours of mixed usage, according to Dell. It also supports ExpressCharge, which can charge the battery up to 80% in an hour. You get a backlit keyboard and a precision touchpad. Other than that, it also has a fingerprint reader integrated into the power button, which adds an extra layer of security.

title: Dell Inspiron 13 5310 2021 (11th Gen i7-11390H, 8GB, 512GB, 13.3" FHD)
short_description: Dell Inspiron 13 5310 (2021) is a mid-range ultraportable laptop that blends premium aesthetics with a powerful Tiger Lake H-Series chipset. It comes with an 11th-generation Intel Core i7-11390H CPU, up to 16GB of LPDDR4x RAM, and up to 2TB of M.2 PCIe NVMe SSD. Furthermore, at 1.28kg weight, this laptop feels almost nonexistent in your backpack. description:
If you are looking for a powerful and portable laptop, you might want to check out the Dell Inspiron 13 5310 (2021). This 13-inch laptop features an 11th Gen Intel Core i7-11390H processor, 8GB of RAM, and 512GB of SSD storage. It also has a matte Full HD display with a 16:10 aspect ratio, a large 54Wh battery, and two Thunderbolt 4 ports.

Dell Inspiron 13 5310 (2021) Overview:

Design and Ports

The Dell Inspiron 13 5310 (2021) has a sleek and elegant design, with a silver aluminum case and a black keyboard. The laptop weighs only 1.28 kg and measures 296.7 x 210 x 13.9-15.9 mm, making it easy to carry around. There is a sturdy hinge that allows it to open up to 135 degrees. Plus a fingerprint reader is integrated into the power button for quick and secure login.The laptop has a decent selection of ports, including one USB-A 3.2 port, two USB-C 4.0 ports with Thunderbolt 4 support, one HDMI 1.4 port, one audio jack, and one proprietary charging port. There is no SD card reader or an Ethernet port, which might be inconvenient for some users.

Display

The Dell Inspiron 13 5310 (2021) has a 13.3-inch IPS LCD display with a resolution of 1920 x 1200 pixels and a refresh rate of 60Hz. The display has a 16:10 aspect ratio, which gives more vertical space for productivity and web browsing. The panel is also matte, which reduces glare and reflections.The display has good brightness, contrast, and color accuracy, covering 100% of the sRGB color space and 72.9% of the DCI-P3 color gamut. Additionally, it has a response time of 35 ms, which is not ideal for gaming or fast-paced videos.

Others

It is powered by a 54Wh battery, accompanied by 65W charging. You also get dual stereo speakers with a power of 2x2.5W, located on the bottom of the case. Other attributes include two microphones and a webcam above the display, with an HD resolution.

description:
Below is a short overview of the Zeblaze Beyond 3 Pro including its features and battery life.

Zeblaze Beyond 3 Pro Overview

Design and Display

The Zeblaze Beyond 3 Pro features a hand-polished stainless steel frame, a Zinc Metal Bezel with Drilling Carbon Coating for the case, and an aluminum metal button and stainless steel buckle. The smartwatch comes with a liquid silicone strap, compatible with standard 20 mm quick-release watch bands. It fits wrist circumferences ranging from 130 mm to 235 mm.The Zeblaze Beyond 3 Pro Smartwatch features a 2.15-inch Ultra HD AMOLED display with a resolution of 415 x 505 pixels and a brightness of up to 1000 nits.

Connectivity and Sensors

Equipped with Bluetooth version 5.3, this smartwatch offers connectivity with devices running Android 4.4 or iOS 8.0 and above.The smartwatch features integrated GPS, GLONASS, GALILEO, and BEidOU support, along with health sensors including a wrist heart rate monitor, pulse ox blood oxygen saturation monitor, proximity sensor, and accelerometer.

Battery

Powered by a 300 mAh Lithium-Polymer battery, the Zeblaze Beyond 3 Pro provides battery life lasting up to 25 days with typical usage and 14 days with heavy usage. With complete GPS and heart rate tracking enabled, users can expect up to 76 hours of training time. Charging time is 1.5 hours.

description:
Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 5 2021: Overview

Here’s a brief description of the build, chipset, and battery life of the Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 5 2021 with the Ryzen 5 chip.

Display and Build

Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 5 sports a 16-inch display IPS LCD panel of FHD resolution (1920 x 1080) resolution. The screen has an anti-glare finish and can reach a maximum brightness of 300 nits. It’s easy to carry around at around 1.66 kilograms. IdeaPad Slim 5 is 357mm in width, 234mm deep, and has a height of 17mm.

Alongside that, you get a 512GB M.2 2242 NVMe SSD in the IdeaPad Slim 5 2021, which also cannot be expanded any further.

Battery and Connectivity 

In the tank of the Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 5, is a 45 Wh Li-Po battery that can be charged via the 65W charger provided in the box.For wireless connectivity, you get WiFi 5 and Bluetooth 5 technology. As for the ports, you get 2 USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, a USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C port, an HDMI port, a card reader, and a headphone jack.

title: Zeblaze Stratos 3 Pro
short_description: The Zeblaze Stratos 3 Pro features a rugged Zinc Metal body, a 1.45-inch AMOLED display with Corning Gorilla Glass, and IP68 water and dust resistance. It offers customizable watch faces, an always-on display, built-in GPS, health tracking (heart rate, SpO2, stress, sleep), and Bluetooth v5.3 for notifications and calls. Its 400 mAh battery lasts up to 45 days in battery saver mode.
description:
Below is a short overview of the Zeblaze Stratos 3 Pro including its features and battery life.

Zeblaze Stratos 3 Pro Overview

Design and Display

The Zeblaze Stratos 3 Pro comes in a circular dial with a body that looks somewhere in between a general watch and a rugged one. Similarly, the case is made out of Zinc Metal and features a DLC Drilling Carbon coating. In the meantime, the watch offers you IP68 water and dust resistance. It is available in Ember Black and Ocean Blue color options.
On the front, the latest offering from the company comes with a 1.45-inch display. As I mentioned earlier, the screen on this thing is circular. Meanwhile, the panel on the Zeblaze Stratos 3 Pro is AMOLED with Corning Gorilla Glass protection. Other than that, this display spans 466 x 466 pixels and offers touchscreen support alongside up to 1,000 nits of peak brightness.

Features and the rest

Moving on to the features, it offers decent customisation of the watch dial with over 100 cloud options along with the choice to upload from your gallery. You also get an always-on display feature. The most attractive feature of the Zeblaze Stratos 3 Pro is definitely its built-in GPS. Moreover, it has an integrated four-way navigation system to offer you accurate fitness tracking. It also allows you to import routes on the watch for easier navigation.Moreover, it comes with a wide range of health-tracking features such as 24H heart rate, SpO2, stress monitoring, breathing exercises, sleep tracking, and so on. You can access these data as well as added functionality via the Zeblaze Fit app available on both Android and iOS. The watch can connect to a smartphone via Bluetooth v5.3 and allows you to receive notifications and make/receive calls. To offer all these features, Zeblaze Stratos 3 Pro packs a 400 mAh cell that can last you up to 45 days of usage in battery saver mode.

description:
Dell Inspiron 14 5415 2021 Overview

The Dell Inspiron 14 5415 2021 is a budget-friendly laptop that offers a lot of value for its price. It features a 14-inch full HD display, a Ryzen 5 5500U processor, 8GB of RAM, and a 256GB SSD. Here's a short overview of the laptop.

Performance

This particular model is powered by a Ryzen 5 5500U CPU under the hood. It is a Hexa-core processor that can handle multitasking and productivity tasks with ease. Having a base clock speed of 2.1 GHz and boost up to 4.0 GHz, it is accompanied by an integrated Radeon graphics card. You can expect some casual games to run. Memory-wise, the laptop comes with 8GB of DDR4 RAM. The SSD has a capacity of 256GB, which is not very large, but it is fast and reliable.

Design and Display

The Dell Inspiron 14 5415 2021 has a sleek and modern design, made up of plastic and metal. It has a silver lid with the Dell logo and a black keyboard deck with a fingerprint scanner. The laptop weighs about 1.5 kg and has a thickness of 17.9 mm, making it easy to carry around.Opening the lid, you are greeted with a 14-inch full HD display with a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels. It is an IPS panel that offers wide viewing angles and good color accuracy. The display also has an anti-glare coating that reduces reflections and eye strain.

Ports, and Battery

The laptop has a decent selection of ports, including two USB 3.2 Gen 1 ports, one USB-C port with DisplayPort and Power Delivery support, one HDMI port, one headphone/microphone combo jack, and one power jack. You also get a webcam and dual speakers with Waves MaxxAudio Pro. Keeping the power-up is a 40Wh battery on The Dell Inspiron 14 2021. It supports fast charging and can charge up to 80% in an hour.

description:
Here is a quick overview of the latest OnePlus Nord CE4 Lite.

OnePlus Nord CE4 Lite Overview

Design and Display

The new OnePlus Nord CE4 Lite measures 8.1 mm in thickness and weighs 191 grams. It features a glass front, plastic frame, and plastic back. Additionally, it is IP54 rated, making it dust and splash-resistant. The device is available in three colors: Super Silver, Mega Blue, and Ultra Orange.The Nord CE4 Lite comes with a 6.67-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate and a peak brightness level of 2100 nits. In addition, the display resolution is 1080 x 2400 pixels, providing approximately 395 ppi density.

Performance and Operating System

The OnePlus Nord CE4 Lite operates on Android 14 with OxygenOS 14. Although it was rumored to house the Snapdragon 6s Gen 3, it now features the Snapdragon 695 chipset housing an Adreno 619 GPU. Moreover, there are two memory variants available: 8GB RAM with 128GB storage and 8GB RAM with 256GB storage.

Camera 

The main camera setup of the Nord CE4 Lite includes a 50 MP Sony LYT600 sensor with OIS and a 2 MP depth camera. This dual-camera system records video at 1080p@30fps with gyro-EIS. The front camera is a 16 MP sensor, also supporting 1080p@30fps video recording with gyro-EIS.

Battery and Charging

The OnePlus Nord CE4 Lite has a 5500 mAh non-removable battery. It supports 80W wired charging, capable of charging from 1-100% in 52 minutes, as advertised. Additionally, it features 5W reverse wired charging. In addition, the device is equipped with stereo speakers and a 3.5mm headphone jack. However, it does not support NFC.

description:
Alewa is a new Nepali accessory brand that has recently released a variety of earphones and smartwatches, including the Alewa Ranger, Sigma, and Strike. Following that, the Nepalese company recently introduced a new product to its lineup. Lets take a deeper look at the Alewa BassBuds, including pricing in Nepal, specifications, and more.

Alewa BassBuds Overview

Customizable EQ Modes

The BassBuds include three EQ modes: normal, balanced, and bass. This allows users to customize the sound profile to their preferences, such as a more neutral sound or a bass-heavy experience.

Design and Endurance

The Alewa BassBuds include a digital display in the casing. Furthermore, these earphones use the Bluetrum AB5636F chipset. Furthermore, ANC+ENC (Active Noise Cancellation + Environmental Noise Cancellation) technology enhances good communication with the presence of a Quad Mic. Furthermore, the Alewa BassBuds have Bluetooth version 5.3, which ensures consistent connectivity with compatible devices up to 10 metres away.

Battery Capacity

The Alewa BassBuds have a battery capacity of 400mAh for the charging case and 40mAh for the buds, providing a longer usage duration. Users can listen to music for up to 6 hours and speak for 4–5 hours using only the earbuds. Furthermore, the earbuds standby period of around 80–100 hours assures that they are ready when you need them.

title: Redmi 13 4G
short_description: Redmi 13 4G is the base entry in Xiaomis \"Redmi 13 lineup\". It comes with the MediaTek Helio G91 Ultra SoC under the hood. It comes in multiple configurations with up to 8GB RAM, and 256GB storage. Similarly, it dons a 6.79-inch LCD panel on the front with FHD+ resolution. It comes with a 108MP primary + 2MP macro sensor combo on the back. Meanwhile, on the front, there is a 13MP shooter. Powering everything is a 5,030 mAh cell with 33W fast charging.
description:
Xiaomi has been well know to offer specs-heavy smartphones in an affordable price bracket. Similar is the case for the sub-brand Redmi. As such, Redmi 13 4G is the companys budget offering for the year 2024.

Redmi 13 4G Overview

Design and Display

Redmi 13 4G comes in a pretty standard design with flat edges. It is available in three colourways: Midnight Black, Pearl Pink, and Ocean Blue. The latter one has a wavy pattern running all across the back panel. Internationally, there is a Sandy Gold option as well, however, we Nepali folks miss out on that one.On the front, we are getting a 6.79-inch LCD panel with the Redmi 13 4G. It stretches FHD+ in resolution and boasts a pixel density of 396PPI. Meanwhile, it refreshes at the rate of 90Hz and comes with a maximum brightness of 550 nits and a DC dimming feature as well.

Performance and Cameras

Under the hood, it comes with the Mediatek Helio G91 Ultra chipset. It is an octa-core processor fabbed with a 12nm process that peaks at 2.0GHz clock speed. The Redmi 13 4G comes in two configurations i.e. 6GB + 128GB, and 8GB + 256GB. It also supports up to 8GB of virtual memory and up to 1TB of storage expansion. Lastly, it comes with HyperOS for software and a 5,030 mAh battery with 33W charging support.The optics department on the Redmi 13 4G is led by a 108MP shooter. It is coupled with a 2MP macro camera which is nothing but a placeholder. In the meantime, a 13MP unit sits underneath the hole-punch cutout and handles the selfies. Additionally, this front camera also doubles down as a face scanner. For additional biometric security, this phone includes a side-mounted fingerprint reader as well.Check out more Redmi smartphones, HERE!

title: Honor Earbuds X5
short_description: The Honor Earbuds X5 is a lightweight wireless stereo with a 3.8-gram body and 35.4-gram case. It features a disk-shaped case with an LED and is available in white. The earbuds offer deep bass and microphones to reduce ambient noise. They use AAC as a codec and have a 30 mAh battery that lasts 5 hours on a single charge.
description:
Honor Earbuds X5 Overview:

Design

The Honor Earbuds X5 is an open-fit true wireless stereo with a lightweight body and case. For reference, each bud weighs around 3.8 grams, while the capsule is 35.4 grams heavy. However, there is no IP rating certified by the earpieces.Talking about the case, it is disk-shaped, a thick one with a rounded edge. The X5's case features an LED at the bottom of it and is available in only white at the moment.

Audio

Honor promises deep bass, all thanks to the 13.4mm moving-coiled drivers. Additionally, with the microphones provided, the Honor Earbuds X5 reduces ambient noise from the surroundings. Additionally, the buds use AAC as a codec.

Rest of the specs

Let it be music or videos, the X5 handles it using a 30 mAh battery that lasts 5 hours on a single charge. Further extending this by 22 hours is the 410 mAh charging case that encloses it inside.Besides, plugging the case for around 1.5 hours takes the fuel from 0 to 100. On a further note, the earbuds from Earbuds X5 charge even more quickly, as it takes each piece an hour to fully restore.

description:

Performance and the rest

The Acer Aspire 5 15 2024 is powered by Intels Core 7 Processor 150U CPU. The max turbo frequency here is 5GHz, while the L3 cache size is 12MB. It comes with 16GB RAM and 512GB SSD for storage. The company has not clarified the upgradability of this laptop.The Acer Aspire 5 15 2024 has a variety of ports and wireless options to connect your devices and accessories. That means, it is powered by the same A15 Bionic chip, complemented by 6GB RAM and up to 512GB of internal storage. Besides that, you get a dedicated GeForce MX550 graphics card with 2 GB of GDDR6 memory. This enables you to run some light games and creative software with ease.

Battery and Others

title: iPhone 13 Pro
short_description: Apple unveiled the iPhone 13 series during an online launch event dubbed 'California Streaming' in September 2021. All four phones in the lineup are now available for purchase in Nepal.
description:
iPhone 13 Pro Overview, Price:

Here, we will discuss the full specifications and price of the iPhone 13 Pro.

Design and Display

The iPhone 13 Pro has a 6.1-inch OLED display with a resolution of 2532 x 1170. This time, the company has also included a 120Hz refresh rate, which Apple refers to as a 'ProMotion' display. With this tech onboard, the screen can refresh from 10-120Hz depending on the content on the screen.Moreover, the device features an oleophobic coating that repels fingerprints and smudges, and the front and back are both protected by Corning Gorilla Glass. It is also water and dust resistant, with an IP68 rating.

Performance

All the smartphones in iPhone 13 series are powered by an Apple A15 Bionic processor. However, the Pro and non-Pro models differ little in this aspect. While it is built on the same 5nm node and has a 6-core CPU, the silicon in Pro-variant boasts a 5-core GPU.Memory-wise, the device is available with up to 1TB of storage. Likewise, iPhone 13 Pro Max gets its juice from a 3,095mAh cell that supports 20W wired and 15W MagSafe wireless charging.

Camera, Others

On the rear, there's a triple camera setup, each with a 12MP lens. As per Apple, the main sensor captures 2.2x more light than the iPhone 12 Pro and is the biggest sensor in an iPhone to date. The ultrawide sensor also works better in low-light circumstances as it can capture 92% more light.Likewise, the telephoto sensor supports 3x optical zoom. Last but not the least, for selfies, there's a 12MP camera inside a 'bathtub' style notch.Rest of the specifications include WiFi 6 (802.11ax), 5G, Bluetooth 5.0, e-SIM (dual), GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, QZSS, and BeiDou. For audio, the smartphone has a built-in speaker.
Check out the full specifications and price of the iPhone 13 Pro below:

description:
Here is a quick overview of the latest Honor 200 Pro.

Honor 200 Pro Overview

Snapdragon 8s Gen 3

The latest Honor 200 Pro houses the recently announced Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset. Its predecessor, the Honor 100 Pro packed a Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 SoC. Meanwhile, the chipset is accompanied by 12GB/16GB of LPDDR5 RAM and up to 1TB of storage. Similarly, the phone boots on Android 14 with MagicOS 8.0 on top.

Design and Display

The latest Honor 200 Pro features a 6.78-inch curved OLED display. It comes in FHD+ (2700 × 1224 pixels) resolution and has a refresh rate up to the standard 120Hz. Honor claims to hit 4,000 nits of brightness with a 100% DCI-P3 color gamut. It also has high-frequency PWM dimming of 3840Hz.The design showcases the phone’s curved display on the front and its multi-camera setup on the rear in a circular camera module cutout. The available color options include black, pink, white, and light green/bluish hues.

Camera

The Honor 200 Pro camera setup consists of a rear triple camera system and a front-facing camera. The rear setup includes a 50MP main camera with a 1/1.3″ OmniVision OV50H sensor with OIS, a 12MP  ultra-wide camera with f/2.2 aperture, a 50MP 2.5x telephoto camera with a Sony IMX856 sensor with OIS, and 4K video recording capability. The front camera is a 50MP shooter with a Sony IMX906 sensor, f/2.1 aperture, a 3D depth camera, and 4K video recording support.

Battery, Charging, and Others

As for the battery juice, the Honor 200 Pro gets it from a non-removable 5200mAh cell, which supports 100W wired charging support and 66W wireless charging as well. Connectivity options will include 5G, WiFi 6, Bluetooth, GPS, NFC, and a USB Type-C port.

title: Asus Vivobook 14 2022 (12th Gen i3-1215U, 4GB, 256GB, 14" FHD)
short_description: Asus VivoBook 14 is a decent budget-friendly ultrabook with a 14-inch FHD IPS LCD screen. It is powered by Intel's Core i3-1215U processor. An integrated Iris Xe GPU handles the graphics. This laptop variant is available with 4GB of RAM and 256GB of storage, although you can tinker around with the memory options if you'd want. With this, you upgrade the VivoBook 14 up to 12GB RAM. Moreover, the laptop features a fingerprint sensor that has been integrated into the trackpad. It features a backlit keyboard with a 1.4mm key travel distance.
description:
Asus Vivobook 14 (2022): Overview

Here’s a brief description of the build, chipset, and battery life of the Asus Vivobook 14 (2022) with the Intel i3 1215U processor.

Design and Display

The Vivobook 14 (2022) is a lightweight and compact everyday machine. Weighing just around 1.5kg, it is easy to carry around and available in 3 color options: Quiet Blue, Icelight Silver, and Terra Cotta.The 14-inch panel is an LCD panel of FHD resolution. It covers a 45% NTSC color gamut and has an aspect ratio of 16:9. The 60Hz screen is a non-touch anti-glare display that can reach a peak brightness of 250 nits.

Performance and Memory

Asus Vivobook 14 (2022) is powered by 12th Gen Intel Core i3-1215U processor. It has 6 cores ( 4 Efficiency + 2 Performance ) and 8 Threads with a max boost frequency of 4.4 GHz. On the GPU front, it features integrated Intel UHD graphics. VivoBook 14 ships with 4GB of DDR4 memory which can be upgraded to a maximum of 12GB via a single SO DIMM slot. You also get 256GB of M.2 SSD.

Battery and Connectivity

In the tank, Asus VivoBook 14 (2022) has a 3-cell 45 Wh Lithium Polymer battery. You can recharge with the 65W adapter in the box.

title: Dell Latitude 14 3420 2021 (11th Gen i5-1135G7, 4GB, 256GB, 14" HD)
short_description: The Dell Latitude 3420 is the company's affordable 14-inch laptop. This model comes with an 11th Gen Tiger Lake Core i5 CPU and 4GB RAM. It relies on integrated Intel Iris Xe GPU for graphics processing. In terms of storage, it is available with HDD and SSD storage options. However, Nepal only has an HDD drive variant as of now. Software-wise, you're getting the latest Windows 11. It is driven by a 54Wh battery and has WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2 connectivity options.
description:
Dell Latitude 14 3420 (2021) Overview:

Performance 

The Dell Latitude 14 3420 2021 comes with an 11th Gen Intel Core i5-1135G7 processor, which is a quad-core CPU with a base frequency of 2.4 GHz and a boost frequency of 4.2 GHz. This processor is suitable for everyday tasks such as web browsing, office work, video conferencing, and light photo editing. It also supports Intel Iris Xe Graphics, which is an integrated GPU that can handle some casual gaming and graphics-intensive applications.The laptop also has 4GB of DDR4 RAM, which is enough for multitasking and running multiple programs at once. However, if you need more memory, you can upgrade it up to 64GB by replacing the existing RAM module.The storage capacity of the laptop is 256GB, which is provided by a PCIe NVMe SSD. This type of storage is faster and more reliable than a traditional hard drive, and it also helps to improve the boot time and loading speed of the laptop.

Battery Life

The battery life of the Dell Latitude 14 3420 (2021) is decent, but not exceptional. The laptop has a 3-cell 54Wh battery. On the charging front, you get a 65W adapter.

Design and Display

The Dell Latitude 15 3520 has a simple and sturdy design that is typical of business laptops. The laptop has a plastic chassis that is reinforced with carbon fiber for extra durability. You get a spill-resistant keyboard and a webcam shutter for privacy.The display of the Dell Latitude 15 3520 is a 15.6-inch screen with a resolution of HD. It has an anti-glare coating that reduces reflections and eye strain.

Ports and Connectivity

The Dell Latitude 14 3420 (2021) powered by Intel Core i5-1135G7 has a decent selection of ports and connectivity options for its price range. The laptop has, a USB Type-C port that supports DisplayPort alt mode and Power Delivery, three USB Type-A ports (two USB 3.2 Gen1 and one USB 2.0), an HDMI port, An RJ-45 Ethernet port, a universal audio jack,  a power adapter port, and a microSD card slotThe laptop also has wireless connectivity options such as Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX201, which supports Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) and Bluetooth.

title: Motorola Moto G85 5G
short_description: The Motorola Moto G85 5G features a sleek design with a camera island that integrates seamlessly into its back panel, available in Olive Green, Cobalt Blue with vegan leather, and Urban Grey with PMMA material. It boasts a 6.67-inch 3D curved pOLED display with FHD+ resolution, 120Hz refresh rate, and 1,600 nits peak brightness. Powered by the Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 chip, it offers up to 12GB of RAM, 256GB of internal storage, expandable up to 1TB, and includes a 50MP dual-camera system, a 32MP front camera, and a 5,000mAh battery with 30W fast charging.
description:
Heres a quick overview of the Motorola Moto G85 5G:

Motorola Moto G85 5G Overview

Design and Display

The Moto G85 5G continues the G-series design tradition with a camera island that seamlessly blends into its back panel. Likewise comes in three colours: Olive Green and Cobalt Blue with a vegan leather finish and urban grey with a standard PMMA material. Similarly, the front features a 6.67-inch 3D curved pOLED display with FHD+ resolution, offering a 120Hz refresh rate, a 240Hz touch sampling rate, and a peak brightness of 1,600 nits, along with 10-bit colour depth covering the DCI-P3 colour space.

Performance 

Talking about the performance, it is powered by the newly released Qualcomm Snapdragon 6s Gen 3 chip, a refreshed version of the Snapdragon 695 5G found in its predecessor, the Moto G84 5G. This makes it the first device to feature this updated Qualcomm processor.The Moto G85 5G is offered in two memory configurations: 8GB and 12GB of RAM. For internal storage, it comes with a single option of 256GB, which should accommodate most users needs. In addition to its generous built-in storage, the phone supports significant expandability. You can enhance the devices memory by up to 1TB using a MicroSD card, effectively doubling its available storage and ensuring ample space for apps, photos, and other data.

Camera

The Moto G85 5G features a dual-camera system on the rear, including a 50MP primary lens with OIS and an 8MP ultrawide lens that also functions as a macro shooter. For selfies and face recognition, it has a 32MP front-facing camera.Likewise, the phone comes with a 5,000mAh battery that supports 30W fast charging. It also includes stereo speakers, a dual-microphone setup, and supports 5G connectivity, WiFi 5, Bluetooth v5.1, and NFC. Additionally, the Moto G85 5G offers eSIM support for a dual SIM experience.

title: Motorola Moto G04s
short_description: The Motorola Moto G04s is a budget smartphone with a 6.56-inch HD+ display, 90Hz refresh rate, and a Unisoc T606 processor. It has 4 GB of RAM, 64 GB of expandable storage, and runs Android 14 with Motorola’s MyUX. The phone features a 50-megapixel rear camera, a 5-megapixel front camera, and a 5,000mAh battery that supports 15W charging, with a 10W charger included.
description:
Heres a quick overview of the Motorola Moto G04s

Motorola Moto G04s Overview

Design and Display

The Motorola Moto G04s is a budget-friendly smartphone designed, featuring an all-plastic construction that helps keep costs low while maintaining durability. Weighing around 180 grams, it is comfortably lightweight, and it comes in a selection of vibrant colours like Sunrise Orange, Satin Blue, Sea Green, and Concord Black, allowing users to choose a style that suits their preferences. The phone boasts a 6.56-inch IPS LCD display with an HD+ resolution and a 90Hz refresh rate, providing smooth visuals and decent clarity. Moreover, with a pixel density of 269ppi, the screen covers about 85% of the front panel and is protected by Gorilla Glass 3, offering resilience against scratches and minor impacts.

Performance

The Motorola Moto G04s comes with the Unisoc T606 processor and 4 GB of RAM for smooth multitasking. It offers 64 GB of UFS 2.2 storage, expandable via microSD for added flexibility. Likewise, the device runs on Android 14 and benefits from the latest software improvements and security updates.

Camera and Battery

Talking about the camera, the Motorola Moto G04s features a good camera setup designed to cater to everyday photography needs. On the back, it features a 50-megapixel primary camera, which is accompanied by an LED flash to enhance low-light shooting. Moreover, this high-resolution camera is capable of capturing detailed images and recording Full HD videos at up to 30 frames per second. For selfies and video calls, the Moto G04s includes a 5-megapixel front-facing camera housed in a discrete punch-hole, also supporting Full HD video recording at 30fps. Likewise, powering the device is a substantial 5,000mAh battery, which supports 15W fast charging to ensure quick top-ups. However, the phone comes bundled with a 10W charger, which may result in slightly slower charging speeds compared to its maximum supported rate.

short_description: Nothing phone (1) is the company's first-ever smartphone. Characterized mainly by its unique transparent design, it was easily the most hyped phone of 2022. Nothing calls this \"Glyph Interface\". Other notable aspects of the phone (1)'s design include flat frames made of recycled aluminum, dual Gorilla Glass 5 protection, and IP53 dust/splash resistance. The phone is powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 778G+ chip with up to 12GB RAM and 256GB storage. It runs on Android 12 with Nothing OS on top, and the company promises 3 generations of OS and 4 years of security updates. Its 6.55\" OLED display has a 120Hz adaptive refresh rate. As for the cameras, Nothing has gone with a 50MP main and 50MP ultrawide sensor at the back and a 16MP selfie shooter. The phone (1) is fueled by a 4500mAh battery that supports 33W wired, 15W wireless, and 5W reverse wireless charging.

description:
Below is a short overview of the Zeblaze Thor Ultra including its features and battery life.

Zeblaze Thor Ultra Overview

Display and Design

The new Zeblaze Thor Ultra 4G Watch boasts a sleek circular and stylish design weighing 60g. On the right side, there are two physical buttons for easy navigation, a SIM card holder on the left, and a heart rate sensor on the back. Apparently, Zeblaze Thor Ultra has an IP67 rating for dust water resistance.The body is made of zinc alloy with PC plastic with silicon straps silicone. The watch features a 1.43-inch AMOLED with a resolution of 466 x 466 pixels, supporting an always-on display. It comes in a sleek black color and offers a variety of customizable watch faces to suit your style.

Storage and Other Features

The Thor Ultra has 2GB of RAM and 16GB of internal memory and runs Android 8.1 OS with Spreadtrum Processor – which means, it supports all kinds of Android apps like Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, light games, and many more. This Android smartwatch phone is packed with other features including a heart rate monitor, SPO2, pedometer, NFC, multi-sport modes, weather, and many more.Connectivity and BatteryThe smartwatch supports WIFI, 4G LTE connectivity, GPS/GLONASS, and Bluetooth. title: Motorola Edge 50 Fusion
short_description: The Motorola Edge 50 Fusion boasts a 6.7-inch FHD+ OLED display with a 120/144Hz refresh rate and Gorilla Glass 5 protection. It comes in vegan leather or glass back options, is IP68-rated, and features a 5000 mAh battery with 68W fast charging. Powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor, it offers up to 12GB of RAM and 512GB of storage, running Android 14 with Hello UI. The camera setup includes a 50MP main sensor with OIS, a 13MP ultrawide, and a 32MP front camera for selfies.
description:
Heres a quick overview of the Motorola Edge 50 Fusion:

Motorola Edge 50 Fusion Overview

Design and Display

Starting off with the display the Motorola Edge 50 Fusion features a 6.7-inch FHD+ OLED display with Pantone validation, offering a refresh rate of 144Hz and protected by Gorilla Glass 5. It comes in two back options—vegan leather or glass—paired with a glass front and plastic frames. Moreover, the phone is IP68-rated for water and dust resistance and is available in vibrant colours including Forest Blue, Hot Pink, and Marshmallow Blue.Inside, the phone is powered by a robust 5000 mAh battery and supports 68W fast charging. Additionally, the device includes stereo speakers and NFC functionality.

Performance 

Talking about the performance this phone is powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 octa-core processor, whereas its higher-end counterpart, it features the more advanced Snapdragon 7 Gen 3. The Edge 50 Fusion offers up to 12GB of RAM and up to 512GB of internal storage. It runs on Android 14 with the Hello UI skin pre-installed.

Camera

The Motorola Edge 50 Fusion is equipped with a versatile camera system designed for high-quality photography and video. The rear setup includes a 50MP primary camera that uses a Sony LYT-700C sensor, featuring optical image stabilization (OIS) to reduce blurriness and improve clarity in various lighting conditions. Talking about the ultrawide it comes with a 13MP ultrawide camera, allowing for expansive shots and capturing more of the scene in each frame.For selfies and video calls, the front-facing camera boasts a 32MP resolution, ensuring sharp and detailed images. This front camera is designed to deliver high-quality results for both still photos and video communication.
