title: Motorola Moto G34 5G
short_description: The Moto G34 5G features Motorola’s signature design with a sleek 8mm flat frame and a 6.5-inch OLED display with HD+ resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate. It is powered by a Snapdragon 695 chipset, paired with 8GB of RAM and 128GB of storage, and runs on MYUI 6.0 based on Android 14. The phone offers a 50MP dual-camera system, a 5,000mAh battery with 18W fast charging, and includes features like 5G connectivity, dual stereo speakers, and a side-mounted fingerprint sensor.
description:
Heres a quick overview of the Motorola Moto G34 5G:

Motorola Moto G34 5G Overview

Design and Display

Starting with its design, the Moto G34 5G exemplifies Motorola’s distinctive aesthetic with its flat 8mm thick frame and softly rounded edges, contributing to a sleek and modern look. Weighing 179 grams, it feels solid yet comfortable in hand. Moreover, the front of the device comes with a 6.5-inch OLED display, which delivers HD+ resolution and a smooth 120Hz refresh rate for vibrant visuals and fluid scrolling. The hole-punch screen is further enhanced by 1920Hz PWM dimming technology, designed to reduce flicker and improve visual comfort during extended use, making it easier on the eyes.

Performance

Similarly, about the performance, the Moto G34 5G features a three-year-old Snapdragon 695 chipset. This 5G processor features 2 Kryo 660 Gold (Cortex-A78) cores clocked at 2.2GHz and 6 Kryo 660 Silver (Cortex-A55) cores running at 1.8GHz. Moreover, the device is equipped with 8GB of LPDDR4x RAM and 128GB of UFS 2.2 storage. On the software front, it runs MYUI 6.0, which is based on Android 14.

Camera

Turning to the camera features, the Moto G34 5G has a versatile dual-camera system on the rear. It features a 50MP primary sensor that captures detailed and vibrant photos, complemented by a 2MP macro lens designed for close-up shots with intricate detail. Likewise, for selfies and video calls, the smartphone includes a 16MP front-facing camera housed within the punch-hole cutout, ensuring high-quality images and clear video communication. This setup offers a range of photography options, from broad landscapes to fine details and sharp selfies.

Battery and Others

Next, the G34 5G has a 5,000mAh battery with 18W fast charging support. For connectivity, it offers 5G, WiFi 5, GPS, a 3.5mm headphone jack, and a USB Type-C port. Additional features include dual stereo speakers and a side-mounted fingerprint sensor.

description:
Lenovo IdeaPad 5i (2021): Overview

Here’s a brief description of the design aesthetic, processor, and battery life of the Lenovo IdeaPad 5i 2021 laptop with an Intel i5 chip.

Build and Display

The Ideapad 5 2021 offers an aluminum metal body. It is 16.9mm thick and weighs around 1.66 kg. The matte screen measures 15.6″ diagonally and boasts 250 nits of brightness. There are dual stereo up-firing speakers, a backlit keyboard, and a fingerprint reader for security.

Performance and Memory

Under the hood, Lenovo IdeaPad 5i (2021) has Intel’s 11th Gen Core i5 1135G7 processor. The new processor brings higher base and boost frequencies. It comes with 8GB DDR4 RAM but unfortunately, it is non-upgradable. For storage, you get a 512 GB M.2 SSD which can be upgraded to 1 TB.

Battery and Connectivity 

In the tank of the Ideapad 5i 2021, is a 56.5 Wh battery pack.  The Ideapad ships with a 65-Wh power adapted, adding up to 2 hours of usage on a quick 15-minute charge using Quick Charge.As for wired connections on the Ideapad 5i 2021, you get 2 USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, a single USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C port, a headphone jack, an HDMI port, and an SD card slot. For wireless connectivity, you get Wi-Fi 5 and Bluetooth 5.0 technology.

description:
Lenovo IdeaPad 5 (2022) Overview:

Here's a brief description of the design aesthetic, processor, and battery life of the Lenovo IdeaPad 5 (2022) laptop with the Ryzen 7 5825U processor.

Build and Display

The Ideapad 5 2022 offers an aluminum metal body. The 14 " screen has 300 nits of brightness and a matte finish. It is 16.9mm thick and weighs around 1.4 kg. There are dual stereo up-firing speakers, a backlit keyboard, and a fingerprint reader for security.

Performance and Memory

Under the hood of the Lenovo Ideapad 5 (2022) is a Ryzen 7 5825U processor. The latest Barcelo APU from AMD, the 5825U brings higher base and boost frequencies than its Cezanne-based predecessor -5800 U. It comes with 16 GB DDR4x RAM but unfortunately, it is non-upgradable. For storage, you get a 1 TB M.2 SSD.

Battery and Connectivity 

The Ideapad 5 2022 (AMD) comes with a 56.5 Wh battery pack. It can play local 1080p video for up to 16.1 hours and lasts 11.75 hours in MobileMark 2018 benchmark at 200 nits. The Ideapad ships with a 65-Wh power adapted which can add up to 2 hours of usage on a quick 15-minute charge using Rapid Charge Boost.As for wired connections, you get four USB ports, including two Type-C, one HDMI, one SD card reader, and a combined audio jack.

description:
Lenovo IdeaPad L3 (2021): Overview

Here’s a brief description of the design aesthetic, processor, and battery life of the Lenovo IdeaPad L3 2021 laptop with an Intel i5 chip.

Build and Display

The Ideapad L3 2021 is 23mm thick and weighs around 2.2 kg. The matte screen measures 15.6″ diagonally and boasts 250 nits of brightness. There are dual stereo up-firing speakers, a backlit keyboard, and a fingerprint reader for security.

Performance and Memory

Under the hood, Lenovo IdeaPad L3 (2021) has Intel’s 11th Gen Core i5 1135G7 processor. The new processor brings higher base and boost frequencies. It comes with 8GB DDR4 RAM which is upgradable to 12 GB. For storage, you get a 512 GB M.2 SSD which can be upgraded to 1 TB.

Battery and Connectivity 

In the tank of the Ideapad L3 2021, is a 36 Wh battery pack.  The Ideapad ships with a 65-Wh power adapter in the box.As for wired connections on the Ideapad L3 2021, you get 2 USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, a single USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C port, a headphone jack, an HDMI port, and an SD card slot. For wireless connectivity, you get Wi-Fi 5 and Bluetooth 5.0 technology.

title: Acer Nitro 5 2022 (12th Gen i5-12500H, RTX 3050, 8GB RAM, 512GB SSD, 15.6" FHD 144Hz)
short_description: The Acer Nitro 5 (2022) is a budget-friendly gaming laptop that features a 15.6-inch FHD 144Hz display, a 12th Gen Intel Core processor, an Nvidia GeForce RTX 3050 graphics card, 8GB of RAM, and 512GB of SSD storage. It can handle most games at medium to high settings but may struggle with some demanding titles. The Acer Nitro 5 is a good option for gamers who want decent performance without stressing much about their pocket.
description:
If you are looking for a gaming laptop that offers solid performance and features without breaking the bank, you might want to check out the Acer Nitro 5 2022 with a 12th Gen Intel Core i5-12500H processor, an Nvidia GeForce RTX 3050 graphics card, 8GB of RAM, and a 512GB SSD. It also has a 15.6-inch Full HD display with a 144Hz refresh rate, a backlit keyboard, and a good port selection.

Acer Nitro 5 2022 (Overview):

Performance

The Acer Nitro 5 2022 packs an Intel Core i5-12500H CPU along with the RTX 3050. The CPU has six cores and 12 threads, with a base clock of 2.5GHz and a boost clock of 4.6GHz. It also supports PCIe Gen4 and DDR4-3200 memory.The Nvidia GeForce RTX 3050 is a mid-range GPU that can handle most games at 1080p resolution with medium to high settings. It has 4GB of GDDR6 VRAM and a maximum graphics power of 95W. It also supports ray tracing and DLSS technologies for more realistic lighting and smoother frame rates.

Design

The Acer Nitro 5 2022 has a sleek and minimalist design, with a black metal lid and a red hinge. The keyboard has red backlighting and a dedicated NitroSense key that lets you monitor and adjust the system settings. The touchpad is large and responsive, with Windows Precision drivers.

Display

The display is one of the highlights of this laptop, as it offers a smooth and crisp gaming experience. The 15.6-inch IPS panel has a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels and a refresh rate of 144Hz.

Ports

The laptop has plenty of ports for connectivity, including one USB-C port with Thunderbolt 4 support, three USB-A ports (one with power-off charging), one HDMI port, one audio jack, and one Kensington lock slot. Likewise, it also has Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.1 for wireless connectivity.

The laptop comes with a 14\" glossy IPS panel that depending upon the model can be a non-touch, FHD touch and UHD touch. title: Acer Predator Helios 16 2023 (i7 13th Gen 13700H, RTX 4060, 16GB, 1TB, 16" WQXGA 165Hz)
short_description: The company's gaming laptop is the Acer Predator Helios 16 2023. Under the hood of this specific model is an Intel Core i7-13700H processor from the 13th generation. This version features a 16' LED-backlit LCD panel with a 165Hz refresh rate. An NVidIA RTX 4060 with 6GB GDDR6 VRAM handles the graphics. It is accompanied by a 1TB NVMe PCI-e Gen 4.0 SSD and 16GB of DDR5 RAM. A 90Wh battery and 230W AC adaptor power the system.
description:
Acer has introduced new models in the Predator Helios 16 and 18 series, bringing forth new gaming laptops. Let's dig into the details of the Acer Predator Helios 16 2023 (PH16-71), a 16-inch model, including its specifications, features, price, and availability in Nepal.

Acer Predator Helios 16 2023 (PH16-71) Overview:

Display

The Acer Predator Helios 16 PH16-71 has a 16-inch WQXGA display with up to  240Hz refresh rate and a Mini LED backlight that delivers stunning visuals and contrast. However, it is not yet available in Nepal. The display also supports NVidIA Advanced Optimus, which dynamically switches between the integrated and discrete graphics to optimize battery life and performance.

Performance

The laptop is powered by up to 13th Gen Intel Core i9 processor paired with up NVidIA GeForce RTX 4080 laptop GPU, based on the new Ada Lovelace architecture that offers a significant leap in performance and AI-powered graphics. The laptop is configurable with up to 32GB of DDR5 RAM and 2TB of NVMe SSD storage, which ensures fast loading times and smooth multitasking.To keep the thermals in check, Acer has used a state-of-the-art cooling system that includes dual custom-engineered 5th Gen AeroBlade 3D fans, vector heat pipes, and liquid metal thermal grease.

Ports and Others

Talking of ports and connectivity, it comes with a range of options, such as HDMI, USB Type-C with Thunderbolt 4, USB Type-A, RJ-45, and Wi-Fi 6E. Fueling the machine is a 4-cell battery that can last up to 5 hours on a single charge, depending on the usage pattern.

title: Lenovo Legion 5 2022 (Ryzen 7 6800H, RTX 3050 Ti, 16GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD 165Hz)
short_description: Lenovo Legion 5 (2022) is a gaming laptop with a pretty subtle visual profile. As a result, it blends in a professional environment rather easily as well. This gaming laptop is powered by AMD's Ryzen 6000 series CPU and NVidIA's RTX 30 series GPU. You can configure this gaming laptop with up to 32GB of DDR5 RAM and 2TB of SSD.
description:
Lenovo Legion 5 (2022) Overview:

Design, Display

The 2022 edition of Legion 5 features a plastic body with aluminum lid. There's a subtle "Legion" branding on the top left corner of the laptop's lid and a "Lenovo" branding on the bottom right. As for cooling, Lenovo says its "Legion Coldfront 3.0" technology helps deliver great performance with zero throttling even under long gaming sessions. The slightly more premium Legion 5 Pro has an even better thermal system, by the way.Anyway, this cooling solution includes two fans with quad-channel exhaust and a large air intake vent at the bottom and underneath each keyboard switch. The laptop comes in two finishes: Phantom Black and Phantom Blue. But you can also find the Stingray White color option in certain markets.Upfront, you're getting a 15.6" Full HD IPS LCD screen with an anti-glare coating on top. Likewise, the Legion 5 (2022) is available with two display configurations in total:
  • 120Hz refresh rate, 250 nits brightness
  • 165Hz refresh rate, 300 nits brightness, 100% sRGB, Dolby Vision

Performance

In terms of performance, this gaming laptop brings AMD + NVidIA combo. It is available with two CPU choices, i.e. Ryzen 5 6600H and Ryzen 7 6800H, whereas GPU options range from RTX 3050 to RTX 3070. Only the RTX 3050 Ti (95W) is currently available in Nepal. The GPU has been complemented with 4GB of GDDR6 VRAM.As for memory, you can install up to 32GB DDR4-3200 RAM here. The Legion 5 (2022)'s base model usually arrives with 512GB SSD, but you can bump it up to 2TB M.2 NVMe SSD as well.

Others

Moving on, this gaming laptop features a Legion TrueStrike keyboard with 4-zone RGB lighting. You can customize the lighting pattern under the Lenovo Vantage app. Port options on the Legion 5 (2022) include 3x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, 2x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C,1xUSB-C 3.2 Gen 2(supports data transfer, Power Delivery 135W and DisplayPort 1.4), 1x HDMI 2.1, 1x RJ45, 1x 3.5mm combo audio jack, and an E-shutter button on the right. Contrary to a physical webcam shutter, this button toggles the camera on/off.When it comes to battery, this gaming laptop has been paired with an 80-Wh battery. Similarly, it fuels up via a 230W AC adapter.

title: Asus Vivobook 14 2022 (12th Gen i7-1255U, 8GB, 512GB, 14" FHD)
short_description: Asus VivoBook 14 is a decent budget-friendly ultrabook with a 14-inch FHD IPS LCD screen. It is powered by Intel's Core i7-1255U processor, which can reach boost clock speeds of up to 4.7 GHz. An integrated Iris Xe GPU handles the graphics. This laptop variant is available with 8GB of RAM and 512GB of storage, although you can tinker around with the memory options if you'd want. With this, you upgrade the VivoBook 14 up to 16GB RAM. Moreover, the laptop features a fingerprint sensor that has been integrated into the trackpad. It features a backlit keyboard with a 1.4mm key travel distance.
description:
Asus Vivobook 14 (2022): Overview

Here’s a brief description of the design aesthetic, chipset, and build quality of the Asus Vivobook 14 (2022) with 12th Gen Intel Core i7-1255U processor.

Display and Build

Asus Vivobook 14 sports a 14″ IPS LCD screen covering 45 % of the NTSC color gamut. This matte display has an FHD (1920×1080) resolution and a standard 16:9 aspect ratio. The 60Hz panel can hit a peak brightness of 250 nits. On top, it has a TÜV Rheinland certification. The device isn’t heavy at 1.7 kilos and is a suitable daily carry.

Performance and Memory

Under the hood, Vivobook 14 (2022) has Intel’s i5-1255U processor. This 12-gen Intel CPU has base and boost clock speeds of 1.2GHz and 4.7GHz, respectively. It has 10 cores (2 Performance + 8 Efficiency) and 12 Threads along with 12 MB of L3 cache. Complementing the CPU is Intel’s Iris Xe graphics.On the memory front, you get 8GB of DDR4 RAM which can be later upgraded up to 16GB. As for secondary storage, you get a 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe 3.0 SSD.

Battery and Connectivity

In the tank, Asus VivoBook 14 has a 42Wh Lithium Ion battery. You can recharge it via the 45W AC adapter provided in the box.For wireless connections, you have your standard WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5. As for the wired port selection, you get 3 USB-As, a USB C, an HDMI, and a headphone jack.

description:

Gigabyte AORUS 15 9MF Overview:

Performance

Display

It also comes with a 15.6-inch display with up to 360Hz refresh rate where you can configure between a QHD or an FHD panel. title: Acer Aspire 5 2022 (12th Gen i3-1215U, MX550, 4GB, 256GB, 14" FHD)
short_description: The Acer Aspire 5 2022 (A514-55) is an affordable laptop with a 14" Full HD screen. It's equipped with an Intel Core i3-1215U CPU that's good enough to handle your daily tasks. To top it off, Acer has also included an Nvidia GeForce MX550 GPU with 2GB of VRAM that provides better performance for graphics-heavy activities. The laptop is paired with 4GB of RAM and 256GB of SSD, but these are upgradable since it comes with extra memory/storage slots. Last but not least, fueling the Aspire 5 (2022) is a 48Whr battery.
description:
The Acer Aspire 5 series offers a low-cost variety of laptops that blend performance and stylish design, making them a great choice for consumers who need strong computing capability but don't want to break the bank. Whether you're working, streaming, or staying connected, the Acer Aspire 5 (2022), powered by Intel Core i3-1215U and NVidIA MX550 GPU, is built to provide a reliable and efficient computing experience.

Acer Aspire 5 (2022) Overview:

Design and Display

The laptop features a modern, and design with a Silver hue. Its compact size of 223 x 328 x 18 mm and lightweight build of 1.65kg make it easy to carry. The 14-inch IPS LCD display offers good viewing angles with its anti-glare matte finish. Although the color gamut encompasses only 45% of NTSC, it still delivers decent color representation. The display's maximum brightness is 250 nits, suitable for most indoor settings. However, it lacks touch functionality.

Performance/ Memory

The Acer Aspire 5 (2022) is powered by the 12th Gen Intel Core i3-1215U processor with 6 cores and 8 threads, along with an Nvidia GeForce MX550 GPU. It features 4GB DDR4 RAM (expandable to 16GB) at 3200 MHz and a 256GB M.2 NVMe PCIe SSD. Operating on Windows 11, it offers a balanced blend of performance and storage for everyday tasks and moderate graphics needs.

Keyboard and Battery

The chiclet-style keyboard and trackpad enable Windows gestures and multi-touch capability, allowing for easy navigation and interaction. Powering the laptop is a 3-cell 48 Wh Li-ion battery, that offers a practical amount of battery life for on-the-go use. Furthermore, the 45W AC Adapter speeds up charging, quickly powering up the laptop when necessary.

Rest of the Specs

The laptop provides versatile connectivity with USB ports, including Thunderbolt 4, HDMI, and audio jack. It features WiFi 6E, Bluetooth 5.1, and Ethernet for networking. TPM 2.0 covers the security of the laptop. Moreover, the laptop includes a 720p HD camera, and stereo speakers, and offers a set of features for various tasks and connectivity needs.

title: Gigabyte G5 MF (Core i5 12th Gen, RTX 4050, 15.6" FHD)
short_description: The Gigabyte G5 MF is a gaming laptop that falls within the mid-tier range and boasts a 15.6-inch FHD 144Hz display. This laptop runs on an Intel Core-i5 12th Gen CPU that's coupled with a dedicated NVidIA RTX 4050 GPU. To suit users' needs, this laptop can be configured with up to 64GB of DDR4 RAM and 512 GB M.2 SSD. As for the battery, it comes with a 54WHr battery that's powered by a 150W AC adapter.
description:
Gigabyte G5 MF is another entry under the G5 series for this year by Gigabyte. There are KF and MF variants of G5 and while they both share almost identical specs, there are some performance tweaks here and there. We've covered Gigabyte G5 KF in a separate story, while here we will go through the specs, features, and availability of the Gigabyte G5 MF.

Gigabyte G5 MF Overview:

Performance

The main difference between the two laptops under the G5 series lies in their performance. The G5 MF model is equipped with an Intel i5-12450H CPU and a dedicated NVidIA RTX 4050 GPU. In contrast, the G5 KF model has an i5-12500H CPU and an RTX 4060 GPU. Both laptops come with the option to configure up to 64GB of DDR4 RAM and 512GB M.2 SSD to complement their chipsets.Gigabyte has integrated WINDFORCE Infinity cooling technology here in this laptop as well. The cooling system consists of 59 blade fans and 4 heat pipes, and 4 exhaust vents.

Design and Display

Moving on, the laptop has a matte black finish, typical of a gaming laptop. But there's a lightly textured pattern on one corner of the lid to give it that gaming asthetics. The laptop is also pretty light measuring just 1.9 kg. Up front, there's a 15.6-inch FHD display with a 144Hz refresh rate, like Gigabyte the G5 KF.

Ports and Others

Gigabyte makes use of the back of the laptop to give you all the ports, including HDMI, a Mini DisplayPort, two USB type-A and two USB type-C ports, an ethernet port, and a MicroSD card reader. t is fueled by a 54Wh battery and it charges via a 150W AC adapter.

title: Dell Vostro 14 3400 2021 (11th Gen i5-1135G7, MX330, 8GB, 256GB, 14" FHD)
short_description: The Dell Vostro 14 3400 is a business laptop with a stylish design. It is powered by a Intel Core i5-1135G7 processor and Nvidia GeForce MX330 graphics with 2GB of GDDR5 VRAM. In terms of memory, Dell sells it in Nepal with 8GB RAM and 256GB storage. It has a 14-inch screen with Full HD resolution and its WVA (wide-viewing-angle) panel provides very little color shift even when viewing the screen from the sides. Furthermore, with a weight of only 1.59 kg, it is easy to carry in your office bag as well.
description:
If you are looking for a reliable and affordable laptop for your small business, you might want to consider the Dell Vostro 14 3400 (2021) with an 11th Gen Intel Core i5-1135G7 processor and entry-level GeForce MX330 from NVidIA. It also has a sleek and durable design, with a spill-resistant keyboard and a fingerprint reader for added security.

Dell Vostro 14 3400 (2021) Overview:

Display

The Dell Vostro 14 3400 has a Full HD display with a matte coating that reduces glare and reflections. The display quality is decent, with good contrast and brightness levels, but it is not very color accurate or vivid. The viewing angles are also narrow, so you might have to adjust the screen position to get the best image.The keyboard of the Dell Vostro 3400 is a standard one, though there is also an option for a white backlight. The touchpad is smooth and responsive, and it supports multi-touch gestures. The laptop also has a good selection of ports, including USB-C, USB-A, HDMI, Ethernet, and an SD card reader.

Performance

This 14-inch laptop offers decent performance for the everyday user, thanks to its Intel Core i5-1135G7 processor. This 11th Gen Tiger Lake CPU has four cores and eight threads with an 8MB L3 cache. Accompanying it is a 8GB of DDR4 RAM, and 256GB of SSD storage. Likewise, you get entry-level GeForce NVidIA MX330 from NVidIA.

Battery

The battery life of the Dell Vostro 14 3400 (i5) has an average 42Wh battery. It is said to last about 6 hours of mixed usage on a single charge. This is enough for most workdays, but you might want to bring the charger with you if you plan to use the laptop for longer periods. You get a 65W power adapter bundled in the box.The Dell Vostro 14 3400 is a great choice for small business owners who need a reliable and affordable laptop that can handle their daily tasks. It has a solid performance, a durable design, and a decent display. It is not very suitable for gaming or creative work, but it can handle some light photo and video editing. The Dell Vostro 14 3400 powered by 11th Gen Intel Core i5 CPU is a laptop that delivers what it promises: value for money.

title: Acer Swift 3 2022 (Ryzen 7 5825U, 16GB, 1TB, 14 FHD)
short_description: The Acer Swift 3 2022 is a thin and light laptop that features the AMD Ryzen 7 5825U processor, a powerful and efficient chip that can handle various tasks and applications. The laptop has a 14-inch IPS display with 100% sRGB coverage, which offers sharp and vivid colors. Inside, you get 16GB of DDR4 RAM and 1TB of SSD. The laptop has a sleek metal design and weighs only 1.2 kg, making it easy to carry around. The laptop also has a backlit keyboard, a fingerprint reader, a webcam with a privacy shutter, and a range of ports. Acer Swift 3 2022 is a great choice for anyone looking for a portable and powerful laptop that can handle work and entertainment.
description:
If you are looking for a laptop that combines performance, portability, and affordability, you might want to check out the Acer Swift 3 (2022) with Ryzen 7 5825U processor. This laptop features a 14-inch FHD display with a 100% sRGB color gamut and a sleek aluminum chassis.

Acer Swift 3 2022 Overview:

Performance

The Acer Swift 3 (2022) has Ryzen 7 5825U CPU. The laptop supports up to 2TB of M.2 SSD storage and Wi-Fi 6E connectivity for blazing-fast internet. Whether you are working on multiple tasks, light photo editing, or browsing the web, the Acer Swift 3 (2022) with Ryzen 7 can handle it with its integrated graphics.

Design

The Acer Swift 3 (2022) is one of the lightest and thinnest laptops in its class, weighing only 1.25 kg and measuring 15.95 mm thin. The laptop also has a fingerprint reader for easy and secure login and a backlit keyboard for comfortable typing.

Display

This particular model sports an FHD display with narrow bezels and a high screen-to-body ratio of 86%. The screen also has 100% sRGB color gamut, which means it can reproduce accurate and vivid colors for any content. Furthermore, it also supports Acer's BlueLightShield technology, which reduces eye strain by filtering out harmful blue light.

Ports and Battery

Talking of the port options, there are USB-C, USB Type-A, and HDMI 2.1 ports for connectivity. Sadly, there is no Thunderbolt 4 port. The laptop gets its juice from a 50Wh battery.

title: Asus VivoBook 16X 2022 (Ryzen 7 5800H, 8GB, 1TB, 16" WUXGA)
short_description: Asus VivoBook Pro 16X is a 16\" Ultrabook designed for creative professionals. It sports a metal chassis finish off with an antibacterial treatment. AMD's Ryzen 7 5800H processor powers this laptop, which also brings 8GB of DDR4 RAM and 1TB of SSD. You can upgrade the memory to 16GB with the vacant SO-DIMM slot. It has a 16\" IPS LCD WUXGA screen with 45% NTSC coverage.
description:
Asus VivoBook 16X 2022 Overview

If you are looking for a laptop that can handle your daily tasks with ease and offer you a stunning display, you might want to check out the ASUS Vivobook 16X 2021 (M1603QA) powered by Ryzen 7 5800H.

Display

The Vivobook 16X also features a 16-inch WUXGA (1920 x 1200) IPS-level panel with a 16:10 aspect ratio, which gives you more vertical screen space to work with. The display has a 300-nit brightness and a 45% NTSC color gamut, so you can enjoy vivid and clear visuals in any lighting condition.The laptop also has a sleek and stylish design, with a choice of Quiet Blue or Transparent Silver colors and an ASUS Antimicrobial Guard coating on the surface.

Performance

This laptop is powered by the AMD Ryzen 7 5800H processor, which is an 8-core processor with a maximum clock speed of up to 4.2GHz. There is no discrete graphics, so users will have to rely on the integrated Vega graphics. Asus Vivobook 16X (2022) ships with 8GB of sodered DDR4 RAM that you can upgrade up to 16GB using the vacant SO-DIMM slot. Likewise, you get 1TB of SSD storage.

Ports and Connectivity

The laptop also has a range of connectivity options, including USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C, USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, HDMI 1.4, a 3.5mm combo audio jack, and a DC-in port. The laptop also supports Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.3 for wireless connectivity.

Battery and Others

The Vivobook 16X (Ryzen 7) also has a 50Wh battery that can last up to 6 hours on a single charge, according to ASUS. The laptop also comes with Windows 11 Home preinstalled, which offers a more intuitive and personalized user experience through the MyAsus app. This app lets you access various system settings and features, such as system diagnosis, battery health charging, fan profile, WiFi SmartConnect, and more.

title: ASUS Zenbook 14 2023 (Ryzen 5 7530U, 16GB, 512GB, 14" 2.5K IPS)
short_description: ASUS Zenbook 14 (UM3402YA) is an ultrabook powered by AMD's  Ryzen 5 7530U processor. It is a lightweight machine weighing in at just 1.34 kg. It comes with 8GB of fast LPDDR4x RAM and 512GB M.2 SSD. It has a great 2.5K display and premium build quality. This is ASUS's offering to creatives seeking a sleek and portable everyday carry.
description:
ASUS Zenbook 14 2023 Overview :

ASUS Zenbook 14 is an ultrabook with a great display and decent battery life. It weighs just under 1.4 kg, making it an ideal everyday carry. With its fast memory and capable processor, it'll breeze through most school or office work and multimedia use cases. But the lack of discrete graphics might become apparent when you deal with graphics-heavy work like video editing or playing high-end games.

Design and Build 

Since ASUS's Zenbook 14 is a premium device, you can expect a flagship-grade build. Both the top and bottom of the laptop are made up of aluminum, and the surface is treated with Aluminium stamping. The screen is a 14" IPS panel of 2.5K WQXGA (2560x1600) resolution. It covers 100% sRGB gamut while having a 16:10 aspect ratio. Zenbook 14's display is  TÜV Rheinland-certified, has an Anti-glare finish and can reach 400 nits of brightness.

Performance and Memory

description:

Performance and Battery Life

The laptop also supports fast charging, which can provide up to four hours of use with just 30 minutes of charging.

Connectivity and Ports

The Acer Swift 5 2022 has a variety of ports and connectivity options for different needs. The laptop has:- 2x Thunderbolt 4 port that supports data transfer, charging, and display output- 2x USB Type-A ports that support USB 3.2 Gen 1- 1x HDMI port that supports HDMI 2.0- 1x headphone/microphone combo jack- 1x microSD card readerThe laptop also has Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.1 for wireless connectivity.

title: boAt Airdopes 71
short_description: The boAt Airdopes 71 are compact, pocket-sized earbuds featuring an in-ear design with an IPX4 rating for water and sweat resistance. They offer a decent audio experience with 6mm drivers and two microphones for clear calls and environmental noise cancellation. Equipped with Bluetooth 5.3, IWP technology, and touch controls, they support mono and stereo modes and include a BEAST Mode for low-latency gaming. With 40mAh batteries in the earbuds and a 300mAh battery in the charging case, they provide up to 40 hours of usage at 60% volume and can be quickly recharged via USB-C.
description:
boAt Airdopes 71 Overview

Design and Audio

As I mentioned earlier, the boAt Airdopes 71 is compact and as such it is very pocketable and can easily fit inside pockets, handbags, and such. The buds themselves come in an in-ear fit with a stemmed design. They also boast an IPX4 rating, able to withstand splashes of water and sweat exposure without much issue. Likewise, the charging case is ovular with curved edges. It is available in Active Black, Starry Blue, and Frost White colour options.Moving on to the audio side of things, these earbuds only pack a 6mm driver on each side due to their pocketable form factor. Though the driver size is quite small compared to many offerings in the market, it is not the only contributing factor to audio quality. Hence, you can still get a decent audio experience from it. Additionally, the boAt Airdopes 71 packs two microphones to offer environmental noise cancellation and a clear calling experience.

Features and Battery

Despite its small stature, these earbuds offer a handful of features. Starting with Bluetooth v5.3 connectivity. They can connect to both smartphone platforms and access their respective voice assistants as well. Similarly, they have IWP technology, instantly pairing with the latest connected device. The boAt Airdopes 71 comes with touch controls and can be used in mono as well as stereo modes. Furthermore, there is a BEAST Mode dedicated to gamers, wherein the earbuds’ latency drops as low as 50ms.All the features and the accessory itself are powered by 40mAh batteries baked inside it. For added usability, it has a 300mAh cell inside the charging case. Combined, it translates to 40 hours worth of usage when the volume is set at 60 per cent. Talking of charging, it has a USB-C interface and generally takes about two hours to charge both the earbuds and case. However, plugging it in for a quick 10-minute charge can still offer you two hours of playtime.

short_description: The Katana 15 B13VEK is MSI's latest gaming laptop, featuring the latest innovations from Intel and Nvidia. It has a 13th Gen Intel Core i7-13620H CPU and a GeForce RTX 4060 GPU. MSI has also included support for MUX Switch, which allows the laptop to put the GPU to sleep when not in use. It aids in energy conservation. It has a 53.5WHr battery with 150W charging support, by the way. The Katana 15 variant mentioned here comes with 16GB of DDR6 RAM and 1TB of NVMe SSD. Since it is a gaming laptop, it's no surprise both the RAM and storage are upgradeable. The Katana 15 B13VEK (2023) is roughly 2.25 kg in weight.
description:
MSI Katana 15 2023 Overview

If you are looking for a powerful and affordable gaming laptop, you might want to check out the MSI Katana 15 (2023) with 13th Gen Intel Core i7-13620H CPU and RTX 4060 GPU.

Display

The MSI Katana 15 (2023) has a 15.6-inch IPS display with a refresh rate of 144Hz, which offers smooth and responsive gameplay. The screen has a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels, which is ideal for gaming and watching videos.The laptop has a four-zone RGB keyboard with highlighted WASD keys, which adds some flair to the design. The keyboard sports a comfortable layout and decent feedback, but the font and pixel-style elements might not appeal to everyone. This gaming machine also boasts dual stereo speakers.

Performance

The MSI Katana 15 (2023 laptop) features a 13th Gen Intel Core i7-13620H processor and an Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 graphics card, which can handle most games at 1080p resolution with high settings. As for the memory, it comes with 16GB of RAM and a 1TB SSD, giving you plenty of memory and storage space for your games and applications.

Battery

The main downside of the gaming laptop is its 53.5Wh battery, which is very modest compared to other gaming laptops.Overall, the laptop is a great choice for gamers who want a lot of performance. It can run most games at high settings and has a fast display and a spacious SSD. However, if you are looking for a more portable and longer-lasting gaming laptop, you might want to look elsewhere.

title: Asus ROG Zephyrus M16 2023 (13th Gen i9-13900H, RTX 4070, 32GB, 1TB, 16" WQXGA 240Hz)
short_description: Asus's ROG Strix G16 (2023) comes with a 16-inch IPS LCD display and a high 165Hz refresh rate. Powering the laptop is an Intel Core i9-13900H mobile processor. The graphics are taken care of by NVidIA's RTX 4070. This variant of the laptop ships with 32GB of DDR5 RAM and 1TB of storage.
description:
Asus ROG Zephyrus M16 (2023): Overview

Here's a brief description of the design aesthetic, chipset, and port selection of the Asus ROG Zephyrus M16 (2023) with Intel Core i9-13900H processor and RTX 4070 GPU.

Display and Build

As the name suggests, ROG Zephyrus M16 (2023) features a 16" display. It's an IPS panel of WQXGA resolution (2560 x 1600) with a 16:10 aspect ratio and covers 100% of the sRGB color gamut. The device features G-sync and has a MUX switch alongside Advanced Optimus. Besides that, it has a 240Hz refresh rate and a 3ms response time.The laptop is 2.1kg heavy. Talking about the exact dimensions, it is 355 mm wide, about 246 mm long, and 22.3mm thick.

Performance and Memory

Under the hood of Asus ROG Zephyrus M16 (2023) is the combination of 13th Gen Intel Core i9-13900H processor and the RTX 4070 GPU. It's a 16-core, 20-thread processor with a max clock speed of 5.4 GHz. Besides that, it has 24MB of L3 cache.The RTX 4070 mobile card comes with 8GB of GDDR6 VRAM. With Dynamic Boost, the TGP of this GPU reaches 140W (115W + 25W).As for the memory, the laptop has 32GB (2 x 16GB) of DDR5 RAM at 4800 MHz. You can upgrade it to 32GB sticks to get a maximum of 64GB RAM.

Battery and Connectivity

In the tank of the gaming laptop is a 90Wh Lithium Ion battery. You can charge it via the 280W AC adapter provided in the box.For wireless connections, this device is equipped with WiFi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3 technology. As for the port selection, you get 2 USB-A ports, 2 USB-C ports (including a Thunderbolt 4), an HDMI port, an ethernet port, and a 3.5 mm headphone/microphone jack.

While it ships with 16GB of DDR4 RAM, it is expandable up to 64GB. In terms of storage, it has a 512GB NVMe SSD. The laptop has an in-built 90WHr battery and weighs approximately 2.26 kg. It has a 16\" QHD+ touchscreen IPS display with a 120Hz refresh rate.
description:
If you are looking for a powerful and stylish laptop for content creation, you might want to check out the MSI Creator Z16 (2021) with 11th Gen Intel Core i7-11800H and RTX 3060.

MSI Creator Z16 2021 Overview

Display and Design

The MSI Creator Z16 2021 also has a stunning 16.1-inch QHD+ display touch with a 16:10 aspect ratio and 100% DCI-P3 color gamut, which offers a vivid and immersive visual experience. The display is also factory calibrated for color accuracy, so you can trust your work to look its best.You get 16 GB of DDR4-3200 memory and a 512GB NVMe PCIe Gen4 SSD. The laptop also has a sleek and lightweight design, weighing only 2.26 kg and measuring 23.95 to 27.5 mm in thickness.

Performance

The MSI Creator Z16 (2021) features the latest 11th Gen Intel Core i7-11800H processor and the NVidIA GeForce RTX 3060 graphics card, which can handle demanding tasks such as video editing, graphic design, and gaming.

Rest of the Specs

The laptop has a single backlit keyboard with white lighting, an HD webcam, and a variety of ports, two USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A, two Thunderbolt 4, a MicroSD card slot, and an audio combo jack. The laptop also supports Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.2 for fast and stable wireless connectivity.This laptop is a great choice for content creators who want a powerful and portable laptop with a stunning display and a stylish design.

HP Notebook 15s (2021) with Ryzen 5 5500U is an affordable laptop with a good display and satisfactory battery life. It weighs just 1.69 kilos, making it suitable for everyday carry. With its fast memory and capable processor, it'll breeze through most office and school work. Here's a brief description of the build, chipset, and connectivity options on the HP Notebook 15s (2021).

Display and Design 

As the name suggests, the HP Notebook 15s (2021) sports a 15.6" IPS panel of FHD (1920x 1080) resolution. It is a 60Hz display that can also reach 250 nits of brightness. Furthermore, the display covers 45% of the NTSC color gamut so watching movies or media on this big screen is more enjoyable.

Performance and Memory 

Under the hood, the HP Notebook 15s (2021) is powered by AMD's Ryzen 5 5500U processor. It features Integrated Ryzen Radeon graphics. The RAM is fast DDR4 memory. This variant comes with 8GB RAM and up to 512GB of M.2 SSD.

Connectivity and Extras

HP Notebook 15s (2021) ships with WIFI 5 and Bluetooth 5 technology. It houses a 41Wh-rated lithium-polymer battery and comes with a 45Wh charging adapter in the box. As for the ports, you get 2 USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C, an HDMI port, an SD card slot,  and one 3.5mm port.

short_description: Asus Vivobook Pro 15 (2023) is a premium 15.6\" ultrabook. As the name implies, it features a 15.6\" IPS LCD display. This screen covers 100% sRGB gamut on top of being Pantone validated. It is powered by a 13th Gen Intel Core i7-13700H processor, which can reach boost clock speeds of up to 5.0 GHz. This productivity-focused laptop is further complemented by RTX 3050 GPU, 16GB of RAM, and 1TB of SSD storage.
description:
Asus Vivobook Pro 15 (2023): Overview

Here's a brief description of the build, chipset, and battery life of the Asus Vivobook Pro 15 (2023) with Intel i7-13700H processor and RTX 3050.

Design and Display

The Vivobook Pro 15 has a premium-looking sleek design. It features a military-grade all-metal design while remaining compact and lightweight. Weighing just around 1.8kg, it is easy to carry around and available in 2 color options: Quiet Blue and Cool Silver.The 15.6-inch panel is an IPS panel of FHD (1920x1080) resolution. It covers a 100% sRGB color gamut and has a 16:9 aspect ratio. The 144 Hz screen is a non-touch matte display that can reach a peak brightness of 250 nits. Additionally, it is TUV Rheinland-certified on top of being Pantone validated.

Performance and Memory

Under the hood, ASUS Vivobook Pro 15 (2023) has the 13th Gen Intel Core i7-13700H processor. It has 14 cores and 20 threads with a max boost frequency of 5.0 GHz. On the GPU front, it features NVidIA GeForce RTX 3050 with 6GB of DDR6 VRAM. Vivobook Pro 15 has 16GB of DDR5 memory, which can't be upgraded further. You also get 1TB of M.2 SSD and an empty M.2 2280 slot.

Battery and Connectivity

In the tank, ASUS Vivobook Pro 14 OLED has a 3-cell 70 Wh Lithium Polymer battery. You can recharge with the 150W adapter in the box.For wired connections, you get 2 USB Type-A ports, a single USB-C Thunderbolt 4 port alongside another USB-C port, one HDMI slot, an ethernet port, and an SD card reader. Alongside that, you get WIFI 6E and Bluetooth 5.3 technology.

description:
HP Victus 16 (2021) Overview:

Here's a brief description of the design aesthetic, chipset, and port selection of the HP Victus 16 (2021) laptop with the Ryzen 7 5800H processor and RTX 3050 Ti card.

Design and Build 

HP Victus 16 (2021) comes with a massive 16.1-inch display. Its IPS LCD panel covers 100% of the sRGB color gamut. The laptop has an 82% screen-to-body aspect ratio and can reach 250 nits of peak brightness.All this is housed inside a new form factor that tries to mimic the more premium Omen series. As you would expect, it is made of plastic. HP Victus 16 (2021) measures 23.5mm in thickness and weighs around 2.46 kg.

Performance and Memory

Regarding CPU and GPU, HP Victus 16 (2021) comes with AMD's Ryzen 7 5800H processor and RTX 3050 Ti, which can handle most things without a need for worry.The NVidIA RTX 3050 Ti has 4GB of GDDR6 RAM. Unfortunately, the TGP is unspecified here.You get two DDR4 SO-DIMM slots. Both are preinstalled with an 8GB DDR4 stick. In the future, you can replace the current sticks with 16GB sticks. Hence it can have a maximum of 32GB RAM.

Battery and Connectivity

HP Victus 16 (2021) packs a 70Wh battery. Likewise, you get a 150W AC charger included in the box.In terms of ports, you get one USB-C, three USB-A, one HDMI, one ethernet, an SD card reader, and a 3.5mm headphone jack. Moreover, the keyboard is backlit, and Lenovo includes a 720p HD camera.

short_description: Asus Vivobook 14 (2023) is a decent budget-friendly ultrabook with a 14-inch FHD IPS LCD screen. It is powered by 12th Gen Intel Core i5-1235U processor, which can reach boost clock speeds of up to 4.40 GHz. An integrated Iris Xe GPU handles the graphics. This laptop variant is available with 8GB of RAM and 512GB of storage, although you can tinker around with the memory options if you'd want. With this, you upgrade the Vivobook 14 up to 16GB RAM. description:
Asus Vivobook 14 (2023): Overview

Here’s a brief description of the build, chipset, and battery life of the Asus Vivobook 14 (2023) with the Intel Core i5-1235U processor.

Design and Display

The Vivobook 14 (2023) is a lightweight and compact everyday machine. Weighing just around 1.5kg, it is easy to carry around and available in 3 color options: Quiet Blue, Icelight Silver, and Terra Cotta.The 14-inch panel is an LCD panel of FHD resolution. It covers a 45% NTSC color gamut and has an aspect ratio of 16:9. The 60Hz screen is a non-touch anti-glare display that can reach a peak brightness of 250 nits.

Under the hood of the Asus Vivobook 14 (2023), there's a 12th Gen Intel Core i5-1235U processor. It has 10 cores (8 Efficiency + 2 Performance ) and 12 Threads with a max boost frequency of 4.4 GHz. On the GPU front, it features integrated Intel Iris Xe graphics. Vivobook 14 ships with 8GB of DDR4 memory which can be upgraded to 16GB (max) via the SO-DIMM slot present. With that, you also get 512GB of M.2 SSD.

Battery and Connectivity

In the tank, Asus VivoBook 14 (2023) has a 3-cell 42 Wh Lithium Polymer battery. You can recharge with the 65W adapter in the box.As for the connectivity options, you get WiFi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3. Moreover, the ports include a USB 2.0 Type-A port, 2 USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports, a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C port, an HDMI port, and a 3.5mm jack.

description:

Here's a brief description of the design aesthetic, chipset, and port selection of the HP Victus 15 (2023) laptop with the Intel Core i5-13420H CPU and NVidIA RTX 3050 GPU.

Design and Build 

HP Victus 15 (2023) comes with a 15.6-inch display. It's an IPS LCD panel that covers 45% of the NTSC color gamut. The laptop has an 82% screen-to-body aspect ratio and can reach 250 nits of peak brightness.All this is housed inside a new form factor that tries to mimic the more premium Omen series. However, since the GPU is based on a newer microarchitecture, it brings hardware-accelerated Ray Tracing, DLSS supersampling, and other RTX features.You get two DDR4 SO-DIMM slots, one or both preinstalled with 8GB DDR4 stick(s). title: Asus TUF Gaming F15 2023 (13th Gen i7-13700H, RTX 4060, 16GB, 1TB, 15.6" FHD 144Hz )
short_description: Asus has refreshed the TUF Gaming F15 (2023) with Intel 13th Gen CPUs and NVidIA RTX 40-series GPUs. The F15 (FX507VV4) packs the CPU-GPU pair of Intel Core i7-13700H and RTX 4060 GPU (140W). It ships with 16GB of DDR5 RAM and 1TB of SSD storage, both of which are upgradeable.
description:
Asus TUF Gaming F15 (2023) Overview:

Back in January, Asus refreshed the TUF Gaming F15 with the latest 13th Gen Intel "Raptor Lake" processors and NVidIA RTX 4000-series GPU. And now the Intel variant with RTX 4060 is also here. So, let’s get into the specs, features, official price, and availability of the Asus TUF Gaming F15 (2023) laptop with Intel Core-i7 13700H & RTX 4060 in Nepal.

Performance and Memory

First thing first — this new TUF Gaming F15 is powered by an Intel Core i7 13700H CPU with 14 cores, 20 threads, and a maximum boost speed of 5.0GHz. On the graphics front, you get the RTX 4060 with 8GB GDDR6 VRAM and a maximum TGP of 140W, considering the 25W Dynamic Boost.Like last year, all the models come with a MUX switch, allowing users to bypass the integrated GPU for higher graphics performance in gaming. New to this year is the Advanced Optimus, which automates the whole process.

Cooling and Memory

To keep with the added power, the Asus TUF Gaming F15 (2023) comes with improved thermals. The colling setup includes dual Arc Flow fans with 84 blades as sharp as 0.1mm. This results in 13% more airflow compared to last year. In addition, the laptop has up to five copper heat pipes and four exhaust vents.As for memory, the laptops ships with 16GB of DDR5-4800 RAM. The SO-DIMM slots are user-accessible, and you can expand it up to 32GB. Likewise, you can configure the laptop with 2TB PCIe 4.0 SSD storage via the dual M.2 slots.

Design and Display

Although not as significant, Asus has also made changes to the chassis of the new TUF Gaming F15. The 2023 model is smaller than its predecessor and features distinct color options. Mecha Grey and Jager Grey feature two different finishes and logo placement. In addition, it has a single-zone Mini LED illuminated RGB keyboard and a four-way indicator above it. Opening the metal lid, you are greeted with a 15.6-inch IPS screen. Here, you get 144Hz FHD with color coverage of 100% DCI-P3 and 75% Adobe.

Rest of the Specs

Fueling the new TUF Gaming F15 2023 is a 4-cell 90Wh battery. With the fast charging support, it can go from 0% to 50% in just 30 minutes. Connectivity options on the laptop include four USB ports, one HDMI 2.1, one RJ-45, one combo audio jack, and a Kensington lock. The laptop has Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2 for wireless connection. The audio setup includes two 2W speakers with Dolby Atmos and Hi-Res Audio.

title: Asus Zenbook 14 2023 OLED (13th Gen i7-1360P, 16GB, 1TB, 14" 3K 90Hz OLED)
short_description: Asus ZenBook 14 OLED (2023) is a premium ultrabook with a 14\" OLED 3K 90Hz display. It has a 100% DCI-P3 color gamut and the top bezel is home to an FHD webcam with an IR function for Windows Hello login. Powering the Asus ZenBook 14 OLED is Intel's Core i7-1360P. Integrated Iris Xe GPU handles graphics on the laptop. In terms of memory, you can customize it with up to 16GB RAM and 1TB SSD.
description:
Asus Zenbook 14 2023 OLED Overview

The Asus Zenbook 14 2023 OLED is one of the latest laptops from Asus that features a 14-inch 3K OLED display with a 90Hz refresh rate, a 13th Gen Intel Core i7-1360P processor, 16GB of RAM, and a 1TB SSD. Let's head into its short overview.

Display

The display of the Asus Zenbook 14 2023 OLED is undoubtedly the highlight of this laptop. The OLED panel will offer vivid colors, deep blacks, and wide viewing angles with its 3K resolution. Asus has also provided a 90Hz refresh rate for smooth and responsive scrolling. On top of that, you get Dolby Vision, 100% DCI-P3 color gamut, TUV Rheinland certification, and 600 nits of HDR peak brightness on this laptop. for enhanced contrast and brightness.

Design

The Asus Zenbook 14 2023 OLED boasts a stylish and elegant design. It features a robust and lightweight metal frame that is only 1.39kg in weight and 16.9mm thick. The laptop's ErgoLift hinge is a standout feature that slightly elevates the keyboard for an ergonomic typing experience. The backlit keyboard includes a fingerprint scanner integrated into the power button. Additionally, there is a sizeable touchpad that can easily transform into a NumberPad with LED-lit numeric keys.

Performance

The performance of the Asus Zenbook 14 2023 OLED is also quite on the higher side. The laptop is powered by the Intel Core i7-1360P processor. This CPU has 12 cores, 16 threads, and a base frequency of 3.70GHz that can boost up to 5.0GHz. You get an integrated Intel Iris Xe graphics card that can handle some light gaming and video editing. Memory-wise, this particular model gets 16GB of RAM and a 1TB PCIe NVMe Gen 4 SSD that provides fast multitasking and storage.

Battery and Connectivity

Fueling this ultrabook is a 4-cell 75Wh battery that gets charged via the 65W power adapter. The connectivity of the Asus Zenbook 14 2023 OLED is good. You get two Thunderbolt 4 ports that support data transfer, charging, and display output. It also has one USB-A port, one HDMI port, and one headphone jack. Whereas, the wireless connectivity relies on Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2.

Ports, Connectivity, and Battery

The Dell Inspiron 14 7430 2023 also has a range of ports and connectivity options, including two Thunderbolt 4.0 ports, one HDMI port, one USB-A port, and one headphone/microphone combo jack. Furthermore, it has one microSD card reader, Wi-Fi 6E, Bluetooth, and a fingerprint reader.

description:
Here’s a brief overview of the Asus ROG Strix G18 (2024) with Core i9-14900HX CPU and  RTX 4070 graphics.

Asus ROG Strix G18 2024  Overview

Performance and Display

Along with an NVidIA® GeForce RTX™ 4070 Laptop GPU. title: MSI Modern 15 H 2023 (13th Gen i7-13700H, 16GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD)
short_description: The MSI Modern 15 H 2022 (B13M) model has a powerful 13th Gen Intel Core i7-13700H CPU and comes with 16GB of RAM onboard. The other features of this model are similar to its sibling, the Modern 15 H B13M (i5). It has a 15.6-inch IPS LCD panel and an HD front camera for video calls. Graphics are handled by an integrated Iris Xe GPU, and it has a memory configuration of 16GB DDR4 RAM and 512GB of SSD. The weight of the ultrabook is around 1.9kg.
description:
The MSI Modern 15 H (2023) is a portable laptop with a 13th Gen Intel Core i7-13700H for seamless multitasking and up to 1TB SSD storage. One can also enjoy vibrant visuals on its 15.6-inch IPS LCD screen, and stay connected with USB Type-C, WiFi 6, and Bluetooth 5.2.

MSI Modern 15 2023 Overview:

Design and Display:

MSI Modern 15 H 2023 is a portable laptop with dimensions of 359 x 241 x 19.9 mm and a lightweight build at 1.7 kg. It is available in Classic Black and Star Blue colors. Likewise, the device boasts a 15.6-inch IPS LCD screen with a matte, anti-glare finish. Also, it has a Full HD resolution (1920 x 1080), a refresh rate of 60 Hz, and a 16:9 aspect ratio.

Performance and Storage:

MSI Modern 15 H (2023) delivers performance through its 13th Gen Intel Core i7-13700H Processors (Raptor Lake). Moreover, it features 8 E-cores running at a base clock of 1.8 GHz and a boost clock of 3.7 GHz, and 6 P-cores operating at a base clock of 2.4 GHz and a boost clock of 5.0 GHz.Furthermore, the processor houses a 24MB L3 cache for smooth multitasking. Battery and Connectivity:

The laptop is powered by a 3-cell Li-Polymer 54Whr battery, conveniently charged using a 65W AC adapter.MSI Modern 15 H (2023) includes a USB Type-C port with USB 3.2 Gen2 capability for versatile connectivity. An audio jack (3.5mm) combines headphone and microphone input/output, catering to your audio needs.

Rest of the features:

The MSI Modern 15 H (2023) features Wi-Fi 6 (AX201) technology operating on dual bands (2.4/5 GHz). It also supports Bluetooth 5.2 for device pairing. Running on Windows 11, the laptop is equipped with 16GB of installed RAM for smooth multitasking and efficient operations.

title: Lenovo V15 G3 2022 (Intel i5-1235U, 8GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD)
short_description: Lenovo V15 G3 IAP (2022) is an affordable laptop that comes with decent specs and the signature Lenovo design. This laptop has a 15.6-inch FHD panel up front with a 45% NTSC colour gamut. Under the hood, it packs 12th Gen Intel Core i5-1235U coupled with Intel Iris Xe integrated graphics. Additionally, it packs 8GB DDR4-3200 and 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe SSD. You can add 8 more GB of RAM with a SO-DIMM slot while you can swap out a 1TB SSD for the default one. Lastly, this laptop has a 45Wh battery with 65W charging capability.
description:
Are you looking for an affordable laptop as a student or office worker that can pull you through your day-to-day tasks? Then you might want to check out the Lenovo V15 G3 (2022) with an Intel i5-1235U processor.

Lenovo V15 G3 (2022) Overview

Design and Display

The Lenovo V15 G3 (2022) comes in the classic Lenovo design with a monotone finish and the company branding at the edge of the lid on a metallic strip. It comes in an Iron Grey colour option. Moreover, the laptop features a full-size keyboard with a number pad and measures 1.70 kg or more. This thing has also passed the MIL-STD-810H military certification.On the front, we have a 15.6” display with an FHD resolution spanning 1,920 x 1,080 pixels. Additionally, it comes in a 16:9 aspect ratio, has a matte finish with no touchscreen support, and offers a 45% NTSC colour gamut. As per Lenovo, the screen either be a TN panel with 250 nits of peak brightness or an IPS panel with 300 nits of maximum luminosity. Whichever it is, the viewing experience on this display will be passable at best.

Performance

The 12th Gen Intel Core i5-1235U processor handles the primary computing on the Lenovo V15 G3 (2022). This silicone comes with 10 cores eight of which are efficiency cores while the other two are dedicated for performance. Other than that, this processor has 12 threads, a 12MB cache, and a peak clock speed of 4.4 GHz. Meanwhile, the Intel Iris Xe baked inside the chip itself handles the graphics.In addition to that, this laptop comes with 8GB soldered memory. It is a DDR4 RAM with a 3,200 MHz frequency. Similarly, a 512GB SSD handles the storage over here. Furthermore, the Lenovo V15 G3 (2022) offers an attractive amount of upgradability. Even though the memory on this laptop is soldered, it also comes with a SO-DIMM slot with up to 8GB RAM support. On the other hand, you can swap out the M.2 2242 SSD with a 1TB capacity.

The Rest

The Lenovo V15 G3 (2022) comes with an integrated 45Wh cell in the tank. You can juice up the battery with a 65W three-pin round tip charger. For wireless connectivity, you get WiFi 5 as well as Bluetooth v5.1 support. Meanwhile, for the wired connection, you get one ethernet port, one HDMI 1.4b, one 3.5mm combo audio jack, and one power connector. Additional ports include one USB 2.0, one USB 3.2 Gen 1, and one USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 with data transfer, PD, and DP support.

title: Lenovo Legion Pro 5i 2023 (13th Gen i7-13700HX, RTX 4070, 16GB, 1TB, 16" WQXGA 240Hz)
short_description: The Legion 5 Pro is a new series of laptops designed to replace the standard Legion 5 lineup. The first Legion 5 Pro model debuted at CES 2023, featuring 13th Gen Intel i7 "Raptor Lake" processors and RTX 4070 GPUs. Lenovos in-house cooling solution and AI Engine enhance this powerful CPU-GPU combination to optimize FPS in games.
description:
Heres a short description of the design aesthetic, chipset, and battery life of the Lenovo Legion Pro 5i 2023 (16IRX8) laptop with Intel i7, RTX 4070, and 240Hz screen.

Lenovo Legion Pro 5i 2023 (16IRX8) Overview

Design and Display 

The Lenovo Legion Pro 5i 2023 is built like a gaming machine. It featuring an all-aluminum build and weighs a substantial 2.5 kilos. It offers a wide array of ports, including 2 USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C ports (with DisplayPort 1.4), 3 USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 ports, a headphone port, an HDMI 2.1 port, an RJ45 port, and a power-in socket. Moreover, the Lenovo Legion Pro 5i 2023 (16IRX8) boasts a 16" WQXGA (2560 x 1600) display with a high 240Hz refresh rate and a 16:10 aspect ratio. In addition, the keyboard features a custom 4-zone RGB backlight with black keycaps.

Performance and Memory

Alongside the smooth 240Hz screen, the Lenovo Legion 5 Pro 5i 2023 (16IRX8) ensures smooth performance with the combination of Intels 13th-gen i7 processor and NVidIA RTX 4070. The Core i7-13700HX processor has 16 (8 performance + 8 efficiency) cores and 24 threads. It has 30MB of L3 cache. Moreover, it can also go up to 5.0 GHz of max clock speed. As for the GPU, NVidIAs RTX 4070, with a maximum TGP of 140W, can handle graphic-intensive workloads easily.  In addition, Lenovo has also included an LA1 AI chip to improve fps in games.
The laptop features Lenovos Coldfront 4.0 technology to cool the CPU and GPU combo effectively. In addition, the Lenovo Legion Pro 5i 2023 comes with 32GB of fast DDR5 RAM, expandable up to 64GB. Furthermore, it includes two M.2 2280 slots for secondary storage, with one slot already occupied. Besides, the Legion Pro 5i 2023 (16IRX8) is equipped with a 4-cell 80Wh battery that supports Super Rapid Charge, allowing it to reach 80% charge in just 30 minutes using the included 300W adapter.

It is accompanied by 16GB of DDR5 RAM and 1TB NVMe PCI-e Gen 4.0 SSD, which is further expandable up to 64GB and 2TB, respectively. Fueling the setup is a 90Wh battery with a 230W AC adapter.
description:

Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 (2023) Overview:

Design and Display

Kicking off with the design, the Helios Neo 16 2023 wraps a gaming vibe with a fancy RGB keyboard and lights. This time, the display lid houses laser-engraved unique codes for customization. And as for the dimensions, it will go up to 2.49 kg of weight measuring 15.72 x 11.63 x 1.06 in dimensions.On the display side, Acer has provided two options— a 165Hz IPS panel with 2,560 x 1,600 resolutions and 500 nit brightness, as well as a 165Hz panel with 1,920 x 1,200 resolution and 400 nit brightness. Regardless of the resolution, both screens boast 100% sRGB color gamut, Nvidia Advanced Optimus with G-SYNC, and a 3ms response time.

Performance

The laptop gets two options for processors: i5-13500HX and i7-13700HX. This particular model of the Acer Predator Helio 16 Neo (2023) pairs the Intel Core i5-13500HX with RTX 4060. The laptop supports up to 64GB of DDR5 RAM and up to 2TB of NVMe SSD storage.Acer has used a state-of-the-art cooling system here. It includes all-metal 5th gen AeroBlade fan technology plus liquid metal thermal paste for those gaming actions.

Ports and Others

Talking of ports and connectivity, it comes with a range of options. You get 2x Thunderbolt 4 connectors, 3x USB-A 3.2 Gen 2, HDMI 2.1 video out, audio jack & a microSD card reader. Fueling the gaming machine is a 4-cell battery that can last up to 5 hours on a single charge.

description:
Asus TUF Gaming A15 (2022): Overview

Display and Build

Asus TUF Gaming A15 (2022) sports a 15.6″ 165Hz IPS Panel. The screen has a FHD resolution of 1920 x 1080 with a 16:9 aspect ratio. On top of that, it has Adaptive-Sync, a MUX switch, and Optimus. The laptop weighs about 2.2  kilograms and is 354 mm wide, 251 mm deep, and about 23mm high.

Performance

Under the hood, the Asus TUF Gaming A15 (2022) has an AMD Ryzen 7 6800H processor alongside an RTX 2050 GPU. The 8-core 16 Thread CPU can reach a maximum boost clock speed of 4.7 GHz. Complementing that, the 2050 GPU has 4GB GDDR6 VRAM and a total power draw (TGP) of 70W with Dynamic Boost.On the memory front, you get 16GB of DDR5 RAM. You can upgrade it to a maximum of 32GB via the 2 SO-DIMM slots. Alongside that, you get a 512GB M.2 SSD.

Battery and Connectivity

In the tank of the TUF Gaming A15, you will find a 90Wh Lithium Ion battery. It can be charged via the 240W adapter in the box.In terms of port selection, you get 2 USB Type-A ports, two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C port, an HDMI slot, an RJ45 LAN port, and a headphone jack. For wireless connectivity on ASUS TUF Gaming A15, you have your WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2 technology.

It is powered by the Intel Core Ultra 7 256V Lunar Lake processor with 8 cores/threads, Arc graphics, and an AI NPU delivering up to 47 TOPS. description:

Asus Zenbook S 14 OLED 2024 (UX5406SA) Overview

Design and Display

The Asus Zenbook S series is a premium ultrabook lineup, offering a sleek and stylish design. The lid is made of “ceraluminium”, while the rest of the chassis is entirely metal. The Asus Zenbook S 14 OLED 2024 (UX5406SA) is available in two colours: Scandinavian White and Zumia Grey. For portability, it is just 1.1 cm thin and weighs a mere 1.2 kg.The laptop features a Lumina OLED display with accurate colours out of the box, a 120Hz refresh rate, and quick response times. Additionally, it offers 500 nits of brightness for HDR and 400 nits in regular use, alongside certifications for blue light reduction. Although a touch variant exists, the widely available model in Nepal does not support touch or stylus input.

Performance and the rest

Powered by the new Intel Core Ultra 7 256V Lunar Lake chip, the Asus Zenbook S 14 OLED 2024 (UX5406SA) has 8 cores/threads and a boost clock of up to 4.8 GHz. This new architecture provides significant efficiency gains, making it ideal for ultrabooks. The chip also includes improved Arc graphics and a dedicated AI NPU that can deliver up to 47 TOPS. Memory is soldered, with configurations offering up to 32GB LPDDR5X RAM and 1TB of storage. Though there are no additional memory slots, the 16GB/1TB variant should meet most users needs.The Asus Zenbook S 14 OLED 2024 (UX5406SA) includes two Thunderbolt 4 ports, a USB Type-A, HDMI, and an audio jack. Wireless features include Wi-Fi 7 and Bluetooth 5.4, providing the latest in wireless technology for fast connections.

description:
Lenovo is a staple brand in the corporate sector with its sleek and minimal ultrabooks. One of the popular offerings from the brand is their Yoga series with a fully rotatable hinge. Here, we will look at the Lenovo Yoga 7 2-in-1 2024 with the Intel Core Ultra 5 125U processor.

Lenovo Yoga 7 2-in-1 2024 Overview

Design and Display

Here, you get a WUXGA resolution spanning 1,920 x 1,200 pixels. Meanwhile, the display on the Lenovo Yoga 7 2-in-1 has a glossy anti-fingerprint finish and covers a 45% NTSC colour gamut. title: HP Envy x360 2024 (Ryzen 5 8640HS, 16GB, 512GB, 14" WUXGA Touch)
short_description: HP Envy x360 is a convertible laptop that comes in an aluminum chassis. On the front, you get a 14-inch touchscreen IPS panel with WUXGA resolution. description:
Are you looking for a convertible laptop without making much of a compromise on the performance side of things? Then you might want to check out the 2024 update of the HP Envy x360 that comes with the Ryzen 5 8640HS processor.

HP Envy x360 2024 Overview

Design and Display

As I mentioned earlier, the HP Envy x360 2024 is a convertible laptop with a fully rotatable hinge. As such, it can be used in many ways, adding to your convenience. The laptop is built with an aluminium frame and ships in a single Natural Silver colour option. Additionally, it comes with two USB Type-A, one USB Type-C, a HDMI, a microSD card reader, and a combo audio jack as port options.On the front, this laptop dons a 14-inch touch screen. The panel on the HP Envy x360 2024 is an IPS LCD with WUXGA resolution, 300 nits peak brightness, and a 62.5% sRGB colour gamut.

Performance

The Ryzen 5 8640HS processor spearheads the performance side of things on the HP Envy x360 2024. It is one of the latest silicon from the company that packs 10 cores, 12 threads, and a 12MB L3 cache. Other than that, it can clock at a peak frequency of 5GHz. In the meantime, the integrated Intel Graphics handles the graphical duties on this laptop.Likewise, additional performance hardware includes 16GB memory coupled with 512GB storage. The RAM here is a LPDDR5-6400 unit while the SSD is an NVMe PCIe Gen 4. The company does not clarify the upgradability of the device, hence, it is better if you consult with the vendor regarding this subject. On the software front, the HP Envy x360 2024 boots on Windows 11 Home. Similarly, it draws its power from a 59Wh battery that supports 65W charging speed.

title: Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch M4 Pro (2024)
short_description: The MacBook Pro 14-inch (2024) is for power users needing top-notch performance, thanks to the M4 Pro chip, 120Hz XDR display, and plenty of ports. Creative pros and multitaskers will love it, but casual users or students might find it overkill for the price.
description:
Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch M4 Pro (2024)

Design and Display 

The new MacBook Pro 14-inch retains the design introduced in 2021. It features a casing made from 100% recycled aluminum. The dimensions are 1.55 cm * 31.26 cm * 22.12 cm, with a weight of 1.55 kg for the M4 model. Customers can choose between two color options: Silver and Space Black.The device is equipped with a Liquid Retina XDR display. It supports a sustained brightness of 1000 nits and peaks at 1600 nits for HDR content. The display also offers ProMotion technology, allowing for adaptive refresh rates of up to 120Hz.

Processor

This MacBook Pro features the M4 Pro chip with up to a 14-core CPU, 20-core GPU, 48GB of unified memory, and 4TB of storage. However, the only available variant in Nepal currently comes with 24GB of memory and 512GB of storage.

Ports and Memory

The new 14-inch MacBook Pro includes three Thunderbolt/USB 4 ports, MagSafe 3, HDMI, an SDXC card slot, and a 3.5mm headphone jack. This is an increase from two Thunderbolt/USB 4 ports in the base M3 model. The base memory has been upgraded to 16GB, up from 8GB in the previous model.On the Pro or Max variant, the Type-C ports are faster than Thunderbolt 5s with up to 120 Gbps speeds, which are over 3x quicker than the Thunderbolt 4 ports. There’s

Camera Specifications

The device comes with a 12MP Center Stage camera. This feature ensures that the user remains centered during video calls. Additionally, the camera supports Desk View

title: Acer Aspire 5 2022 (12th Gen i5-1235U, 8GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD)
short_description: Aspire 5 2022 (A515-57) is the latest budget laptop from Acer. It build on last year's model with the latest 12th Gen Intel processors. This particular model packs the deca-core Core i5-1235U with two performance cores and eight efficiency cores. Here, the P-cores have support for hyper-threading, taking the thread count. Acer has even added support for Thunderbolt 4 on this laptop. Other aspects of the Acer Aspire 5 2022 (A515-57) is quite similar to its predcessor.
description:
The Acer Aspire series is known for being a budget-friendly option that suits students and professionals who need a laptop for everyday tasks. This model of Acer Aspire 5 (2022) equipping 12th Gen Intel Core i5-1235U processor, reflects a balance between performance and usability. Its display, connectivity options, and features make it a practical choice.

Acer Aspire 5 (2022) Overview:

Display and Design

The laptop features a 15.6-inch IPS LCD display with a Full HD resolution of 1920 x 1080. The anti-glare matte finish ensures comfortable viewing in various lighting conditions. With a thickness of 17.90 mm and a weight of 1.77 kg, it's designed for easy portability. Color options include Gold, Blue, and Black.What's more is, this non-touchscreen display has a 60Hz refresh rate and a maximum brightness of 250 nits. The 45% NTSC color gamut indicates decent color accuracy.

Performance and Memory

This Acer Aspire 5 (2022) model features the power of a 12th Gen Intel Core i5-1235U processor paired with Iris Xe integrated graphics for everyday tasks.Moreover, it primarily comes with 8GB DDR4 RAM (expandable up to 32GB) and houses a 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe SSD for storage offering two SSD slots in total for future expansion.

Keyboard and other I/O devices

The laptop comes with a familiar chiclet keyboard and a multi-touch trackpad for smooth navigation. Furthermore, it incorporates a 720p HD webcam, stereo speakers, and dual-array microphones, for video calls and audio interactions.

Battery and Connectivity

The Acer Aspire 5 (2022) model features a 3-cell 50 Wh Li-ion battery. It includes a 65W AC adapter for convenient charging.Also, the laptop offers a selection of ports, including 1 USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, 1 Thunderbolt 4 USB Type-C (supporting DisplayPort and Power Delivery), and 1 HDMI 1.4 for display connectivity. Additionally, it provides a 3.5mm headphone/microphone I/O jack, an SD card reader, and an Ethernet port. This device enhances connectivity through WiFi 6E (802.11 ax 2x2) and Bluetooth 5.2.

The Acer Swift 5 (2021) brings a chiclet-style keyboard with backlighting and a Windows Precision trackpad for navigation. The laptop comes with a 720p HD webcam for video calls and online meetings and additionally, it boasts stereo speakers to deliver audio output.

title: HiFuture Zone 2
short_description: The HiFuture Zone 2 is a general smartwatch that does not have much separating it from the crowd. It comes with IP68 water and dust resistance, a silicone strap and a 1.96-inch screen with an IPS panel. Other than that, it offers over 100 sports modes and watch faces along with a Bluetooth calling feature. It can last you an average of 7 days on a single charge.
description:
Are you looking for a smartwatch that offers you all the basics and has subtle aesthetics? Then the HiFuture Zone 2 might just be the one for you!

HiFuture Zone 2 Overview

Design and Display

The HiFuture Zone 2 is like the regular guy of the smartwatch world. This watch does not have anything extra going on, hence, it is not very eye-catching. It comes in a regular squircle body with small lugs where you attach the silicone strap. It ships in three colour options: Black, Pink, and Silver White. The watch case also comes in a similar shade to the strap colour. Other than that, it boasts IP68 water and dust resistance for added durability.Meanwhile, on the front, this smartwatch comes with a 1.96-inch IPS panel stretching 240 x 286 pixels in resolution. The company does not mention other key aspects of the screen. However, they assure a “world of clarity and vivid colours” with the HiFuture Zone 2. Though it is not as vibrant as an AMOLED screen, an IPS LCD is still a solid second-best option you would want to look at. Thus, the company claims should hold some water.

Features and the rest

This smartwatch comes with a decent selection of health and fitness tracking features. Which includes over 100 sports tracking modes including walking, treadmill, outdoor cycling, rowing machine, elliptical and so on. With a wide selection of sports modes, the HiFuture Zone 2 will keep up with your fitness journey.In the meantime, for health tracking, this watch tracks your heart rate, sleeping patterns, and stress level. There is no information on the blood oxygen saturation reading feature on this watch. Other than health and fitness tracking, the HiFuture Ultra 3 offers a wireless calling feature over Bluetooth. The company has not specified the Bluetooth version this smartwatch running on. Lastly, this smartwatch is capable of offering you 7 days of usage.

Design

Display

As the name suggests, Acer Swift Go 14 (2023) sports a 14" WQXGA+ (2880x1800) OLED display with deep blacks and high contrast. Besides that, it has narrow bezels and a high screen-to-body ratio of 86%. The screen also has 100% DCI-P3 color gamut coverage, which means it can reproduce accurate and vivid colors for any content. Furthermore, it also supports Acer's BlueLightShield technology, which reduces eye strain by filtering out harmful blue light.

Performance

The Acer Swift Go 14 (2023) has a 13th Gen Intel Core i5-13500H CPU. The laptop supports up to 2TB of M.2 SSD storage and Wi-Fi 6E connectivity for blazing-fast internet. Whether you are working on multiple tasks, light photo editing, or browsing the web, the Acer Swift Go (2023) with i5 can handle it with its integrated graphics.

Ports and Battery

Talking of the port options, there are 2x USB-Cs, 2x USB Type-As, and a HDMI 2.1 port for connectivity. Sadly, there is no Thunderbolt 4 port. The laptop gets its juice from a 50Wh battery.

title: Acer Nitro V 16 2024 (Ryzen 7 8845HS, RTX 4050, 16GB, 512GB, 16" WUXGA 165Hz)
short_description: The Acer Nitro V 16 (ANV16-41) is perfect if you want a large screen for gaming and work, with powerful performance from its AMD Ryzen 7 8845HS processor and NVidIA GeForce RTX 4050 graphics. Whether you enjoy gaming or need to tackle heavy tasks, this laptop delivers smooth performance and reliability.
description:
Check out this Acer Nitro V 16 (2024) powered by AMD Ryzen 7 8845HS and RTX 4050.

Acer Nitro V 16 (ANV16-41) Overview

Design and Display

The Acer Nitro V 16 comes in a similar design to its other Nitro V 15 siblings. It features the company logo on the centre of the lid and vents under the hinge. Meanwhile, it also comes with an RGB backlit keyboard with a numpad on the front.In terms of display, Acer is giving us two options to choose from i.e. WQXGA or WUXGA. Either way, it will be a 16-inch screen with a 165Hz refresh rate measuring a response time of 3ms. Acer has not mentioned the type of panel this laptop will feature. However, from our experience with gaming laptops, we assume it to be an IPS LCD panel.

Performance

This Acer Nitro V 16 (2024) ships with an AMD Ryzen 7 8845HS CPU alongside an RTX 4050 GPU.Furthermore, the Acer Nitro V 16 (ANV16-41) also feature a DDR5 RAM of up to 32 GB clocking in at 5,600 MHz. Similarly, it also has up to 2 TB of PCIe 4.0 SSD storage. Moreover, a dual-fan cooling system helps this laptop keep cool while providing optimum performance. It will ship with Windows 11 out of the box on the software front.

Connectivity and the rest

The Acer Nitro V 16 comes with decent options of ports with a full-function USB 4 Type-C, two USB 3 Type-A, an HDMI port, and a headphone jack. In terms of wireless connectivity, we will be getting WiFi 6E as well as unspecified Bluetooth version support. Meanwhile, it features speakers with DTS:X Ultra support.

description:
Are you looking for an affordable laptop that does not compromise much on the performance side of things? Then Acer Aspire Lite 15 (AL15-52) with Intel Core i5-1235U processor might just be the one for you.

Acer Aspire Lite 15 (AL15-52) Overview

Design and Display

The Acer Aspire Lite 15 (AL15-52) has a sleek and modern design with a compact build, making it an ideal choice for everyday use. Weighing just 1.59 kg and measuring 1.99 cm in thickness, it is highly portable and perfect for users on the go. The steel grey colour adds to its professional look.Meanwhile, the Acer Aspire Lite 15 (AL15-52) has a 15.6-inch Full HD display. It is a TFT LCD with the Acer ComfyView finish that minimises glare on the screen. With a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels, the screen delivers crisp images, suitable for both work and entertainment. However, since this laptop has a TFT LCD panel, it has poor viewing angles.

Performance

Equipped with a 12th-generation Intel Core i5-1235U processor, the Acer Aspire Lite 15 (AL15-52) ensures reliable performance for a variety of tasks. The processor features 10 cores and 12 threads, with a maximum turbo boost of up to 4.4 GHz. This makes the laptop well-suited for multitasking and everyday computing needs. For graphics, the Intel Iris Xe Graphics integrated into the system provides basic support for media consumption and light gaming.Furthermore, the Acer Aspire Lite 15 (AL15-52) has 8GB of DDR4 RAM, providing smooth operation. Storage is handled by a 512GB NVMe PCIe Gen3 SSD, ensuring fast boot times and quick access to files and programs. The 36Wh battery offers reasonable power, with enough charge to last through most of the day depending on usage.
