title: Acer Predator Helios 18 2024 (13th Gen i9-14900HX, RTX 4080, 16GB, 1TB, 18" WQXGA 240Hz)
short_description: The Predator Helios 16 2023 is a gaming machine from Acer for 2023. It boasts a 18-inch LED-backlit LCD panel with a 240Hz refresh rate. Fueling the laptop is a 90Wh battery with 300W of fast charging support. This specific model gets the horsepower of a 14th Gen Intel Core i9-14900HX CPU under the hood. For those gaming actions, Acer has paired the CPU with an NVidIA RTX 4080 GPU with 12GB GDDR6 VRAM. Furthermore, you get 16GB of DDR5 RAM and 1TB NVMe PCIe Gen 4.0 SSD on board.
description:
In this short overview, lets get into the specs, features, prices, and availability of the Acer Predator Helios 18 (2024) with 13th Gen Intel Core i9-14900HX and RTX 4080.

Acer Predator Helios 18 (2024) Overview

Design and Display 

Being an 18-inch gaming machine, the Predator Helios is a chunker weighing over 3 kilos and occupying quite a footprint. It features a multi-color Predator logo on the lid followed by similar RGB strips on the bottom. You got your two Thunderbolt 4s at the back, alongside an HDMI, and a power jack. The rest of the Type-A, SD card slot, and ethernet options are divided across the sides.The screen on the Predator Helios 18 is especially impressive given that you can go with a mini-LED panel running at a whopping 250Hz with up to 1000 nits of brightness all across. The WQXGA resolution sports a 16:10 ratio and the screen is creative-ready with its accurate 100% DCI-P3 colors.

Performance and Memory 

Under the hood, the Acer Predator Helios 18 (2024) from Acer ships witht the 14th gen Core i9 14900HX Raptor Lake refresh CPU with 24 Cores, 32 Threads, and a boost clock of 5.8GHz paired with the RTX 4080 (12GB) from NVidIA drawing up to 175W of power. Complementing that, you get plenty of RAM (up to 64GB DDR5)  and storage (up to 2TB NVME Gen 4)  for your games and other files. With such a powerful combo, the Helios 18 is sure to provide desktop-grade performance with the added benefit of being mobile. Besides gaming at ridiculously high frame rates, it’s plenty capable of editing at 4k, rendering animations, or dabbling in 3d modeling.Things are kept under wraps by a combination of 5th Gen AeroBlade fans and liquid metal on the GPU and GPU that help keep the temperatures in check.

Connectivity and Extras

Moving on to the rest of the stuff, you get WiFi 7 support, AI-based noise reduction, tons of RGB customization, and a large 90 Wh battery. The laptop ships with a 330W brick to provide sufficient juice to the system and the maximum quoted runtime is 5.5 hours on the company’s website.The colorful keyboard is an eyecatcher with its individual-lit keys and ‘MAGSPEED’ WASD accents. Acer claims that their patented Magclick tech uses a mechanical switch with short key travel for satisfying mechanical feedback as well as shorter actuation for faster clicks.

title: Nothing Phone (2a)
short_description: The Nothing Phone (2a) features a 6.7-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate and 394 PPI density. Powered by MediaTek’s Dimenstiy 7200 Pro SoC, it offers smooth performance and runs on Nothing OS 2.5 based on Android 14. With 12GB RAM + 8GB virtual RAM and 128/256GB storage, it promises longevity with 3 years of major OS updates and 4 years of security updates. Its camera setup includes a 50MP main and ultrawide lens, capable of 4K video recording, along with a 32MP selfie shooter. The phone also features a 5000mAh battery with 45W fast charging and connectivity options like 5G, WiFi 6, Bluetooth 5.3, NFC, and a USB Type-C 2.0 port, with an in-display fingerprint scanner for security.
description:
Nothing Phone (2a) Overview

Display

The Nothing Phone (2a) sports a 6.7-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate. This FHD+ display bears a 394 PPI density, 10-bit colors, and 1300 units of peak brightness.

Performance and Storage

Under the hood, this smartphone features Meditatek’s Dimenstiy 7200 Pro SoC. It’s an octa-core processor built on TSMC’s 2nd gen 4nm node featuring 2 Cortex A715 prime cores (@2.8GHz) and 6 Cortex A510 secondary cores (@2.0 GHz).Likewise, the Pro moniker stands for the joint collaboration with Mediatek engineers for better software and hardware integration. On the GPU side, there’s Arm Mali-G610 MC4 and HyperEngine 5.0 for handling graphical workloads. To keep the thermals in check, Nothing has provided an advanced liquid cooling system.Software-wise, the Phone (2a) boots on Nothing OS 2.5 built on top of Android 14. And the company is promising 3 years of major OS updates and 4 years of security updates. Memory-wise, it comes with 12GB RAM + 8GB virtual RAM and 128/256GB of internal storage.

Camera

In terms of optics, you get a 50MP main camera of 1/1.15 inch sensor with OIS coupled with a 50MP ultrawide camera of a 1/2.76″ sensor size, which is the same one from the Phone (2). The main camera supports video shooting up to 4K@30 fps. Upfront, you get a 32MP selfie shooter.

Battery, Charging, and Others

Fueling the phone is a 5000mAh battery, accompanied by 45W of fast charging. Talking of the connectivity options here, you get 5G, WiFi 6, Bluetooth 5.3, GPS, NFC, and a USB Type-C 2.0 port. Furthermore, there is an in-display fingerprint scanner for biometrics security.

title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4
short_description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 4 is largely identical to its predecessor, but it does offer some quality of life improvements. It's design remains same as the Fold 3, yet it is 3% lighter at 263 gm, down from 271 gm. The display is nearly identical too, with 2X Dynamic AMOLED, 120Hz refresh rate, and LTPO 2.0. But the brand has changed the aspect ratio of the cover display from 25:9 to 21.6:18, which reduces letterboxing in the screen. The foldable is powered by TSMC's 4 nm-based Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1 chipset. On the back, there is a triple camera setup with a 50MP main camera, a 10MP telephoto shooter, and a 12MP ultra-wide lens. For selfies, you get a 10MP sensor on the cover screen and a 4MP under-display camera on the inner display. Moreover, it comes with a 4400mAh Li-Po battery that supports 25W wired fast charging. The phone is available in three memory configurations: 12/256GB, 12/512GB and 12GB/1TB.

description:
Are you looking for a powerful machine with the latest and greatest hardware? Then you will surely find the Acer Predator Triton Neo 16 2024 (PTN16-51-96GK) with Intel Core Ultra 9 185H and NVidIA GeForce RTX 4060 interesting.

Acer Predator Triton Neo 16 2024 (PTN16-51-96GK) Overview

Design and Display

Despite being a gaming beast the Acer Predator Triton Neo 16 2024 (PTN16-51-96GK) maintains a subtle look with a Silver colouring. Performance and the rest

title: Promate Lima
short_description: The Promate Lima are regular earbuds for the most part. You get a half-in-ear design with a long stem. The charging case is also elongated and ovular in shape. It comes with a standard IPX4 rating, 13mm dual drivers, and relatively new Bluetooth v5.3 connectivity. There isnt anything amazing battery-wise either, you get a 40 mAh cell on the buds, and a 300 mAh piece in the case. With this, you get up to 30 hours of combined usage. While the earbuds themselves dont look like much, its what you get in the box that sets them apart. You get a magnetic earphone strap as well as a soft silicone protective case with the Promate Lima, which is pretty cool! Dont you think?
description:
Promate, a Taiwanese accessories brand, offers an extensive range of products, spanning from earbuds to chargers. Among its lineup is the Promate Lima TWS earbuds. Lets take a brief look at what they have to offer.

Promate Lima Overview

Design

These earbuds feature a half-in-ear design with an elongated stem. They are accompanied by a charging case that comes in an ovular shape and is also on the longer end. A circular marking atop the stem serves as dedicated touch controls. Moreover, the Promate Lima sports an IPX4 rating, ensuring resistance against water exposure from any direction. They are available in two colour variants: Black, and White.A notable aspect of the Promate Lima earbuds lies in their packaging. A typical earbud package includes a charging cable, silicone tips, and sometimes a pouch. These earbuds have gone a step further by including a magnetic earphone strap and a soft silicone protective case. The former allows users to attach the buds for use as a neckband, while the latter safeguards the charging case from scratches.

Audio and Features

The Promate Lima comes equipped with dual 13mm drivers for audio delivery. Additionally, these earbuds also feature environmental noise cancellation through in-built high-quality microphones. Powered by an AD6973D4 chipset, they offer Bluetooth v5.3 for wireless connectivity, along with a Quick Pairing feature and access to phone voice assistants.In the battery department, each bud houses a 40 mAh cell, while the charging case boasts a larger 300 mAh unit. This configuration provides up to 7 hours of usage on a single charge. You get an additional 23 hours of playback when you combine it with the case. The charging time of the Promate Lima, when the battery runs low, is quite decent as well. It takes just 90 minutes to fill up via the USB Type-C interface.

short_description: The Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 2024 (PHN16-72-97FL) is a gaming machine with the power of 14th Gen i9-14900HX CPU and RTX 4070 GPU under the hood. There is a 16\" LED-backlit IPS LCD panel with a 240Hz refresh rate on this variant. It is accompanied by 16GB of DDR5-5600 RAM and 1TB NVMe PCI-e Gen 4.0 SSD respectively. description:
If you are looking for a laptop that offers sheer raw power then you might want to take a look at the Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 2024  with an Intel Core i9-14900HX processor and RTX 4070 graphics card. Lets take a brief look at the laptop here:

Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 2024 Overview

Design and Display

The Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 2024 (PHN16-72-97FL) comes in all that all gamers look complete with an RGB keyboard and beefy bulk. It can go up to 27.60mm in thickness and weighs two and a half kilos. The port selection on this laptop includes a HDMI, two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, one USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A and Type-C each, and an ethernet jack.As the name suggests, the Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 2024 sports a 16-inch display with WQXGA resolution. The panel here is an IPS with an Acer ComfyView finish. Additionally, it also comes with a high refresh rate of 240Hz and 100% DCI-P3 wide colour gamut support.

Performance

The Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 2024 (PHN16-72-97FL) comes with the latest Intel Core i9-14900HX coupled with NVidIA GeForce RTX 4070 under the hood. This processor comes with 24 cores, 32 threads, and a 36MB L3 cache. In the meantime, it can clock in between 1.6GHz and 5.8GHz depending on the situation. The dedicated graphics card is equipped with 8GB GDDR.Further performance hardware on the Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 2024 (PHN16-72-97FL) includes 16GB DDR5-5600 RAM and 1TB NVMe Gen 4 SSD. The company has not clarified the upgradability of the laptop, however, gaming laptops are usually upgradable. Hence, it should also offer hardware expansion probably on the same numbers as the last-gen offerings. In the tank, you get a 90Wh battery while the charging speed reaches 230W.

short_description: The Acer Nitro V 16 (ANV16-41) is perfect if you want a large screen for gaming and work, with powerful performance from its AMD Ryzen 7 8845HS processor and NVidIA GeForce RTX 3050 graphics. Whether you enjoy gaming or need to tackle heavy tasks, this laptop delivers smooth performance and reliability.
description:
Check out this Acer Nitro V 16 (2024) powered by AMD Ryzen 7 8845HS and RTX 3050.

Acer Nitro V 16 (ANV16-41) Overview

Design and Display

The Acer Nitro V 16 comes in a similar design to its other Nitro V 15 siblings. It features the company logo on the centre of the lid and vents under the hinge. Meanwhile, it also comes with an RGB backlit keyboard with a numpad on the front.In terms of display, Acer is giving us two options to choose from i.e. WQXGA or WUXGA. Either way, it will be a 16-inch screen with a 165Hz refresh rate measuring a response time of 3ms. Acer has not mentioned the type of panel this laptop will feature. However, from our experience with gaming laptops, we assume it to be an IPS LCD panel.

Performance

This Acer Nitro V 16 (2024) ships with an AMD Ryzen 7 8845HS CPU alongside an RTX 3050 GPU.Furthermore, the Acer Nitro V 16 (ANV16-41) also feature a DDR5 RAM of up to 32 GB clocking in at 5,600 MHz. Similarly, it also has up to 2 TB of PCIe 4.0 SSD storage. Moreover, a dual-fan cooling system helps this laptop keep cool while providing optimum performance. It will ship with Windows 11 out of the box on the software front.

Connectivity and the rest

The Acer Nitro V 16 comes with decent options of ports with a full-function USB 4 Type-C, two USB 3 Type-A, an HDMI port, and a headphone jack. In terms of wireless connectivity, we will be getting WiFi 6E as well as unspecified Bluetooth version support. Meanwhile, it features speakers with DTS:X Ultra support.

title: Lenovo Yoga Slim 7i Carbon 2021 (11th Gen i7 1165G7, 16GB, 1TB, 13.3" WQXGA)
short_description: Lenovo Yoga Slim 7i Carbon is a premium ultrabook powered by the 11th Gen Intel Core processor. It gets its name from the 2nd Gen Web-Core 2.0 Fiber that helps maintain a light form factor. In fact, the laptop weighs just 966 grams and measures just 15mm in thickness. Even with the portable design, Lenovo Yoga Slim 7i has managed Military Grade MIL-STD-810G certification. Furthermore, it brings a 14-inch glossy QHD screen with Dolby Vision. It has two Thunderbolt 4 ports for display output and boasts up to 15 hours of endurance.
description:
Lenovo Yoga Slim 7i Carbon (2021) Overview :

Here’s a brief overview of the design aesthetic, chipset, and battery life of Lenovo Yoga Slim 7i Carbon 2021 with the i7 chipset.

Design and Display

Lenovo Yoga Slim 7i Carbon is a premium ultrabook that gets its name from the 2nd Gen Web-Core 2.0 Fiber which helps maintain a light form factor. In fact, the laptop weighs just 966 grams and measures just 15mm in thickness. Even with the portable design, Lenovo Yoga Slim 7i has managed Military Grade MIL-STD-810G certification. Furthermore, it brings a 14-inch glossy QHD screen with Dolby Vision. The panel covers 100% of the DCI-P3 color gamut and can hit up to 300 nits of brightness.

Performance and Memory 

Under the hood, Lenovo Yoga Slim 7i Carbon (2021) features an 11th Gen Intel Core i7-1165G7 processor. On the other hand, the integrated Intel Iris Xe GPU handles the graphics part. In terms of memory, you get 16GB of non-upgradable DDR4 RAM and 1TB of M.2 SSD.

Connectivity and Extras

The Lenovo Yoga  Slim 7i  Carbon ships with standard WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.1 technology. It houses a 50Wh-rated lithium-polymer battery and comes with a 65W USB-C adapter in the box. With that cell(s), the laptop boasts up to 15 hour of endurance. On the I/O front, Lenovo Yoga Slim 7i Carbon features two Thunderbolt 4, and a single USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C port.

title: Lenovo Legion 5i Pro 2022 (12th Gen i7 12700H, RTX 3060, 16GB, 1TB, 16" WQXGA 165Hz)
short_description: Legion 5 Pro is the best gaming laptop that Lenovo has to offer. The 2022 iteration of the laptop brings an all-aluminum design, Intel Core 12th Generation CPUs, and RTX 30-series GPUs. The CPU-GPU combo is paired with Lenovo's in-house cooling solution and AI Engine to maximize fps in games.
description:
Lenovo Legion 5 Pro 2022 Overview :

Here's a brief description of the build, chipset, and battery life of the Lenovo Legion 5 Pro 2022 with i7 & RTX 3060.

Build and Display 

Lenovo Legion 5 Pro (2022) has the build of a gaming machine. It has an all-aluminum build and weighs a hefty 2.5 kilos. The wide 16" display of WQXGA (2560x1080) resolution has a high 165Hz refresh rate. It has a tall 16:10 aspect ratio as well. The keyboard has a custom 4 Zone RGB backlight, whereas the keycaps are black in color.

Performance and Memory

This laptop is powered by Intel's 12th gen i7 processor. The Core i7-12700H processor has 14 (6 performance + 8 efficiency) cores and 20 threads. It has 24MB of L3 cache. It can also go up to 4.7GHz of max clock speed. As for the GPU, NVidIA's RTX 3060, with a maximum TGP of 140W, can handle graphic-intensive workloads easily. It has Lenovo's Coldfront 4.0 technology to cool this CPU/GPU combo.Lenovo Legion 5 pro 2022 ships with 16GB of fast DDR5 RAM, which can be further upgraded to up to 32GB.There are 2 M.2 2280 slots for secondary memory, one of which is preoccupied.

Battery and Connectivity 

Legion 5 Pro (2022) packs a 4-cell 80Wh battery that lasted about 6 hours (hybrid mode) on MobileMark 2018 test. It supports Super Rapid Charge, which can charge the cells up to 80% in 30 minutes via the 135W adapter that ships in the box.As for the ports, you get a lot— a USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C (with DisplayPort1.4) on the left, a USB-A 3.2 Gen 1, a headphone port, and an E-Shutter button on the right. Similarly, there are two USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 (1 always-on), one USB-A 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C (with DisplayPort 1.4, Power supply), one HDMI 2.1, one RJ45, and a power-in socket on the back.

title: Vivo V27e
short_description: The Vivo V27e is the most affordable offering of the latest V27 lineup. This phone comes with a minimalistic aesthetic design that looks premium. It is a sleek, light phone with a 7.7mm thickness and 185g weight. It brings a 6.62-inch AMOLED with a 120Hz refresh rate. The camera is the main highlight of this phone. It comes with the same 64MP triple camera setup at the back as its predecessor. But Vivo has integrated aura ring light in all of the phones in this lineup. In case you don't know Aura Ring Light intelligently detects low ambient light and adds brightness for radiant and delicate complexions. Similar to its predecessor, it is powered by a MediaTek Helio G99 processor. Currently, it is available in a single 8/256GB variant. Furthermore, it comes with pre-installed Android 13 with FuntouchOS 13 on top. It is fueled by a 4600mAh battery which supports 66W fast charging.

title: Lenovo Yoga Slim 7 Pro 2022 (12th gen i7 12700H, MX550, 16GB, 1TB, 14" 2.8K OLED)
short_description: Lenovo Yoga Slim 7 Pro 2022 (14IAH7) is a premium ultrabook powered by Intel's 12th Gen Core i7-12700H  processor. It is a lightweight machine weighing in at just 1.3 kg. It comes with 16 GB of fast DDR5 RAM and 1 TB M.2 2280 SSD. It has a great 2.8k OLED display and premium build quality. This is Lenovo's offering to creative professionals seeking a sleek and portable everyday carry.
description:
Lenovo Yoga Slim 7 Pro 2022 (i7) Overview :

Lenovo Yoga Slim 7 Pro, Slim 7 Pro, or Slim 7i Pro is a premium ultrabook with a great display and decent battery life. It weighs just under 1.4 kilos, making it an ideal everyday carry. With its fast memory and capable processor, it'll breeze through most school or office work. Here's a brief description of the build, chipset, and connectivity options on the Lenovo Yoga Slim 7 Pro 2022 (i7).

Design and Build 

Since the Slim 7 Pro is a premium device, you can expect a flagship-grade build. Both the top and bottom of the laptop are made up of aluminum. The 14" screen is a 2.8k OLED panel of (2880x1800) resolution. It is a 90 Hz display that covers 100% sRGB gamut. Slim 7 Pro's display supports Dolby Vision, has an Anti-glare finish, and can reach 400 nits of brightness. The laptop's 180° hinge allows it to lay fully horizontally across a table.

Performance and Memory 

Under the hood, Yoga Slim 7 Pro sports Intel's 12 Gen Core i7-12700H processor. It features a dedicated Geforce MX550 GPU, which makes it reliable when handling some graphics workloads. The RAM is top-of-the-line LPDDR5 memory. This variant comes with 16GB of this DDR5 RAM and 1TB of M.2 SSD.

Connectivity and Extras

The Lenovo Yoga Slim 7 Pro ships with the industry standard WIFI  6 and Bluetooth 5.1 technology. It houses a 61Wh-rated lithium-polymer battery and comes with a 100Wh charging adapter in the box. It can provide up to 8 and a half hours of local 1080p video playback at 150 nits of brightness. As for the ports, you get a single USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A port (always on), 2 USB C ports (1x USB 3.2 Gen 2, 1x USB4, which supports 40Gbps data transfer), and one 3.5mm port.

title: Lenovo IdeaPad 3 2022 (Ryzen 5 5625U, 16GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD)
short_description: The 2022 iteration of the Lenovo IdeaPad 3 (15ABA7) is among the best mainstream laptops for students and officers that balances power, build quality and affordability. This particular laptop is powered by AMD's Ryzen 5625U processor with integrated Radeon Vega graphics. It comes with 16GB RAM and 512GB SSD. The cool thing about this laptop is that it can have up to 2TB of storage if you choose to install a 1TB 2.5\" HDD and upgrade the SSD to 1 TB. It features a 15.6\" FHD LCD panel enclosed inside a plastic chassis, which feels robust nonetheless.
description:
Lenovo Ideapad 3 (2022): Overview

Here's a brief description of the design aesthetic, processor, and battery life of the Lenovo IdeaPad 3 (2022) laptop with the Ryzen 5 processor.

Design and Build 

Despite being in the budget laptop category, Lenovo Ideapad 3 looks much like a premium device. Its brushed matte finish gives it a polished look. It is well-built with no hinge or flexing issues. It's not cumbersome at 1.63 kilos and is pretty convenient to use.The large 15.6" display is an IPS panel of FHD resolution (1920x1080). It can go up to 300 nits in brightness and covers 45% of the NTSC color gamut. The keyboard, unfortunately, lacks a backlight and the trackpad is a bit off-center.

Performance and Memory

The Lenovo Ideapad  3 2022 is powered by Ryzen's 5000 series processor. The Ryzen 5 5625U may not be top of a line processor but it's no slug either. If you're purchasing this laptop for school work or for the office, it should deliver quite satisfactorily. Having said that, the Intel variant of the same laptop is a better deal when it comes to Price/Performance ratio.This laptop comes with 16GB of DDR4RAM, but it can't be upgraded any further. At purchase, you get 512GB of M.2 2280 SSD for long-term storage. The fun part is you can replace that SSD with a 1TB now and also add an additional 2.5" HDD. So you can have up to 2 TB of storage on Lenovo IdeaPad 3 2022 (1TB SSD + 1TB HDD).

Battery and Connectivity 

Lenovo Ideapad 3 15ABA7 ships with a 38Wh battery. It's not a very big battery, but it can still play local 1080p video for up to 13.3 hours at 150 nits of brightness. It performed decently on the MobileMark 2018 benchmark lasting a total of 8.5 hours.As for port selection, you get an old-fashioned USB 2 type-A port, a USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A port, a USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 port, an HDMI 1.4b port, a Card reader, and a 3.5mm headphone/microphone jack. For wireless connectivity, you have your standard Wifi 6 and Bluetooth 5.1 technology.

title: Ultima Soundbox S20 Speaker

It features RGB ring lights, company branding, and controls on top, with rings for attaching a strap. The speaker delivers 20W audio output, includes built-in microphones for calls and voice assistants, and supports Bluetooth 5.3 and TWS pairing for stereo sound. It charges via USB-C and takes 4.5 hours to fully charge.
description:
Here is a quick overview of Ultima Soundbox S20!

Ultima Soundbox S20 Overview

Design

The Ultima Soundbox S20 is cylindrical in shape, has a mesh texture throughout, and is IPX5-rated. The front has company branding, and the controls are on top. Alongside the controls are two rings to hook a carrying strap, making it highly portable. Furthermore, the Ultima Soundbox S20 has RGB ring lights on either end.

This means the Ultima Soundbox S20 offers 20W output.The  speaker come with built-in microphones allowing you to receive calls and access voice assistants.The S20 enjoys the newer 5.3 version of the connectivity platform. title: Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 4 2022 (Ryzen 7 5825U, 16GB, 512GB, 14" FHD)
short_description: The E14 series is Lenovo's offering to business clients and corporations looking for an affordable company device. Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 4 is an ultralight device with an efficient and powerful CPU meant for work-from-anywhere (WFA). The laptop has a compact form factor coming in at just around 1.6 kg and is powered by AMD Ryzen 7 5825U, complemented by 16GB of DDR4 RAM and 512GB SSD.\r\n\r\n
description:
Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 4 (2022) : Overview

Design and Build 

ThinkPad E14 has an all-metal aluminum body which makes it feel premium. It has a 14" FHD display with 45% NTSC coverage. The E14 features an LED backlit keyboard, a Windows Precision glass touchPad, and a familiar Trackpoint. It is relatively light at around 1.6 kg or about 3.5 pounds. It is 324 mm in width, 221mm deep, and has a height of 18mm.

Performance and Memory

AMD's Ryzen 7 5825U processor powers the ThinkPad E14. It has 8 Cores and 16 Threads. The chip has a base frequency of 2 GHz and a max boost frequency of 4.5 GHz. The graphics part is handled by the Integrated AMD Radeon Graphics.Lenovo ThinkPad E14 comes with 16GB of DDR4 RAM where 8GB is soldered on the motherboard, and the other 8GB is in a SO-DIMM slot. But luckily, you can replace the existing stick with a 32GB. Thus ThinkPad E14 can have a maximum of 40GB RAM. You get 512GB SSD with Opal 2.0 security on purchase, which can be further expanded to 1.5TB ( 1x 512GB M.2 2242 SSD + 1x TB M.2 2280 SSD ) via the extra  M.2 2280 slot.

Battery and Connectivity

What powers the ThinkPad E14 is a 57 Wh Li-Po battery. It performed decently on the MobileMark 2018 benchmark as well lasting 15 hours at 200 nits.As for connectivity, you get a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C port that supports data transfer, Power Delivery 3.0, and DisplayPort 1.2. You also get an old-fashioned USB 2.0 Type-A port alongside a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A port, 1 HDMI port, and an Ethernet port. A 3.5mm headphone/microphone jack is also present to meet your audio needs. On the wireless side of things, you get WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.1.

Design and Build

You also get 2 USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports and 1 HDMI port. A 3.5mm headphone/microphone jack is also present to meet your audio needs. title: Lenovo Legion Slim 7i 2023 (13th Gen i7-13700H, RTX 4060, 16GB, 1TB, 16" 3.2K 165Hz )
short_description: Lenovo Legion Pro 7 is among the best gaming laptop out there, but it is not the most portable one, especially when you are a student or have to travel a lot. This is where the Legion Slim 7 comes in. Lenovo positions the Legion Slim 7 as the portable alternative to the Legion 7 Pro.
description:
Lenovo Legion Slim 7i 2023: Overview

Here's a brief description of the build, chipset, and battery life of the Lenovo Legion Slim 7i 2023 laptop with i7-13700H & RTX 4060.

Design, Display

Lenovo's Legion Slim 7i is a sleek machine despite being a gaming-centric laptop. The wide 16" display and capable CPU/GPU combo are all packed in under 2 kg. The all-aluminum chassis gives it a premium feel which is complemented by its impressive 165Hz display with 3.2K (3200x2000) resolution. The display supports Dolby Vision and can reach 430 nits of brightness. Thus, a suitable display for gamers as well as for consuming media.

Performance and Memory

Lenovo Legion Slim 7i 2023 packs a 13th gen Intel Core i7-13700H processor paired with an RTX 4060 that can breeze through most games and software at medium-high settings. Though Lenovo has limited its TGP to only 115W to make it work in a slimmer format, this laptop can still plow down graphics-intensive tasks provided that you keep your expectations in check.This is paired with 16GB of fast DDR5 RAM which can be upgraded to a maximum of 32GB. You are provided 2 M.2 2280 slots for secondary storage, one of which is preoccupied with a 1TB SSD.

Battery and Connectivity

Lenovo offers the biggest battery in a portable PC you can legally travel with. The 99.99 Wh battery is good enough for getting some work done (9.1 hours of local 1080p video playback), but we definitely suggest plugging it in while gaming or doing intensive tasks. It also ships with a 230W adapter and supports Charge Express.As for wireless connectivity, you get Intel Killer Wifi 6E and Bluetooth 5.1. You'll find plenty of ports in the Slim 7i. There are 3x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A port, 1x USB-C 3.2 Gen 2, 1x Thunderbolt 4/USB4 port which supports up to 40Gbps data transfer speeds, 1x HDMI port, 1x Headphone/microphone port(3.5mm) and 1x card reader slot.

description:

With its fast memory and capable processor, it'll breeze through most school or office work. Design and Build 

Since the Slim 7 is a sleek device, you yet a 14.8 grams thickness and 968 grams of weight. Lenovo has also not compromised on the build aspect. The ultrabook is MIL-STD-810 compliant with a carbon top and aluminum base for sturdiness.The 13.3" screen is a 2.5K LCD panel of (2560x1600) resolution. description:
Lenovo ThinkPad Z16 Gen 1 (2022): Overview

Here's a brief description of the build, chipset, and battery life of the Lenovo ThinkPad Z16 Gen 1 2022 with Ryzen 7 Pro 6850H.

Design and Build 

ThinkPad Z16 has the build of a premium device. It has an all-body aluminum chassis and a 16" WUXGA display with 100% sRGB coverage.  Alongside that, it also features an LED backlit keyboard, Windows Precision glass touchPad (with haptic feedback), and a familiar Trackpoint. It performed well on the MobileMark 2018 benchmark as well lasting 20.5 hours at 200 nits.As for connectivity, you get a single USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 port, and 2 USB 4 ports that support data transfer, Power Delivery 3.0, and DisplayPort 1.4a. title: Boult K45
short_description: Boult K45 is a pretty standard offering from the Indian brand. It comes with 13mm drivers and relies on Bluetooth v5.3 for connection with your device. In the meantime, it supports SBC and AAC audio codecs. You get a bunch of features on these earbuds including Zen Mode (ENC), Combat Gaming Mode (45ms low-latency), Blink & Pair (Fast Pairing), and Lightning Boult (Fast charging). Lastly, these earbuds are IPX5 rated and offer up to 50 hours of playback with the charging case.
description:
Boult is an Indian accessories brand that entered the Nepali market in April 2024. Amongst the first batch of products to arrive here is the Boult K45 earbuds. These audio accessories offer you the standard features you would expect from a pair of earbuds. Lets briefly go through these earbuds, shall we?

Boult K45 Overview

Design and Audio

These earbuds come in an in-ear fit with silicon tips and a stem. They mimic the looks of the Apple AirPods Pro but with added colour options. It ships in three shades — Red, White, and Blue. They have a dual-tone finish with the hearing unit coming in a different colour. The red option shares the stage with black, white with ash, and blue with a darker shade of blue. Moreover, the Boult K45 comes with IPX5 water resistance and sits inside a pill-shaped charging case.The company uses a lot of marketing jargon for its mediocre tech. For example, it dubs its audio as BoomX technology. However, they come with 13mm dynamic drivers, which is more or less a standard in earbuds like these. Similarly, you get a “Zen Mode” on the Boult K45 which is just an ENC feature powered by four microphones. Talking of ANC, there isnt one on these earbuds.

Features and the rest

The Boult K45 comes with typical features you would expect in a pair of earbuds. Starting with touch controls and access to the voice assistant in your smartphone. It is equipped with Bluetooth v5.3 and supports SBC and AAC codecs. Additionally, it also comes with a “Blink & Pair” fast pairing feature that connects these earbuds as soon as you open the charging case. They also offer “Combat Gaming Mode” where the earbuds latency drops as low as 45ms.In terms of battery, the company shies away from putting a number on the capacity. However, they mention a playback time of seven hours on earbuds alone. The number goes up to 50 hours when factoring in the case as well. The Boult K45 supports fast charging via USB Type-C interface wherein plugging in for a mere 10 minutes gives you over one and a half hours of playback.
  • Check out more Boult earbuds, HERE!

description:
Lenovo Yoga Slim 7 Pro (2021) Overview

Lenovo Yoga Slim 7 Pro, Slim 7 Pro, or Slim 7i Pro is a premium ultrabook with a great display and decent battery life. It weighs just under 1.4 kilos, making it an ideal everyday carry. With its fast memory and capable processor, it'll breeze through most school or office work. Here's a brief description of the build, chipset, and connectivity options on the Lenovo Yoga Slim 7 Pro 2021 with the 11th Gen Intel Core i5-11300H processor.

Design and Build 

Since the Slim 7 Pro is a premium device, you can expect a flagship-grade build. Both the top and bottom of the laptop are made up of aluminum. The 14" screen is a 2.8k OLED panel of (2880x1800) resolution. It is a 90 Hz display that covers 100% DCI-P3 gamut. Slim 7 Pro's display supports Dolby Vision, has an Anti-glare finish, and can reach 400 nits of brightness. The laptop's 180° hinge allows it to lay fully horizontally across a table.

Unfortunately, it features Integrated Iris Xe graphics which may render some graphics workloads less than ideal. The RAM is fast LPDDR4X memory. title: Lenovo Legion 5 Pro 2022 (Ryzen 7 6800H, RTX 3050 Ti, 16GB, 512GB, 16" WQXGA 165Hz)
short_description: Legion 5 Pro is the best gaming laptop that Lenovo has to offer. The 2022 iteration of the laptop brings an all-aluminum design, Ryzen 6000-series CPUs, and RTX 30-series GPUs. The CPU-GPU combo is paired with Lenovo's in-house cooling solution and AI Engine to maximize fps in games.
description:
Lenovo Legion 5 Pro 2022 Overview: 

Here's a brief description of the design aesthetic, chipset, and battery life of the Lenovo Legion 5 Pro 2022 with Ryzen 7 6800H & RTX 3050 Ti.

Build and Display 

Lenovo Legion 5 Pro (2022) has the build of a gaming machine. It has an all-aluminum build and weighs a hefty 2.42 kilos. The wide 16" display of WQXGA (2560x1080) resolution has a high 165Hz refresh rate. It has a tall 16:10 aspect ratio as well. The keyboard(with number pad) has a custom 4 Zone RGB backlight, whereas the keycaps are black in color.

Performance and Memory

Lenovo Legion 5 Pro 2022 is powered by a Ryzen 7 6800H processor alongside the RTX 3050 Ti. The Ryzen 6800H chip has 8 cores and 16 threads. It has 16MB of L3 cache. It can also go up to 4.5 GHz of max clock speed. As for the GPU, NVidIA's RTX 3050 Ti can handle graphic-intensive workloads without much difficulty. It has Lenovo's Coldfront 4.0 technology to cool this CPU/GPU combo.Lenovo Legion 5 Pro 2022 ships with 16GB of fast DDR5 RAM. Besides that, there are 2 M.2 slots for secondary memory, one of which is preoccupied.

Battery and Connectivity 

Legion 5 Pro (2022) packs a 4-cell 80Wh battery that lasted about 9.9 hours on MobileMark 2018 test. It supports Super Rapid Charge, which can charge the cells up to 80% in 30 minutes via the 230W adapter that ships in the box.As for the ports, you get a lot. A USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C (with DisplayPort1.4) on the left, a USB-A 3.2 Gen 1, a headphone port, and an E-Shutter button on the right. Similarly, there are two USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 (1 always-on), one USB-A 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C (with DisplayPort 1.4, Power supply), one HDMI 2.1, one RJ45, and a power-in socket on the back.

title: Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 2021 (Ryzen 5 5500U, 8GB, 512GB, 14" FHD Touch)
short_description: Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 14 is a portable machine with a 14-inch touch screen. It features familiar IdeaPad body with a flexible 360-degree hinge. As for performance, it packs AMD's Ryzen 5500U chipset with integrated Radeon graphics. The laptop has a backlit keyboard with a fingerprint scanner on the power button. description:
Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 (2021): Overview

Here’s a brief description of the design aesthetic, processor, and battery life of the Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 2021 laptop with the Ryzen 5 chip.

Design and Display

Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 2021 is a 2-in-1 device that can act both as a traditional notebook as well as a tablet. It comes in a mostly plastic build with aluminum on the cover. Its 360-degree hinge enables the Flex to fold into a Windows tablet. Unfortunately, you’ll have to buy the Digital Pen separately to utilize this feature fully. It’s not dauntingly thick or heavy at 18 mm and 1.5 kilos respectively.The 14″ screen is an IPS panel of FHD resolution (1920 x 1080 pixels). It can go up to 250 nits in brightness and supports multi-touch. It is also TUV certified for low blue light. Overall the build on the Flex 5 2021 (14ALC7)  is pretty similar to its predecessor and characteristic of the Flex series.

Performance and Memory 

Under the hood of the Lenovo IdeaPad Flex, 5 2021 is AMD’s Ryzen 5 5500U processor. It has 6 cores which can push the chip from its base clock of 2.1 GHz to a maximum boost clock speed of 4.0GHz. The L3 cache on this device is 8 MB. On the GPU front, you get AMD’s integrated Radeon graphics.Talking about memory, Flex 5 ships with 16GB of DDR4 RAM, which has a speed of 3200 MHz. It is soldered onto the motherboard, so you cannot upgrade beyond its default configuration. For long-term storage, you are equipped with a 512GB M.2 SSD. Again, there is no room for an HDD expansion.

Battery and Connectivity 

Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 2021 ships with a 52.5 Wh battery and a 65Wh adapter.  The device supports Quick Charge as well.For wireless connectivity, you get WiFi 5 and Bluetooth 5 technology. As for wired connections, you get 2 USB TYPE-A ports, 1 USB C port, 1 HDMI 1.4b port, a card reader slot, and a 3.5mm headphone/microphone jack.

title: Lenovo Thinkbook 13s 2021 (Ryzen 5 5600U, 8GB, 256GB, 13.3" WUXGA)

description:
Lenovo Thinkbook 13s (2021): Overview

Here’s a brief description of the design aesthetic, processor, and battery life of the Lenovo Thinkbook 13s 2021 laptop with the Ryzen 5 5600U CPU.

Design and Display

Lenovo Thinkbook 13s Gen 3 (2021) is a business-oriented laptop. It comes in a plastic build with aluminum on the cover. The laptop is 14.9mm thin and weighs 1.26kg, making it easy to carry it all around.The 13.3″ screen is an IPS panel of WUXGA resolution (1920 x 1200 pixels). It can go up to 300 nits in brightness. Under the hood of the Lenovo Thinkbook 13s 2021 is AMD’s Ryzen 5 5600U processor. It has 6 cores which can push the chip from its base clock of 2.3GHz to a maximum boost clock speed of 4.2GHz. The L3 cache on this device is 16MB. On the GPU front, you get AMD’s integrated Radeon graphics.Talking about memory, this particular ships with 8GB of LPDDR4 RAM. For storage, you are equipped with a 256GB M.2 SSD.

Battery and Connectivity 

Lenovo Thinkbook 13s ships with a 56Wh battery and a 65W adapter. The device supports Quick Charge as well.For wireless connectivity, you get WiFi 5 and Bluetooth 5.0 technology. As for wired connections, you get one USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A port, one USB 3.2 Gen 2, Type-C port, 1 HDMI 1.4b port, and a 3.5mm headphone/microphone jack.

title: Lenovo LOQ 15 (Intel i7-13620H, RTX 4060, 16GB, 1TB, 15.6" WQHD 165Hz)
short_description: LOQ is Lenovo's new sub-brand of affordable gaming laptops (& PCs). The Lenovo LOQ 15 2023 is a beast of a machine with a 13th Gen Intel Core i7-13620H processor and an NVidIA RTX 4060 GPU. Plus, with 16GB DDR5-5600 RAM and 1TB SSD storage, you’ll have plenty of space for all your games and files. The display is a 15.6-inch IPS panel with WQHD resolution, a 165Hz refresh rate, and 100% sRGB colour coverage, so everything will feel super smooth and responsive. And, it’s got stereo speakers and a backlit keyboard for those late-night gaming sessions.
description:
Lenovo LOQ 15 (2023) Overview:

Here's a brief description of the Lenovo LOQ 15 (2023) with the Intel i7-13620H CPU and RTX 4060 GPU.

Design and Display

The Lenovo LOQ 15 (2023) features an all-plastic body. There's a “LOQ” branding on the top left corner of the laptop's lid and the signature “Lenovo” branding on the bottom right. The laptop weighs upwards of 2.40 kg and comes in a single Storm Grey finish.Upfront, you're getting a 15.6" Full HD IPS LCD screen with an anti-glare coating on top. The Lenovo LOQ 15 comes with the highest configuration available: WQHD resolution spanning 2,560 x 1,440 pixels. Moreover, it is an IPS panel with a 100% sRGB colour gamut and 165Hz refresh rate.

Performance

In terms of performance, this gaming laptop packs an Intel and NVidIA combo. This particular Lenovo LOQ 15 (2023) comes with the 13th Gen Intel Core i7-13620H and NVidIA GeForce RTX 4060 discrete GPU. The processor is a ten-core silicone with a peak clock speed of 4.9 GHz. Meanwhile, the graphics card packs 8GB GDDR6 VRAM, offers a boost clock of 2,370 MHz and a TGP of 115W.As for memory and storage, you get 16GB DDR5-5600 RAM coupled with 1TB PCIe 4.0 SSD, but you can also bump it up to 2TB M.2 NVMe SSD. You can expand your memory up to 32GB, while you get an extra slot for additional storage. Furthermore, on the software front, it comes with Windows 11 Home.

Others

Port options on the Lenovo LOQ 15 (2023) include one USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, two USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A, one USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C, one HDMI 2.1, one RJ-45, and one 3.5mm combo audio jack. Additionally, for wireless connectivity, we are getting WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.1 support. In the tank, this laptop has a 60-Wh Li-polymer battery that can be juiced up by a 170W AC adapter that comes in the box.

title: VivoBook Pro 16X OLED 2021 (Ryzen 9 5900HX, RTX 3050Ti, 16GB, 1TB, 16" FHD)
short_description: Asus VivoBook Pro 16X is a 16\" Ultrabook designed for creative professionals. AMD's Ryzen 9 5900HX processor and NVidIA's RTX 3050 Ti GPU power the laptop. Its 16\" OLED display has a 4K resolution and 100% DCI-P3 color coverage. Besides that, it also boasts a speedy 0.2ms response time. This model has 16GB of RAM and 1TB of SSD storage. In addition, the VivoBook Pro 16X has a fingerprint sensor integrated into the power button for biometrics. Its backlit keyboard has a 1.4mm key travel distance.
description:
Asus Vivobook Pro 16X OLED (2021): Overview

Here’s a brief description of the build, chipset, and battery life of the Asus Vivobook Pro 16X OLED 2021 with the Ryzen 9 5900HX processor and NVidIA RTX 3050 Ti graphics.

Design and Display

The Vivobook Pro 16X has a premium sleek design. It features a military-grade all-metal design while remaining portable. Weighing around 1.95kg, it is easy to carry around and suitable for mobile workflows.The 16-inch panel is an OLED panel with a 4K (3840×2400) resolution. It covers a 100% DCI-P3 color gamut and has an aspect ratio of 16:10. The 60 Hz screen is a non-touch glossy display that can reach a peak brightness of 550 nits in HDR mode. Additionally, it is VESA-certified HDR True Black on top of being Pantone validated.

Performance and Memory

Under the hood, ASUS Vivobook Pro 16X OLED (2021) is powered by AMD Ryzen 9 5900HX processor. It has 8 cores and 16 threads with a max boost frequency of 4.6 GHz. On the GPU front, it features NVidIA GeForce RTX 3050 Ti with 4GB of DDR6 VRAM. Vivobook Pro 16X has 16GB of DDR4 memory which can be upgraded to 32GB. With that, you also get 1TB of M.2 SSD.

Battery and Connectivity

In the tank, ASUS Vivobook Pro 16X OLED has a 6-cell 96 Wh Lithium Polymer battery. You can recharge with the 150W adapter in the box.For wired connections, you get 3 USB Type-A ports, a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C port alongside a USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C port, an HDMI slot, and a Micro SD card reader. Alongside that, you get WIFI 6 and Bluetooth 5 technology.

title: Dell G15 5520 2022 (12th Gen i7-12700H, RTX 3060, 16GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD 120Hz)
short_description: This Dell G5 gaming laptop is equipped with a 12th Gen Intel Core i7-12700H CPU and Nvidia RTX 3060 graphics. Memory options include 16GB of DDR4 RAM and 512GB of SSD storage. The RAM can be expanded up to 32GB. Furthermore, Dell has installed a 15.6-inch LCD display with a refresh rate of 120Hz on the front. Likewise, it boasts WiFi 6 functionality as well as an HDMI 2.1 connection that supports up to 4K@120Hz streaming.
description:
If you're looking for a capable gaming laptop that can handle 1080p gaming at high settings, you might want to check out the Dell G15 5520 with 12th gen i7 CPU and RTX 3060 GPU.

Dell G15 5520 (2022) Overview:

Performance

This laptop features a 12th Gen Intel Core i7-12700H processor and an NVidIA GeForce RTX 3060 GPU, which deliver better performance for most games than its RTX 3050 Ti sibling. The chip is coupled with 16GB of RAM and a 512GB SSD, which are enough for multitasking and storing your games. You can also upgrade the memory and storage yourself, as they are user-replaceable.The laptop has a decent selection of ports, including three USB-A, one USB-C with Thunderbolt 4, an HDMI 2.1, an Ethernet, and a headphone jack. The USB-C port supports video output but not charging or Thunderbolt 4.

Design and Display

The Dell G15 5520 2022 comes in three color options: Dark Shadow Gray, Obsidian Black Special Edition, and Specter Green with Camouflage. The laptop has a plastic chassis with a textured lid that features the Dell logo and a vent for airflow. It is on a thick and heavy profile, measuring 1.1 inches in height and weighing 2.57 kg. Hence, it may not be the most portable or sleek device, but it feels sturdy and durable.You get a full-size keyboard with a numeric keypad and a G-key for quick access to gaming functions. The keyboard is backlit with either orange or RGB lighting, depending on the color choice.The laptop has a 15.6-inch display with various resolutions and refresh rate options. You can choose between an FHD (1920 x 1080) 120Hz, an FHD 165Hz, and a QHD (2560 x 1440) 240Hz panel. This particular model has an FHD panel with 120Hz. The higher refresh rates are ideal for smooth gaming, while the QHD option offers sharper visuals.

Battery and Others

The Dell G15 (2022) gets its juice from a 56Wh battery with 180W charging support. Talking of ports, it has got a decent selection, including three USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 ports, one USB-C port with DisplayPort alt mode, an HDMI 2.1 port, an Ethernet port, a headphone jack, and a power port. The USB-C port supports video output and Thunderbolt 4. The laptop also has an HD webcam with dual microphones and stereo speakers with Nahimic audio software.

title: Anker Soundcore AeroFit
short_description: Anker Soundcore AeroFit is an open-fit earbuds that come IPX7 rating for water and sweat resistance. Inside, it has 14mm dynamic drivers with titanium-coated domes. You also get two microphones on each bud, which are then coupled with an AI algorithm for a clear calling experience. For connectivity, you get Bluetooth v5.3 and by tapping into the Soundcore app you get additional functionalities. Some of the features on these earbuds are touch controls, custom EQ, multipoint connection, etc. The batteries on this thing are quite large with 85mAh on buds and 750mAh in the case. Combined, it offers up to 42 hours of usage and takes less than three hours to refill.
description:
Do you find in-ear earbuds to be uncomfortable while semi-in-ear does not feel as secure? Then you might want to check out open-fit earbuds, and Anker Soundcore AeroFit is one good choice in the category.

Anker Soundcore AeroFit Overview

Design and Audio

The Anker Soundcore AeroFit earbuds have aerospace-grade titanium wire for their structure, which allows them to retain their original form even after 5,000 bends. It is then layered with a soft material that is easy on your skin. The speaker unit is made of TPU, which is a type of plastic. These earbuds also boast an IPX7 rating and are resistant to sweat and splashes of water. It ships in four different colours: Midnight Black, Calm White, Soft Pink, and Cozy Blue.The audio on these earbuds is delivered by 14mm dynamic drivers. They also come with titanium polymer-coated domes. The Anker Soundcore AeroFit has uniquely designed nozzles. With this, they offer directional acoustics optimising the sound output and minimising the leakage. In addition, each bud packs two microphones which when coupled with an AI algorithm offer “crystal clear” calls.

Features and Battery

These earbuds come with touch controls for navigation. Meanwhile, for wireless connectivity Bluetooth v5.3 and support SBC and AAC codecs. The Anker Soundcore AeroFit works with Android, Apple, and Windows devices and supports multipoint connections as well. However, for that, you need to access this feature through the Soundcore app. This app also offers you custom EQs and Find Device features.Battery-wise, they pack an 85mAh cell in each bud, which is about double the capacity you get on regular buds. The charging case has an equally large battery too i.e. 750mAh. Combined, the Anker Soundcore AeroFit can last about 42 hours. Meanwhile, independently these buds offer about 11 hours of usage. They also support fast charging and can provide four hours of battery backup with a quick 10 minutes of charge.

title: Lenovo V15 G3 2022 (Intel i7-1255U, 16GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD)
short_description: Lenovo V15 G3 IAP (2022) is an affordable laptop that comes with decent specs and the signature Lenovo design. This laptop has a 15.6-inch FHD panel up front with a 45% NTSC colour gamut. Under the hood, it packs 12th Gen Intel Core i7-1255U coupled with Intel Iris Xe integrated graphics. Additionally, it packs 16GB DDR4-3200 and 512GB M.2 NVMe PCIe SSD. You can swap out a 1TB SSD for the default one if you need additional storage space. Lastly, this laptop has a 45Wh battery with 65W charging capability.
description:
Are you looking for an affordable laptop as a student or office worker that can pull you through your day-to-day tasks? Then you might want to check out the Lenovo V15 G3 (2022) with an Intel i7-1255U processor.

Lenovo V15 G3 (2022) Overview

Design and Display

The Lenovo V15 G3 (2022) comes in the classic Lenovo design with a monotone finish and the company branding at the edge of the lid on a metallic strip. It comes in an Iron Grey colour option. Moreover, the laptop features a full-size keyboard with a number pad and measures 1.70 kg or more. This thing has also passed the MIL-STD-810H military certification.On the front, we have a 15.6” display with an FHD resolution spanning 1,920 x 1,080 pixels. Additionally, it comes in a 16:9 aspect ratio, has a matte finish with no touchscreen support, and offers a 45% NTSC colour gamut. As per Lenovo, the screen either be a TN panel with 250 nits of peak brightness or an IPS panel with 300 nits of maximum luminosity. Whichever it is, the viewing experience on this display will be passable at best.

Performance

The 12th Gen Intel Core i7-1255U processor handles the primary computing on this Lenovo V15 G3 (2022). This silicone comes with 10 cores eight of which are efficiency cores while the other two are dedicated for performance. Other than that, this processor has 12 threads, a 12MB cache, and a peak clock speed of 4.70 GHz. Meanwhile, the Intel Iris Xe baked inside the chip itself handles the graphics.In addition to that, this laptop comes with 16GB memory — 8GB of which is on SO-DIMM slot while the other 8GB is soldered. It is a DDR4 RAM with a 3,200 MHz frequency. Similarly, a 512GB SSD handles the storage over here. Additionally, you can swap out the M.2 2242 SSD with a 1TB capacity.

The Rest

The Lenovo V15 G3 (2022) comes with an integrated 45Wh cell in the tank. You can juice up the battery with a 65W three-pin round tip charger. For wireless connectivity, you get WiFi 5 as well as Bluetooth v5.1 support. Meanwhile, for the wired connection, you get one ethernet port, one HDMI 1.4b, one 3.5mm combo audio jack, and one power connector. Additional ports include one USB 2.0, one USB 3.2 Gen 1, and one USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 with data transfer, PD, and DP support.

title: Boult X45
short_description: Boult X45 is a pretty standard offering from the Indian brand. It comes with 13mm drivers and relies on Bluetooth v5.3 for connection with your device. In the meantime, it supports SBC and AAC audio codecs. You get a bunch of features on these earbuds including Zen Mode (ENC), Combat Gaming Mode (45ms low-latency), Blink & Pair (Fast Pairing), and Lightning Boult (Fast charging). Lastly, these earbuds are IPX5-rated and offer up to 40 hours of playback with the charging case.
description:
Boult is an Indian accessories brand that entered the Nepali market in April 2024. Amongst the first batch of products to arrive here is the Boult X45 earbuds. These audio accessories offer you the standard features you would expect from a pair of earbuds. Lets briefly go through these earbuds, shall we?

Boult X45 Overview

Design and Audio

These earbuds come in an in-ear fit with silicon tips and a stem. It ships in three shades — Ash, Black, and Olive. They have a dual-tone finish featuring a contrasting colour. The ash option shares the stage with black, black with grey, and olive with ash. Moreover, the Boult X45 comes with IPX5 water resistance and sits inside a pill-shaped charging case with a wavy texture.The company uses a lot of marketing jargon for its mediocre tech. For example, it dubs its audio as BoomX technology. However, they come with 13mm dynamic drivers, which is more or less a standard in earbuds like these. Similarly, you get a “Zen Mode” on the Boult X45 which is just an ENC feature powered by four microphones. Talking of ANC, there isnt one on these earbuds.

Features and the rest

The Boult X45 comes with typical features you would expect in a pair of earbuds. Starting with touch controls and access to the voice assistant in your smartphone. It is equipped with Bluetooth v5.3 and supports SBC and AAC codecs. Additionally, it also comes with a “Blink & Pair” fast pairing feature that connects these earbuds as soon as you open the charging case. They also offer “Combat Gaming Mode” where the earbuds latency drops as low as 45ms.In terms of battery, the company shies away from putting a number on the capacity. However, they mention a combined playback time of 40 hours when factoring in the case as well. Furthermore, the Boult X45 supports fast charging via USB Type-C interface wherein plugging in for a mere 10 minutes gives you over two hours of playback.

title: Boult Ripple
short_description: Boult Ripple is a pretty standard offering from the Indian brand. It is available in silicone strap options and comes with IP67 dust and water resistance, Bluetooth v5.2, and a 1.39 inch HD display. Talking of features, it offers 150+ cloud watch face, 120+ sports modes, health and vitals tracking like heart rate, blood oxygen, blood pressure , sleep, and menstruation. Additionally, it also offers Bluetooth calling along with notification update, remote control, and Find My Phone feature.
description:

Furthermore, even if you were a spree-calling, you could easily go on with 2 whole days of BT calling on this smartwatch.In terms of health tracking, the Ripple integrates the Boult Health suite. With over 120 sports modes available, it caters to various fitness preferences. However, as with many budget-friendly smartwatches, its precision may raise some doubts. title: Lenovo Legion 5 2024 (14th Gen i7-14650HX, RTX 4060, 16GB, 512GB/1TB, 16" WQXGA 165Hz)
short_description: The Lenovo Legion 5 2024 features a 16\" WQXGA IPS LCD panel with a 165 Hz refresh rate, powered by an Intel Core i7-14650HX and NVidIA GeForce RTX 4060 GPU. It offers up to 64GB DDR5 RAM, 1TB storage, and runs on Windows 11 Home. The laptop includes a 6-row RGB backlit keyboard, multiple USB and HDMI ports, and an 80-Wh battery with WiFi 6E and Bluetooth v5.3 for connectivity.
description:
Lenovo Legion 5 2024 Overview

Design and Display

Upfront, youre getting a 16" IPS LCD panel with an anti-glare coating on top. Likewise, the Lenovo Legion 5 2024 offers a WQXGA resolution spanning 2560x1600 pixels. It offers a peak brightness of 350 nits, a refresh rate of 165 Hz, and a 100% sRGB colour gamut. Lastly, it does not have touchscreen support.

Performance

In terms of performance, this gaming laptop brings an Intel + NVidIA combo. This Lenovo Legion 5 2024 ships with the Intel Core i7-14650HX and NVidIA GeForce RTX 4060 GPU. The CPU is a sixteen-core architecture with a maximum frequency of 5.2 GHz. Meanwhile, the discrete graphics card comes with 8GB GDDR6 VRAM and a 2,370 MHz boost clock.As for memory, you can install up to 64GB DDR5-5600 RAM. In this particular model, you are getting 16GB memory coupled with 1TB of storage. As mentioned earlier, you can easily upgrade your memory as well as storage whenever you need it! Meanwhile, on the software end, you are getting Windows 11 Home.

Others

Moving on, this gaming laptop features a 6-row keyboard with a numeric keypad. The keyboard also offers either a white backlight or a 4-Zone RGB backlight options. This particular option ships with the RGB one. The port selections on the Lenovo Legion 5 2024 include three USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A, one USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C (support data transfer and DisplayPort 1.4), one USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C (supports data transfer, Power Delivery 140W and DisplayPort 1.4), one HDMI 2.1, one RJ45, a 3.5mm combo audio jack, and one 4-in-1 card reader.When it comes to battery, this gaming laptop has been paired with an 80-Wh Li-Polymer battery and 2300W AC adapter. For wireless connectivity, this Lenovo Legion 5 2024 with Intel i7-14650HX and RTX 4060 comes with WiFi 6E and Bluetooth v5.3.

title: Samsung Galaxy M15 5G
short_description: The Samsung Galaxy M15 5G flaunts a classic design with a 6.5-inch Super AMOLED display and three rear cameras. Powered by an octa-core 5G processor, it offers 6GB RAM + 128GB storage (expandable to 1TB) and a 13MP selfie camera. With a 6,000mAh battery and 25W wired charging, it supports dual-SIM 5G and includes NFC for connectivity.
description:
Samsung Galaxy M15 5G Overview

Design and Display

In terms of design, there isn’t much going on. This phone comes in the classic Galaxy blueprint. Meaning, it has a monotone finish with three camera cutouts vertically stacked on top of one another. The Samsung Galaxy M15 5G features a chequered pattern on the back and ships in Light Blue, Dark Blue, and Grey colours.On the front, you get a 6.5-inch screen surrounded by thick bezels. However, you do get a Super AMOLED panel here. It is one of the best panels in the market, so the viewing experience should be pleasant on this phone. Moreover, the Samsung Galaxy M15 5G has an FHD+ resolution spanning 1,080 x 2,340 pixels. It also offers a 90Hz refresh rate, a colour depth of 16 million, and a brightness of up to 800 nits.

Performance

Samsung has not mentioned outright which chip the Galaxy M15 5G is running on. They do mention that the processor has eight cores, 5G capability, and a peak clock speed of 2.2GHz. Based on this information, sources have determined the chipset to be MediaTek Dimensity 6100+, which is relatively fresh at this time.Other than that, the Samsung Galaxy M15 5G comes in a single 6GB + 128GB configuration in Nepal. The storage is on the lower end by 2024 standards, but, thankfully you can expand it up to a terabyte via MicroSD card. Moreover, it boots on Android 14 with OneUI on top. As such, it offers a full Galaxy experience, complete with four years of OS updates and five years of security patches.

Camera and the rest

In the optics department, you get three shooters on the back led by a 50MP main camera. It is further coupled with two auxiliary units comprising of a 5MP ultrawide sensor, and a 2MP macro lens. The lattermost one is just a placeholder camera that you won’t get much utility out of. Meanwhile, on the front, you get a 13MP selfie shooter.The Samsung Galaxy M15 5G draws its power from a large 6,000 mAh battery. You get 25W of wired charging here and Samsung Nepal is providing it for free. Additionally, it comes with dual-SIM 5G cellular, dual-band WiFi, Bluetooth v5.3, five-way navigation, and NFC support for wireless connectivity. In the meantime, you get a USB 2.0 Type-C as well as a 3.5mm stereo headphone jack for wired connections.

title: boAt Stone 750
short_description: The boAt Stone 750 is a triangular Bluetooth speaker with a woven mesh texture and LED lights on both ends for ambiance. It boasts a 12W audio output with 2-inch drivers, ensuring ample loudness. The speaker is splash-resistant (IPX5) and offers Bluetooth v5.3, AUX, and TF/MicroSD card connectivity, but lacks USB-A. However, it also supports TWS for pairing two speakers and includes an in-built microphone for calls. With a 2,200 mAh battery, it lasts up to 12 hours at 60% volume and charges via USB Type-C in 2.5 hours.
description:
boAt Stone 750 Overview

Design and Audio

The boAt Stone 750 comes in a long triangular shape with a woven mesh texture. LEDs on either end of its body can glow in various colours to set the mood. It is also IPX5 splash-resistant, able to handle splashes of water here and there. While it launched with three colour choices in its home country, only Ragining Black and Marine Blue options arrived here.Moving on to the audio, the boAt Stone 750 has two output units with 2-inch drivers. Each one is capable of 6W power, totalling 12W audio output. It is on the higher end for Bluetooth speakers, hence, loudness will not be an issue with this one.

Features and Battery

This speaker has five buttons for navigation on its top and comes with Bluetooth v5.3 for wireless connectivity with your smartphone. Similarly, there is an AUX port and TF/MicroSD card slot if you want to connect more traditionally. Sadly, no USB-A for pen drives and such though. Moreover, the boAt Stone 750 offers a TWS feature as well, allowing you to connect and sync two speakers and use them simultaneously. It also has an in-built microphone, so you can receive calls through the speaker itself.It has a 2,200 mAh battery inside and can last up to half a day when used at 60% volume. The boAt Stone 750 has a USB Type-C port for charging and takes just 2.5 hours to fully juice up.

title: Asta Wolf Rolly
short_description: Asta Wolf Rolly is a wireless earbuds from the Nepali OEM brand. It comes in an unconventional design with a rollable mechanism. With this, the earbuds are sure to draw attention. Apart from that, they come in an in-ear fit with silicon tips and IPX4 water resistance. Inside, it packs a 13mm driver as well as a 30 mAh battery. Similarly, the case has a 250 mAh cell offering over 20 hours of playtime. Lastly, it is equipped with Bluetooth v5.3 along with automatic pairing feature.
description:
Asta Wolf is a Nepali-born accessories brand whose products always had a special emphasis on design. One such product is Asta Wolf Rolly which we will be briefly looking at here.

Asta Wolf Rolly Overview

Design

The Asta Wolf Rolly has a very unique design that puts it apart from the rest of the pack. The charging case of these earbuds comes in a hexagon shape which in itself is pretty unique! Other than that, it has mostly hollow space and transparent areas through which you can see the buds in the case.Its mechanism adds an extra flair on top of its unusual design. To get the earbuds out of the case, you have to literally ROLL it. The Asta Wolf Rolly comes in a two-part mechanism casing where the charging unit is hinged to an outer housing. The hexagonal part is just a housing while the charging unit is circular. In the meantime, the actual earbuds look pretty standard with an in-ear design. They also have cylindrical stems featuring touch controls while boasting IPX4 water resistance.

Audio and Features

A 13mm driver on both of the buds delivers the audio on this thing. In addition to that, the Asta Wolf Rolly comes equipped with a quad-mic setup. With this, these earbuds offer environmental noise cancellation during calls. Similarly, they come with Bluetooth v5.3 for wireless connectivity with your smartphone. Meanwhile, they also have a low latency of 60ms as per the company.In terms of battery, the Asta Wolf Rolly packs a 30 mAh cell on each side, while the charging case has a larger 250 mAh cell. This helps these buds to provide you with 6 hours of independent, and over 20 hours of playback with the case. These earbuds can be fully charged in about two hours via a USB Type-C port.

title: OnePlus Pad 2
short_description: OnePlus Pad 2 is a flagship tablet that comes with a 12.10-inch LCD panel. Under the hood, it packs the Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset. description:

It has a 13MP shooter on the back and an 8MP unit on the front. In the tank, the OnePlus Pad 2 packs a 9,510 mAh battery with 67W charging support. It does not support any cellular connectivity. However, it does offer wireless connections via tri-band WiFi 7, and Bluetooth v5.4. On the other hand, it comes with a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C port for wired connections capable of up to 5Gbps data transfer speed. Lastly, this tablet only has a face unlock as a biometric security.

title: Remax RB-M22
short_description: The Remax RB-M22 is a one-of-a-kind speaker with a detachable design. This means, that this speaker while functioning as a single unit can be snapped into two different pieces offering a stereo audio effect. It is capable of 3W of individual output while as a larger unit, the number doubles to 6W. Other than that, it comes in a transparent finish, is equipped with Bluetooth v4.2, and packs a 1,000 mAh battery offering over six hours of usage.
description:
Are you looking for a truly unique speaker that will surely draw some attention? Then you might want to check out the Remax RB-M22!

Remax RB-M22

Design

The design of the Remax RB-M22 is definitely its most highlighting feature. Firstly, it comes in a pill-shaped body with a transparent finish. However, that is not the most interesting thing going on here. This speaker is actually, a two-piece unit.This means, that you can snap the speaker in half and it will change into two individual functioning units. These separate pieces have magnets on the base that help them attach and disguise as one whole speaker. The Remax RB-M22 has a decent heft to it too, weighing 446 grams combined, and exactly half that for a single unit.

Audio and the rest

Talking of the audio, this speaker is capable of offering 6W of total output. This is a decent number, but the quality of sound most depends on how the product has been designed. Hence, you better ask the vendor for a demo to see if it suits your taste. Moreover, when snapped in two, the individual pieces offer 3W output each. Given that, its unique dislocation capability the Remax RB-M22 is capable of stereo audio effect.Other than that, it comes with rather old Bluetooth v4.2 and is compatible with devices that have Bluetooth regardless of the platform. Meanwhile, for wired connections, you get a micro USB port and an AUX (3.5mm) jack. This speaker also comes with an in-built microphone and a 1,000 mAh battery. With this, the Remax RB-M22 can last you up to 6 hours on 60% volume and over tenfold the time on standby. Once the charge has been depleted this thing takes about two to three hours to fully juice up.

title: Tronsmart Element T6 Mini
short_description: Tronsmart Element T6 Mini is a compact and portable speaker available in Black, and Red colourways. This speaker offers 15W audio output despite its small form factor — thanks to the companys proprietary SoundPulse technology. It is outdoor-ready with IPX6 water resistance and is also equipped with Bluetooth v5.0. Moreover, it also offers hands-free phone calling, voice assistant control, and stereo pairing. Lastly, it can last you an entire day while taking just three hours to fully charge.
description:
Tronsmart is known for its wide range of accessories including headphones, speakers, earbuds, and speakers. Here is a short overview of one of its speakers — the Tronsmart Element T6 Mini!

Tronsmart Element T6 Mini Overview

Design and Audio

It is a cylindrical-shaped speaker that is on the shorter end. It measures just 120mm vertically and 92mm across all while weighing just over half a kilo. With this, it is compact, lightweight, and extremely portable. For further portability, it can also be attached to a lynard and carried around. Additionally, it also boasts an IPX6 water resistance making it ideal for outdoor conditions. Meanwhile, it comes in two colourways: Black, and Red.Audio-wise, you are getting an output of 15W from the Tronsmart Element T6 Mini despite the small stature of the speaker. The company was able to pull this off with its proprietary SoundPulse technology. Here, Tronsmart applies customised power cells to the portable speaker that ensures five times output amplification. Furthermore, this speaker also offers 360° surround sound output.

Features and Battery

Firstly, the Tronsmart Element T6 Mini comes with Bluetooth v5.0 with which you can connect it to your devices like smartphones, and laptops. In the meantime, it has an in-built microphone as well allowing you to make and receive calls while also giving you access to voice assistants on different platforms. It can wirelessly operate within a range of 30 metres from your device in an open area. On the other hand, it comes with an AUX port and a MicroSD/TF card reader for wired connections. It is also capable of stereo pairing.Talking of the battery, Tronsmart shies away from mentioning the cell capacity on the Element T6 Mini. However, they do claim a full days worth of usage when using the speaker at 50% volume. When the battery runs dry, you can charge it with a USB Type-C charger. It supports 10.5W of charging speed and takes three hours to fully charge.

title: Tronsmart Bang
short_description: Tronsmart Bang is a boombox-type party speaker available in Black with LED lighting that moves to the beat of the sound. This speaker offers 60W audio output with the companys proprietary SoundPulse technology. It is built for the outdoors with IPX6 water resistance. It offers wireless connectivity via Bluetooth v5.0 and NFC. Moreover, it also offers hands-free phone calling, and voice assistant control with its in-built mic. description:
Tronsmart is known for its wide range of accessories including headphones, speakers, earbuds, and speakers. Here is a short overview of one of its speakers — the Tronsmart Bang!

Tronsmart Bang Overview

Design and Audio

It is a boombox-like speaker built for the outdoors. Given its nature, it obviously comes with a handle to carry around. Despite that, it is not an easy speaker to carry around with a weight of just over three kilos. Adding on to its outdoor theme, it boasts an IPX6 water resistance to handle the weather. Meanwhile, it comes in a single plain and simple black colour but is complete with a generous amount of RGB lighting to give it more personality.Audio-wise, you are getting an output of 60W from the Tronsmart Bang complete with its proprietary SoundPulse technology. This tech allows them to deliver louder output in a more compact form factor without taking a hit to the audio quality. Additionally, this speaker comes with TuneConn Technology — which is like stereo pairing features, but on a steroid. With this, you can sync over 100 — yes over 100 — speakers to get the party vibes going!

Features and Battery

Lets talk features. Firstly, the Tronsmart Bang can establish a connection with your devices via Bluetooth v5.0 as well as NFC. In the meantime, it has an in-built microphone as well allowing you to make and receive calls. It also gives you access to voice assistants on different platforms. It can wirelessly operate within a range of 18 metres from your device. On the other hand, it comes with an AUX port, a MicroSD/TF card and a U-disk (Pendrive) reader for wired connections. The speaker allows you to fine-tune the LEDs and mess around with the equaliser through the Tronsmart App.Talking of the battery, Tronsmart shies away from mentioning the cell capacity on this Bang speaker. However, they claim up to 15 hours of usage when using it regularly. But when you go all out with full volume and LEDs turned on, the playback time drops down to just four hours. Anyway, when you do run the battery dry, it can juice back up with a USB Type-C charger. It supports 10W of charging speed and takes four and a half hours to charge fully. Lastly, if need be, it can double down as a power bank too.

title: Acer Predator Triton 16 2023 (i7 13th Gen 13700H, RTX 4070, 16GB, 1TB, 16" WQXGA 240Hz)
short_description: Acer has just added the newest member to its premium Predator Triton gaming lineup. The company unveiled the new Predator Triton 16 (2023) at the ongoing Compute. So, let’s get into the specs, features, expected price, and availability of Acer Predator Triton 16 (2023) in Nepal.
description:
Acer Predator Triton 16 (2023) Overview:

Performance and Cooling

The new Predator Triton 16 (2023) comes with the latest 12th gen Intel “Raptor Lake” gaming processors. More specifically, Acer lets you choose between Core i7-13700H and Core i9-13900H. The GPU option is even more streamlined as the Predator Triton 16 (2023) is only available with the NVidIA RTX 4070 GPU, which brings all the added features of Ada Lovelace, like improved ray tracing and DLSS 3. Acer Predator Triton 16 features two memory slots that you can configure with 32GB of DDR5-5200 RAM. Likewise, it can have up to 2TB of PCIe M.2 SSD in RAid 0 configuration. Keeping the laptop cool is dual 5th gen Aeroblade fans with 89 blades and Vortex Flow with thermal foam. Moreover, Acer has used liquid metal thermal grease on the CPU. 

Design and Display

As the name suggests, the Predator Triton 16 (2023) comes with a 16-inch IPS display with WQXGA resolution. The screen refreshes at 240Hz and brings support for NVidIA Advanced Optimus and G-Sync. It covers 100% DCI-P3 color gamut and can get as bright as 500 nits. The narrow bezels and tall 16:10 aspect ratio give the display a streamlined look. It is housed inside a sleek metal chassis measuring 20mm in thickness. It is available in a single silver color with sparkling fish on top. The keyboard has a per-key RGB backlight and a dedicated key for Predator Sense. The app lets you control fan speed, lighting and other aspects of the Predator Triton 16 (2023).

Rest of the Specs

Acer Predator Triton 16 (2023) is fueled by a 99.98Wh battery. It features two Thunderbolt 4 Type-C ports that you can choose for charging. In addition, the laptop has two USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A, an HDMI 2.1, and a MicroSD card slot.

title: Samsung Galaxy Buds3
short_description: Samsung Galaxy Buds3 is a 2024 offering of the company that comes with a significant redesign compared to its predecessors. It has a transparent lid on the charging case. Meanwhile, the buds themself have an edged stem, IP57 rating, and come in a half in-ear fitting. They also offer ANC, however, without Ambient mode. They are equipped with 11mm dynamic drivers for audio and Bluetooth v5.4 for wireless connectivity. Feature-wise, they come with Galaxy AI, Voice Controls, and other ecosystem-only features like Auto Switch and 360 Audio. Lastly, these buds last up to six hours by themselves and up to 30 hours with the case when used without noise cancellation.
description:
Samsung is one of the largest and most popular companies in the world, and it is pretty obvious that their products are top-tier. So, if you are looking for one of the best earbuds in the market then Samsungs 2024 offering — Galaxy Buds3 is a pretty solid option.

Samsung Galaxy Buds3 Overview

Design and Audio

Samsung has deviated from its regular stemless design and given the Galaxy Buds3 a stem. But they made sure to add a bit of flair, made a bit edgy instead of plain cylindrical shape. Moreover, the lid of the charging case is transparent adding to the overall aesthetic of the buds. Likewise, these buds are IP57 dust and water-resistant and come in a semi in-ear fitting. The whole thing is available in Silver and White colour options.For audio, Samsung has packed the Galaxy Buds3 with an 11mm dynamic driver. These earbuds come with Samsung Seamless Codec capable of 24bit / 96kHz processing on top of the regular SBC and AAC codecs. They are also capable of noise cancellation, though they do not possess an ambient mode. So, its either all the noise or no noise at all. Other than that, you can also enjoy 360 Audio on these buds, but only with selective Samsung devices.

Features and the rest

The latest Samsung Galaxy Buds3 come with Galaxy AI baked into them. Coupled with three mics on each bud, they auto-adjust audio output to provide the best listening experience to the user. Likewise, these buds support Interpreter mode when used with the latest high-end Galaxy devices. You also get ecosystem features like Auto Switch and Auracast on these buds.Additionally, one can control them through touch as well as voice commands. These buds rely on Bluetooth v5.4 for wireless connectivity with your smartphone. The Samsung Galaxy Buds3 packs a 48 mAh battery on either side and a 515 mAh cell in the charging case. With this, you get up to six and 30 hours of independent and combined playback with ANC turned off. For charging, you go wired with USB Type-C as well as wireless.
