title: Huawei Band 9
short_description: The Huawei Band 9 features a 1.47-inch AMOLED display and weighs just 14 grams, with a slim profile of 8.9mm. It is waterproof up to 5ATM and connects via Bluetooth 5.3, making it compatible with Android 9.0 and iOS 11 or later devices. The Band 9 boasts a battery life of up to 14 days under typical usage, with a quick 45-minute charge to reach full capacity. It is available in five colours and offers a soft fluoroelastomer strap for comfort, with a woven nylon option for the Blue variant.
description:
Are you looking for a reliable fitness tracker? Then you might want to check out the Huawei Band 9 from one of the largest tech giants in the world.

Huawei Band 9 Overview

Design and Display

The Huawei Band 9 retains its practical rectangular form factor, featuring a rounded display and a side button for easy navigation. Weighing just 14 grams and measuring a slim 8.9mm in thickness, it is designed for lightweight comfort. The Band 9 comes in five colours: Blue, Charm Pink, Lemon Yellow, White, and Starry Black. Additionally, the Blue variant offers an alternative woven nylon strap, while other versions feature an improved soft fluoroelastomer strap, designed to be more skin-friendly.The device is equipped with a 1.47-inch AMOLED screen, delivering vibrant visuals and clarity. It is also waterproof up to 5ATM, making it suitable for swimming and other water-based activities.

Features and Battery

Huawei has packed the Band 9 with numerous features aimed at fitness and health tracking. It supports over 100 sports modes, enabling users to monitor various activities. The device includes Huawei TruSleep 4.0 for detailed sleep tracking, providing insights into sleep stages and helping to improve sleep quality. It connects via Bluetooth 5.0 and is compatible with both Android (9.0 and above) and iOS (11 and later) devices. Users can track their health metrics through the Huawei Health app, offering a user-friendly interface for managing data.In terms of battery life, Huawei claims the Band 9 can last up to 14 days with typical usage and 9 days under more intensive use. Additionally, the device benefits from fast charging, reaching a full charge in just 45 minutes. This combination of extensive features and long battery life makes the Huawei Band 9 a versatile and convenient fitness tracker.

title: Zeblaze Stratos 3 Ultra
short_description: The Zeblaze Stratos 3 Ultra features a 1.43-inch AMOLED display with IP69K water and dust resistance. It offers customizable watch faces, an always-on display, built-in GPS, health tracking (heart rate, SpO2, stress, sleep), and Bluetooth v5.3 for notifications and calls. Its 300 mAh battery lasts up to 40 days in battery saver mode.
description:
Below is a short overview of the Zeblaze Stratos 3 Ultra including its features and battery life.

Zeblaze Stratos 3 Ultra Overview

Design and Display

The Stratos 3 Ultra weighs 56.5 g, and without the wristband, it weighs 34.8 g. It features a 1.43-inch AMOLED display protected by Corning Gorilla Glass. The display offers a resolution of 466 x 466 pixels with 391 PPI. Additionally, it supports a brightness of up to 1000 nits.The case is made from a zinc metal bezel with a drilling carbon coating. The buttons and buckle are crafted from stainless steel. The wristband is made of durable silicone and measures 22 mm. Furthermore, the Stratos 3 Ultra is rated for water resistance at 5 ATM and IP69K, making it suitable for various conditions.

Sensors and Health Features

This smartwatch includes multiple sensors. It supports dual-band GPS and five satellite positioning systems: GPS, GLONASS, GALILEO, QZSS, and BDS. Additional sensors include a compass, gyroscope, geomagnetic sensor, barometric altimeter, and acceleration sensor. The health features consist of a wrist heart rate monitor and a pulse oximeter for blood oxygen saturation.Additionally, the Stratos 3 Ultra operates on Bluetooth version 5.3. It is compatible with smartphones running Android 5.0 or iOS 12.0 and above.

Battery Life

The device houses a 300 mAh Li-Pol battery. In power-save mode, the standby time can reach up to 45 days. It offers up to 24 days of training time in power-save mode and up to 86 hours with full GPS and heart rate tracking enabled. Charging takes approximately 1.5 hours.

title: MSI Cyborg 15 2022 (12th Gen i5-12450H, RTX 4050, 8GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD)
short_description: MSI Cyborg 15 2022 (A12VE) is a sci-fi cyberpunk-inspired gaming laptop with some translucent parts. It comes in a Translucent Black chassis coupled with a blue backlit keyboard spewing the cyberpunk vibe. Under the hood, it comes with the Intel Core i5-12450H and NVidIA GeForce RTX 4050 combo. Additionally, it also packs an 8GB GDDR5-4800 RAM and 512GB NVMe PCIe Gen 4 SSD. Other than that, it comes with a 3-cell 53.5 Wh battery and 120W AC adapter for the power.
description:
The MSI Cyborg 15 (A12VE) is the Taiwanese company's offering for the year 2022. It is a gaming laptop available in multiple configurations. Here, we will discuss a particular MSI Cyborg 15 (2022) with 12th Gen Intel Core i5-12450H and NVidIA RTX 4050 discrete GPU.

MSI Cyborg 15 2022 (A12VE) Overview

Design and Display

The MSI Cyborg 15 2022 is heavily inspired by sci-fi cyberpunk style. Given that, the inspiration spills on the design of this laptop. Certain parts on the keyboard and chassis of the laptops are translucent allowing for a view of internal. Moreover, the exhaust on the bottom of the laptop is arranged such that it reads “MSI TRUE GAMING”.A 15.6-inch display with narrow bezels on the side sits on the front of the MSI Cyborg 15 2022. It has a sizable chin with the company name branded on it. The screen itself is an IPS panel capable of a 144Hz refresh rate. Furthermore, it boasts an FHD resolution spanning 1,920 x 1,080 pixels. Moving back to the laptop, it comes in a Translucent Black finish with a single blue backlit keyboard.

Performance

The MSI Cyborg 15 2022 delivers its performance through 12th Gen Intel Core i5-12450H coupled with the NVidIA RTX 4050. The CPU is an octa-core silicone with four performance and efficiency cores each. It is also capable of clocking in a maximum of 4.4 GHz. Meanwhile, the discrete GPU comes with 6GB GDDR6 memory and peaks at 1,605 MHz.This laptop ships with 8GB DDR5-4800 RAM as its memory. In the meantime, it comes with 512GB NVMe PCIe Gen 4.0 SSD for the storage. You can up the memory on your MSI Cyborg 15 2022 up to 64GB with dual-channel compatibility. Contrarily, you cannot upgrade the storage and will have to swap out the SSD entirely. On the software end, it comes with Windows Home 11.

Battery and the rest

In the tank, the MSI Cyborg 15 2022 comes with a 3-cell 53.5 Wh battery and comes with 120W power adopter in the box. Other than that, it offers wireless connectivity with WiFi 6 and Bluetooth v5.2 combination. The port selection is decent as well with one audio jack, one USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C, two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, and one HDMI 2.1.

short_description: The Lenovo LOQ 2024 (15AHP9) is a gaming laptop that comes with a good set of hardware. This includes a combination of an AMD Ryzen 7 8845HS processor and an NVidIA GeForce RTX 4050 discrete graphics card. In addition to that, you also get 16GB RAM and 512GB SSD on this thing. description:
Are you looking for a gaming laptop that will give you great performance for years to come? Then the Lenovo LOQ 2024 (15AHP9) with the AMD Ryzen 7 8845HS CPU and RTX 4050 GPU might be of interest.

Lenovo LOQ 2024 (15AHP9) Overview

Design and Display

Lenovo LOQ 2024 (15AHP9) is a gaming laptop that comes in a rather sleek design with a noticeable protrusion on the back. The chassis is made out of PC-ABS, however, it does boast the MIL-STD-810H certification. It comes in Luna Grey colouring and weighs nearly two and a half kilos. As for the ports, you get plenty — three USB-A, one USB-C, an HDMI port, one combo audio jack, an ethernet, and a power-in socket.Meanwhile, the Lenovo LOQ 2024 (15AHP9) comes with a wide 15.6-inch display of FHD (1,920 x 1,080) resolution with a high 144Hz refresh rate. It can also go up to 5.1 GHz of max clock speed. As for the GPU, NVidIAs RTX 4050, with a maximum TGP of 105W supports graphical workloads. In addition, Lenovo has also included an LA1 AI chip to improve FPS in games.In addition to the CPU and GPU combo, the Lenovo LOQ 2024 (15AHP9) ships with dual-channel memory. This particular model comes with 16GB DDR5-5600 RAM, which can be further upgraded to 32GB. Furthermore, there are two M.2 2280 slots, one of which is preoccupied with a 512GB NVMe PCIe Gen 4 SSD. title: Realme C61
short_description: Realme C61 is a 2024 budget offering from the company. The phone has a tough build complete with ArmorShell Protection™, IP54 rating, and TÜV Rheinland High Reliability Certificate. It comes with a 6.74-inch AMOLED panel with HD+ resolution, 560 nits peak brightness, up to 90Hz refresh rate, and up to 180Hz touch sampling rate. Inside it comes with the UNISOC T612 processor coupled with 4GB RAM and 64GB storage. The phone allows you to virtually extend the memory as well as expand the storage by an additional 2TB via MicroSD card. It boots on the realme UI based on Android 14 and offers some nifty features. Optics-wise, it has a 32MP primary camera, an unspecified auxiliary lens, and a 5MP front shooter. In the tank it packs a 5,000 mAh cell with 10W charging speed.
description:
Are you looking for an affordable smartphone with a tough exterior and relatively smooth performance? Then you might want to check out the Realme C61:

Realme C61 Overview

There are two variants of the Realme C61 available worldwide. The model available in Nepal is the Indian variant.

Design and Display

Realme C61 looks pretty standard in terms of design. It has a wavy pattern on the back and comes in Safari Green, and Marble Black colour options. The company spends a great deal speaking of its durability. The phone is IP54 water and dust-resistant and TÜV Rheinland certified for high reliability. Additionally, it features something called ArmorShell Protection which is a combination of multiple things. Such as metal frames, reinforced glass, coated film, etc. that add to the overall sturdiness of the phone.On the front, you are looking at a 6.74-inch screen with an unspecified panel. This display is likely an LCD considering the price of the phone. In the meantime, the Realme C61 screen comes with an HD+ resolution with 560 nits of peak brightness, 90Hz refresh rate, and up to 180Hz touch sampling rate.

Performance and the rest

The phone is equipped with the UNISOC T612 for its processing duties. It is an octa-core silicon with 12nm fabrication and 1.8GHz peak clock speed. Though available in three different configurations, Nepali customers can only get it in 4GB + 64GB trim. This is the lowest available configuration of the Realme C61. The phone allows you to virtually extend the memory and also supports a MicroSD card of up to 2TB, which helps it curb its limitations. In the tank, it has a 5,000 mAh battery with 10W charging support.Talking of the cameras, the phone has a 32MP primary shooter coupled with an auxiliary lens of unspecified purpose. On the front, it is equipped with a 5MP unit for selfies. The Realme C61 has a dual Nano SIM slot with 4G cellular as well as dual-band WiFi and Bluetooth v5.0 support. It also comes with some nifty software features like the Mini Capsule 2.0.

description:

title: Asus Vivobook 14 2021 (11th Gen i5-1135G7, 8GB, 512GB, 14" FHD)
short_description: Asus VivoBook 14 is a decent 14-inch Ultrabook under the sub 1 lakh budget. It is powered by Intel's Core i5-1135G7 processor, which can reach boost clock speeds of up to 4.20 GHz. An integrated Iris Xe GPU handles the graphics. This laptop variant is available with 8GB of RAM and 512GB of storage, although you can tinker around with the memory options if you'd want. With this, you upgrade the VivoBook 14 X415 up to 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, and 1TB of HDD. Moreover, the laptop features a fingerprint sensor that has been integrated into the trackpad. It features a backlit keyboard with a 1.4mm key travel distance.
description:
Asus Vivobook 14 2021: Overview

Here’s a brief description of the build, chipset, and battery life of the Asus Vivobook 14 (2021) with 11th Gen Intel Core i5-1135G7 processor.

Display and Build

As the name suggests, Vivobook 14 features a 14-inch IPS display. The 60Hz panel covers 45% of the NTSC color gamut and can hit a peak brightness of 220 nits. Other than that, it has an FHD resolution (1920×1080) and an aspect ratio of 16:9. The laptop is relatively portable at 1.6 kgs and suitable for an everyday carry machine.

Performance and Memory

Under the hood, the Asus Vivobook 14 2021 has an 11th-gen Intel i5-1135G7 processor. This 4-core 8-thread processor can hit a maximum turbo frequency of 4.20 GHz. It is reliable enough for basic usage like web browsing, document edits, or consuming media. Similar is the story with the integrated Intel Xe graphics.Other than that, you get 8 GB of RAM with the Vivobook 14 and a 512GB SSD. One of the plus points of this device is its upgradability, there’s an extra empty SO-DIMM slots where you can insert an 8 GB stick and upgrade the total RAM to 16 GB. Similarly, there’s also an empty 2.5″ HDD slot where you can add extra memory.

Battery and Connectivity

In the tank of the Vivobook 14, you get a 2-cell 37 Wh Lithium-ion battery. You can recharge it with the 45W adapter provided in the box.As for the port selection, you get 3 USB-As, a USB-C, an HDMI, an SD card reader, and a headphone/microphone combo jack. For wireless connectivity, there’s WiFi 5 and Bluetooth 4.1.

title: Google Pixel 9 Pro
short_description: Google Pixel 9 Pro is the premium flagship offering for 2024 from the makers of Android. As such, it runs on the stock version of the OS and will get 7 years worth of updates. Hardware-wise, it packs the in-house Tensor G4 processor coupled with 16GB RAM and up to 1TB storage. It also has a 4,700 mAh battery powering it up. On the front, you are looking at a 6.3-inch Super Actua LTPO OLED display with a fingerprint-resistant coating. The build of the phone is solid too, with an aluminium body and Gorilla Glass Victus 2 on the front as well as back. For cameras, it gets a 50MP primary, 48MP ultrawide / macro and 48 telephoto shooter on the back. Meanwhile, it has a 42MP camera on the front.
description:
Are you looking for a good Android phone? Then how about a one from the makers of Android themselves? Lets take a look at Googles more premium 2024 offering — Google Pixel 9 Pro!

Google Pixel 9 Pro Overview

Design and Display

The name “Google “Pixel 9 Pro” might have you believe that it is a successor to the Google Pixel 8 Pro. It sort of is, but not truly. It is definitely a step up from the base model. The has a similar design to its lower model with flat edges and a longer pill-shaped camera island. The phone comes with aluminium from its body and frame while the front and back are covered with Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 2. It is available in Porcelain, Rose Quartz, Hazel, and Obsidian colour options.On the front, it has a 6.3-inch Super Actua display (LTPO OLED). It stretches FHD+ in resolution with 1,280 x 2,856 pixels at 495 PPI pixel density. It is also capable of a 1 to 120Hz adaptive refresh rate. Besides that, the Google Pixel 9 Pro can reach a peak brightness of 3,000 nits.

Performance and Cameras

Inside, the Google Pixel 9 Pro has the in-house Tensor G4 processor and Titan M2 security coprocessor. The primary silicon comes with 4nm fabrication, eight cores, and a peak clock speed of 3.1 GHz. You get the phone in a single 16GB memory option. Meanwhile, you can choose between 128GB, 256GB, 512GB, and 1TB for storage. In the tank, it packs a 4,700 mAh battery with 45W wired and up to 21W wireless charging support.The cameras are one of the key highlights of a Pixel phone. The Google Pixel 9 Pro comes with a 50MP primary, 48MP ultrawide / macro, and 48MP telephoto lens on the back. In the meantime, it gets a 42MP shooter on the front. Furthermore, this phone continues to enjoy AI-assisted image editing features. AI is an integral part of the general functionalities of the phone as well. Lastly, it boots on Android 14 out of the box, which is an older version of the OS as Android 15 is already out. However, that should not be an issue as Google promises seven years of software updates with the phone.

description:

Lenovo LOQ 2024 (15IAX9) Overview

Design and Display

Lenovo LOQ 2024 (15IAX9) is a gaming laptop that comes in a rather sleek design with a noticeable protrusion on the back. The chassis is made out of PC-ABS, however, it does boast the MIL-STD-810H certification. It comes in Luna Grey colouring and weighs nearly two and a half kilos. Performance and the rest

The processor has eight (four performance + four efficiency) cores, 12 threads, and 12MB of L3 cache. It can also go up to 4.4 GHz of max clock speed. As for the GPU, NVidIAs RTX 4050, with a maximum TGP of 105W supports graphical workloads. In addition, Lenovo has also included an LA1 AI chip to improve FPS in games.In addition to the CPU and GPU combo, the Lenovo LOQ 2024 (15IAX9) ships with dual-channel memory. This particular model comes with 12GB DDR5-4800 RAM, which can be further upgraded to 32GB. Furthermore, there are two M.2 2280 slots, one of which is preoccupied with a 512GB NVMe PCIe Gen 4 SSD. For power, it packs an integrated 60Wh battery that supports Super Rapid Charge Pro. This technology can juice the laptop to 50% in just 30 minutes via the 135W adapter that ships in the box.Check out more Lenovo Laptops, HERE!

title: Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold
short_description: Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold is the companys 2024 foldable offering. It comes with an updated design, IPX8 rating, and solid build materials. It has a 6.3-inch Actua display on the front, which is the same as that of the base Pixel 9. Meanwhile, inside it has a large 8-inch Super Actua Flex display which is one of, if not the largest offering in a smartphone. For performance, it comes with a Tensor G4 chipset coupled with 16GB RAM and up to 512GB storage. Likewise, the camera department includes a 48MP main, 10.5MP ultrawide / macro, 10.8MP telephoto, and two 10MP selfie shooters. description:
Are you looking for a good folding phone? Then Googles 2024 offering — Pixel 9 Pro Fold- will surely spike your interest.

Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold Overview

Design and Display

Despite the “9” in its name, it is a successor to the Google Pixel Fold launched last year. The phone is marketed as the “thinnest foldable available”, however, this is true only for the American audience. Regardless, it is one of the thinnest options in the world with an unfolded thickness of 5.1mm. It is also a pretty solid unit with a steel and aluminium alloy hinge, an aluminium frame, and Gorilla Glass Victus 2 layering on the front and back. This phone also comes with an IPX8 rating on top of that.For displays, it has a 6.3-inch Actua display with up to 120Hz refresh rate and FHD+ resolution. It is basically the same display as the one you get on the base Pixel 9. Inside, it has a large 8-inch Super Actua Flex display with 2K resolution. The Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold is one of, if not THE largest display on a smartphone. It can go from 1Hz to 120Hz in refresh rate and up to 2,700 nits in brightness while offering 2K resolution.

Performance and Cameras

Similar to other Google Pixel 9 offerings, it comes with in-house Tensor G4 processor. It is further coupled with Titan M2 security coprocessor. For memory, it comes with a single 16GB option. Meanwhile, you can choose between 256GB and 512GB for the storage. It boots on Android 14 out of the box and will be receiving seven years of updates.Talking of cameras, it may appear to have four units, but in reality — it is a triple-camera setup. The Google Pixel 9 Pro Fold comes with a 48MP primary shooter, 10.5MP ultrawide with macro focus, and 10.8MP telephoto lens. For selfies, it has 10MP cameras on the inside as well as the outside.

title: Benco V90 Plus
short_description: The Benco V90 Plus features a plastic back and frames, a glass front, and a 6.56-inch IPS LCD screen with 720x1612 resolution and a 90Hz refresh rate. It supports dual Nano-SIMs, GSM, WCDMA, LTE, GPS, and USB Type-C. Powered by a Unisoc T606 chipset, it runs on Android 13 with 4GB RAM, 128GB storage, and SD card support. description:
Here is a quick overview of the latest Benco V90 Plus.

Benco V90 Plus Overview

Design and Display

The Benco V90 features a sleek design with a plastic back and frames, and a glass front. It measures 9mm in thickness, 74.7mm in width, and 163mm in height, weighing 197 grams. The smartphone comes in three colors: Elemental Blue, Light Grey, and Bluish Silver. Notably, it does not have an IP rating for water or dust resistance.The device sports a 6.56-inch IPS LCD screen with a resolution of 720x1612 pixels and a 20.2:9 aspect ratio. The display supports a 90Hz refresh rate. However, details about touch sampling rate and brightness are unspecified.

Network and Connectivity

The Benco V90 supports dual SIM functionality with 2 Nano-SIMs. It operates on GSM, WCDMA, and LTE networks. The device covers a broad range of 2G, 3G, and 4G bands. For connectivity, it includes WLAN 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, Bluetooth 5.3, GPS with A-GPS, Glonass, Beidou, and Galileo. The phone features a USB Type-C port but lacks NFC support.

Performance and Memory

Powered by the Unisoc T606 chipset, the Benco V90 includes an octa-core CPU with 2 Cortex-A75 cores and 6 Cortex-A55 cores, all clocked at 1.6 GHz. The GPU is a Mali-G57. The device runs on Android 13, though the specific UI version is not mentioned.The smartphone comes with 4GB of RAM and 128GB of internal storage. Additionally, it supports SD cards for expanded storage.

Cameras, Security, and Battery

The Benco V90 has a dual-camera setup on the back, featuring a 13MP primary camera and an AI lens. Camera features include portrait mode and night mode. The front camera is an 8MP single sensor. Video specifications for both cameras are not provided.For security, the device includes a side-mounted fingerprint sensor. The Benco V90 is equipped with a 5000 mAh non-removable battery and supports 18W charging.

Asus TUF Gaming A15 (2022): Overview

Display and Build

title: Redmi Buds 3 Lite
short_description: The Redmi Buds 3 Lite has a unique design with earfins to make it fit into your ears. The TWS is lightweight and also somewhat resistant to water and dust, thanks to the IP54 rating. Moreover, they have a 6-mm dynamic audio driver tuned by Xiaomi's Sound Lab, a 5-hour battery life, and a Type-C port for charging.
description:
Redmi Buds 3 Lite Overview:

Design

The Redmi Buds 3 Lite has something new to offer in terms of design. The uniqueness of these buds comes from the earfins you can attach them to. These fins add a layer of confidence that the buds won't fall off, even when you are shaking hard. Additionally, Xiaomi provides you with two sizes of hooks and three different sizes of ear tips so that it better fits your ears.Moreover, the IP54 dust and water resistance ensures that you can use them in any weather condition, be it rain or shine. With a weight of only 4.2 g each, the Buds 3 Lite is incredibly lightweight and comfortable to wear for extended periods. The lightweight design also follows with the charging case, which weighs just 36 g.

Sound

The Redmi Buds 3 Lite comprises a 6-mm dynamic audio driver tuned by Xiaomi's Sound Lab. Obviously, there is no Active Noise Cancellation, as it is a low-cost option. However, it does have the Environment Noise Reduction feature to improve call clarity. In addition to that, there is a dedicated low-latency mode, but the company hasn't made it clear about the threshold it can attain.

Battery 

Lastly, the lite version of Redmi Buds 3 (which didn't launch in Nepal) has a 5-hour battery life. Up to 18 hours can be added with the charging case. On the bottom of the case is a Type-C port for charging. But the company has made no mention of how much time it will take to charge it to the max.

Asus ROG Strix G18 (2023): Overview

title: Anker Soundcore Select 4 Go

It supports TWS pairing for stereo sound and is available in blue, black, white, and soon purple and green. With an IP67 rating, it’s dust and water-resistant, durable for 5 days of playback at 40°C, and retains 95% battery capacity after 300 cycles. description:
Anker Soundcore Select 4 Go Overview

Design and Audio

The Select 4 Go has a compact design, weighing 265 grams and measuring 12.08 x 8.27 x 4.85 cm. It’s available in blue, black, and white color options, with additional colors like purple and green expected soon The Select 4 Go features a 1.75-inch full-range driver, delivering 5W audio output. It offers up to 20 hours of playtime on a single charge. Connectivity is handled through Bluetooth 5.4, with a range of up to 30 meters.In addition, users can pair two speakers via True Wireless Stereo (TWS) for a stereo sound experience. This allows one speaker to play the left audio channel, while the other handles the right channel. Inside the box, users will find the Select 4 Go speaker, a 60 cm USB-A to USB-C cable, and a quick start guide.

Durability and Battery Life

The speaker is IP67-rated, making it dust and water-resistant. Soundcore claims the Select 4 Go can withstand five days of continuous playback at 40°C without losing performance. The battery is designed to retain 95% of its original capacity even after 300 charging cycles. The buttons are rated for up to 3,000 presses.

description:
Asus Zenbook S13 OLED (2023):Overview

Here's a brief description of the design aesthetic, chipset, and battery life of the all-new Asus Zenbook S13 OLED (2023) with the Intel Core i7-1355U processor and 13.3-inch 2.8L OLED display.

Design and Display

Performance and Memory

title: Asus ROG Strix Scar 15 2022 (Core i9 12900H, RTX 3070 Ti, 16GB, 1TB, 15.6" FHD 300Hz)
short_description: Asus ROG Strix Scar (G533ZW-HF144W) is a gaming laptop from 2022. It flaunts a 15.6-inch IPS LCD panel with a 300Hz refresh rate and 100% sRGB coverage. Powering the laptop is a powerful Intel 12th Gen Core i9-12900H processor. The graphics are taken care of by NVidIA's RTX 3070 Ti. This variant of the laptop ships with 16GB of RAM and 1TB of internal storage.
description:
If you are looking for a powerful gaming laptop, then you can barely go wrong with the Asus ROG Strix series! As such, the Asus ROG Strix Scar 15 2022 with Core-i9 12900H and RTX 3070 Ti might just be the one for you!

Asus ROG Strix Scar 15 2022 (G533ZW-HF144W) Overview

Design and Display

The Asus ROG Strix Scar 15 2022 has a unique design signature. It comes with an uneven bottom bezel, which makes it look cool. Meanwhile, it has two small hinges near the edge of its body instead of the extended single hinge we see in a lot of laptops. Thus, it is unique in more than one way. All this is packed in a metal body weighing in at 2.30 kg.In the display department, it comes with a 15.6-inch IPS panel with a 16:9 aspect ratio. Additionally, it has an FHD resolution of 1,920 x 1,080 pixels alongside a refresh rate of 300Hz. It is also an anti-glare display that comes with a 100% sRGB colour gamut.

Performance

This Asus ROG Strix Scar 15 2022 packs the Core i9 12900H and RTX 3070 Ti among other things. The CPU is an Intel 12th Gen processor with a peak clock speed of 5.0 GHz, 14 cores, and 24MB cache. For graphics, this laptop packs the NVidIA GeForce RTX 3070 Ti. This discrete graphics card has 8GB GDDR6 VRAM and has 1.41 GHz peak clock speed and 150W TGP.You get a 16GB DDR5-4800 memory that can be expanded up to 64GB. It also supports dual-channel memory. Similarly, you get 1TB PCIe 4.0 NVMe M.2 Performance SSD for the storage. Lastly, Asus ROG Strix 15 2022 ships with the Windows 11 Home as the operating system.

Battery and the rest

Powering the entire thing is a 4-cell 90Wh Lithium-ion pack that can be juiced up by the AC adapter as well as the USB Type-C port. Here, it supports 240W and 100W of charging via the AC port and Type-C respectively.In the meantime, this Asus ROG Strix 15 2022 comes with triple-band WiFi 6E and Bluetooth v5.3 support for wireless connectivity. For wired connections, we have an audio jack, an HDMI port, two USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, a USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C, a Thunderbolt port, and a 2.5G LAN port. Other than that, we also have an FHD 1080p@60FPS webcam and a four-speaker system for audio.

description:
Asus is one of the most popular laptop manufacturers in the world with multiple series under their belt. One such popular series is their Vivobook series. Here, we will look at the Asus Vivobook 15 2024 (X1504VAP) with the Intel Core 5 120U processor.

Asus Vivobook 15 2024 (X1504VAP) Overview

Design and Display

The Asus Vivobook 15 2024 (X1504VAP) maintains the series distinctive design, featuring the recognizable brand name cutout on the lid. With a slim profile of just 1.79 cm and a weight of under one and a half kilograms, this model is both sleek and portable. Noteworthy is the trackpads dual functionality, serving as both a trackpad and a numeric pad. Available in Cool Silver and Indie Black, this laptop offers two sophisticated color choices.Dominating the front is a single panel option: a 15.6-inch IPS LCD display. With a Full HD resolution of 1,920 x 1,080 pixels and an anti-glare coating, this display guarantees clarity and minimizes glare. However, the display quality of the Asus Vivobook 15 2024 falls short, providing only a 45% NTSC color gamut, 300 nits of brightness, and a 60Hz refresh rate.

Performance and the rest

Underneath the surface, the Asus Vivobook 15 2024 (X1504VAP) runs on the Intel Core 5 120U processor, accompanied by integrated Intel graphics. This processor boasts impressive specifications, including 10 cores, 12 threads, and a maximum clock speed of 5.0 GHz. Additionally, the GPU within this laptop offers a maximum graphics dynamic frequency of 1.4GHz.Moreover, it comes equipped with 16GB of memory, which can be expanded by an additional 8GB. In terms of storage, it features a 512GB SSD, with an extra slot available supporting up to 1TB. Powering the device is a built-in 42Wh lithium-ion battery, supported by a 45W power adapter.

title: Anker Soundcore Life Note 3i
short_description: The Anker Soundcore Life Note 3i is the latest budget TWS from Anker, a well-known company. It has an in-ear fit with three silicone tip sizes. Here, 10-mm audio drivers with deep bass handle the music side of things. Additionally, it provides 22EQ modes Hybrid-ANC noise reduction.
description:
Anker Soundcore Life Note 3i Overview:

Design

On the surface, the Anker Soundcore Life 3i is an in-ear fit with typical silicone tips and a long stem. The box provides you with three silicone tip sizes: large, medium, and small.Also, they have tactile buttons for control, meaning you need to press the button rather than simply touch the surface. Furthermore, the device is water-resistant, following IPX5 standards.

Audio related features

Moving on to audio, the Life Note 3i is powered by 10-mm audio drivers with an impedance of 16Ω. The company promises this product to have deep bass with a frequency range of 20 Hz to 20 kHz. Additionally, it can switch between two EQ modes (Bass and 21 others).Moreover, the Hybrid-ANC provides noise reduction allowing for a sound audio and call experience, so the other side wont have to worry about your surrounding noises. This is all thanks to the four microphones in Soundcore Life P2i, two on each of the earpieces, along with some processing going on inside the buds.

Connectivity

The Soundcore Note 3i connects to your device (usually a phone) within a 10-meter radius using Bluetooth V5.2. For charging, though, you would need a wired USB-C cable alongside a power brick.On the battery side, this bud abides by 8 hours of longevity. The case tops it off with a combined 36 hours of playback. Further, 10 minutes of charges back you up for two hours.

title: Asus Zenbook S 13 OLED (2024) (Core Ultra 7 155H, 16GB, 1TB, 13" 3k OLED)
short_description: The Asus Zenbook S 13 OLED (2024) stands out as a premium 13-inch ultrabook. True to its name, it boasts an OLED display, covering 100% DCI-P3 gamut and certified for VESA HDR True Black, alongside Pantone validation. Equipped with an Intel Core Ultra 7 155H processor capable of reaching boost clock speeds of up to 4.8 GHz, this productivity-focused laptop is enhanced by an Intel Arc GPU, 16GB of RAM, and spacious 1TB SSD storage.
description:
Here is the brief overview of the latest Asus Zenbook S 13 OLED ( 2024) with the latest Intel Core Ultra 7 155H processor.

Asus Zenbook S 13 OLED (2024) Overview

Design and Display

Asus Zenbook S 13 OLED (2024) is an Intel Evo laptop, and that already gives us an idea of what’s it about. It boasts a slim frame measuring just around 10mm and weighing just a kilogram. Despite that, it is quite durable with its US MIL-STD-810H standard. In addition to that, it features a plasma ceramic aluminum body and comes with linear patterns on the lid.As the name suggests, we are greeted with a 13.3-inch OLED panel upfront. The screen can be of up to 3K resolution spanning 2,880 x 1,800 pixels. It is also capable of up to 600 nits of brightness and a 100% DCI-P3 colour gamut. Other than that, it comes with a handful of certifications for various aspects such as Dolby Vision, Vesa DisplayHDR, Pantone, TÜV Rheinland, and SGS. Moreover, the Asus Zenbook S 13 OLED (2024) is available in Basalt Grey, and Ponder Blue finishes.

Performance and Rest

The Asus Zenbook S 13 OLED (2024) relies on the latest Intel Core Ultra 7 155H processors for its performance. Given that, the Asus Zenbook S 13 OLED (2024) also enjoys the Intel AI Boost. It is an NPU that helps the laptop harness the power of AI without hindering the overall performance. Meanwhile, the processor comes with 16 cores and up to 4.8 GHz maximum frequency.The graphics here are handled by Intel’s integrated GPU i.e. Intel Arc. Similarly, we are getting 16GB and 1TB PCIe 4.0 x 4 SSD for memory and storage respectively on the Asus Zenbook S 13 OLED (2024). On the software front, this laptop ships with Windows 11 Pro.Powering the entire thing is a 63Wh battery that can be juiced up by a 65W charger. Meanwhile, this laptop can reach 70% charge in only 49 minutes. The port selection here consists of two Thunderbolt 4, one USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A, one HDMI 2.1, and an audio combo jack. Additionally, we are getting Harman/Kardon fine-tuned speakers with Dolby Atmos support. It is coupled with a smart amplifier and ASUS Audio Booster technology that helps boost the volume by over five times.

title: Dell XPS 13 Plus 9320 2023 (13th Gen i7-1360P, 16GB, 1TB, 13.4" 3.5K Touch OLED)
short_description: Dell XPS 13 Plus 9320 (2023) is a high-end ultraportable notebook series with a striking design. The XPS 13 9320 has a 13.4-inch QHD (3.5K) display with a 16:10 aspect ratio. This is also an OLED display with a 3.5K resolution and a 90% DCI-P3. Powering it is a considerably faster 13th Gen Intel P-series processor and Xe graphics, as well as up to 16GB of LPDDR5 RAM and 512GB/1TB of SSD. As a result, it will undoubtedly serve you well in your day-to-day chores. Similarly, the XPS 13 offers Thunderbolt connectors and WiFi 6 compatibility for faster communication.
description:
The Dell XPS 13 Plus 9320 (2023) is a premium laptop that offers a sleek design, powerful performance, and a stunning display. In this blog post, let's talk about some of the key features and specifications of this laptop, and why you might want to consider it for your next purchase.

Dell XPS 13 Plus 9320 (2023) Overview:

Design and Build Quality

The Dell XPS 13 Plus 9320 (2023) has a minimalist and elegant design. The laptop has a platinum or graphite color option and a durable aluminum chassis that is resistant to scratches and fingerprints. Also, the carbon fiber palm rest is soft and comfortable. The laptop weighs only 1.26 kg and has a thin profile of 15.28 mm, making it easy to carry around.It features a backlit keyboard and a fingerprint reader that is integrated into the power button for quick and secure login. The laptop has two Thunderbolt 4 ports that support power delivery, data transfer, and display output, as well as a USB-C to USB-A adapter bundled in the box.

Display and Audio

The Dell XPS 13 Plus 9320 (2023) has a stunning display that is one of its main selling points. The laptop has a 13.4-inch screen that comes in four different options: FHD+ non-touch, FHD+ touch, 3.5K OLED touch, or UHD+ touch. All of these options have an InfinityEdge design that minimizes the bezels and maximizes the screen-to-body ratio. The display also has an anti-glare or anti-reflect coating that reduces reflections and eye strain.The display quality varies depending on the option you choose, but all of them have high brightness, contrast, color accuracy, and viewing angles. The FHD+ options have a resolution of 1920 x 1200 pixels and a refresh rate of 60 Hz, while the 3.5K OLED option has a resolution of 3456 x 2160 pixels and a refresh rate of 60 Hz. The UHD+ option has a resolution of 3840 x 2400 pixels and a refresh rate of 60 Hz.The laptop also has a dual speaker system that delivers clear and loud sound quality. The speakers are tuned by Waves MaxxAudio Pro and support Dolby Vision for an enhanced audio-visual experience. Accompanying it is a dual microphone array that supports noise cancellation and voice recognition.

Performance and Battery Life

This particular model laptop has the 13th Gen Intel Core i7-1360P CPU with 12 cores, 16 threads, 18 MB cache, and 5.0 GHz turbo frequency.As for the memory and storage, you get 16GB LPDDR5 RAM that runs at 5200MHz and 512GB/1TB SSD. The laptop also has an integrated Intel Iris Xe graphics card that supports casual gaming and graphics-intensive tasks. It also supports Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.2 for fast and stable wireless connectivity.The Dell XPS 13 Plus 9320 (2023) comes with a 56 Wh battery that supports fast charging via the Thunderbolt 4 port.

title: Asus ProArt PX13 OLED 2024 (Ryzen AI 9 HX 370, RTX 4050, 24GB, 1TB, 13.3" 3K OLED)
short_description: The Asus ProArt PX13 OLED 2024 is a sleek 13-inch convertible laptop built for creatives. It features a powerful AMD Ryzen AI 9 HX 370 processor, RTX 4050 GPU, and a 3K OLED touchscreen with stylus support. Weighing under 1400 grams, it offers up to 32GB RAM, 2TB SSD storage, and a range of connectivity options including WiFi 7. ideal for digital art and other creative tasks, it also includes advanced features like an FHD webcam, IR blaster, and Asus DialPad.
description:
Introducing the Asus ProArt PX13 OLED 2024, a sleek and powerful laptop featuring the AMD Ryzen AI 9 HX 370 processor and RTX 4050. Lets have a quick overview.

Asus ProArt PX13 Overview

Design and Display

This ProArt is the first of its kind to be a 13” convertible creative device. Asus has transitioned the ROG X13 Flow to the ProArt series this time around so it’s a powerful mini PC capable of all your creative endeavors. It’s a 2-in-1 hybrid device with a touchscreen weighing less than 1400 grams.On the screen side of things, there’s a 13.3-inch 3K OLED panel with a 16:10 aspect ratio running at 60Hz. The touch display has stylus support and full P3 colors perfect for those in fields like digital art. Moreover, the screen reaches an impressive 500 nits in HDR, has Pantone Validation for accurate colors out of the box, and TUV Rheinland and SGS certification for minimal blue light. All in all, it’s an excellent compact screen for a portable creative workstation.

Performance and Memory 

The Asus ProArt PX13 is powered by the new Zen 5 Strix Point Ryzen AI processors with a built-in NPU. Asus has tried its best to take advantage of the onboard 50 TOPS of power from the processor with tailored applications like Story Cube, and MuseTree. But, that is likely going to be overshadowed by the dedicated GPUs from NVidIA.The ProArr PX13 can be configured with up to an RTX 4070 with 8GB of VRAM and 90W TGP. As for the memory, you get up to 32GB of soldered RAM and up to 2TB Gen 4 NVME SSD.

Battery and Connectivity

Under the hood, there’s a large 70Wh battery powering the ProArt PX13. There’s only a single Type-A port, dual Type-C USB 4 ports, an HDMI, an audio jack, a micro card reader, and a power jack.Other features include support for Triple band WiFi 7 alongside Bluetooth 5.4. There’s also an FHD webcam tucked in the top bezel alongside an IR blaster for Windows Hello. Moreover, you get a dedicated Co-pilot key in the keyboard with an Asus DialPad on the touchpad. And although the ProArt 13 is being marketed as an AI PC, many of the features are still to roll which you learn about on Microsoft’s Co-pilot page.

title: HP Victus 15 2022 (12th Gen i7-12650H, RTX 3050 Ti, 16GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD 144Hz)
short_description: HP's offering towards entry-level gamers, the HP Victus 15  is a beast of a laptop packing in the 12th gen Intel Core i7-12650H and NVidIA's RTX 3050 Ti GPU. Its 15.6\" screen with a 144Hz refresh rate has 45% NTSC coverage making it fun to watch media and play games. It has a good battery, fast memory, and a decent port selection. You can't go wrong with choosing a good deal.
description:
HP Victus 15 (2022) Overview:

Here's a brief description of the design aesthetic, chipset, and port selection of the HP Victus 15 (2022) laptop with the Intel Core i7-12650H CPU and RTX 3050 Ti GPU.

Design and Build 

HP Victus 15 (2022) comes with a 15.6-inch display. Its 144 Hz IPS LCD panel covers 45% of the NTSC colour gamut. The laptop has an 82% screen-to-body aspect ratio and can reach 250 nits of peak brightness.All this is housed inside a new form factor that tries to mimic the more premium Omen series. As you would expect, it is made of plastic. HP Victus 15 (2022) measures 23.5mm in thickness and weighs around 2.3 kg.

Performance and Memory

Regarding CPU, HP Victus 15 (2022) comes with the 12th generation Core i7-12650H chip. It can handle most things without a need for worry.As for graphics, you get NVidIA GeForce RTX 3050 Ti, which has 4GB of GDDR6 RAM. Unfortunately, the TGP is unspecified here.However, since the GPU is based on a newer microarchitecture, it brings hardware-accelerated Ray Tracing, DLSS supersampling, and other RTX features.You get two DDR4 SO-DIMM slots, both preinstalled with two 8GB DDR4 sticks. In the future, you can add 16GB sticks to both slots. Hence it can have a maximum of 32GB RAM.

Battery and Connectivity

HP Victus 15 (2022) packs a 70Wh battery. Likewise, you get a 200W AC charger. It provides up to 7 hours and 15 minutes of video playback whereas the battery life may dip down to 5 hours and 45 minutes on mixed usage.In terms of ports, you get one USB-C, three USB-A, one HDMI, one ethernet, an SD card reader, and a 3.5mm headphone jack. Moreover, the keyboard is backlit, and HP includes a 720p HD camera.

title: Asus TUF Gaming A15 2024 (Ryzen 7 7435HS, RTX 2050, 8GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD 144Hz)
short_description: The Asus TUF Gaming A15 (FA506NFR) features a 15.6-inch IPS display with a 144Hz FHD resolution, housed in a redesigned chassis available in Mecha Grey and Jager Grey. It is powered by the AMD Ryzen 7 7435HS processor, an 8-core, 16-thread CPU with a boost clock of up to 4.5GHz, and an NVidIA RTX 2050 GPU with 4GB GDDR6 VRAM. The laptop includes 8GB or 16GB of DDR5-4800 RAM, expandable up to 32GB, and 512GB PCIe 4.0 SSD storage. Cooling is enhanced by dual Arc Flow fans, five copper heat pipes, and four exhaust vents for improved airflow. It runs on a 4-cell 90Wh battery with fast charging, reaching 50% in 30 minutes, and offers Wi-Fi 6, Bluetooth 5.2, and multiple ports, including HDMI 2.1 and USB.
description:
Asus TUF Gaming A15 (2024) Overview

Here’s a brief description of the design aesthetic, chipset, and port selection of the Asus TUF Gaming A15 (2023) laptop with the AMD Ryzen 7435HS  and NVidIA RTX 2050 GPU.

Design and Display

Although not as significant, Asus has also made changes to the chassis of the new TUF Gaming A15. The 2024 model is smaller than its predecessor and features distinct color options. Mecha Grey and Jager Grey feature two different finishes and logo placement. In addition, it has a single-zone Mini LED illuminated RGB keyboard and a four-way indicator above it. Opening the metal lid, you are greeted with a 15.6-inch IPS screen. Here, you can choose between 144Hz FHD and 165Hz QHD. This particular model is the former one.

Performance and Memory

This particular variant of Asus TUF Gaming A15 is powered by Ryzen 7 7435HS and NVidIA RTX 2050. It is a Zen 3+-based CPU with six cores, 12 threads, and a maximum boost speed of 4.55GHz. On the graphics front, you can choose from three NVidIA RTX 40-series GPUs. This one packs the RTX 2050 with 4GB GDDR6 VRAM and a maximum TGP of 75W, considering the 60W Dynamic Boost.Like last year, all the models come with a MUX switch, allowing users to bypass the integrated GPU for higher graphics performance in gaming. New to this year is the Advanced Optimus, which automates the whole process.

Cooling and Memory

To keep with the added power, the Asus TUF Gaming A15 (2024) comes with improved thermals. The colling setup includes dual Arc Flow fans with 84 blades as sharp as 0.1mm. This results in 13% more airflow compared to last year. In addition, the laptop has up to five copper heat pipes and four exhaust vents.As for memory, the laptops ships with 8GB or 16GB of DDR5-4800 RAM. The SO-DIMM slots are user-accessible, and you can expand it up to 32GB. Likewise, you get 512GB PCIe 4.0 SSD storage.

Rest of the Specs

Fueling the new TUF Gaming A15 2024 is a 4-cell 90Wh battery. With the fast charging support, it can go from 0% to 50% in just 30 minutes. Connectivity options on the laptop include four USB ports, one HDMI 2.1, one RJ-45, one combo audio jack, and a Kensington lock. The laptop has Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2 for wireless connection. The audio setup includes two 2W speakers with Dolby Atmos and Hi-Res Audio.

title: MSI Rawp_ider GE68 HX 2023 (13th Gen i9-13900HX, RTX 4070, 32GB, 2TB, 16" QHD 240Hz)
short_description: The MSI Raider GE68 HX 2023 is a high-performance gaming laptop powered by a 13th-generation Intel Core i9-13900HX processor and an RTX 4070 GPU, delivering impressive graphics and speed. It comes with 32GB of RAM, expandable up to 64GB, and a 2TB NVMe SSD. The 16-inch display offers a 240Hz refresh rate and covers 100% of the DCI-P3 color spectrum. The laptop has a 99.99WHr battery and a 240W charger, ensuring long-lasting gaming sessions.
description:
Here is a quick overview of the latest MSI Raider GE68 HX 2023 powered by Intel Core i9-13900HX and RTX 4070.

MSI Raider GE68 HX 2023 Overview

Design and Performance

The MSI Raider GE68 HX 2023 is a compact and powerful gaming laptop. Measuring 357 x 284 x 22.20 mm and weighing 2.7 kg, it features a Core Black design. It is powered by a 13th Gen Intel Core i9-13900HX processor with 24 cores, 32 threads, and a 36MB L3 cache. The processor’s E-Cores and P-Cores offer adjustable base and boost clock speeds. Additionally, the NVidIA GeForce RTX 4070 GPU with 8GB VRAM and 140W TGP delivers dedicated graphics performance.

Memory, Storage, and Display

The laptop comes with 32GB of DDR5 RAM, which is expandable up to 64 GB. Storage includes a 2TB M.2 NVMe PCIe SSD and two additional M.2 PCIe slots for further expansion. The 16-inch IPS LCD has a matte finish, supports QHD+ resolution, offers a 240Hz refresh rate, and covers 100% of the DCI-P3 color gamut.

Connectivity, Input, and Battery

The MSI Raider GE68 HX 2023 offers various connectivity options, including USB Type-A, USB Type-C, Thunderbolt 4, HDMI, and a 3.5mm audio jack. It also features a Micro SD card reader, WiFi 6E, and Bluetooth 5.3. The keyboard is a Per-Key RGB by SteelSeries, and the laptop includes a trackpad, a 1080p IR HD webcam, and security features like fingerprint, face unlock, and TPM. A 240W AC adapter for charging supports the 99Wh 4-cell Li-ion battery.

short_description: HP Notebook 14 2021 (FQ1051AU) is an entry-level laptop that gets the basics done. It is powered by a Ryzen 3 5300U processor coupled with 4GB of RAM. And by default, it comes with SSD storage which means you're sure to get faster read and write speed from traditional hard disk. Moreover, it's a portable machine at just 1.4 kg of weight, and you get a 14-inch screen on the front. The HP 14 should serve you well for your basic daily commutes.
description:
HP Notebook 14 (2021): Overview

HP Notebook 14 (2021) with Ryzen 3 5300U is an affordable laptop with satisfactory battery life. It weighs just 1.4 kilos, making it suitable for everyday carry. With its capable processor, it'll be able to handle most office and school work. Here's a brief description of the build, chipset, and connectivity options on the HP Notebook 14 (2021).

Display and Design 

As the name suggests, the HP Notebook 14 (2021) sports a 14" IPS panel of FHD (1920x 1080) resolution. It is a 60Hz display that can also reach 250 nits of brightness. Furthermore, the display covers 45% of the NTSC color gamut so watching movies or media on this screen is more enjoyable.

Performance and Memory 

Under the hood, the HP Notebook 14 (2021) is powered by AMD's Ryzen 3 5300U processor. It features Integrated Ryzen Radeon graphics. The RAM is fast DDR4 memory. This variant comes with 8GB RAM and up to 512GB of M.2 SSD.

Connectivity and Extras

HP Notebook 14 (2021) ships with WIFI 5 and Bluetooth 4.2 technology. It houses a 41Wh-rated lithium-polymer battery and comes with a 45Wh charging adapter in the box. As for the ports, you get 2 USB Type-A ports, a USB Type-C, an HDMI port, and one 3.5mm port.

title: Acer Spin 3 2023 (Gen i3-N305, 8GB, 256GB, 14 FHD Touch)
short_description: The Acer Spin 3 2023 is an affordable 2-in-1 laptop. It is powered by an Intel Core i3-N305 processor, paired with 8GB RAM and 256GB SSD. Alongside that, you get a 14\" IPS touch display with FHD resolution and 40 Wh battery.
description:
Acer Spin 3 (2023) Overview:

Heres a brief description of the features, performance, and connectivity options on the Acer Spin 3 (2023) with the i3-N305 chipset.

Design and Display

The new Spin has a modern design with minimal bezels. Being a 2-in-1, it can also fold on itself to be used like a tablet. Moreover, it is relatively compact weighing about 1.54 kg. Moving on to the display, its a 14-inch FHD IPS panel. Similarly, the 60Hz touch screen has multi-touch and AES pen support for workflows requiring stylus input.

This 8 Core, 8 Thread CPU has boost clock frequencies of 3.8GHz.  Furthermore, it is complemented by Intel’s integrated UHD Graphics. Movimemory,  you get 8GB of RAM alongside a 256GB M.2 SSD. As for the OS, the laptop boots on Windows 11 Home out of the box. 

Battery and Connectivity

The new Spin 3 (2023) features a 40Wh 3-cell Lithium battery. You can charge it via the included 65W Type-C adapter. For wired connections, you get one USB Type-C port, two USB Type-A port, and an HDMI port.

title: boAt Airdopes Supreme
short_description: boAt Airdopes Supreme is a budget earbuds that come with Spatial Audio and 24-bit audio processing. These features are usually reserved for high-end audio wearables, yet here we are! Other than that, these earbuds come in an in-ear fit with IPX4 water and dust resistance. They also offer ENC during calls with the help of a quad-mic setup. The boAt Airdopes Supreme is rich in features offering things like in-ear detection, multipoint connection, IWP, BEAST Mode, etc. On top of that, they also offer up to 50 hours of combined playtime.
description:
Are you looking for earbuds with spatial audio and high-quality 24-bit audio processing? What if I told you, you could get these features under NPR 4,000? Yes, you heard that right! Under NPR 4,000 — its boAt Airdopes Supreme!

boAt Airdopes Supreme Overview

Design and Audio

The boAt Airdopes Supreme comes in an in-ear design, offering IPX4 splash and water resistance for added durability. The earbuds feature capacitive touch controls on the earpiece area, allowing easy access to various functions. The charging case has a pebble-shaped design with a multicoloured LED indicator, a USB Type-C charging port, and a reset button at the bottom. It is available in five colour options: Swedish White, Classic Black, Sporty Blue, Metallic Grey, and Sage Green, though only the first two colours are available in Nepal.Equipped with 10mm drivers, the boAt Airdopes Supreme delivers clear audio, supported by AI ENx with wind noise reduction technology. This, along with four microphones, helps enhance call quality. Additionally, the earbuds offer spatial audio with 24-bit audio processing, one of their standout features.

Features and Battery

The boAt Airdopes Supreme uses Bluetooth v5.2 for seamless transmission, supporting both AAC and SBC codecs. A useful multipoint connectivity feature allows users to toggle between two connected devices, and the Insta Wake N’ Pair function simplifies the pairing process. Moreover, the earbuds come with in-ear detection, adding convenience during daily use. Gamers will appreciate the BEAST Mode, which reduces latency to as low as 65ms, improving the gaming experience.In terms of battery life, each boAt Airdopes Supreme earbud houses a 35mAh cell, while the charging case has a 400mAh battery. This combination offers up to 50 hours of playtime. When low on power, the ASAP Charge feature provides 150 minutes of playback with just 10 minutes of charging. Full charging, however, takes about two hours. Lastly, users can access additional controls and customisation through the boAt Hearables app, available on both Android and iOS.

title: HP Victus 15 2022 (12th Gen i5-12450H, RTX 3050, 8GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD)
short_description: HP's offering towards entry-level gamers, the HP Victus 15  is a beast of a laptop packing in the 12th gen Intel Core i5-12450H and NVidIA's RTX 3050 GPU. Its 15.6\" screen with 45% NTSC coverage making it fun to watch media and play games. It has a good battery, fast memory, and a decent port selection. You can't go wrong with choosing a good deal.
description:
HP Victus 15 (2022) Overview:

Here's a brief description of the design aesthetic, chipset, and port selection of the HP Victus 15 (2022) laptop with the Intel Core i5- 12450H CPU and NVidIA RTX 3050 GPU.

Design and Build 

HP Victus 15 (2022) comes with a 15.6-inch display. It's an IPS LCD panel that covers 45% of the NTSC colour gamut. The laptop has an 82% screen-to-body aspect ratio and can reach 250 nits of peak brightness.All this is housed inside a new form factor that tries to mimic the more premium Omen series. As you would expect, it is made of plastic. HP Victus 15 (2022) measures 23.5mm in thickness and weighs around 2.48 kg.

Performance and Memory

Regarding CPU, HP Victus 15 (2022) comes with the 12th generation Intel Core i5-12450H, which can handle most things without a need for worry. As for graphics, you get NVidIA GeForce RTX 3050, which has 4GB of GDDR6 RAM. Unfortunately, HP has not specified the TGP here.However, since the GPU is based on a newer microarchitecture, it brings hardware-accelerated Ray Tracing, DLSS supersampling, and other RTX features.You get two DDR4 SO-DIMM slots, one preinstalled with an 8GB DDR4 stick. In the future, you can add 16GB sticks to both slots. Hence it can have a maximum of 32GB RAM.

Battery and Connectivity

HP Victus 15 (2022) packs a 52.5Wh battery. Likewise, you get a 200W AC charger. It provides up to 8 hours and 45 minutes of video playback, whereas the battery life may dip to 5 hours and 45 minutes on mixed usage.In terms of ports, you get one USB-C, three USB-A, one HDMI, one ethernet, an SD card reader, and a 3.5mm headphone jack. Moreover, the keyboard is backlit, and Lenovo includes a 720p HD camera.

title: Asus TUF Gaming A15 2023 (Ryzen 9 7940HS, RTX 4060, 16GB, 1TB, 15.6" FHD 144Hz )
short_description: Asus has refreshed the TUF Gaming A15 (2023) with Ryzen 7000-series CPUs and NVidIA RTX 40-series GPUs. The A15 (FA507XV) packs the CPU-GPU pair of Ryzen 9 7940HS and RTX 4060 GPU (140W). It ships with 16GB of DDR5 RAM and 1TB of SSD storage, both of which are upgradeable.
description:
Asus TUF Gaming A15 (2023) Overview:

In January, Asus refreshed the TUF Gaming A15 with the latest AMD Ryzen 7000-series processors and NVidIA RTX 4000-series GPU. You can finally buy this gaming laptops laptop in Nepal. So, let’s get into the specs, features, official price, and availability of the Asus TUF Gaming A15 (2023) laptop with Ryzen 9 7940HS and RTX 4060 in Nepal.

Design and Display

Although not as significant, Asus has also changed the chassis of the new TUF Gaming A15. The 2023 model is smaller than its predecessor and features a neutral Jager Grey colour option and logo placed on the edge of the metal lid.In addition, it has a single-zone Mini LED illuminated RGB keyboard and a four-way indicator above it. Inside you are greeted with a 15.6-inch anti-glare IPS panel. It boasts an FHD resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels and refreshes at the rate of 144Hz. This screen has a colour coverage of 100% sRGB and 75.35% Adobe.

Performance and Memory

The TUF Gaming A15 2023 (FA507XV) comes with AMD Ryzen 9 7940HS and NVidIA RTX 4060. The Ryzen 9 7940HS boasts 8 cores, 16 threads, and a maximum boost speed of 5.2 GHz. In addition, this TUF Gaming A15 comes coupled with RTX 4060 on the graphics front. It boasts 8GB GDDR6 VRAM and a maximum clock speed and TGP of 2420MHz and 140W respectively.Like last year, all the models come with a MUX switch, allowing users to bypass the integrated GPU for higher graphics performance in gaming. New to this year is the Advanced Optimus, which automates the whole process.

Cooling and Memory

To keep with the added power, the Asus TUF Gaming A15 (2023) comes with improved thermals. The colling setup includes dual Arc Flow fans with 84 blades as sharp as 0.1mm. This results in 13% more airflow compared to last year. In addition, the laptop has up to five copper heat pipes and four exhaust vents.As for memory, the laptops ships with 16GB of DDR5-4800 RAM. The SO-DIMM slots are user-accessible, and you can expand it up to 32GB. It comes with 1TB PCIe 4.0 NVMe SSD storage via the dual M.2 slots. You can also double your storage if need be.

Rest of the Specs

Fueling the new TUF Gaming A15 2023 is a 4-cell 90Wh battery. With the fast charging support, it can go from 0% to 50% in just 30 minutes. Connectivity options on the laptop include four USB ports, one HDMI 2.1, one RJ-45, one combo audio jack, and a Kensington lock. The laptop has Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.3 for wireless connection. The audio setup includes two speakers with Dolby Atmos and Hi-Res Audio.All in all, if you are looking for a gaming companion then the Asus TUF Gaming A15 (2023) laptop with Ryzen 9 7940HS and RTX 4060 will surely be a solid choice for you!

description:
HP Spectre x360 13 (2023): Overview 

HP Spectre x360 13 (2023) with the Intel Core i7-1355U chip is a premium 2-in-1 with a great display and battery life. It weighs just 1.6 kilos, making it an ideal everyday carry. title: Redmi Note 11
short_description: The Redmi Note 11 is the successor to last year's fan-favorite Redmi Note 10. The phone features an AMOLED display and stereo speakers, making it an excellent multimedia consumption device for the price.
description:
Redmi Note 11 Overview, Price:

Here, we will discuss the full specifications and price of the Redmi Note 11.

Design, Display

The Redmi Note 11 features a boxy design with squared-off edges and is available in three color options—Graphite Gray, Twilight Blue, and Star Blue. The first two shade has a matte finish on the back while the latter has a shiny gradient look to it.Like its predecessor, there's a 6.43-inch FHD+ AMOLED panel with Full HD+ resolution on the front. However, it now has a 90Hz refresh and 180Hz sampling rate, as well as compatibility with the DCI-P3 color gamut. Likewise, the brightness on this device is rather impressive too, with a peak brightness of 1000nits.

Performance

Under the hood, it's powered by a Snapdragon 680 processor. The SoC is manufactured on a 6nm node and comprises 4 x Cortex-A73 (2.4GHz) cores and 4 x Cortex-A53 (1.9GHz) cores. While it is a capable day-to-day performer, it does not support 5G bands. This makes the Note 11 a 4G handset.In terms of software, it comes pre-installed with the latest MIUI 13, while the core platform remains Android 11 from last year. Anyways, the memory option includes up to 6GB of RAM and up to 128GB of internal storage. The latter is expandable via a microSD card.

Cameras, Others

At the back, there's a quad-camera setup led by a 50MP primary lens. Accompanying this is an 8MP ultrawide sensor, 2MP macro, and 2MP depth lens. Similarly, a punch-hole cutout on the front houses a 13MP camera for selfies and video calls.Moreover, Redmi Note 11 gets its juice from a 5000mAh battery that supports 30W fast charging. You get a compatible adapter inside the box that takes around an hour to completely charge the cell.

title: Zeblaze Vibe 7 Lite
short_description: The Zeblaze Vibe 7 Lite offers a solid blend of both durability and loaded functions. With its rugged design, customizable watch faces, and health-tracking features, it is suitable for those who need a reliable companion for both daily activities and workouts. The 14-day battery life with Bluetooth calling makes it worth it with the compatibility with both Android and iOS. So, if you are looking for a budget smartwatch with decent features, check this out!
description:
Below is a short overview of the Zeblaze Vibe 7 Lite including its features and battery life.

Zeblaze Vibe 7 Lite Overview:

Design and Display

The Zeblaze Vibe 7 Lite comes in a rugged design that features a Zinc alloy casing and buttons. It measures 49 mm x 49 mm x 13 mm in dimensions and weighs just 47 and a half grams without the straps. Furthermore, it has passed 12 military-grade tests and offers durability of 3 ATM, and IP69K.A 1.47-inch IPS panel greets us on the front with a resolution of 360 x 360 pixels, 326PPI, and Corning Gorilla Glass protection. Finally, the Zeblaze Vibe 7 comes in four different colour options: Meteorite Black, Wild Green, Desert Grey, and Electric Orange.

Performance and Features

This smartwatch comes with the Realtek 8763EW chipset under the hood. It is the same SoC that was featured on the Zeblaze GTR 3 Pro as well. It comes with all the basic watch features like time, date, stopwatch, and so on. Meanwhile, you also get a wide range of watch face customisation.Furthermore, it comes with 100+ workout modes while tracking your health vitals such as blood oxygen, heart rate, and menstrual cycle. And, most importantly it offers Bluetooth calling capability as well as a personal assistant.

Battery and the rest

In terms of battery, it comes with a 280 mAh lithium polymer cell that can provide you with up to 14 days of general usage. The number jumps by an additional 11 days when the battery save mode is turned on. Additionally, the Zeblaze Vibe 7 Lite can be fully charged in about 1.5 hours with the magnetic charger that’s included in the box.In terms of wireless connectivity, it comes with Bluetooth v5.2 (BLE). It is compatible with devices running on Android 5.0, and iOS 10.0 or later versions. It also offers additional functionality through the FitCloudPro app.

short_description: The ASUS Zenbook 15 OLED is an ultrabook with an OLED display and decent battery life, weighing just 1.4 kg. It features a 15.6\" 2.8K OLED panel with a 16:9 aspect ratio, 120Hz refresh rate, and 600 nits of HDR peak brightness. The laptop is powered by AMD's 7000 series processor, Ryzen 7 7735U, with a base frequency of 2.7 GHz and a maximum boost of 4.75 GHz. It has 16GB of LPDDR5 RAM and 1 TB of M.2 PCIe 4.0 SSD. The Zenbook 15 comes with WiFi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3 technology, a 67Wh-rated lithium-polymer battery, and a 65W AC adapter.
description:
ASUS Zenbook 15 OLED Overview:

ASUS Zenbook 15 2023 is an ultrabook with an OLED display and okay battery life. The laptop weighs just 1.4 kg for you to carry around daily. It has the latest memory available and a decently capable processor for your basic and normal tasks. Nonetheless, it lacks discrete graphics, which the Zenbook series is not for.Here's a brief overview of the ASUS Zenbook 15 OLED 2023:

Design and Build 

You know it's a better build when you hear Zenbook. The ASUS Zenbook 15 OLED uses aluminum from top to bottom for its body. The screen features a 15.6" 2.8K OLED panel with a 16:9 aspect ratio, 120Hz refresh rate, and 600 nits of HDR peak brightness. Additionally, this glossy display covers 1.07 billion colors and 100% of the DCI-P3 color gamut, plus it is Pantone-validated.

Performance and Memory 

Under the hood, AMD's 7000 series processor powers the Zenbook OLED 15 2023, specifically the Ryzen 7 7735U. This has a base frequency of 2.7 GHz and can boost up to 4.75 GHz at maximum. Moreover, the laptop features AMD's Integrated Radeon Graphics, 16GB of LPDDR5 RAM, and 1 TB of M.2 PCIe 4.0 SSD.

Battery and Connectivity

Other than that, the Zenbook 15 comes with the latest WiFi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3 technology. It has a 67Wh-rated lithium-polymer battery with a 65W AC adapter included in the box but can also be charged using two USB-C ports in the laptop. Not only that, it has a single USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A, one HDMI 2.1, a Micro SD card reader, and a 3.5mm jack in terms of ports.

title: Dell Latitude 14 3440 2023 (13th Gen i5-1335U, 8GB, 512GB, 14" FHD)
short_description: The Dell Latitude 14 3440 (2023) is a business laptop with a 13th Gen Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB of RAM (upgradable to 64GB), and a 512GB PCIe NVMe SSD for fast storage. It features a sturdy design with a carbon fiber-reinforced plastic chassis, a spill-resistant keyboard, and a webcam shutter for privacy. The 14-inch FHD LED display has an anti-glare coating. Connectivity includes USB Type-C, USB Type-A, HDMI, RJ-45 Ethernet, a universal audio jack, a power adapter port, a microSD card slot, Wi-Fi 6, and Bluetooth. The laptop offers decent battery life with a 3-cell 42Wh battery.
description:
Here is a quick overview of the Dell Latitude 14 3440 (2023) with 13th gen Intel Core i5-1335U.

Dell Latitude 14 3440 (2023) Overview:

Performance 

The Dell Latitude 14 3440 2023 comes with a 13th Gen Intel Core i5-1335U processor, a deca-core CPU with a base frequency of 1.3 GHz and a boost frequency of 4.6 GHz. This processor is suitable for everyday tasks such as web browsing, office work, video conferencing, and light photo editing. It also supports Intel Iris Xe Graphics, which is an integrated GPU that can handle some casual gaming and graphics-intensive applications.The laptop also has 8GB of DDR4 RAM, which is enough for multitasking and running multiple programs at once. However, if you need more memory, you can upgrade it up to 64GB by replacing the existing RAM module.The storage capacity of the laptop is 512GB, which is provided by a PCIe NVMe SSD. This type of storage is faster and more reliable than a traditional hard drive, and it also helps to improve the boot time and loading speed of the laptop.

Battery Life

The battery life of the Dell Latitude 14 3440 (2023) is decent, but not exceptional. The laptop has a 3-cell 42Wh battery.

Design and Display

The Dell Latitude 15 3440 has a simple and sturdy design that is typical of business laptops. The laptop has a plastic chassis that is reinforced with carbon fiber for extra durability. You get a spill-resistant keyboard and a webcam shutter for privacy.The display of the Dell Latitude 15 3440 is a 14-inch LED screen with a resolution of FHD. It has an anti-glare coating that reduces reflections and eye strain.

Ports and Connectivity

The Dell Latitude 14 3440 (2023) powered by Intel Core i5-1335U has a decent selection of ports and connectivity options for its price range. The laptop has, a USB Type-C port that supports DisplayPort alt mode and Power Delivery, two USB Type-A ports (USB 3.2 Gen1 and , an HDMI port, An RJ-45 Ethernet port, a universal audio jack,  a power adapter port, and a microSD card slot.  The laptop also has wireless connectivity options such as Intel Wi-Fi 6 AX201, which supports Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) and Bluetooth.

description:
The HP ProBook 455 G5 is a traditional laptop that comes with AMD A10-9620P. Heres a quick overview of this HP budget laptop.

HP ProBook 455 G5 (AMD A10)

Design and Performance

The HP ProBook 455 g5 offers a budget-friendly option for users seeking a portable computing solution. Weighing in at 2.02 kg (4.45 lb), it provides basic portability without sacrificing durability.The ProBook 455 g5 is powered by the AMD A10-9620P. With frequencies ranging from 2.5 GHz to 3.0 GHz, users can handle typical tasks like web browsing, document editing, and multimedia playback with relative ease.

title: iPhone 16 Plus
short_description: The iPhone 16 Plus features a redesigned vertical camera module, a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, and a new action button. It’s powered by the Apple A18 chip and runs iOS 18, with a dual-camera system (48MP main and 12MP ultrawide) and a 12MP front camera. It supports WiFi 7, 5G, NFC, USB Type-C, and GPS.
description:
The iPhone 16 Plus is introduced this year, continuing the established trend. Historically, Plus models haven’t received significant upgrades over the standard versions and are often the least popular in the lineup. In this article, we’ll examine the specifications and features of the iPhone 16 Plus and its expected price in Nepal.

iPhone 16 Plus Overview

Design and Display

Talking about the design, the 16 Plus features a redesigned vertical camera module. Additionally, it sports a boxy metal frame and a glass sandwich design. It introduces an Action Button and a new Capture Button, replacing the alert slider. As a "Plus" model, it has a taller body and a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display. Moreover, it comes with a Faceid for 3D security and the refresh rate remains at 60Hz, differentiating it from the Pro models. A 120Hz refresh rate would have been a welcome upgrade as we move into 2025.

Performance and Memory

The iPhone 16 Plus is powered by the new Apple A18 chipset. While it’s not a Pro model, it offers some improvements over the A16 Bionic found in the iPhone 15 and iPhone 15 Plus. The device includes the latest AI features. Furthermore, it also runs on iOS 18, though the most advanced AI capabilities are reserved for the Pro models.

Camera

The iPhone 16 Plus has a dual-camera system on the rear, which includes a 48MP main camera with Optical Image Stabilization (OIS), along with a 12MP ultrawide. Moreover, for selfies and video calls, the device features a 12MP front-facing camera, maintaining the standard quality expected from recent iPhone models.

Battery and Others

The iPhone 16 Plus claims up to 26 hours of video playback which is actually an hour less than its predecessor. Additionally, the smartphone offers a comprehensive range of connectivity features, including support for WiFi 7, 5G, NFC, a USB Type-C port, and GPS.

title: iPad Mini 7 (2024)
short_description: The 2024 iPad Mini comes with smarter AI features, like a better Siri and handwriting recognition, plus a new calculator app. Powered by the fast A17 Pro chip, it’s super smooth with 8GB of RAM and up to 512GB of storage. Its compact size, solid display, and long battery life make it a great choice if you want something powerful and portable.
description:
Apple iPad Mini 7 (2024) Overview

AI and Software

The 2024 iPad Mini gets major upgrades through software. It now packs Apple Intelligence, with tools like Writing Tools for refining text across apps like Mail, Notes, and Pages, plus a smarter Siri with better language understanding. You can also access ChatGPT for extra info.AI is the big draw, but it’ll come later with the iPadOS 18.1 update this October. This update adds Apple Pencil Pro support, letting you use features like squeeze and roll. You can also use Smart Script to write and edit in your own handwriting, transcribe audio, customize the home screen, and send RCS messages. Plus, the iPad finally has a calculator app and a new Math Notes feature to solve handwritten equations, create variables, and insert graphs.

Performance

Much of the AI heavy-duty is all thanks to the A17 Pro chipset underneath. It is quite a significant jump from the A15 Bionic silicon on the previous iteration of the iPad. This processor arrived alongside Pro models of iPhone 15 with a 16-core Neural Engine (NPU). Similarly, it has a hexa-core CPU, two of the cores are dedicated to pure performance while the rest are for efficiency. Then for graphics, there is a five-core GPU. The whole thing is fabricated on TSMC’s 3nm process and as a result, is very efficient.In the meantime, the iPad Mini 7 (2024) is available in three storage options, those being 128GB, 256GB, and 512GB. This is a sizable upgrade over the last generation of iPad, given that it started at a measly 64GB. Though Apple does not outright mention it, they have bumped up the memory on this thing. The latest iPhones were upgraded with 8GB RAM, as it is a minimum requirement for facilitating all the AI tasks. Hence, the latest iPad now likely has the same amount of memory as well. A 19.3Wh battery powers this tablet and with it you can get up to 10 hours of usage.

Design and Display

The iPad Mini 7 (2024) looks pretty much the same on the outside. It keeps the same compact design and aluminum body, and comes in Blue, Purple, Starlight, and Space Grey. You can pick either the WiFi-only model or the cellular one, both supporting WiFi 6E and Bluetooth v5.3, with the cellular version also getting 5G. It has 12MP cameras on both the front and back, plus a Touch id sensor on the top.For the display, it has an 8.3-inch Liquid Retina panel with a 1,488 x 2,266 resolution. The screen covers a wide P3 color range, hits 500 nits of brightness, and includes True Tone for a more comfortable view. It’s also laminated with an oleophobic and antireflective coating.A

title: Remax CozyBuds W16
short_description: The Remax Coyzbuds W16 offer high-quality audio with dual ENC technology and 13 mm drivers, providing clear, immersive sound. They feature Bluetooth® 5.3 for stable connectivity, integrated controls, and compatibility with Android and iOS. With a battery life of 5 hours per charge and up to 20 hours using the charging case, these earbuds ensure long-lasting performance and convenience.
description:
Lets have a quick overview of the Remax CozyBuds W16, which packs a lot of features like dual ENC, long battery life and so much more.

Remax CozyBuds W16 Overview

Audio

The Remax Coyzbuds W16 deliver a high-quality audio experience with their advanced dual ENC (Environmental Noise Cancellation) technology, ensuring crystal-clear sound during calls and music playback. These earbuds feature 13 mm driver units that produce a rich, immersive sound with a broad frequency response range of 20Hz to 20kHz. With a 32-ohm driver impedance and 5mW rated power, they provide powerful, distortion-free audio that satisfies both casual listeners and audiophiles. Whether you enjoy deep bass notes or crisp high frequencies, the Cozybuds W16 offer an exceptional listening experience in any environment.

Connectivity and Controls

The Remax Coyzbuds W16 ensure seamless and efficient connectivity with the latest Bluetooth® 5.3 technology. This enables a stable and fast connection with a range of up to 10 meters, making them ideal for both indoor and outdoor use. These earbuds are compatible with both Android and iOS devices, offering versatile use across different platforms. You can easily manage playback and calls with the integrated controls on the earbuds, allowing you to play, pause, skip tracks, and handle previous tracks. The built-in microphone ensures clear voice transmission, enhancing the overall communication experience.

Battery Life and Convenient Charging

The Remax Coyzbuds W16 boast a significant battery life, with each earbud featuring a 35mAh capacity that provides up to 5 hours of continuous playback on a single charge. The charging case, with a substantial 300mAh capacity, can recharge the earbuds fully up to four times, extending the total playing time to an impressive 20 hours. You can fully charge the charging case in just 2 hours via the convenient Type-C port. With a remarkable standby time of up to 120 days, the Cozybuds W16 stay ready to go, ensuring you have reliable audio support whenever you need it.

title: Samsung Galaxy A24 4G
short_description: Samsung Galaxy A24 4G shares a similar design as its sibling, the Galaxy A34 5G. It is powered by a MediaTek Helio G99 chipset based on a 12nm fabrication process. The phone features a 6.6-inch AMOLED display with FHD+ resolution and a 90Hz refresh rate. The device runs on Android 13-based One UI Core 5 and is equipped with a 5000mAh battery that supports 25W fast charging.
description:
Design and Display

The Samsung Galaxy A24 4G has a 6.5-inch Super AMOLED screen that delivers a resolution of 1080 x 2340 pixels and a refresh rate of 90 Hz. The screen also has a peak brightness of 1000 nits, which makes it easy to see even in bright sunlight. Design-wise, it takes a lot of cues from its sibling, Galaxy A34 5G.

Performance

The Samsung Galaxy A24 4G is powered by the MediaTek Helio G99 chipset, which is a 6nm octa-core processor that can handle multitasking and gaming with ease. The device also has 6GB or 8GB of RAM and 128GB or 256GB of internal storage, which can be expanded up to 1TB with a microSD card. Running the OS is Samsung's OneUI Core 5.1 built on top of Android 13. The device is guaranteed to receive 4 years of OS and 5 years of security updates.

Camera

As for the optics, the smartphone houses a triple rear camera setup that consists of a 50MP main camera with optical image stabilization (OIS), a 5MP ultra-wide camera with a 123-degree field of view, and a 2MP macro camera for close-up shots. The device also has a 13MP selfie camera that can record 1080p videos at 30 frames per second. The camera features include LED flash, panorama, HDR, bokeh mode, and pro mode.

Battery and Others

The Samsung Galaxy A24 4G has a 5000mAh battery that supports 25W fast charging. Other attributes of the smartphone are a side-mounted fingerprint scanner on the side, NFC for contactless payments, a USB Type-C port for data transfer and charging, and a 3.5mm headphone jack for audio. The device supports dual SIM cards and has various connectivity options such as Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPS, and LTE.

title: Dell G15 5520 2022 (12th Gen i7-12700H, RTX 3050 Ti ,16GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD 120Hz)
short_description: This Dell G15 5520 gaming laptop is equipped with a 12th Gen Intel Core i7-12700H CPU and Nvidia RTX 3050 Ti graphics. Memory options include  16GB of DDR4 RAM and 512GB of SSD. The RAM can be expanded up to 32GB. Furthermore, Dell has installed a 15.6-inch LCD display with a refresh rate of 120Hz on the front.
