description:
If you're looking for a capable gaming laptop that can handle 1080p gaming at high settings, you might want to check out the Dell G15 2022 (5520).

Dell G15 5520 (2022) Overview:

Performance

This laptop features a 12th Gen Intel Core i7-12700H processor and an NVidIA GeForce RTX 3050 Ti GPU, which deliver strong performance for most games. The chip is paired with 16GB of RAM and a 512GB SSD, which are enough for multitasking and storing your games. You can also upgrade the memory and storage yourself, as they are user-replaceable.The laptop has a decent selection of ports, including three USB-A, one USB-C, an HDMI 2.1, an Ethernet, and a headphone jack. The USB-C port supports video output but not charging or Thunderbolt 4.

Design and Display

The Dell G15 5520 2022 comes in three color options: Dark Shadow Gray, Obsidian Black Special Edition, and Specter Green with Camouflage. The laptop has a plastic chassis with a textured lid that features the Dell logo and a vent for airflow. It is on a thick and heavy profile, measuring 1.1 inches in height and weighing 2.57 kg. Hence, it may not be the most portable or sleek device, but it feels sturdy and durable.You get a full-size keyboard with a numeric keypad and a G-key for quick access to gaming functions. The keyboard is backlit with either orange or RGB lighting, depending on the color choice.The laptop has a 15.6-inch display with various resolutions and refresh rate options. You can choose between an FHD (1920 x 1080) 120Hz, an FHD 165Hz, and a QHD (2560 x 1440) 240Hz panel. This particular model has an FHD panel with 120Hz. The higher refresh rates are ideal for smooth gaming, while the QHD option offers sharper visuals.

Battery and Others

The Dell G15 (2022) gets its juice from a 56Wh battery with 180W charging support. Talking of ports, it has got a decent selection, including three USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 ports, one USB-C port with DisplayPort alt mode, an HDMI 2.1 port, an Ethernet port, a headphone jack, and a power port. The USB-C port supports video output but not charging or Thunderbolt 4. The laptop also has an HD webcam with dual microphones and stereo speakers with Nahimic audio software.

title: Vivo Y19s
short_description: Vivo Y19s is a budget phone that comes with good enough specs. You get a plastic build with IP64 water and dust resistance. On the front, it has a 6.68 LCD panel with HD+ resolution and 90Hz refresh rate. Underneath, the phone packs a Unisoc T612 chip with 6GB memory and 128GB storage. Likewise, it packs a 50MP and 0.08MP camera on the back while having an 8MP unit. Lastly, the Vivo Y19s houses a 5,500 mAh battery with 15W fast charging support.
description:
Are you looking for a budget smartphone that isnt very heavy on your pockets? Then you might want to take a look at the Vivo Y19s!

Vivo Y19s Overview

Design and Display

Although the name might have you believe it’s related to the Y19, it’s much closer to call it a follow-up to the Y17s. So on the design front, the phone has a sleek look with rounded edges and appears to have a matte or slightly shimmery finish. Furthermore, the phone has a dual rear camera prominently featured, with the cameras arranged vertically in an oval-shaped camera module.

On the front, this smartphone has a 6.68” LCD panel with a 90Hz refresh rate and goes up to 1000 nits of peak brightness. Additionally, it boasts a drop-resistant design and is rated for IP64, making it dust-tight and offering basic water resistance.

Performance

On the inside, Vivo Y19s features a Unisoc T612 chipset, built on a 12nm process and featuring two Cortex-A75 cores and six A55, all running at 1.8GHz, alongside a Mali-G57 GPU.

Furthermore, this chip is paired with up to 6GB of LPDDR4X RAM and 128 GB of eMMC 5.1 storage. While all that’s not exciting, the bright side is that the card tray can accommodate two nano-SIMs and a microSD.

The Vivo Y19s features a standout 5,150mAh battery, which is impressive for a phone of this size. However, the battery charges at a modest 15W. Notably, it is rated to retain at least 80% of its original capacity after 1,460 cycles, meaning that if you charge it once a day, it should last long even after four years of use.

Camera and the rest

The rear camera has a 50MP sensor, and the selfie camera is inside a punchhole with a resolution of just 5MP. In addition, there is an RGB LED ring on the camera island that can be used for notifications or to add a bit of flair to music.

Moreover, the Vivo Y19s launches with FuntouchOS 14, based on Android 14. It comes with stereo speakers, and the company claims that in noisy environments, you can boost the volume up to 300%, which is most likely just a gimmick. Additionally, this smartphone includes a 3.5mm headphone jack at the bottom.

title: HiFuture Mate 2 Pro
short_description: HiFuture Mate 2 Pro is an open-ear TWS with wings for easy ear placement. It has an IPX5 water-resistance rating and comes in black and white colors featuring aptX adaptive support and Bluetooth 5.2. The earbuds have a 70 mAh battery in each earpiece and a 500 mAh battery in the case, allowing them to last around 20 hours.
description:
HiFuture Mate 2 Pro Overview:

Design

Starting with, HiFuture Mate 2 Pro is an open-ear TWS. The wings go up and around the buds to hold them near the ears. If you dont know what an open-ear is, this type of earphone leaves your ear fully open, making you fully aware of your surroundings while immersing yourself in the music.On the other side, the Mate 2 Pro provides an IPX5 water-resistance rating. Moreover, they arrived in two different colors, Black and White.

Audio

On the audio side, Qualcomms QCC3040 chipset powers the Mate 2 Pro. This is why the earbuds have aptX adaptive support and come with Bluetooth 5.2. Here, the APTX Adaptive adapts the bitrate and the latency according to consumed content. Likewise, 15.4mm neodymium drivers are what they use to deliver the music. Users even get to use ENC while calling.

Battery

For endurance, the HiFuture Mate 2 Pro fits a 70 mAh cell into each earpiece. With an additional 500mAh battery in the case, the TWS as a whole lasts around 20 hours. Charging is kinda slow, though! Recharging them back to full takes a theoretical duration of 5 hours.

title: Acer Swift Go 14 2023 (13th Gen i7-1355U, 16GB, 512GB, 14 WUXGA Touch)
short_description: The Acer Swift Go 2023 is a thin and light laptop that features the Core i7-1355U processor, a powerful chip that can handle all your tasks and applications without worries. The laptop has a 14-inch IPS display with 16GB of LPDDR5 RAM and 512GB (or 1TB) of SSD. The laptop has a sleek metal design and weighs relatively lightly. The laptop also has a backlit keyboard, a fingerprint reader, a webcam with a privacy shutter, and a range of ports. Acer Swift Go 2023 is a great choice for anyone looking for a portable and powerful laptop that can handle work and entertainment.
description:
If you are looking for a laptop that combines performance, portability, and affordability, you might want to check out the Acer Swift Go 14 (2023) with an Intel Core i7-1355U processor. This laptop features a 14-inch FHD display with a 100% sRGB color gamut and a sleek aluminum chassis.

Acer Swift Go 14 2023 Overview:

Design

The Acer Swift Go 14 (2023) is one of the lightest and thinnest laptops in its class, weighing only 1.25 kg and measuring 14.9 mm thin. The laptop also has a fingerprint reader for easy and secure login and a backlit keyboard for comfortable typing.

Display

As the name suggests, Acer Swift Go 14 (2023) sports a 14" WUXGA (1920×1200) IPS display Besides that, it has narrow bezels and a high screen-to-body ratio. Furthermore, it also supports Acers BlueLightShield technology, which reduces eye strain by filtering out harmful blue light.

Performance

The Acer Swift Go 14 (2023) has a 13th Gen Intel Core i7-1355U CPU paired with 16GB of RAM and 512GB of SSD. The laptop supports  Wi-Fi 6E connectivity for blazing-fast internet. Whether you are working on multiple tasks, light photo editing, or browsing the web, the Acer Swift Go (2023) with i5 can handle it with its integrated graphics.

Ports and Battery

Talking of the port options, there are 2x USB-Cs, 2x USB Type-As, and a HDMI 2.1 port for connectivity. The laptop gets its juice from a 65Wh battery.

short_description: The Anker Soundcore V30i earbuds, available in black colour, are rated IPX5 for resistance to light rain and sweat. They offer 14.2mm dynamic drivers, Bluetooth 5.3 with AAC and SBC and 4 microphones.  Furthermore, these earbuds also enhance your listening experience with features like volume boost, reading mode, and custom EQ settings. description:
Anker has brought the Soundcore V30i wireless earbuds to the Nepali market, which provides a balance of performance and price. In this post, well examine closely what it has to offer, including major features, specifications, battery life, and the official price in Nepal.

Soundcore by Anker V30i Overview

Design and Audio

The Anker Soundcore V30i is designed for maximum comfort while keeping you connected. In terms of form factor, it features an open-ear design with soft and flexible ear hooks that wrap over the back of the ear. Furthermore, it has an IPX5 water resistance rating, which protects against water and perspiration splashes.The Soundcore also V30i features a 14.2mm bio-material diaphragm that produces deep, "robust bass" and well-balanced music.

Battery Life

One of the Soundcore V30is distinguishing qualities is its amazing battery life. These earphones last up to 12 hours on a single charge. Furthermore, with the supplied charging case, you can extend your listening duration to an impressive 36 hours. And what more? If youre in a hurry, a quick 10-minute charge provides an extra 3 hours of playing.

description:
If you are looking for a work laptop with some good features, you might want to check out the new Acer Aspire Go 14 with the AMD Ryzen 5 7520U. This year too, Acer has extended this series with some improvements. Here are some of the reasons that make this laptop a great choice for casual users.

Rest of the specs

It includes a USB Type-C port, two USB Type-A ports, an HDMI 2.1 port, and Wi-Fi 6E / Bluetooth 5.1 for wireless connectivity. And when its time to sail down the road, you can trust the laptops 53Wh 3-cell Li-ion battery to keep you moving all day long.

title: Ultima Watch Flex
short_description: The Ultima Watch Flex has a sleek design, 2.01-inch HD screen, and Bluetooth calling with a mic and speaker. It tracks sleep, heart rate, SpO2, and 100+ sports modes. The 300mAh battery lasts 2-3 days with heavy use or up to 7 days with light use, charging fully in 2.5 hours. It’s compatible with iOS 8.0+ and Android 5.1+ and pairs with the Ultima Fit app.
description:
Ultima Watch Flex Overview

Design and Display

Starting with the design, the Ultima Flex features a sleek, 3D curved edge and a comfortable silicone wrist strap. On the right side of the watch, you will find a navigation button for easy control. The watch’s dimensions are 48.8mm x 38.8mm x 12.9mm, offering a substantial but comfortable fit on most wrists.In the case of ingress protection, you get an IP67 rating, ensuring water resistance up to 1.5-metre depth, however, it is not recommended for swimming. When it comes to the display, the Ultima Flex sports a 2.01-inch TRU HD screen with a resolution of 240 x 296 pixels and an impressive brightness of 800 nits.

Bluetooth Calling and Features

One of the standout features of the Ultima Flex is its Bluetooth Calling functionality. Packed with Bluetooth 4.0, you can make and receive calls directly from the watch, reject incoming calls, and even view your call history. Moreover, the watch comes with an inbuilt microphone and speaker. Additionally, the Ultima Flex includes an auto sleep tracker, heart rate monitor, SpO2 sensor, and over 100 sports modes for tracking a wide variety of activities.

Battery and Charging

The Ultima Flex is powered by a 300mAh Lithium Polymer battery, and with heavy usage, it can last between 2 to 3 days, while normal usage can stretch up to 7 days on a single charge. Charging the watch is also quick, taking about 2.5 hours to reach a full battery. The watch is compatible with both iOS 8.0 and Android 5.1, and it pairs with the Ultima Fit app to track your health and fitness metrics.

title: Honor 200
short_description: The Honor 200 smartphone features a curved back and large camera island, available in four colorways. It has a 6.7-inch FHD+ AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate and 4,000 nits peak brightness. Powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 processor, it offers 8GB, 12GB, or 16GB RAM and 256GB or 512GB storage options. The camera setup includes a 50MP main camera with OIS, a 50MP telephoto lens, a 12MP ultrawide/macro camera, and a 50MP front camera. It has a 5,200 mAh battery with 100W charging and supports 5G, WiFi 6, Bluetooth v5.3, and NFC.
description:
Here is a quick overview of the Honor 200 smartphone.

Honor 200 Overview

Design and Display

Design-wise, the Honor 200 looks almost similar to its “Pro” counterpart. That being said, it comes with a curved back and a large ovular camera island. It is available in four finishes wherein the Velvet Black is the only monotone option. Meanwhile, all three remaining options — Moonlight White, Coral Pink, and Sky Blue, have a unique patterned finish on the back.On the front, the phone has a slightly curved screen stretching 6.7 inches. The panel here is an AMOLED spanning FHD+ in resolution. Additionally, you get a 120Hz refresh rate, a peak brightness of 4,000 nits, and a 3,840Hz PWM dimming. Other than that, the Honor 200 covers the full DCI-P3 colour gamut while also offering wet hand touch support.

Performance

This phone does not stand out as much in terms of performance. The Honor 200 packs the Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 processor for primary computing. It is a decent midrange processor that launched in November 2023. This silicon comes with 4nm fabrication and offers a peak clock speed of up to 2.63 GHz.In addition to the chipset, the Honor 200 is available in five different memory and storage configurations. The latest offering is available in three RAM sizes — 8GB, 12GB, and 16. On the other hand, it comes in 256GB and 512GB storage options. Furthermore, this phone also packs a vapour chamber with an area of 5,029mm2 which regulates the phone’s temperature.

Camera and the rest

The Honor 200 is well-equipped in the camera department. Starting with the 50MP primary camera that is coupled with the 1/1.56” Sony IMX906 sensor with OIS support. Moreover, it also houses a telephoto lens as well as an ultrawide/macro camera as auxiliary units. The former is a 50MP shooter with the Sony IMX856 sensor while the latter is a 12MP snapper. In the meantime, the front camera is also a 50MP unit.In the tank, this phone packs a large 5,200 mAh battery with 100W wired charging support. The cell in the Honor 200 is the company’s silicon-carbon battery that offers a leading level of endurance. Other than that, it comes with 5G cellular, WiFi 6, Bluetooth v5.3, and NFC support.

title: Asus TUF Gaming F15 2022 (12th Gen i7-12700H, RTX 3060, 16GB, 1TB, 15.6" WQHD 165Hz)
short_description: Asus TUF Gaming F15 (2022) was first announced at CES 2022 with the latest 12th Gen Intel H-series mobile processors. The FX507ZM, in particular, is powered by Core i7-12700H CPU with 14 cores (6 P-cores + 8 E-cores). It is paired with RTX 3060 graphics with a total TGP of 140W (115 + 25W Dynamic Boost). The laptop features a 15.6-inch WQHDscreen with a 165Hz refresh rate and 100% sRGB gamut. It also supports Adaptive-Sync, MUX Switch, and Optimus. Memory options include up to 32GB DDR5 RAM and 1TB SSD.
description:
Asus TUF Gaming F15 (2022): Overview

Here’s a brief description of the Asus TUF Gaming F15 2022 with 12th Gen Intel Core i7-12700H processor and NVidIA RTX 3060 GPU, including design aesthetic, chipset, and port selection.

Display and Build

Asus TUF Gaming F15 (2022) sports a 15.6″ 165Hz IPS Panel. The screen has a WQHD resolution of 2560 x 1440 with a 16:9 aspect ratio. On top of that, it has Adaptive-Sync, a MUX switch, and Optimus. The laptop weighs about 2.2  kilograms and is 354 mm wide, 251 mm deep, and about 23mm high.

Performance

Under the hood, the Asus TUF Gaming F15 (2022) has a 12th Gen Intel Core i7-12700H processor alongside RTX 3060 GPU. The 14-core (6 Performance + 8 Efficiency) 20 Thread CPU can reach a maximum boost clock speed of 4.7 GHz. Complementing that, the 3060 GPU has 6GB GDDR6 VRAM and a total power draw (TGP) of 115W with Dynamic Boost.On the memory front, you get 16GB of DDR5 RAM. You can upgrade it to a maximum of 32GB via the 2 SO-DIMM slots. Alongside that, you get a  1TB M.2 SSD.

Battery and Connectivity

In the tank of the TUF Gaming F15, you will find a 90Wh Lithium Ion battery. It can be charged via the 240W adapter in the box.In terms of port selection, you get 2 USB Type-A ports, one USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C port, a Thunderbolt 4 port, an HDMI slot, an RJ45 LAN port, and a headphone jack. For wireless connectivity on ASUS TUF Gaming F15, you have your WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2 technology.

boAt Stone 352 Overview

Compact and Portable Design

The boAt Stone 352 boasts a compact design measuring 9 x 9 x 11 cm and weighing just 550 grams. This sleek and lightweight build makes it effortlessly portable, allowing you to take your music wherever you go with ease.

boAt Stone 352: Enhanced Connectivity

title: Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch M3 (2023)
short_description: The MacBook Pro 14-inch (M3) is a laptop geared toward creators and alike. Powered by the new and powerful Apple M3, M3 Pro, and M3 Max chips. The MacBook 14 can be configured with up to 96GB of RAM and 8TB of storage. Although the availability of the memory and storage configuration may vary by region. Aside from that, it is very similar to its predecessor in most ways. It has the same 14.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR screen and an aluminum chassis. And there are three Thunderbolt 4 ports, one SDXC card slot, and a 3.5mm headphone jack for connectivity. As usual, Apple sells the MacBook Pro 14-inch M3 (2023) in Silver and Space Grey variants.
description:
Apple Macbook Pro 14-inch M3 (2023) Overview:

If you are looking for a powerful and portable laptop that can handle any task, you might want to consider the Macbook Pro 14-inch M3. This is the latest model from Apple, featuring a stunning 14-inch Retina display, a fast and efficient M3 chip, and a sleek design.

Performance

The Macbook Pro 14-inch M3 is more than just a laptop. It is a creative powerhouse that lets you work, play, and create with ease. Whether you are editing photos, videos, or music, coding apps or games, or browsing the web, the Macbook Pro 14 with an M3 lineup of chips can handle it all with speed and smoothness.
The M3 chip is the secret behind the Macbook Pro 14's performance. You get three chip options here: M3, M3 Pro, and M3 Max. As known, this Apple silicon is a custom-designed processor that integrates the CPU, GPU, Neural Engine, and memory into a single chip.

Display

The Macbook Pro 14 M3 continues to boast the 14-inch Retina display with a resolution of 3024 x 1964 pixels and 1600nits of peak brightness. This screen also supports True Tone technology, which automatically adjusts the color temperature to match the ambient light.

Ports and I/O

In terms of ports, the Macbook Pro 14 M3 consists of 2x Thunderbolt 4 ports that support USB 4, DisplayPort, and charging. It also has an HDMI port, an SDXC card slot, a headphone jack, and a MagSafe 3 port that provides fast and safe charging. For wireless connectivity, you get Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3.

title: Acer Nitro 16 2023 (13th Gen i7-13620H, RTX 4050, 16GB, 1TB, 16 WUXGA 165Hz)
short_description: The Acer Nitro 16 AN16 is a gaming laptop with an Intel Core i7 processor 13th gen, RTX 4050 with 6 GB dedicated graphics, 1TB SSD, 16 GB RAM, Windows 11 Home, and Killer Wi-Fi 6. It has a 16-inch display, Thunderbolt 4, USB Type-C and Type-A ports, HDMI v2.1, and DTS X: Ultra Audio. Compact at 2.7 kg, its portable for gaming on-the-go.
description:
If you want a powerful and affordable gaming laptop, you might want to check out the Acer Nitro 16 model. This particular model of Acer Nitro 16 2023 brings the 13th Gen Intel Core i7-13620H processor coupled with RTX 4050 GPU along with 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, and a 165Hz 16" FHD+ panel.

Acer Nitro 16 2023 Overview

Processor

Under the hood, the Acer Nitro 16 2023 is powered by an Intel Core i7 processor from the 13th generation, ensuring seamless multitasking and gaming. It is equipped with dedicated GDDR6 graphic memory of 6 GB capacity for smooth graphics rendering. With a 1TB NVMe M.2 SSD storage and 16 GB of DDR5 RAM clocked at 4800 MHz, users can expect lightning-fast load times and responsiveness. Moreover, the laptop supports expandable memory up to 32 GB. The graphical processing is handled by the NVidIA GeForce RTX 4050, ensuring stunning visuals for gaming.

Display and Audio

Featuring a 16-inch WUXGA display with a resolution of 1920 x 1200 pixels, the Acer Nitro 16 2023 delivers crisp visuals and vibrant colors. The display panel has a high brightness of 400 nits, anti-glare technology, and covers 100% sRGB, ensuring an immersive viewing experience. The laptop has built-in speakers and dual microphones that provide clear audio output and input. Additionally, it features DTS X: Ultra Audio for optimized bass and immersive sound.

Operating System and Connectivity

The Acer Nitro 16 2023 with i7-13620H, and RTX 4050 runs on the Windows 11 Home operating system, providing a user-friendly interface and compatibility with various software. title: AirPods 4
short_description: AirPods 4 is a 2024 offering from Apple that comes in two flavours — with and without ANC. The ANC bit is the latest introduction. The audio on these buds will surely follow in the footsteps of its predecessor and be amazing. They come with personalised spatial audio with head tracking. There are many more features that Apple has managed to cram into these earbuds. They offer up to 30 hours of playback and have switched to USB-C for charging. The ANC variant also gets the luxury of wireless charging support along with a speaker on the case for the instances that you misplace the earbuds.
description:
Are you looking for one of the best earbuds in the market? Then Apples 2024 offering — AirPods 4 is one of the easier picks.

Apple AirPods 4 Overview

Design and Audio

The AirPods Gen 4 maintains Apples iconic design, featuring the familiar plain white color and semi-in-ear fitting. The charging case looks nearly the same but has been reduced in size by about 10%. A notable update is the stem, which now includes a force sensor, allowing for control of playback and calls through pinching. Moreover, the earbuds are rated IP54 for dust, sweat, and water resistance.Audio quality remains a priority, with Apple utilizing a low-distortion driver powered by a custom high-dynamic range amplifier. The AirPods 4 supports 16-bit/48kHz processing, delivering high-quality sound.Additionally, the personalized Spatio Audio with dynamic head tracking enhances immersion, especially during media consumption. An inward-facing microphone adjusts the EQ automatically, preserving the audio details. Apple has also introduced Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) in its semi in-ear design, while “Adaptive Audio” lets essential sounds, like sirens, pass through, enhancing safety. While that may be true, Apple is also offering a variant with no ANC feature.

Features and Battery

Apart from its audio capabilities, the AirPods Gen 4 packs several features to enhance the user experience. They seamlessly connect with all devices linked to an Apple id, allowing for smooth switching between gadgets. Moreover, two sets of AirPods can connect to a single device simultaneously, ideal for shared listening experiences. The H2 chip enhances voice commands, making Siri more accessible. By simply nodding or shaking your head, you can respond to Siri’s announcements.Battery life reaches up to five hours without ANC and four hours with it; the charging case extends this to 30 and 20 hours, respectively. The case also features a USB-C interface, and for the ANC variant, there is wireless charging and a built-in speaker to help locate misplaced earbuds.

description:

Design and Display

title: Zeblaze Stratos 2 Plus
short_description: The Zeblaze Stratos 2 Plus features a 1.43-inch AMOLED display with 3ATM water resistance. It offers customizable watch faces, an always-on display, built-in GPS, health tracking (heart rate, SpO2, stress, sleep), and Bluetooth v5.3 for notifications and calls. Its 530mAh battery lasts up to 27days in typical usage.
description:
Below is a short overview of the Zeblaze Stratos 2 Plus including its features and battery life.

Zeblaze Stratos 2 Plus Overview

Design and Display

The Stratos 2 Plus is an adventure-centric smartwatch with a metal unibody design and a 3ATM rating for protection against water damage. It features a 1.43-inch AMOLED display protected by Corning Gorilla Glass. The display offers a resolution of 466 x 466 pixels with 391 PPI. Additionally, it supports a brightness of up to 1000 nits. Zeblaze ships this guy in two colors: Electric Orange and Graphite Black.

Sensors and Health Features

This smartwatch includes multiple sensors. It supports dual-band GPS and five satellite positioning systems: GPS, GLONASS, GALILEO, QZSS, and BDS. Additional sensors include a compass, gyroscope, geomagnetic sensor, barometric altimeter, and acceleration sensor. The health features include a wrist heart rate monitor and a pulse oximeter for blood oxygen saturation.Additionally, the Stratos 2 Plus operates on Bluetooth version 5.3. It is compatible with smartphones running Android 5.0 or iOS 12.0 and above.

Battery Life

The device houses a 530 mAh Li-Po battery. It can provide up to 27 days of battery life on typical usage and 13 days on heavy usage.

description:

boAt Immortal 131 Overview

Design and Audio

Right from the get-go, boAt Immortal 131 gives a strong gamer vibe. It almost has a Batman-esque design with an edgy look. It obviously comes in Black, but there is a White option too. title: Anker Soundcore K20i
short_description: The Anker Soundcore K20i TWS earbuds feature a lightweight half-in-ear design, weighing just 3.3g per earbud, with a compact charging case for easy storage. Equipped with 13mm drivers and BassUp technology, they deliver enhanced sound quality with deeper bass. The earbuds offer up to 6 hours of playtime, extending to 36 hours with the charging case, and a quick 10-minute charge provides 2 hours of use. Additional features include Bluetooth 5.3, touch controls, AI dual-mic with Environmental Noise Cancellation (ENC), IPX5 water resistance, and a low-latency game mode.
description:
Are you looking for earbuds with high levels of audio customisation? Then the Anker Soundcore K20i might just be the one for you!

Anker Soundcore K20i Overview

Design and Audio

The Anker Soundcore K20i TWS earbuds feature a lightweight half-in-ear design, with each earbud weighing just 3.3g for a snug and comfortable fit during extended use. The earbuds come with a compact, rounded charging case that flips open, offering a wide opening to easily place and remove the earbuds. Magnets ensure secure storage when not in use. These earbuds are available in Black, and White.With a 13mm driver, the Anker Soundcore K20i delivers enhanced sound quality, providing a rich and immersive listening experience. Furthermore, the BassUp technology boosts low-end frequencies, delivering deeper bass for users who enjoy powerful audio.

Features and Battery

Equipped with Bluetooth 5.3, the Anker Soundcore K20i offers stable and fast connectivity for uninterrupted listening. Touch controls make it easy to operate, allowing users to play, pause, or skip tracks with just a tap. The earbuds also feature an AI-driven dual-mic algorithm paired with Environmental Noise Cancellation (ENC) technology, ensuring clear call quality by reducing background noise. Users can customise their audio experience through the Soundcore App, which offers 22 preset EQs, giving complete control over sound preferences.The earbuds provide up to 6 hours of playtime on a single charge, while the charging case extends the total battery life to 36 hours. A quick 10-minute charge offers 2 hours of playback, ensuring minimal downtime. Additionally, the Anker Soundcore K20i is IPX5-rated for water resistance, making it safe from sweat and light splashes. For gamers, the low-latency game mode provides a smoother audio experience during gameplay. Altogether, these features make the Soundcore K20i a versatile choice for daily use.

Design and Display

title: Lenovo Legion 5 2021 (Ryzen 7 5800H, RTX 3050 Ti, 16GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD 165Hz)
short_description: Lenovo Legion 5 (2021) is a gaming laptop with a pretty subtle visual profile. As a result, it blends in a professional environment rather easily as well. This gaming laptop is powered by AMD's Ryzen 5000 series CPU and NVidIA's RTX 30 series GPU.
description:
Lenovo Legion 5 2021 (Ryzen 7) Overview:

Here's a short description of the design aesthetic, chipset, and battery life of the Lenovo Legion 5 2021 (Ryzen 7).

Design, Display

The 2021 edition of Legion 5 features an all-plastic build quality. There's a subtle "Legion" branding on the top left corner of the laptop's lid and a "Lenovo" branding on the bottom right. As for cooling, Lenovo says its "Legion Coldfront 3.0" technology helps deliver great performance with zero throttling even under long gaming sessions. The slightly more premium Legion 5 Pro has an even better thermal system, by the way.Anyway, this cooling solution includes two fans with quad-channel exhaust and a large air intake vent at the bottom and underneath each keyboard switch. The laptop comes in two finishes: Phantom Black and Phantom Blue. But you can also find the Stingray White color option in certain markets.Upfront, you're getting a 15.6" Full HD IPS LCD screen with an anti-glare coating on top. Likewise, the Legion 5 (2021) is available with two display configurations in total:
  • 120Hz refresh rate, 250 nits brightness
  • 165Hz refresh rate, 300 nits brightness, 100% sRGB, Dolby Vision

Performance

In terms of performance, this gaming laptop brings AMD + NVidIA combo. It is available with a single CPU choice, i.e. Ryzen 7 5800H, whereas GPU options range from RTX 3050 to RTX 3070. Only the RTX 3050 Ti (95W) and RTX 3060 (130W) variants are currently available in Nepal. These GPUs have been complemented with 4GB and 6GB of GDDR6 VRAM, respectively.As for memory, you can install up to 32GB DDR4-3200 RAM here. The Legion 5 (2021)'s base model usually arrives with 512GB SSD but you can bump it up to 2TB M.2 NVMe SSD as well.

Others

Moving on, this gaming laptop features a Legion TrueStrike keyboard with 4-zone RGB lighting. You can customize the lighting pattern under the Lenovo Vantage app. Port options on the Legion 5 (2021) include 4x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, 2x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C, 1x HDMI 2.1, 1x RJ45, 1x 3.5mm combo audio jack, and an E-shutter button on the right. Contrary to a physical webcam shutter, this button toggles the camera on/off.When it comes to battery, this gaming laptop has been paired with either a 60 or 80 Wh battery depending on the GPU configuration. Similarly, they fuel up via a 230W or a 300W AC adapter, respectively.

title: Lenovo Legion Pro 5i 2023 (13th Gen i7-13700HX, RTX 4060, 16GB, 512GB, 16" WQXGA 165Hz)
short_description: The Legion 5 Pro is a new range of laptops that is set to replace the vanilla Legion 5 lineup. The first Legion 5 Pro laptop was introduced at CES 2023 with 13th Gen Intel “Raptor Lake” processors and RTX 40-series GPU. The CPU-GPU combo is paired with Lenovo’s in-house cooling solution and AI Engine to maximize fps in games.
description:
Lenovo Legion Pro 5i (2023) Overview :

Here's a short description of the design aesthetic, chipset, and battery life of the Lenovo Legion Pro 5i 2023 laptop with Intel i7 and RTX 4060.

Build and Display 

Lenovo Legion 5 Pro has the build of a gaming machine. It has an all-aluminium build and weighs a hefty 2.5 kilos. The wide 16" display of WQXGA (2560x1080) resolution has a high 165Hz refresh rate. It has a tall 16:10 aspect ratio as well. The keyboard has a custom 4 Zone RGB backlight, whereas the keycaps are black in color.

Performance and Memory

Lenovo Legion 5 Pro 5i 2023 is powered by Intel's 13th gen i7 processor alongside RTX 4060. The Core i7-13700HX processor has 16 (8 performance + 8 efficiency) cores and 24 threads. It has 30MB of L3 cache. It can also go up to 5.0 GHz of max clock speed. As for the GPU, NVidIA's RTX 4060, with a maximum TGP of 140W, can handle graphic-intensive workloads easily.  In addition, Lenovo has also included LA1 AI chip to improve fps in games.The laptop has Lenovo's Coldfront 4.0 technology to cool this CPU/GPU combo. Lenovo Legion 5 pro ships with 16GB of fast DDR5 RAM, which can be further upgraded to up to 32 GB. There are 2 M.2 2280 slots for secondary memory, one of which is preoccupied.

Battery and Connectivity 

Legion 5 Pro (2023) packs a 4-cell 80Wh battery that lasted about 5.3 hours (hybrid mode) on MobileMark 2018 test. It supports Super Rapid Charge, which can charge the cells up to 80% in 30 minutes via the 230W adapter that ships in the box.As for the ports, you get a lot— 2 USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-Cs (with DisplayPort1.4), 3 USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 port, and a headphone port. Similarly, there is also an  HDMI 2.1, an RJ45 port, and a power-in socket.

Contrary to a physical webcam shutter, this button toggles the camera on/off.When it comes to battery, this gaming laptop has been paired with either a 60 or 80-Wh battery depending on the GPU configuration. Similarly, they fuel up via a 230W or a 300W AC adapter, respectively.

title: Lenovo Legion Pro 7i 2023 (13th Gen i9-13900HX, RTX 4080, 32GB, 1TB, 16" WQXGA 240Hz)
short_description: The Legion Pro 7i is a new range of laptops that is set to replace the vanilla Legion 7 lineup. The first Legion 7 Pro laptop was introduced at CES 2023 with 13th Gen Intel \"Raptor Lake\" processors and RTX 40-series GPU. The CPU-GPU combo is paired with Lenovo's in-house cooling solution and AI Engine to maximize fps in games.
description:
Lenovo Legion Pro 7i 2023: Overview 

Here's a brief overview of the design aesthetic, CPU/GPU, and battery life of the Lenovo Legion Pro 7i 2023 with i9 and RTX 4080.

Build and Display 

Lenovo Legion Pro 7i has the build of a gaming machine. It has an all-aluminum build and weighs a hefty 2.8 kilos. The wide 16" display of WQXGA (2560x1080) resolution has a high 240Hz refresh rate. It has a tall 16:10 aspect ratio as well. The keyboard has a custom 4 Zone RGB backlight, whereas the keycaps are black in color.

Performance and Memory

Lenovo Legion Pro 7i 2023 is powered by Intel's 13th gen Core i9-13900HX processor along with NVidIA's RTX 4080. This processor has 24 (8 performance + 8 efficiency) cores and 32 threads. It has 36MB of L3 cache. It can also go up to 5.4 GHz of max clock speed. As for the GPU, NVidIA's RTX 4080, with a maximum TGP of 175W, can handle graphic-intensive workloads easily. In addition, Lenovo has also included an LA2 AI chip to improve fps in games.The laptop has Lenovo's Coldfront 5.0 technology to cool this CPU/GPU combo. Lenovo Legion Pro 7i ships with 16GB of fast DDR5 RAM, which can be further upgraded to up to 32 GB. There are 2 M.2 2280 slots for secondary memory, one of which is preoccupied.

Battery and Connectivity 

Legion Pro 7i (2023) packs a 4-cell 99.9 Wh battery that lasted about 4.4 hours (hybrid mode) on MobileMark 2018 test. It supports Super Rapid Charge, which can charge the cells up to 70% in 30 minutes via the 330W adapter that ships in the box.As for the ports, you get a lot— a Thunderbolt 4 port, a USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C (with DisplayPort1.4) port, 3 USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 ports, and a headphone jack. Similarly, there is also an  HDMI 2.1, an RJ45 port, and a power-in socket.

title: Lenovo Legion 5 2023 (Ryzen 7 7735HS, RTX 4060, 16GB, 512GB, 15.6" WQHD 165Hz)
short_description: Lenovo Legion 5 (2023) is a gaming laptop with a pretty subtle visual profile. As a result, it blends in a professional environment rather easily as well. This gaming laptop is powered by AMD Ryzen 7 7735HS CPU and NVidIA GeForce RTX 4060 GPU. You also get this gaming laptop with 16GB of DDR5-4800 RAM and 512GB SSD. You can extend the storage up to 1TB as well. On the front, you get a 15.6\" IPS LCD panel with a smooth 165 Hz refresh rate and WQHD resolution. Lastly, it comes with a full-sized keyboard with a white backlight and a numpad.
description:
Lenovo Legion 5 (2023) Overview

Design and Display

The 2023 edition of Lenovo Legion 5 features a plastic body with an aluminium lid. There's a “Legion” branding on the top left corner of the laptop's lid and a “Lenovo” branding on the bottom right. The laptop comes in a single Storm Grey colour option.Upfront, you're getting a 15.6" IPS LCD panel with an anti-glare coating on top. Likewise, the Lenovo Legion 5 (2023) offers a WQHD resolution spanning 2,560 x 1,440 pixels. It offers a peak brightness of 350 nits, a refresh rate of 165 Hz, and a 100% sRGB colour gamut. Lastly, it does not have touchscreen support.

Performance

In terms of performance, this gaming laptop brings an AMD + NVidIA combo. This Lenovo Legion 5 (2023) ships with the AMD Ryzen 7 7735HS and NVidIA GeForce RTX 4060 GPU. The CPU is an octa-core architecture with a maximum frequency of 4.75GHz. Meanwhile, the discrete graphics card comes with 8GB GDDR6 VRAM and a 2,370 MHz boost clock.As for memory and storage, you can install up to 16GB DDR5-4800 RAM and up to 1TB M.2 2280 SSD here. In this particular model, you are getting the maximum amount of memory i.e. 16GB while you have to make do with 512GB of storage. You are getting an extra SSD slot with the Lenovo Legion 5 (2023), so you can easily bump your storage whenever you need it!

Others

Moving on, this gaming laptop features a 6-row keyboard with a numeric keypad. The keyboard also features a white backlight. The port selections on the Lenovo Legion 5 (2023) include three USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, one USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C (support data transfer and DisplayPort 1.4), one USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C (supports data transfer, Power Delivery 135W and DisplayPort 1.4), one HDMI 2.1, one RJ45, and a 3.5mm combo audio jack.When it comes to battery, this gaming laptop has been paired with a 60-Wh battery and 230W AC adapter. For wireless connectivity, this Lenovo Legion 5 (2023) with Ryzen 7 7735HS and RTX 4060 comes with WiFi 6 and Bluetooth v5.1.

description:
Lenovo Legion Slim 5i (2023) Overview

Design and Display

The 2023 edition of Lenovo Legion Slim 5i features a plastic body with an aluminum lid. There's a “Legion” branding on the top left corner of the laptop's lid and a “Lenovo” branding on the bottom right. The laptop comes in Misty Grey, and Storm Grey colour options.Upfront, you're getting a 16" IPS LCD panel with an anti-glare coating on top. Others

This particular option ships with the RGB one. The port selections on the Lenovo Legion Slim 5i (2023) include two USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A, one USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C (support data transfer and DisplayPort 1.4), one USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C (supports data transfer, Power Delivery 140W and DisplayPort 1.4), one HDMI 2.1, one RJ45, a 3.5mm combo audio jack, and one 4-in-1 card reader.When it comes to battery, this gaming laptop has been paired with an 80-Wh Li-Polymer battery and 170W AC adapter. title: Lenovo Legion Pro 7 2024 (14th Gen Intel Core i9-14900HX, RTX 4080, 32GB, 1TB, 16" WQXGA 240Hz)
short_description: The Lenovo Legion Pro 7 2024 (16IRX9H) is a gaming laptop that comes with a very solid set of hardware. This includes a combination of a 14th Gen Intel Core i9-14900HX processor and an NVidIA GeForce RTX 4080 discrete graphics card. In addition to that, you also get 32GB RAM and 1TB SSD on this thing. It can be upgraded further to exactly double the storage capacity, however, the memory you get is the peak. On the front, it dons a 16-inch IPS LCD panel that stretches WQXGA in resolution and offers a 240Hz refresh rate and 100% DCI-P3 colour gamut. Along with all this impressive hardware, you get a 99.9Wh battery with a 330W AC adapter to keep things up and running.
description:
Are you looking for a super powerful laptop that can pretty much handle all you demand from it? Then you might want to take a look at this Lenovo Legion Pro 7 2024 (16IRX9H) with the Intel i9-14900HX processor and RTX 4080 graphics card.

Lenovo Legion Pro 7 2024 (16IRX9H) Overview

Design and Display 

Lenovo Legion Pro 7 2024 (16IRX9H) is a gaming machine and the build speaks for it. It has an all-aluminium body and weighs over two and a half kilos. As for the ports, you get plenty — four USB-A one of which supports Always On, two USB-C, an HDMI port, one ethernet, one combo audio jack, and a power-in socket.The Lenovo Legion Pro 7 2024 (16IRX9H) comes with a wide 16-inch display of WQXGA (2560 x 1600) resolution with a high 240Hz refresh rate. It is an IPS panel with a 16:10 aspect ratio, 500 nits peak brightness, and 100% DCI-P3 colour gamut. The keyboard is a full-size keyboard with per-key RGB backlighting, while the whole thing ships in Eclipse Black colour.

Performance and the rest

Other than that, the Lenovo Legion Pro 7 2024 (16IRX9H) ensures smooth performance with the combination of 14th Gen Intel Core i9-14900HX processor and NVidIA RTX 4080. The processor has 24 (8 performance + 16 efficiency) cores, 32 threads, and 36MB of L3 cache. It can also go up to 5.8 GHz of max clock speed. As for the GPU, NVidIAs RTX 4080, with a maximum TGP of 175W, can handle graphic-intensive workloads easily. Lenovo has also included an LA2-Q AI chip as well as a hybrid thermal cooling solution for improved performance.In addition to the solid CPU and GPU combo, the Lenovo Legion Pro 7 2024 (16IRX9H) ships with dual-channel memory. This particular model comes with 32GB DDR5-5600 RAM, which is the maximum support for this laptop. Furthermore, there are two M.2 2280 slots, one of which is preoccupied with a 1TB NVMe PCIe Gen 4 SSD. For power, it packs an integrated 99.9Wh battery that supports Super Rapid Charge. This technology can juice the laptop to 30% in just 10 minutes via the 330W adapter that ships in the box.

title: Samsung Galaxy S24 FE
short_description: The Samsung Galaxy S24 FE is a 2024 semi-flagship offering from the company. It features a 6.7-inch FHD+ Dynamic AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate and 1900 nits peak brightness, protected by Gorilla Glass Victus+ on both sides. It runs on the Exynos 2400e chipset, a slightly underclocked version of the Exynos 2400, paired with 8GB RAM and up to 512GB of non-expandable storage. The phone includes a 4700 mAh battery supporting 25W wired and 15W wireless charging, along with Wireless PowerShare. It also offers a triple camera setup with a 50MP main sensor and will receive seven years of OS and security updates.
description:
Are you looking for what we call a semi-flagship phone? With all the premium-esque feel, but without the premium price tag? Then things dont get much better than the Samsung Galaxy S24 FE!

Samsung Galaxy S24 FE Overview

Design and Display

The Galaxy S24 FE follows Samsung’s familiar design language, bearing a strong resemblance to all its other offerings. It features the well-known "traffic light" camera layout and flat frames, which add a bold, modern look. Curved edges on all sides give it a more ergonomic feel in hand. The phone is built with Gorilla Glass Victus+ on both the front and back. With this, the phone offers robust protection against everyday wear and tear. Additionally, the device boasts an IP68 rating, making it dust and water-resistant. However, it isn’t quite as premium in build quality as the standard Galaxy S24.On the front, the Galaxy S24 FE is equipped with a 6.7-inch FHD+ Dynamic AMOLED display. This panel delivers a smooth 120Hz refresh rate and an impressive 1900 nits peak brightness, making it a great choice for vibrant and sharp visuals, even under bright sunlight.

Performance and the rest

Under the hood, the Galaxy S24 FE runs on the Exynos 2400e chipset, a slightly downclocked version of the Exynos 2400 found in the main S24 series. The only difference is a 100 MHz reduction in clock speed on the Cortex-X4 core, resulting in just 4-5% lower benchmark scores. It comes with 8GB RAM and three storage options: 128GB, 256GB, or 512GB, although there’s no expandable storage. On the battery front, the S24 FE offers a 4700 mAh capacity, supporting 25W wired and 15W wireless charging, along with Wireless PowerShare.The phone also benefits from Samsungs stellar software support, shipping with Android 14 and One UI 6.1. Samsung promises seven years of OS and security updates, solidifying its long-term value. Furthermore, you get all the cool Galaxy AI features as well. Lastly, the phone boasts a versatile triple camera setup: a 50MP main, 12MP ultrawide, and 8MP telephoto lens, alongside a 10MP selfie camera.

title: OPPO A3x
short_description: The Oppo A3x features a 6.67-inch LCD panel with HD+ resolution, 90Hz refresh rate, and Panda glass protection. It runs on the Snapdragon 6s 4G Gen 1 chipset, offering 4GB of RAM, expandable storage via MicroSD, and an 8MP rear camera with a flicker sensor. The phone supports 45W SUPERVOOC 2.0 charging for its 5,100 mAh battery, reaching 50% charge in 30 minutes. Additionally, it maintains 80% battery capacity even after four years of use.
description:
Are you looking for an affordable smartphone with good looks and a large battery? Then Oppo A3x might be of interest to you!

Oppo A3x Overview

Design and Display

The Oppo A3x is available in two colours: Ocean Blue with wavy patterns and Nebula Red with a plain finish. It offers durability with its IP54 rating, protecting the phone from water splashes and spills. Additionally, the company says the phone can resist exposure to other liquids too, such as tea, and soup. Moreover, it passed the MIL-STD-810H test for shock resistance and received a five-star rating from SGS.The device features a 6.67-inch LCD screen, reinforced with Panda glass for added protection. The display supports HD+ resolution, a 90Hz refresh rate, and a peak brightness of 1,000 nits. Additionally, the screen covers 83% of the NTSC colour gamut with a colour depth of 16.7 million. As such, the Oppo A3x offers a good viewing experience and visibility indoors as well as in bright outdoor conditions. It also includes the “Splash Touch” feature, allowing seamless use with wet hands.

Performance and Camera

The Oppo A3x runs on the Snapdragon 6s 4G Gen 1 chipset, which is basically a renamed Snapdragon 662. Furthermore, it comes with either 64GB or 128GB of storage, expandable via a MicroSD card, and includes 4GB of RAM with an option for virtual expansion. In terms of battery, it is equipped with a 5,100 mAh unit, which supports 45W SUPERVOOC 2.0 fast charging. It can reach 50% charge in just 30 minutes, providing quick power boosts when needed. Additionally, the battery is built to retain 80% of its original capacity even after four years, ensuring long-term reliability.On the back, the Oppo A3x houses an 8MP camera, along with a flicker sensor to capture flicker-free images—especially useful when photographing lights or moving water. For selfies, it features a 5MP front camera.

title: Xiaomi 12 Pro
short_description: Initially launched in December 2021, Xiaomi 12 Pro was among the first phone to feature Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor. However, it was not until March 2022 that it was made available to the Global market, including Nepal.
description:
Xiaomi 12 Pro Overview:

Here, we will discuss the full specifications, price, and availability of the Xiaomi 12 Pro.

Design, Display

Xiaomi 12 Pro features a 6.73-inch Samsung-made E5 AMOLED panel with WQHD+ resolution. The color depth here is 10-bit, thus, it is capable of displaying over a billion colors.In addition, it boasts LTPO 2.0 technology that allows the phone to dial down the refresh rate from 120Hz to up to 1 Hz, based on the content to save battery. It is compatible with HDR10+ and Dolby Vision formats and can get as bright as 1500 nits. Xiaomi has even added Gorilla Glass Victus protection on the 12 Pro.

Performance

Xiaomi 12 Pro was among the first smartphone to come with the Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor. To help the chip sustain high performance over long gaming sessions, Xiaomi has included its LiquidCool technology. It features a Vapor Chamber and three graphite sheets that dissipate heat to keep the core temperature low.The base variant of the Xiaomi 12 Pro comes with 8GB of LPDDR5 RAM and 256GB UFD 3.1 storage. There is also a 12GB variant of the phone with the same internal storage.

Camera, Others

Moving on, there are three cameras on the back of the Xiaomi 12 Pro: a 50MP primary lens, a 50MP ultrawide (115° FOV), and a 50MP telephoto lens. The primary camera has Optical Image Stabilization for steadier shots and footage. You can record 8K videos at 24 fps using the rear camera.Over on the front, there is a 32MP selfie shooter with an f/2.45 aperture. it is capable of recording 1080 60 fps videos.Fueling the Xiaomi 12 Pro is a 4,600mAh battery that supports 120W fast charging. There is a compatible charger included in the box. The phone ships with Android 12-based MIUI 13 out of the box. The price of Xiaomi 12 Pro starts at Rs. 104,999 in Nepal for the base 8/256GB variant.

title: boAt Airdopes Alpha
short_description: The boAt Airdopes Alpha is a wireless earphone with a semi-in-ear design and an IPX5 rating which comes in two color options namely Black and White. It features 13mm drivers for a playful audio experience and promises HD sound with a frequency range of 20 Hz to 20 kHz. The buds have battery backup up to 35 hours and also ensure quick recharging up to 120 minutes of playback with 10 minutes of charge, Other features include Bluetooth 5.3, Insta Wake n' Pair, one-touch support, and beast mode for gamers and ENx Noise Cancellation as well.
description:
Airdopes Alpha Overview:

Design

Starting with the design, boAt Airdopes Alpha is a semi-in-ear-fitted wireless earphone. You get an IPX5 rating for water and splash protection. Additionally, covering them up is the pill-shaped case with a button inside to reset the pairing. Multiple different color options are available for Airdopes Alpha which include: Black and White

Audio

On the audio side, the 13mm drivers on each bud offer a playful experience. Plus, the boAt Airdopes Alpha promises HD sound with a frequency range of 20 Hz to 20 kHz. The buds contain microphones for voice pickup; however, the exact number is unspecified.

Battery

On the other hand, the TWS is equipped with good battery backup. Airdopes Alpha offers 35 hours of playtime. This depends on stuff like the volume and duration of continuous playbacks. ASAP charging adds another 120 minutes of playback within 10 minutes of charging

boAt Airdopes Alpha Extras

title: Redmi 9A
short_description: Redmi 9A is a budget-oriented smartphone that offers dependable performance for basic tasks and even light gaming. It is equipped with a MediaTek Helio G25 chipset. The phone sports a single 13MP sensor for normal daytime photos, and a 5MP camera on the front for video calls. Similarly, it has a fairly big 6.53-inch screen with HD+ quality for casual movie watching.
description:
Redmi 9A Overview, Price:

Here, we will discuss the full specifications and price of the Redmi 9A. 

Design, Display

The Redmi 9A features a 6.53-inch IPS LCD display with a water-drop notch on the front. It is an HD+ resolution screen with a 20:9 screen aspect ratio. Unfortunately, there is no higher refresh rate or anything of the sort here.Nonetheless, the company claims that the phone has a TUV-certified reading mode that would reduce harmful blue light. Similarly, the screen has a typical brightness of 400 nits.Furthermore, as a budget phone, the Redmi 9A has a rather basic design. There's a stripe running down from a pill-shaped camera module while the rest of the back panel looks clean. Buyers will have a choice of three color variants to choose from—Midnight Black, Nature Green, and Sea Blue.

Performance

The smartphone is powered by an octa-core MediaTek Helio G25 processor manufactured on a 12nm node. It has eight ARM Cortex-A53 cores running at 2.0 GHz. The graphics, on the other hand, are handled by the Imagination PowerVR GE8320 GPU. The phone has 2GB or 3GB of RAM and 32GB of internal storage, which can be expanded with a microSD card up to 512GB.

Cameras, Others

Talking about the camera, there is a single 12MP camera on the back. Accompanying this is an LED flash. For selfies, there is a 5MP camera inside a waterdrop style notch.Fueling the handset is a 5000mAh battery that, as per the company, can provide up to 162 hours of music listening time and 31 hours of calls. The phone charges via a 10W adapter and a micro USB connector.For connectivity, it supports single-band WiFi (2.4GHz) and Bluetooth 5.0. The smartphone lacks a fingerprint sensor for biometrics, therefore one has to make up for it with face unlock.

title: Acer Predator Helios 16 2023 (13th Gen i9-13900HX, RTX 4080, 16GB, 1TB, 16" WQXGA 240Hz)
short_description: The Predator Helios 16 2023 is a gaming machine from Acer for 2023. It boasts a 16-inch LED-backlit LCD panel with a 240Hz refresh rate. Fueling the laptop is a 90Wh battery with 330W of fast charging support. This specific model gets the horsepower of a 13th Gen Intel Core i9-13900HX CPU under the hood. For those gaming actions, Acer has paired the CPU with an NVidIA RTX 4080 GPU with 12GB GDDR6 VRAM. Furthermore, you get 16GB of DDR5 RAM and 1TB NVMe PCIe Gen 4.0 SSD on board.
description:
Acer has delivered a new gaming laptop with new introductions in the Predator Helios 16 and 18 series. In this article, let's get into the specs, features, prices, and availability of the Acer Predator Helios 16 (2023) with 13th Gen Intel Core i9-13900HX and RTX 4080.

Acer Predator Helios 16 (2023) Overview:

Design

Acer has improved the Predator Helios 16 quite a lot when it comes to design. This gaming laptop comes with a revamped rear panel with an RGB light bar to spice things up. It also houses two Thunderbolt 4, one HDMI, and a power supply.Also, the sRGB display delivers a WQXGA screen resolution of 2560 x 1600 px on a 16" anti-glare screen. The laptop even provides a 165Hz IPS display with the ability to select a 240Hz one.

Performance

On the performance end, the Acer Predator Helios 16 (2023) brings the combination of Intel Core i9-13900HX and NVidIA RTX 4080. The Core i9-13900HX processor has 24 cores (8 P-cores / 16 E-cores) with a max turbo frequency of 5.40 GHz. Moreover, The RTX 4080 graphics card present in this laptop provides an enhanced gaming experience with its Ada Lovelace architecture.To enhance your gaming experience, the user can configure Helios 16 with up to 32GB of dual-channel DDR5 RAM. Also, storage of up to 2 TB of PCIe SSD in RAid 0 is provided for storing games.

Cooling

The Predator Helios 16 has a robust cooling system designed by Acer to accommodate its already high-performance gaming capabilities. Cooling this laptop are the two 5th Gen Aeroblade 3D fans and vector heat pipes that work together to efficiently dissipate heat away from the CPU and GPU. Additionally, the CPU is applied with liquid metal cooling, which keeps the laptop cool, even in Turbo mode.

title: Redmi 10
short_description: The Redmi 10 is the company's latest budget offering, featuring a large 6000mAh battery that powers the phone through your daily tasks. It has an 18W charging speed, however, the firm only includes a 10W brick in the package. Although a budget phone, it doesn't skip on a fingerprint sensor and sports a chipset that is enough for your leisure surfing and even light gaming. For binging movies and such, there is a big enough 6.7-inch screen on the front.
description:
Redmi 10 Overview, Price:

Here, we will discuss the full specifications and price of the Redmi 10. Before we begin, it is worth noting that this is not the first "Redmi 10." The company released the Helio G88-powered phone of the same name last year; which was again released with the Redmi 10 (2022) moniker. And now we have the new "Redmi 10," which is also known as the Redmi 10C in some places.

Design, Display

On the front, the Redmi 10 features a big 6.7-inch IPS LCD panel. While this screen might be a good choice for multimedia consumption, it only has HD+ resolution, so content might not look as good as on a Full HD display. Anyway, it boasts a typical 60Hz refresh rate and 400 nits of brightness and also includes Gorilla Glass 3 protection.The phone's rear boasts a large camera bump that also houses a fingerprint sensor. This design is strikingly similar to the Realme Narzo 50A. Redmi is still calling it the Evol design, despite the fact that it looks nothing like the Redmi 10 series from last year.Moreover, the company has provided a textured finish at the back to keep fingerprints and smudges at bay. It comes in three different colors: Midnight Black, Pacific Blue, and Caribbean Green.

Performance

It is powered by a Snapdragon 680 processor under the hood. This mobile silicon is built on energy-efficient 6nm nodes and has four Cortex-A73 cores and six Cortex-A53 cores running at 2.4GHz and 1.9GHz, respectively. The Adreno 610 GPU, on the other hand, handles graphics. While this is not a strong enough chipset for gaming, it provides consistent day-to-day performance.The memory option includes up to 6GB of RAM and 128GB of internal storage. In terms of software, it comes pre-installed with MIUI 12 and the core platform is Android 11.

Cameras, Others

Redmi Note 10 Prime features a dual-camera setup at the back. This includes a 50MP primary sensor and a 2MP depth sensor. One can take selfies with the 5MP sensor housed on the front screen.Furthermore, a big 6000mAh battery powers the device throughout the day. Although the phone supports 18W fast charging, it only comes with a 10W charger in the box. For connectivity, it supports dual-band WiFi and Bluetooth 5.0.

Battery and Connectivity

short_description: Samsung Galaxy M55 5G is a 2024 midrange offering from the company. The phone comes in the classic “Galaxy” design while housing a 6.72-inch Super AMOLED Plus display with a 120Hz refresh rate, and 1,000 nits peak brightness. description:
Are you looking for a midrange smartphone that is a well-fleshed out product with solid brand value? Then the Samsung Galaxy M55 5G might just be the package for you! Lets take a look.

Samsung Galaxy M55 5G Overview

Design and Display

The Samsung Galaxy M55 5G comes in a similar design to any other Galaxy phone. It has vertically aligned camera cutouts on a monotone finish on the back. It has curved frames, and ships in two colour options Light Green and Denim Black.
In the meantime, the front has a 6.67-inch display with a Super AMOLED Plus panel. The screen spans FHD+ in resolution while offering a 120Hz refresh rate. Additionally, you also get 1,000 nits of peak brightness on the Samsung Galaxy M55 5G, giving you a comfortable viewing experience out in the sunlight as well.

Performance and the rest

The Samsung Galaxy M55 has sidelined the companys in-house Exynos 1380 chipset under its hood from the previous generation. This time around the company has opted with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7 Gen 1 processor instead. This processor offers you 4nm fabrication, three different sizes of cores, and a peak clock speed of 2.4 GHz. On top of that, it packs 8GB or 12GB RAM coupled with two different options of storage at 128GB and double that i.e. 256GB. You get the full Samsung experience with OneUI 6.1 on top of Android 14.
In the optics department, the company has dropped the resolution of the main camera down to 50MP. This shooter is capable of optical image stabilisation. In the meantime, the auxiliary lenses include an 8MP ultrawide camera and another 2MP macro lens. On the front, the Samsung Galaxy M55 5G houses another 50MP camera that doubles down as the face scanner. For further security, you get a fingerprint sensor under the screen. it packs a 5,000 mAh battery that supports 45W of fast charging.

short_description: After nearly three years of dabbling in the flagship market, Xiaomi is finally bringing the big gun out with the Xiaomi 13 Pro. In particular, the brand has gone above and beyond in the camera department, collaborating with Leica and including a 1\" camera. The latter is a Sony IMX989 sensor which is joined by a 75mm 50MP floating telephoto lens. This floating module divides the lens into two groups, one of which can be moved swiftly to switch between zoom and macro shots. The lens has zoom capabilities ranging from 3.2x optical zoom to 70x digital zoom. Following that is a 50MP Samusng JN1 ultrawide sensor with a 14mm f/2.2 lens. All three cameras feature optical lenses from Leica. Not only does the 13 Pro deliver in the camera department, but it also excels in other areas. It is powered by a flagship Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 silicon and features a 6.73-inch AMOLED screen with LTPO that can change the refresh rate from 1Hz to 120Hz depending on the content. A 4820mAh battery powers the device and supports 120W wired and 50W wireless charging. There are even two in-house developed Surge processors (Surge P1 and Surge G2) that aid in battery life and charging efficiency.

title: Remax TWS-36 Retro
short_description: The Remax TWS-36 Retro earbuds offer Bluetooth 5.1 connectivity, super bass, and noise reduction. Available in white, blue, and green, they feature a 13mm driver unit and a 20Hz to 20KHz frequency response. With a 30mAh battery per earbud and a 200mAh charging case, they provide 3.5 hours of talk time and 45 hours of standby. Made from PC+ABS materials, these IPX4 waterproof earbuds are durable and versatile.
description:
The Remax brand has been present in the Nepali accessories market for quite some time, offering products across various price segments. Among their wide range of gadgets, the Remax TWS-36 Retro is one of the available earbuds in Nepal. Lets dive into this overview to discuss the TWS-36 Retro, including its specifications and features.

Remax TWS-36 Retro Overview

The REMAX TWS-36 Retro TWS Wireless Bluetooth 5.1 Earbuds come in white, blue, and green. They support A2DP, HFP, HSP, and AVRCP agreements and feature Bluetooth version 5.1 with a transmission distance of up to 10 meters. The working voltage is 5V. Moreover, the TWS-36 Retro comes with digital display which shows the charge percentage.

Audio and Performance

The earbuds have a 13mm driver unit with a frequency response of 20Hz to 20KHz. They have a speaker impedance of 32Ω and a speaker power of 3mW. These earbuds offer super bass and noise reduction.

Battery and Durability

Each earbud has a battery capacity of 30mAh, while the charging case has a capacity of 200mAh. The earbuds provide a talk time of 3.5 hours and a standby time of 45 hours. Charging time for the earbuds is 1 hour. The material used is PC+ABS, and the earbuds have an IPX4 waterproof rating.

title: Vivo Y18
short_description: Vivo Y18 is a budget phone that comes with good enough specs. You get a plastic build with IP54 water and dust resistance. On the front, it has a 6.56 LCD panel with HD+ resolution and 90Hz refresh rate. Underneath, the phone packs a MediaTek Helio G85 with 6GB memory and 128GB storage. Likewise, it packs a 50MP and 0.08MP camera on the back while having an 8MP unit. Lastly, the Vivo Y18 houses a 5,000 mAh battery with 15W fast charging support.
description:
Are you looking for a budget smartphone that isnt very heavy on your pockets? Then you might want to take a look at the Vivo Y18!

Vivo Y18 Overview

Design and Display

The Vivo Y18 comes with flat frames and a composite plastic sheet for the back panel. Additionally, the phone boasts an IP54 water and dust resistance. Meanwhile, it ships in two colour options: Mocha Brown, and Wave Aqua. The former comes in a plain monotone finish while the latter features wavy patterns all across the back.A 6.56-inch screen with a 2.5D curve greets us on the front. The panel on the Vivo Y18 is an LCD with up to 90Hz refresh rate. Moreover, the screen offers a brightness of up to 840 nits along with HD+ resolution. Likewise, it has a pixel density of 269 PPI and comes with an 83% NTSC colour gamut.

Performance and the rest

The primary performance on this phone is driven by the MediaTek Helio G85 processor with eight cores, 12nm fabrication, and a peak clock speed of 2.0GHz. Additional hardware on the Vivo Y18 includes up to 8GB LPDDR4x RAM coupled with up to 256GB eMMC 5.1 storage. However, you only get a solo 6GB + 128GB configuration in Nepal. Other than that, you can virtually extend the memory up to 8GB while the storage can go up to an additional 1TB with a MicroSD card.In terms of optics, this phone comes with three cameras altogether. It has a 50MP primary shooter coupled with a 0.08MP auxiliary lens. In the meantime, the front-facing camera is an 8MP unit. In the tank, the Vivo Y18 packs a 5,000 mAh battery with 15W charging support. It comes with dual SIM support with a dedicated space for external storage as well. Lastly, this phone has a side-mounted fingerprint sensor for biometric security.

title: HP Omen 16 2023 (Ryzen 9 7940HS, RTX 4070, 16GB, 512GB, 16.1" FHD 165Hz)
short_description: HPs gaming laptop, the Omen 16 (2023), boasts formidable specs, featuring the Ryzen 9 7940HS processor and NVidIAs RTX 4070 GPU. With its 16.1\" screen offering a 165Hz refresh rate and full 100% sRGB coverage, it provides an immersive experience for both media consumption and gaming. Additionally, it offers a reliable battery life, speedy memory, and a diverse port selection. Opting for this laptop is a wise decision for those seeking a compelling deal.
description:
HP Omen 16 (2023) Overview:

Heres a brief description of the design aesthetic, chipset, and port selection of the HP Omen 16 (2023) laptop with the AMD Ryzen 9 7940HS CPU and RTX 4070 GPU.

Design and Build 

Named aptly, the HP Omen 16 (2023) showcases a 16.1-inch display with a vibrant 165Hz IPS LCD panel that fully encompasses the sRGB color spectrum. Sporting an impressive 83% screen-to-body ratio and capable of achieving a peak brightness of 300 nits, this laptop offers a visually captivating experience. With a thickness of 23mm and weighing approximately 2.37 kg, the HP Omen 16 (2023) strikes a balance between portability and performance.

Performance and Memory

In terms of performance, the HP Omen 16 (2023) packs a punch with its Ryzen 9 7940HS CPU, an octa-core, 16-thread processor capable of turbo boosting up to 5.20GHz. On the graphics front, it boasts the NVidIA GeForce RTX 4070 GPU, providing ample power for 1080p gaming with its 8GB DDR6 VRAM, although the TGP remains unspecified.Being part of the 40 series, the GPU brings along hardware-accelerated Ray Tracing, DLSS supersampling, and other RTX features for enhanced gaming experiences. Memory-wise, the laptop comes equipped with two DDR5 SO-DIMM slots, each already populated with two 8GB DDR5 sticks. Future upgrades allow for the addition of 16GB sticks to both slots, enabling a maximum RAM capacity of 32GB.

Battery and Connectivity

HP Omen 16 (2023) packs an 83Wh battery. Likewise, you get a 230W AC charger. It provides up to 8 hours and 15 minutes of video playback whereas the battery life may dip to 9 hours on mixed usage.In terms of ports, you get two USB-C with Thunderbolt 4, two USB-A, one HDMI, one ethernet, an SD card reader, and a 3.5mm headphone jack. Moreover, the keyboard is backlit as well.

It has a larger 1.39\" AMOLED display, while the company has upped the water-resistant property from 5 ATM (50 meters) to 10 ATM (100 meters) here. T-Rex 2 also has a significantly larger battery, which is now rated to last up to 24 days under normal usage. With all this, the watch is a bit heavy compared to its predecessor, as it weighs around 66.5 grams with the strap. In terms of health monitoring, it comes with some advanced features like breathing exercises and menstrual cycle tracking as well. Whereas you can choose from 150+ sports modes along with 15 strength training exercises. Amazfit T-Rex 2 boots on the company's own \"Zepp OS\" platform and pairs with the \"Zepp\" app which is available for both Android and iOS devices.

title: Realme GT 7 Pro
short_description: Realme GT 7 Pro is a premium flagship smartphone and the 2024 offering from the company. After a small hiatus, the Realme GT series made its entry to Nepal with the more affordable GT 6T, earlier this year. Meanwhile, the GT 7 Pro comes in a premium glass design with 1.5K 8T LTPO OLED display on the front. Inside, you are getting the flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. Additionally, the Realme GT 6T packs up to 16GB LPDDR5X RAM, 1TB UFS 4.0 storage, and a 6,500mAh battery with 120W charging support. The cameras on this thing include a 50MP primary, an 8MP ultrawide, and a 50MP telephoto camera. On the front, we have 16MP selfie units all with Sony sensors underneath.
description:
Are you looking for a good gaming smartphone? Then you might want to check out the Realme GT 7 Pro!

Realme GT 7 Pro Overview

Design and Display

The device features an 8T LTPO Eco² OLED Plus micro-curved screen from Samsung Display, designed to enhance power efficiency by reducing consumption by up to 52% at the same brightness. The display also delivers impressive visuals with the industry’s first 120% DCI-P3 color gamut for straight-screen flagships, and a global maximum brightness of 6000 nits, peaking at 6000 nits. Additionally, it supports HDR 10+ and Dolby Vision for enhanced contrast and clarity. Another standout feature is the world’s first non-polarized natural light eye protection technology, which claims 0 polarization of screen light.

Performance and Camera

Realme’s GT7 Pro makes headlines for featuring Qualcomm’s next-gen Snapdragon 8 Elite, which is built on a 3nm process. Additionally, the smartphone features up to 16GB of LPDDR5x RAM and up to 1TB of storage.The Realme GT7 Pro is an impressive flagship, featuring an underwater photography mode. On the back, it sports a 50 MP main camera with OIS, equipped with a Sony IMX906 sensor (1/1.56″) and an f/1.8 aperture for sharp, detailed photos. The telephoto lens includes a 50 MP Sony IMX882 sensor (1/1.95″) with an f/2.65 aperture and OIS, while the ultrawide camera uses the same 8 MP Sony IMX355 sensor (1/4″) and f/2.2 lens found in the GT5 Pro. For selfies, the GT7 Pro includes a 16 MP front camera, housed in a punch-hole cutout on the display

Battery and Rest

Battery-wise, the Realme GT 7 Pro is coupled with a 6,500 mAh battery and supports 120W fast charging. Moreover, the phone runs on Realme UI 6.0, based on Android 14. The phone also comes with a Qualcomm ultrasonic fingerprint scanner.

title: JBL Tune 215
short_description: JBL Tune 215 in-ear wearables feature silicone tips and a circular top for touch controls. The headphones have a 6-mm driver on each earpiece with an impedance of 16 ohms and a driver sensitivity of 101 dB, providing a frequency range of 20 Hz to 20 kHz. Additionally, this TWS has a total of 25 hours of battery life, with 20 hours coming from the case and 5 hours from the buds.\r\n\r\n
description:
JBL Tune 215 Overview:

In-ear fit

The JBL Tune 215 has a tighter, in-ear fit with silicone tips. The stem has a circular top for touch controls and extends down the bottom. The official website mentions its weight as 10.8 g.Besides, the case provided in T215 TWS is rectangle-ish with rounded corners. This weighs around 51.3 g in your pocket. Additionally, it delivers three LEDs at the bottom for battery level indication. Three color options are there on EvoStore's page, JBL's official distributor. They are Blue, Black, and White. However, the blue one is out of stock for now.

Audio and Connectivity

Furthermore, the JBL Tune 215 TWS boasts a 6-mm driver on each earpiece. These drivers have an impedance of 16 ohms, and the driver sensitivity is rated at 101 dB. All of this provides a frequency range of 20 Hz to 20 kHz. Moreover, Bluetooth 5.0 is what connects this to your device.

Total of 25 hours of battery life

Yes, the Tune 215 is rated to provide a whopping 25 hours of battery life. Most of it comes from the case—20 hours to be exact. Besides, each earpiece lasts 5 hours under ideal conditions, such as 50% volume, considering the battery is new.

description:

Design and Display

The Dell Inspiron 14 5440 is an ultrabook laptop with solid aluminum for its chassis and weighs half a kilo. It ships in a single Ice Blue color and has multiple port options. They include one USB-C and two USB-A, a universal audio port, an HDMI, and an SD card slot.The Dell Inspiron 14 5440 has a 14-inch IPS panel with FHD+ resolution. title: Kick AeroPods 141
short_description: The Kick AeroPods 141 by Kick Lifestyle are in-ear earbuds with IPX5 water resistance, available in Jungle Green and Midnight Orange, featuring a distinctive dual-tone design and a unique charging case that resembles Iron Man’s helmet. Equipped with 13mm drivers, Bluetooth v5.4, and a quad-mic setup with environmental noise cancellation, they deliver quality audio and clear calls. The earbuds also support ultra-low latency for gaming and offer up to 120 hours of total playtime with a 700mAh battery in the case, alongside quick charging that provides 180 minutes of playback in just 10 minutes.
description:
Are you looking for stylish-looking earbuds with an affordable price tag? Then you might want to check out the Kick AeroPods 141.

Kick AeroPods 141 Overview

Design

The new Kick AeroPods 141 earbuds by Kick Lifestyle boast a unique in-ear fit with a distinctive dual-tone design. Available in Jungle Green and Midnight Orange, they are IPX5 water-resistant, providing protection against water splashes. The Jungle Green variant features contrasting colours between the ear tips, stems, and the main body, creating a vibrant look. Meanwhile, on the Midnight Orange option, only the ear tips stand out.The charging case of the Kick AeroPods 141 resembles Iron Mans helmet, with a lid that lifts upwards to fully reveal the earbuds, which sit vertically inside. This lid design may offer a smoother user experience than traditional cases by making the earbuds easier to access. The charging case also has a dual-tone finish, however, it is a lot subtler when closed.

Audio and Features

Equipped with powerful 13mm drivers on each side, the Kick AeroPods 141 deliver a rich stereo sound experience. They support Bluetooth v5.4, with SBC and AAC codecs, ensuring reliable wireless audio transmission. For clear voice calls, these earbuds feature environmental noise cancellation, achieved through a quad-microphone setup. Additionally, they come with touch controls, facilitating easy navigation through functions. Meanwhile, they also provide ultra-low latency of just 45ms, making them optimum for fast-paced gaming as well.Battery life is another strong point for these earbuds. The Kick AeroPods 141 offer up to 120 hours of total playtime thanks to a substantial 700mAh battery in the charging case, while the earbuds themselves allow for 10 hours of continuous playback. For quick top-ups, the Spark Charge Technology enables 180 minutes of playback with just a 10-minute charge, ensuring minimal downtime when you need a fast recharge.

It has a 100% DCI-P3 colour gamut and the top bezel is home to an FHD webcam with an IR function for Windows Hello login. Powering the Asus ZenBook 14 OLED is an Intel Core Ultra 9 185H coupled with an integrated Arc GPU. In terms of memory, it comes with 16GB RAM and 1TB SSD. description:
Are you looking for a powerful laptop that can sort all your computing needs for years to come? Then you might want to take a look at this Asus Zenbook 14 OLED 2024 (UX3405MA) with Intel Core Ultra 9 185H processor.

Asus Zenbook 14 OLED 2024 (UX3405MA) Overview

Design and Display 

Asus Zenbook 14 OLED 2024 (UX3405MA) looks like a regular for the most part. The top case material on this thing is aluminium and has a 180° lay-flat hinge. It comes in a Ponder Blue colour option and has a trackpad that doubles down as number keys. As for the ports, you get all the things you need — a USB-A, two Thunderbolt 4s (USB-C), an HDMI port, and a combo audio jack.The Asus Zenbook 14 OLED 2024 (UX3405MA) comes with a 14-inch display of 3K (2,880 x 1,800) resolution with a high 120Hz refresh rate. It is an IPS panel with a 16:10 aspect ratio, 600 nits peak brightness, and 100% DCI-P3 colour gamut. Moreover, the panel is OLED with a glossy finish and no touch support.

Performance and the rest

Other than that, the Asus Zenbook 14 OLED 2024 (UX3405MA) ensures smooth performance with the latest Intel Core Ultra 9 185H processor. The processor has 16 cores, 22 threads, and 24MB of L3 cache. It can also go up to 5.1 GHz of max clock speed. On top of that, it also packs integrated Arc graphics and a dedicated NPU. This brings a lot of AI functionalities to the laptop too.In addition to the processor, the Asus Zenbook 14 OLED 2024 (UX3405MA) ships with 16GB LPPDDR5X RAM. This memory is actually onboard which means it cannot be upgraded any further. Other than that, there is an M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD slot, which is occupied by a 1TB unit. For power, it packs an integrated 75Wh battery and comes with a 65W Type-C charger.
