title: Vivo Y01
short_description: The Vivo Y01 is an entry-level budget offering from Vivo. The phone was launched in tandem with Vivo Y33s 4G and Vivo V23 5G in Nepal. It is powered by the MediaTek Helio P35 chipset, which should be sufficient for day-to-day tasks such as chatting and watching YouTube videos. Likewise, keeping the phone up and running is a 5000mAh battery that supports 10W charging. It boots on the Android 11 Go edition which is a stripped-down version of the regular Android OS, designed for budget smartphones.
description:
Vivo Y01 Overview, Price:

Here, we will discuss the full specifications and price of the Vivo Y01.

Design, Display

Like most budget phones, the Vivo Y01 has an all-plastic design. The 3D curved back with textured stripes contributes to the design aesthetics. Furthermore, the phone is lightweight, weighing only 178 grams, and has a thickness of 8.28 mm. It is available in two color options: Elegant Black and Sapphire Blue.Over on the front, the Y01 sports an HD+ 6.51-inch IPS LCD screen. You will also find a waterdrop-style notch that houses the selfie camera. Because of the phone's budget nature, there's no high refresh rate or touch sampling rate here. Yet, the display supports an Eye Protection mode to filter out harmful blue light.

Performance

Inside, the Vivo Y01 packs an Helio P35 chipset. It is an entry-level octa-core chipset with four Cortex-A53 cores clocked at 2.35 GHz and four Cortex-A53 cores clocked at 1.8 GHz. Despite being comparable to the Helio G35, the chipset lacks MediaTek's HyperEngine gaming feature which ensures that the touch inputs are reliable and accurate.The phone comes with 32GB of internal storage and either 2GB or 3GB of RAM. You can expand the storage capacity up to 1TB via an SD card. In terms of software, the phone comes pre-installed with Funtouch OS 11.1 based on Android 11 Go Edition.

Cameras, Others

Moving on, the Vivo Y01 has two cameras in total—including the rear and front. At the back, there's an 8MP sensor with an f/2.0 aperture, and it has a 5MP f/2.2 sensor on the aforementioned water-drop notch for selfies and video calls.The Vivo Y01 has a 5000mAh battery that supports 10W charging. Unfortunately, it comes with a micro USB connector. In terms of connectivity, it supports 4G LTE, dual-band Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth 5.0.

title: Vivo Y33s
short_description: Vivo Y33s is the company's latest midrange phone to arrive in Nepal. It offers a triple camera setup fronted by a 50MP primary sensor. It supports EIS for stable videos and has the \"Eye Autofocus\" feature as well. Moreover, the phone is powered by the Helio G80 chipset, which brings MediaTek’s HyperEngine gaming technology. This has been complemented with 8GB of RAM and 128GB of expandable internal storage. Vivo Y33s boots on Android 11-based Funtouch OS 11.1 out-of-the-box.
description:
Vivo Y33s Overview, Price:

Design, Display

One of the main selling points of the Vivo Y33s is its design. The phone is quite slim and lightweight. You can choose from two color options: Mirror Black and Midday Dream. Both of them feature a distinct texture and hue and Vivo's "Dual Tone Step" camera module.In terms of display, the Vivo Y33s has a 6.58-inch Full HD+ LCD screen with a standard 60Hz refresh rate. It boasts 96% NTSC coverage and a screen-to-body ratio of 90.6%.

Performance

The Vivo Y33s houses an Helio G80 chipset under the hood. This SoC has two Cortex-A76 (@2.05GHz) and six Cortex-A55 (@2.0GHz) CPU cores whereas handling the graphics side of things is Mali-G52 MC2.Moreover, the phone is available in a single memory configuration with 8GB RAM and 128GB of internal storage in Nepal. Vivo also lets you add 4GB of virtual RAM. It has a triple card slot so you can have two SIMs and a micro SD card at the same time here. Besides, the handset boots on Android 11 with Funtouch OS 11.1 on top right out of the box.

Cameras, Others

Moving on, the Vivo Y33s features a triple camera setup in the back. The primary 50MP sensor has an aperture of f/1.8 and supports EIS for shooting stable videos. Like Vivo's relatively premium phones, the Y33s also comes with Eye Autofocus (Eye AF) from the main camera.It is accompanied by a 2MP macro sensor for close-up shots with a fixed 4cm focus distance. And completing the setup is a 2MP depth sensor for portrait shots. Furthermore, there's a 16MP selfie camera inside the waterdrop cutout upfront.Besides this, the Vivo Y33s has a non-removable 5000mAh battery which supports 18W fast charging. You'll get a compatible charger inside the box itself. The phone has support for 4G LTE, dual-band Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth 5.0. For biometrics, there's a side-mounted fingerprint sensor that doubles as the power button as well. You can buy Vivo Y33s at its official price in Nepal from authorized stores like Hukut.

title: Vivo V23 5G
short_description: Vivo V23 5G is the second phone in the V23 series to be released in Nepal, following the V23e. The phone's color-changing back is its main selling point, but Vivo also touts its dual-tone spotlight selfie feature. Speaking of which, it has a dual-camera setup on the front along with an ultrawide lens that allows for the capture of group selfies. Furthermore, the V23 5G is equipped with a MediaTek Dimensity 920 5G processor and a 64MP triple-cameras. The smartphone also enjoys a contrast-rich AMOLED panel with a 90Hz refresh rate and HDR 10+ certification, making it a good option for multimedia consumption.
description:
Vivo V23 5G Overview, Price:

Here, we will discuss the full specifications and price of the Vivo V23 5G.

Design, Display

To begin with, the Vivo V23 is a phone focused on design. The Sunshine Gold model has a color-changing back that changes from golden to greenish-blue when exposed to sunlight. Those who want a more discreet appearance can go with the Stardust Black variant though. Likewise, the phone is made out of a flat metal frame and features a wide camera module on the back.Upfront, Vivo V23 5G sports a 6.44-inch FHD+ AMOLED panel. This screen has a 90Hz refresh rate and is certified with HDR10+, allowing you to enjoy HDR-supported movies and shows. Similarly, the iPhone-like notch on the V23 houses dual-selfie cameras.

Performance And Memory

Powering the device is MediaTek's  Dimensity 920 5G chipset. It is a 6nm-based processor with two Cortex-A78 cores and six Cortex-A55 cores clocked at 2.5GHz and 2.0GHz, respectively. On the other hand, the graphics are handled by Mali G68 MC4 GPU. The phone is available with up to 12GB of RAM and up to 256GB storage configuration.

Cameras, Others

Along with the design, the camera is another highlight of the smartphone. The handset sports dual selfie cameras with a 50MP sensor and an 8MP ultrawide sensor for group selfies. They are accompanied by Vivo’s dual-tone spotlight for brighter photos during nighttime.Moving on, the back houses a triple camera array comprised of a 64MP primary sensor, an 8MP ultrawide, and a 2MP macro sensor.The Vivo V23 5G is fueled by a 4200mAh battery that supports 44W fast charging. The phone ships with Android 12-based Funtouch OS 12 out of the box. The phone lacks a 3.5mm headphone jack but Vivo provides a USB-C to headphone jack adapter in the box.

title: Ultima Atom 520 Pro
short_description: Ultima has launched a “Pro” version of their Ultima Atom 520. The Ultima Atom 520 pro is a conventional earbud with in-ear silicone tips and comes in a single-tone design with a chrome finish. It is IPX5-rated and available in two colour options. The earbuds come with 13mm drivers, gaming mode with low latency, quad-mic setup with ENC feature, and ASAP Charge support. These earbuds provide up to 45 hours of total playtime at 70% volume and come with Bluetooth v5.3 connectivity.
description:
Ultima Lifestyle is a Nepali brand that has garnered a lot of popularity in recent times. They offer quality products at an affordable price catering to the needs of Nepali consumers. This time around Ultima has launched new earbuds under the name Atom 520 Pro.

Ultima Atom 520 Pro Overview

Design

The Ultima Atom 520 comes in the conventional earbud design, featuring in-ear silicone tips and a stem with touch controls. The whole package comes in a single-tone design with a chrome finish. Notably, the Ultima Atom 520 comes with an IPX5 rating, making it resistant to splashes of water. This also means that these earbuds are sweat-resistant and, therefore can be a perfect partner for you during workouts.Moving on to the case, it comes in a pebble-like design with a chrome finish as well. The case features the company logo on the front and features a USB Type-C charger on the bottom. Moreover, it is available in two colour options: Black, and White.

Audio and rest

The Ultima Atom 520 Pro relies on 13mm drivers for its audio. These earbuds also offer gaming mode, wherein the latency of the buds drops somewhere between 50 to 60 ms. Additionally, the Ultima Atom 520 Pro features a quad-mic setup and an ENC feature to ensure clarity during calls. It also comes with IWP (Insta Wake Pair) technology offering fast and seamless pairing with your device.A pair of 35mAh batteries and a 400 mAh cell powers the buds and the case respectively. The Ultima Atom 520 Pro offers 45 hours of playback time on 75% volume. These earbuds are equipped with the ASAP charge feature wherein charging it for 5 minutes offers you 75 minutes of playback. Other than that, it comes equipped with Bluetooth v5.3 and supports AAC and SBC codecs. Lastly, it is compatible with devices running on Android, iOS, as well as Windows.

title: JBL GO 4
short_description: The JBL GO 4 is the 2024 update of the highly popular GO series succeeding the JBL GO 3. The speaker comes in the signature compact form factor with a lynard attached to it. description:
JBL is one of the most popular audio accessories manufacturers in the world. They have now updated their catalogue for this year. Amongst the products to receive the update is the JBL GO 3. Here is a short overview of the JBL GO 4, which includes its features and specifications.

JBL GO 4 Overview

Design and Audio

The JBL GO 4 introduces a sleek new design, perfect for music lovers on the move. With its modern, compact form factor and reinforced strap, its built for portability and convenience, seamlessly fitting into any lifestyle. Moreover, this speaker reflects JBLs commitment to sustainability with 80% post-consumer recycled materials in its construction. This eco-friendly approach aligns with JBLs mission to provide environmentally conscious audio solutions.Audio-wise, the JBL GO 4 steps up its game with a richer sound profile and deeper bass compared to its previous generation. Despite its small size, this speaker packs a powerful audio punch, catering to those who value quality sound in a compact package.User-friendly controls remain a priority, ensuring easy operation, while the ports facilitate effortless connectivity with other devices.

Battery and the rest

The reliable battery of the JBL GO 4 offers up to 7 hours of continuous playtime, designed to keep the music going all day long. Its efficient power management system ensures optimal performance, whether youre travelling, enjoying outdoor activities, or relaxing at home.Furthermore, the JBL GO 4 boasts Bluetooth v5.3 with LE audio capabilities, an IP67 waterproof and dustproof rating, and multi-speaker connections via Auracast, enhancing its versatility and functionality.

title: Redmi A4
short_description: Redmi A4 comes as the successor to the Redmi A3. This phone comes with a glass on the back. The screen measures 6.88 inches and offers a 120Hz refresh rate. Meanwhile, under the hood, you get a Snapdragon 4s Gen 2 coupled with up to 4GB memory and up to 64GB storage. For software, you get stock Android 14. description:
Redmi has been a staple brand in the budget and midrange segment for many years now. And the Redmi A4 is the companys entry-level phone for the year 2024! Lets have a brief look at it.

Redmi A4 5G Overview:

Xiaomi has unveiled the Redmi A4 5G at the Indian Mobile Congress (2024). To do this, it has tied up with SoC giant Qualcomm and the phone takes the crown as the first smartphone to be powered by the Snapdragon 4s Gen 2 chipset.

Design and Display

Beginning with the design, the Redmi A4 5G borrows its appearance from the recently unveiled Redmi 14C. You get the identical Oreo-shaped camera module and a U-shaped notch display upfront. Talking of the latter, it is a 6.88-inch IPS LCD panel with a 120hz. Other than that, it also boast a 3.5mm headphone jack.

Snapdragon 4s Gen 2

The star of the show on the Redmi A4 is its processor: Snapdragon 4s Gen 2. This budget SoC from Qualcomm boasts an energy-efficient 4nm fabrication process and 5G connectivity. You get a similar architecture to the 4 Gen 2, just slightly underclocked cores. To put it into a picture, you get 2×2.2 GHz Cortex-A78 & 6×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55 cores here, which should provide a better overall performance and gaming in the budget segment.

Camera, Battery, and Others

As for the optics, the smartphone bears a 50MP rear camera alongside a secondary camera. Fueling the phone is likely a 5000mAh battery, following the common norms of the budget segment contenders. Moreover, what’s more considerable is that the phone will support gigabit-fast connectivity speed on 5G.

title: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 5 2023 (Ryzen 7 7730U, 16GB, 1TB, 14" WUXGA)
short_description: As the name suggests, Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 5 (AMD) is a thin and light laptop designed for normal day-to-day tasks. This laptop is available in multiple screen sizes, but the one here has a 14-inch IPS screen of WUXGA (1920x1200) resolution. The specifications of the IdeaPad Slim 5 and the regular IdeaPad 5 are quite similar. However, you get few quality-of-life improvements on the Slim 5. On the downside, you can not upgrade the RAM later on as it is soldered into the motherboard.
description:
Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 5 2023 (Ryzen 7): Overview

Here's a brief description of the build, chipset, and battery life of the Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 5 2023 (Ryzen 7).

Design and Build 

Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 5 offers a premium all-metal build with an aluminum top and bottom. The 14-inch display is an IPS LCD panel of WUXGA resolution (1920 x 1080) resolution. The screen has a matte finish and can reach a maximum brightness of 300 nits. It's relatively lightweight at around 1.46 kilograms.IdeaPad Slim 5 is 312mm in width, 221mm deep, and has a height of 17mm.

Performance and Memory 

Under the hood of IdeaPad Slim 5 is an AMD's Ryzen 7000 series processor. The Ryzen 7 7730U is an efficient mobile processor with 8 Cores and 16 Threads. Common everyday tasks like web browsing and office work should be a breeze for the processor. It has a maximum clock speed of 4.5 GHz as well as 16MB of L3 cache.As for memory, you get 16GB of non-upgradable DDR4 RAM. Alongside that, you also get  1TB M.2 2242 NVMe SSD.

Battery and Connectivity 

The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 5 is fueled by a 56.5 Wh Li-Po battery which can last up to 16 hours of local 1080p video playback at 150 nits of brightness. It performed very well in the MobileMark 2018 benchmark as well lasting 12.5 hours.For wireless connectivity, you get WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.1 technology. As for the ports, you get 2 USB 3.2 Gen Type-A ports, 2 USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C ports,an HDMI port, a card reader, and a headphone jack.

title: Acer Predator Helios 16 2023 (13th Gen i7-13700HX, RTX 4050, 16GB, 1TB, 16" WQXGA 165Hz)
short_description: The Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 2023 is a gaming laptop from the company. This particular model comes with a 13th Gen Intel Core i7-13700HX CPU under the hood. There is a 16' LED-backlit LCD panel with a 165Hz refresh rate on this variant. Handling the graphics is an NVidIA RTX 4050 with 6GB GDDR6 VRAM. It is accompanied by 16GB of DDR5 RAM and 1TB NVMe PCI-e Gen 4.0 SSD. Fueling the setup is a 90Wh battery with 230W AC adapter.
description:
Acer Predator Helios is a go-to gaming laptop. Here, we will further talk about the specs and features of the Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 (2023) with 13th-Gen Intel Core i7-13700HX and RTX 4050 graphics.

Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 (2023) Overview:

Design and Display

Kicking off with the design, the Helios Neo 16 2023 wraps a gaming vibe with a fancy RGB keyboard. This time, the display lid houses laser-engraved unique codes for customization. As for the dimensions, it will go up to 28.25mm thick while weighing 2.6kg.On the display side, Acer has provided two options— a 165Hz IPS panel. One with 2,560 x 1,600 resolution and 500 nit brightness. And another with 1,920 x 1,200 resolution and 400 nit brightness. Regardless, both the Acer Helios Neo 16 (2023) screens boast a 100% sRGB color gamut. They also feature the NVidIA Advanced Optimus with G-SYNC and a response time of 3ms.

Performance

The Acer Helios Neo 16 (2023) gets two options for processors: i5-13500HX and i7-13700HX. These 13th Gen Intel CPUs are accompanied by NVidIA GeForce RTX 4050 (6GB), RTX 4060 (8GB), or RTX 4070 (8GB), and 140W TGP.  The laptop supports up to 32GB of DDR5 RAM and 2TB of NVMe SSD storage, ensuring fast loading times and smooth multitasking.Acer has used a state-of-the-art cooling system here. It includes all-metal 5th gen AeroBlade fan technology plus liquid metal thermal paste for those gaming actions.

Ports and Others

Talking of ports and connectivity, Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 2023 (i7-13700HX, RTX 4050) comes with a range of options. You get 2x Thunderbolt 4 connectors, 3x USB-A 3.2 Gen 2, HDMI 2.1 video out, plus audio and GbE jacks along with a microSD card reader. Fueling the gaming machine is a 4-cell battery that can last up to 5 hours on a single charge.

title: Acer Swift X 16 2023
short_description: Acer Swift X 16 2023 is company's latest laptop with AMD Ryzen 7000 series processor. You can configure the laptop up to AMD Ryzen 9 H-series processor, which is complemented by Nvidia GeForce RTX 4050 GPU. The CPU and GPU combo is accompanied by  up to 2TB SSD and 16GB of DDR5 RAM. A 76Wh battery power the system. Besides this, the laptop also has a premium OLED screen with a contemporary 16:10 aspect ratio to aid in productivity-focused work. The laptop has already been announced by Acer, but we are unknown when it will hit the shelves in the stores near you.
description:
Acer Swift X 16 (2023) Overview:

Here, we will discuss the full specifications and price of the Acer Swift X 16 (2023).

Design and Display

The Swift X 16 (2023) has a minimal design with an aluminum chassis that weighs roughly 1.9 kg. Compared to the previous model, the brand has increased the trackpad's surface area by 33%. Interestingly, it's the largest touchpad among Acer’s current laptops, says the company itself. On the other hand, you also get a full-sized keyboard with a dedicated numpad and backlighting.Moving on, as the name suggests, the Swift X 16 flaunts a 16-inch OLED display with a 3.2K resolution and 120Hz refresh rate. The screen has a peak brightness of 500 nits and also covers 100% DCI-P3 color gamut.

Performance and Memory

Under the hood, the laptop is powered by the latest AMD Ryzen 7000-series processors. With a Zen 4 and RDNA 3-based APU, you can choose from Ryzen 5 7535HS all the way to Ryzen 9 7940H. For graphics, a Radeon 780M GPU has been integrated, but you can optionally add up to an RTX 4050 dedicated GPU.To keep the thermals under control, Acer has used a redesigned thermal layout. This new design uses TwinAir cooling with dual D6 Cooper heat pipes for sustained performance. There are also four fan speeds—Silent, Normal, Performance, and Turbo—to choose from. Memory-wise, the laptop comes with 16GB of LPDDR5 RAM and a storage capacity of up to 2TB SSD.

Rest of the specs

Besides that, the laptop is fueled by a 76Wh battery which is claimed to offer a battery life of up to 10 hours on a single charge. The I/O options include an HDMI 2.1 port, twin USB 4.0 connections, two USB-C ports, a 3.5mm jack, a microSD card reader, and a Windows Hello-certified fingerprint reader.

title: Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 4 2022 (12th Gen i5 1235U, 8GB, 512GB, 14" FHD)
short_description: The E14 series is Lenovo's offering to business clients and corporations looking for an affordable company device. Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 4 is an ultralight device with an efficient CPU meant for work-from-anywhere (WFA). The laptop has a compact form factor coming in at just around 1.6 kg and is powered by Intel 12th-gen i5-1235U, complemented by 8GB of DDR4 RAM and 512GB SSD.
description:
Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 4 (2022): Overview

Here's a brief description of the build, chipset, and battery life of the Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 4 2022 with the Intel i5 processor.

Design and Build 

ThinkPad E14 has a hybrid build. The aluminum top makes it feel premium, but the bottom is ABS plastic. It has a 14" FHD display with 45% NTSC coverage. The E14 features an LED backlit keyboard, a Windows Precision glass touchPad, and a familiar Trackpoint. It is relatively light at around 1.6 kg or about 3.5 pounds. It is 324mm in width, 221mm deep, and has a height of 19mm.

Performance and Memory

Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 4 (2022) is powered by Intel's 12th gen Core i5-1235U processor. It has 10 Cores and 12 Threads. The chip has a base frequency of 3.3GHz, and a max boost frequency of 4.4 GHz.The graphics part is handled by the Integrated Intel Iris Xe Graphics. Lenovo ThinkPad E14 comes with 8GB of soldered DDR4 RAM, but luckily, there is an empty SO-DIMM slot where you can add up to a 32GB stick. Thus ThinkPad E14 can have a maximum of 40GB RAM. You get 512GB SSD with Opal 2.0 security on purchase, which can be further expanded to 2 TB ( 2x 1TB M.2 2242 ) via the extra  M.2 2242 slot.

Battery and Connectivity

What powers the machine is a 57Wh Li-Po battery. It can play local 1080p video for up to 15.6 hours at 150 nits of brightness. It performed decently on the MobileMark 2018 benchmark as well lasting 11.5 hours at 200 nits.As for connectivity, you get a USB 4 (Thunderbolt 4) port that supports data transfer, Power Delivery 3.0, and DisplayPort 1.4. You also get an old-fashioned USB 2.0 Type-A port alongside a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A port, 1 HDMI port, and an Ethernet port. A 3.5mm headphone/microphone jack is also present to meet your audio needs. On the wireless side of things, you get WiFi 6E and Bluetooth 5.1.

seo_description_facebook: Learn about Lenovo ThinkPad E14 ( 12th gen i5-1235U, 8GB, 512GB, 14\" FHD) Price in Nepal and Availability. More about Lenovo ThinkPad E14 Gen 4 2022 (i5) .

title: Dell G15 5530 2023 (13th Gen i5-13450HX, RTX 3050, 16GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD 120Hz)
short_description: This Dell G15 5530 (2023) gaming laptop is equipped with a 13th Gen Intel Core i5-13450HX CPU and Nvidia RTX 3050 graphics. Memory options include 16GB of DDR5 RAM and 512GB of SSD. The RAM can be expanded up to 32GB. Furthermore, Dell has installed a 15.6-inch LCD display with a refresh rate of 120Hz on the front. Likewise, it boasts WiFi 6 functionality as well as an HDMI 2.1 connection that supports up to 4K@120Hz streaming.
description:
If you're looking for a capable gaming laptop that can handle 1080p gaming at high settings, you might want to check out the Dell G15 5530 with Intel Core i5-13450HX and RTX 3050.

Performance

On the core, the laptop packs a 13th Gen Intel Core i5-13450HX processor and an NVidIA GeForce RTX 3050 GPU, which deliver strong performance for most games. The chip is paired with 16GB of RAM and a 512GB SSD, which are enough for multitasking and storing your games. You can also upgrade the memory and storage yourself, as they are user-replaceable.The laptop has a decent selection of ports, including three USB-A, one USB-C, an HDMI 2.1, an Ethernet, and a headphone jack. The USB-C port supports video output but not charging or Thunderbolt 4 standards.

Design and Display

The Dell G15 5530 2023 comes in a Dark Shadow Gray color option with a Black thermal shelf. The laptop has a plastic chassis with a textured lid that features the Dell logo and a vent for airflow. It is on a thick and heavy profile, measuring 1.06 inches in height and weighing 2.57kg. Hence, it may not be the most portable or sleek device, but it feels sturdy and durable.You get a full-size keyboard with a numeric keypad and a G-key for quick access to gaming functions. The keyboard is backlit with either orange or RGB lighting, depending on the color choice.The laptop has a 15.6-inch display with various resolutions and refresh rate options. You can choose between an FHD (1920 x 1080) 120Hz, an FHD 165Hz, and a QHD (2560 x 1440) 240Hz panel. This particular model has an FHD panel with 120Hz. The higher refresh rates are ideal for smooth gaming, while the QHD option offers sharper visuals.

Battery and Others

The Dell G15 (2023) gets its juice from a 56Wh battery with 240W charging support. Talking of ports, it has got a decent selection, including three USB-A 3.2 Gen 1 ports, one USB-C port with DisplayPort alt mode, an HDMI 2.1 port, an Ethernet port, a headphone jack, and a power port.The USB-C port supports video output but not charging or Thunderbolt 4. The laptop also has an HD webcam with dual microphones and stereo speakers with Nahimic audio software.

title: Marshall Tufton
short_description: The Marshall Tufton is a portable speaker available in Black & Brass or Black. It features a metal grille, a leather pattern, Bluetooth buttons, and a battery indicator. The speaker is IPX2 water-resistant and features a powerful driver system with a 133mm woofer, two 50mm tweeters, and a 16mm full-range driver. It supports Bluetooth 5.0 technology, allowing wireless music playback within 30 feet, and features \"Stack Mode\" for synchronization with other devices. The speaker also has a 20+ hour battery life.
description:
Marshall Tufton Overview:

Design

The Marshall Tufton is a portable speaker with dimensions measuring 229×163×350 mm and weighing 4900 grams. Available in Black and brass or Black, this portable speaker features a metal grille at the front and a leather pattern all over its body. Similarly, at the top are all the controls, including knobs for bass, treble, and volume. Moreover, there are Bluetooth buttons and a battery indicator on either side of the controls. With an IPX2 water-resistant rating and flush-mounted corner caps, the Tufton speaker is exceptionally rugged.
  • Check out other Marshall speakers here.

Audio

Equipped with a powerful driver system, the Tufton speaker features a 133mm woofer, two 50mm tweeters, and a 16mm full-range driver. Additionally, the speaker utilizes Class D amplifiers, with the woofer powered by a 40W amp and the tweeters by two 15W amps. Plus, a 16-watt amp powers the full-range drivers.

Connectivity

Offering Bluetooth 5.0 technology, the Tufton speaker allows wireless music to play within a range of up to 30 feet. In addition to that, it supports connectivity via an aux-in port too. Further, Tufton includes a unique feature called "Stack Mode," which enables connection and synchronization with other compatible devices. Additionally, the speaker boasts multi-host functionality, allowing seamless switching between two Bluetooth-connected devices.

Battery

One of Tufton's strengths is its battery life, providing 20+ hours of portable playtime on a single charge. Furthermore, the speaker supports quick charging, with just 20 minutes of charging offering 4 hours of playtime. For reference, a full charge can be achieved in 2.5 hours, providing the flexibility to use it on the go.

title: Marshall Kilburn II
short_description: The Marshall Kilburn II is a rugged, bulky speaker with a leather pattern and features volume, bass, and treble knobs, an LED for charge indication, and a Bluetooth button. It weighs 2.5kg and has an IPX2 rating for water resistance. Available in Black with Brass in Nepal, it uses a woofer, two tweeters, three Class D amplifiers, Bluetooth 5.0, SBC, and APT-X, and has a 3.5mm headphone jack for audio input.
description:
Marshall Kilburn II Overview:

Design

The Marshall Kilburn II is a bulky and rugged type of speaker. The signature leather pattern covers all of its body. There are volume, bass, and treble knobs at the top, along with an LED for indicating the charge. A Bluetooth button is at the left of these controls.Even though it's heavy (around 2.5kg), the strap makes up for it. There is an IPX2 rating for protecting it against a little bit of water splashing. The Kilburn II comes with a ton of color options, but only Black with Brass is available here in Nepal.
  • Check out other Marshall speakers here.

Audio and Connectivity

Kilburn II employs a woofer alongside two tweeters for its audio output. Additionally, it incorporates three Class D amplifiers—one at 10W dedicated to the woofer and two at 5W each for the tweeters. This configuration enables the device to deliver stereo sound.You get Bluetooth 5.0 for wirelessly connecting your device to this. The connection can hold a maximum distance of 10 meters. Alongside that, the Kilburn II from Marshall supports SBC as well as APT-X. Also, it incorporates a 3.5mm headphone jack for audio input.

Battery

Moving on, this portable speaker has a cell that powers it for approximately 20 hours on a single charge. Charging it back to full takes well around 2.5 hours.

description:
If you are looking for a laptop that combines performance, portability, and style, you might want to consider the Dell XPS 13 9305 2021. More about the design, display, and performance overview here.

Dell XPS 13 9305 2021 Overview:

Design

The Dell XPS 13 9305 2021 laptop has a sleek and elegant look, with a silver aluminum chassis and a black carbon fiber palm rest. It carries a very thin and light profile, measuring only 0.58 inches in thickness and weighing only 2.64 pounds. This makes it easy to carry around and fit in any bag or backpack.

Performance

The laptop is powered by an 11th Gen Intel Core i7-1165G7 processor. This CPU can handle any task you throw at it, whether it is browsing the web, editing photos or videos, or running multiple applications at once. In terms of memory, you are getting 16GB of RAM, which ensures smooth multitasking and fast loading times. While the 512GB SSD storage, offers plenty of space for your files and programs, as well as faster booting and launching times.

Display

The ultrabook sports a 13.3-inch Full HD display, which delivers crisp and clear images and videos. The display also has a narrow bezel design, which maximizes the screen space and minimizes distractions. The display also has a wide viewing angle and a high brightness level, which makes it suitable for working in different lighting conditions.

Others

The XPS 13 9305 2021 also has some other features that make it a great laptop. For example, it has a backlit keyboard, which allows you to type comfortably in low-light environments. And the fingerprint sensor lets you unlock your laptop with just a touch of your finger.

description:
HP Pavilion Plus 14 (2023) Overview:

Heres a brief description of the build, chipset, and connectivity options on the HP Pavilion Plus 14 2023 with the AMD Ryzen 5 7540U chipset.

Design and Display

The HP Pavilion Plus 14 shows a sleek and modern laptop design. Its slim and lightweight build enhances portability, weighing just 1.38kgs, ensuring you can easily carry it wherever you venture. The HP Pavilion Plus 14 laptop offers a range of connectivity options including Wi-Fi 6 (2x2) (19e) and Bluetooth 5.3. title: Wings Phantom 340
short_description: The Wings Phantom 340 is a lightweight, transparent earbud with a transparent lid and signature logo. It features 13-mm high-fidelity drivers, quad microphones, ENC technology, and a dedicated gaming mode. The earbuds provide 10 hours of playback time, while the case adds 40 hours, resulting in a combined 50-hour battery life. The ANC decreases battery life to 7 hours for the buds and 28 hours for the case. The case can be fully charged in 1.5 hours, while the earbuds take nearly an hour.
description:
Wings Phantom 340 Overview:

Design

Wings Phantom 340 has a transparent design, mostly on the lid. Further, the lid has the Wings' signature logo. Opening the case, the earbuds offer an in-ear fit with a silicone covering for comfort and are rated for IPX5 water resistance.Weighing just around 49 grams total, Phantom 340 is lightweight and comes in two color options: Black and White.

Audio

The audio experience is driven by 13-mm high-fidelity drivers in each earpiece. Along with quad microphones for enhanced noise control during calls, the processing of ambient noise is supported by ENC technology. Moreover, the inclusion of a dedicated gaming mode in Wings Phantom 340 with reduced latency makes it suitable for gaming.The same microphones above also lend a helping hand on the ANC side. Yes, the Phantom 340 comes with active noise cancellation, with the earpieces canceling up to 30 dB of noise.

Rest of the specs

Battery-wise, the earbuds themselves provide approx. 10 hours of playback time, and the case adds an additional 40 hours, resulting in a total combined battery life of 50 hours. However, the ANC decreases the battery life, down to 7 hours for the buds alone and 28 hours for the case.The case can be fully charged in 1.5 hours when completely depleted, while the earbuds alone take nearly an hour to charge. The Wings Phantom 340 utilizes Bluetooth 5.3 for connectivity and features a USB-C port for charging.

title: Asta Wolf Phoenix

title: Redmi Buds 4 Active
short_description: Redmi Buds 4 Active are lightweight and portable in-ear earbuds with a long stem and IPX4 splash resistance. They feature 12mm dynamic drivers and ENC for clear phone calls. description:

Design

Nevertheless, it compensates with environmental noise cancellation (ENC) during phone calls, promoting clear and uninterrupted communication. Furthermore, gamers can enhance their gaming experience from the dedicated low-latency mode.

Battery and more

Moving on to battery life, each earbud is equipped with a 34mAh cell, while the charging case houses a 440mAh one. Design and Display

Talking of the design, it resembles much of its A14 5G sibling with a glass front, plastic frame, and plastic back. Even, the button placements and camera module are pretty identical.

Performance

Under the hood, the Galaxy M14 5G packs an Exynos 1330 chipset. This processor is based on a 5nm technology and supports up to 13 bands of 5G network. In terms of storage, the smartphone has up to 128GB of internal storage and a microSD card slot for further expansion.

Camera

Moving on, the Galaxy M14 5G has a great camera system that consists of a 50MP wide-angle camera, a 2MP macro camera, a 2MP depth camera, and a 13MP selfie camera. You can capture stunning photos and videos with this device, thanks to its features like LED flash, panorama, HDR, and portrait mode. The wide-angle camera lets you fit more in your frame, the macro camera lets you focus on small details, and the depth camera lets you create bokeh effects.

Battery and Others

Galaxy M14 5G has a massive 6000mAh battery that can last you for a long time on a single charge. The device also supports fast charging of up to 25W. It has a fingerprint sensor on the side for easy unlocking, NFC for contactless payments, Voice Focus for clear voice calls, Samsung Knox for security and privacy, and One UI Core 5.1 based on Android 13.

title: Moondrop Space Travel
short_description: The Moondrop Space Travel earbuds have a sleek design with a glassy lid and plastic bottom, featuring an LED light embedded within the logo. They offer a shallow in-ear fit and a touch-control sensor at the back. The 13mm driver features a titanium-plated dome diaphragm, flexible suspension diaphragm, and CCAW voice coil. The earbuds have two microphones each, each with a feedforward and feedback setup for 35 dB of wide-band ANC. They also have low latency/game mode, Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity, and a 380 mAh battery for extended playtime.
description:
Moondrop Space Travel Overview:

Design

The Moondrop Space Travel boasts a futuristic design, featuring a glassy lid and a plastic bottom. The LED light embedded within the letter "A" of the logo at the bottom adds a touch of innovation. The charging case comes in two color themes: black and orange, as well as white and black.In terms of comfort, the Space Travel earbuds offer a shallow in-ear fit, a design choice aimed at enhancing comfort, according to Moondrop. The earbuds align with the color themes of the cases and are equipped with a touch-control sensor at the back (both touch and swipe gestures work).

Audio and Mics

Delving into the audio features, the 13mm driver in Space Travel incorporates a titanium-plated dome diaphragm with a flexible suspension diaphragm underneath. A thin layer of CCAW (copper-clad aluminum wire) voice coil, along with a magnetic and circuit component, complements the driver. Moreover, the earbuds house two microphones each, boasting a feedforward and feedback setup to achieve 35 dB of wide-band ANC. Users can also utilize the transparency mode in Moondrop's Space Travel for added versatility.

Connectivity and others

On the connectivity front, Moondrop Space Travel's low latency/game mode facilitates a swift 55 ms sound transmission during gaming. The Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity ensures a stable connection within a 10-meter radius. For adjustments, users can utilize Moondrop's Link 2.0 app directly from their smartphones.Power-wise, the Space Travel earbuds pack a 37 mAh cell, providing approximately 4 hours of standalone usage. The charging case, equipped with a 380 mAh battery, extends the playtime by an additional 12 hours. In terms of recharging, the earpieces take an hour, while the case fully replenishes in an hour and a half when completely depleted.

title: JBL PartyBox 100
short_description: The JBL PartyBox 100 is a large, lightweight speaker with a 290x288x551mm design and weighs 9.7kg. description:
JBL PartyBox 100 Overview:

Design

JBL Partybox 100 is a pretty large speaker, measuring around 290×288×551mm. Having said that, this is not that huge for its type. It weighs around 9.7kg and wouldn't be appropriate to carry around. Hence, there are two handles on the top to hold it. However, one thing to note is that there is no IP rating.For most of the part, Partybox 100 comprises plastic. Audio and Connectivity

Partybox 100 has two woofers and two tweeters. Both the woofers measure 5.25" while the tweeters are 2.25" wide. With all these transducers, this speaker yields 160W of RMS power. JBL mentions the speaker's frequency range as being between 45Hz and 18kHz. You also have a bass boost!For a wireless connection, there is Bluetooth 4.2 powering the JBL Partybox 100. Another way to connect your device is to use the AUX port provided. You can even attach a mic or a guitar to amplify the audio. Apparently, there is also a dedicated "True Wireless Stereo" mode in which you can link two compatible speakers for stereo sound.

Battery

Partybox 100 doesn't need to be plugged into a source to power on. This ships with a battery inside with a 2500mAh capacity, lasting around 12 hours on a single charge. The speaker also supports fast charging. With a supporting charger, it takes 3 and a half hours to fully fuel up, while slower chargers can take 6.5 hours on average.

description:
Noise Air Buds Mini Overview:

Okay, let's get into what the Noise Air Buds Mini offers.

Design

To begin with, the Noise Air Buds Mini is a semi-in ear with an elongated stem. Talking about the stem, it has the Noise's logo at the bottom and supports touch controls. This all amounts to a weight of 4.4 g while also securing a splash resistance certification of IPX4. Besides, the case is a simple square design with smooth rounded corners. Audio

Battery

title: Google Pixel 8
short_description: Google Pixel 8 is a pretty powerful phone with an in-house nona-core (9-core) processor. It is further assisted by an 8 GB LPDDR5X RAM and either 128 GB or 256 GB of UFS 3.1 storage. Furthermore, the Google Pixel 8 boast a combination of a 50 MP primary and 12 MP ultrawide camera at the back. On the front, it has a 10.5 MP camera. It is further complimented by a wide range of amazing camera features. Overall, the Google Pixel 8 is a great flagship offering from Google at a somewhat affordable price point.
description:
The Pixel 8 is Google's base flagship offering for the year 2023. It is also the first Android 14 phone and is the rightful successor of the Google Pixel 7.

Google Pixel 8 Overview

Design and Display

The Google Pixel 8 is a premium smartphone, and it is clearly visible on the material of choice. It uses aluminium for the body, and Corning Gorilla Glass Victus on the front and back. It follows the same design blueprint that Google has been following for a few years now. This smartphone is available in three different colours: Hazel, Obsidian, and Rose.In terms of display, we have a 6.2-inch AMOLED panel that Google markets as “Acuta Display”. This screen has a resolution of 1080 x 2400 and a pixel density of 428 PPI. Furthermore, the Google Pixel 8 supports variable refresh rates ranging from 60Hz to 120Hz. In the meantime, it also supports HDR all while offering a peak brightness of 2000 nits.

Performance and Battery

Google has gone with its in-house nona-core (9 cores) Google Tensor G3 chipset. This chipset is capable of achieving a peak clock speed of 2.91 GHz with its primary core. Furthermore, we get 8 Gigs of LPDRR5x RAM with the Google Pixel 8. On the other hand, we get either 128 GB or 256 GB of UFS 3.1 storage. In terms of software, Google Pixel 8 ships with Android 14 out of the box. Additionally, it will receive a hefty 7 years of software and security updates.Powering the entire system is a respectable 4,575 mAh cell that can give you a day's worth of general usage. Similarly, it also supports 30W of fast wired charging. Whereas it also supports Qi-certified fast wireless charging, and reverse charging capabilities.

Camera

The camera has always been one of the strongest suites of the Google Pixel lineup. Here with Google Pixel 8, we get a dual-camera setup on the back and a single camera on the front with a hole-punch camera cutout. The primary rear camera is a 50MP shooter with a 1/1.31” sensor size. Complementing it is a 12MP ultrawide lens with a 125.8° field of view. And on the front, we have a 10.5MP lens with f/2.2 aperture. Google's camera comes with a wide plethora of photo and video-capturing features.

title: Fitbit Versa 4
short_description: Versa 4 is the latest addition to Fitbit's popular \"Versa\" line of smartwatches, and it brings a few minor improvements over the Fitbit Versa 3 from 2020. The watch features a beautiful 1.58-inch AMOLED touchscreen and is incredibly lightweight at around 38 grams only. In fact, it is 15% lighter and 10% thinner than its predecessor, making it the lightest and thinnest entry in the Versa line so far. This smartwatch has all the health and fitness tracking features you'd possibly want, including heart rate variability (HRV) and skin temperature readings. Fitbit Versa 4 has built-in Alexa, allowing for hands-free voice commands, and supports NFC for contactless payments through Google Wallet and Fitbit Pay. The watch runs on Fitbit's own operating system—instead of Wear OS—even though the company has been acquired by Google. However, Fitbit has removed support for third-party apps and Google Assistant in its latest smartwatches.

title: Realme C51
short_description: The Realme C51 is a budget smartphone offering a massive 6.74-inch 90Hz screen, a dual-camera setup, and a 5000 mAh battery. The screen has a peak brightness of 560 nits and a touch sampling rate of 180Hz. It sports a dual-camera setup consisting of a 50 MP primary shooter and an unspecified depth sensor. Meanwhile, the front camera is a 5MP lens with f/2.22 aperture. The phone is powered by a Unisoc Tiger T612  processor and a 5000mAh battery with 33W fast charging. As for the software, it runs on Android 13 with Realme UI 4.0 T Edition on top.
description:
Realme C51 is a new budget offering from, well, Realme, the Chinese smartphone manufacturer that comes with some interesting features.

Realme C51 Overview

Design and Display

The Realme C51 is a two-textured phone with a rounded rectangle shape and flat design. This unit measures 167.20 x 76.70 x 7.99 mm in dimensions and weighs about 186 grams. It is available in two colour options: Mint Green, and Carbon Black.Up front, a massive 6.74” display greets us with a 90Hz refresh rate and 180Hz touch sampling rate. Even though it can reach a peak brightness of 560 nits and can display 16.7 million colours, it is an LCD panel, which is the standard for budget phones like this one.

Performance 

In terms of performance, the Realme C51 relies on a Unisoc Tiger T612 SoC. It isn't a very good processor but a popular choice in this price range. Additionally, it is an octa-core chipset built on a 12nm process and can clock in at a maximum of 1.8GHz. It is further assisted by 4GB LPDDR4X RAM and 64 GB internal storage.Given the numbers are quite low, the Realme C51 more than makes up for it by offering sweet amounts of expandability. It offers an additional 4GB virtual RAM extension as well as storage expansion of up to 2TB via MicroSD card. On the software side of things, the Realme C51 comes with Realme UI T Edition based on Android 13. Furthermore, it offers a unique Mini Capsule feature, which is basically Apple's Dynamic Island knock-off.

Camera and the rest

In terms of shooters, we have a 50MP primary camera with a maximum aperture of f/1.8. It receives assistance from a depth sensor that Realme has opted to remain silent about. And on the front, we have a 5MP camera with 76.8° FOV.The Realme C51 has dual-SIM support with 4G LTE, dual WiFi, and Bluetooth v5.0 connectivity. You also get 360° NFC support here. And lastly, juicing up the phone is a 5,000 mAh battery with 33W SUPERVOOC charging support via USB Type-C Port.

title: Anker Soundcore Flare Mini
short_description: The Anker Soundcore Flare Mini is a compact speaker with a bell-shaped body and a wide base. It features six control buttons and ambient LED lights, offering eight colors and five lighting modes. Despite lacking an AUX port, it is IPX7-rated for water protection. It offers a 360° sound with two 5W neodymium drivers and uses Bluetooth 4.2 for a wide connection range. Its high-efficiency Li-ion battery provides approximately 12 hours of continuous playback.
description:
Anker Soundcore Flare Mini Overview

Design

The design of the Anker Soundcore Flare Mini remains consistent with the Flare series. It features a bell-shaped, cylindrical body with a wide base. Similarly, the top panel includes six control buttons, while the bottom showcases the Soundcore logo and ambient LED lights. Moreover, these LEDs offer eight distinct colors and five lighting modes, referred to as "Audio Fireworks."However, the Flare Mini has limited port options, notably lacking an AUX port. This is becoming more common as smartphone manufacturers phase out the 3.5mm headphone jack. It is worth noting that the speaker is IPX7-rated, providing protection against water damage.

Audio and Connectivity

The Anker Soundcore Flare Mini boasts a 360° sound design with two 5W neodymium drivers, delivering a full surround sound experience. Additionally, the BassUp mode is enabled by default but can be deactivated through the controls.In terms of connectivity, the Flare Mini uses Bluetooth 4.2, providing a wide connection range of up to 20 meters (~66 feet). While it lacks app support, users can easily set up another Bluetooth speaker for stereo audio by pressing and holding the Bluetooth button for 3 seconds.

Battery

Powering the Flare Mini is a high-efficiency Li-ion battery, which Anker claims can deliver approximately 12 hours of continuous playback. Nevertheless, there are no mentions of the charging speed of the micro-USB port it comes with.

short_description: The Anker Soundcore P20i is a solid pair of in-ear earbuds with a comfy fit, a pebble-shaped case, and touch controls. description:

Anker Soundcore P20i Overview

Design and Audio Quality

The Soundcore P20i boasts a well-designed in-ear fit with a stemmed structure. The case is pebble-shaped with a lanyard attached to make it easy to carry (if needed). title: Lenovo IdeaPad 5 2022 (Ryzen 7 5825U, 16GB, 1TB, 15.6" FHD)
short_description: Lenovo's Ideapad 5 15 (2022), packing Ryzen 7 5825U processor, is the notebook of choice if you're looking for a light laptop for school or work. It comes with 16GB DDR4x RAM and 1TB SSD. With this processor and memory combo, this guy will breeze through any schoolwork you throw at it. Though, as with most other thin and light notebooks, dedicated graphics is absent, and you'll have to make do with AMD's integrated Radeon graphics.
description:
Lenovo IdeaPad 5 (2022): Overview

Here's a brief description of the design aesthetic, processor, and battery life of the Lenovo IdeaPad 5 2022 laptop with Ryzen 7 5825U chip.

Build and Display

The Ideapad 5 2022 offers an aluminum metal body. It is 16.9mm thick and weighs around 1.85 kg. The matte screen measures 15.6" diagonally and boasts 300 nits of brightness. There are dual stereo up-firing speakers, a backlit keyboard, and a fingerprint reader for security.

Performance and Memory

Under the hood, Lenovo IdeaPad 5 (2022) has a Ryzen 7 5825U processor. This is a "Barcelo" refresh of the Cezanne-based Ryzen 5800U. The new processor brings higher base and boost frequencies. It comes with 16GB DDR4x RAM but unfortunately, it is non-upgradable. For storage, you get a 1 TB M.2 SSD and an empty 2.5 " disk slot for storage expansion.

Battery and Connectivity 

In the tank of the Ideapad 5 2022 (AMD) is a 56.5 Wh battery pack. It is rated for up to 13.6 hours of local video playback and 10.6 hours in MobileMark 2018 benchmark at 200 nits. The Ideapad ships with a 65-Wh power adapted, adding up to 2 hours of usage on a quick 15-minute charge using Rapid Charge Boost.As for wired connections, you get four USB ports, including two Type-C, one HDMI, one SD card reader, and a combined audio jack.

title: Zeblaze Thor SQ
short_description: The Zeblaze Thor SQ features a 2.13-inch AMOLED display with a resolution of 410 x 502 pixels and a peak brightness of 1000 nits. It is powered by the SL8541E Cortex-A7MP Quad-Core CPU and includes 2 GB of RAM with 16 GB of storage. The watch supports 4G LTE and has a 950 mAh battery offering up to 84 hours of typical use. Key sensors include a 3-axis accelerometer and gyroscope, and it supports GPS, GLONASS, and Baidu for navigation. The watch uses magnetic charging and comes with a fluoroelastomer band.
description:
Below is a short overview of the Zeblaze Thor SQ including its features and battery life.

Zeblaze Thor SQ Overview

Display and Design

The Zeblaze Thor SQ features a 2.13-inch AMOLED display with a resolution of 410 x 502 pixels and a brightness of up to 1000 nits. The device measures 59.5 x 47.6 x 15.4 mm and weighs 50 grams without the strap. The band strap is made of fluoroelastomer, with a width of 22 mm and fits wrist circumferences between 140 and 210 mm.

Battery and Charging

The smartwatch comes with a 950 mAh battery, offering up to 84 hours of typical use time. It uses magnetic charging, which takes approximately 45 minutes to fully charge.

Performance and Extras

Powered by the Cortex-A7MP Quad-Core CPU, the Zeblaze Thor SQ claims to offer ‘solid’ performance. It includes 2 GB of RAM and 16 GB of storage. It also supports multiple network bands, including GSM, WCDMA, LTE-FDD, and LTE-TDD. Morevoer, it also features Wi-Fi (2.4GHz, supporting 802.11b/g/n) and Bluetooth 4.2 for connectivity.The smartwatch is equipped with a 3-axis accelerometer, a 3-axis gyroscope sensor, and a new OHR fusion biometric sensor. For navigation and positioning, it supports GPS, GLONASS, Baidou, and AGPS.

title: Asus TUF Gaming A15 2023 (Ryzen 5 7535HS, RTX 2050, 8GB, 512GB, 15.6" FHD 144Hz )
short_description: The Asus TUF Gaming A15 (FA506NC) features a 15.6-inch IPS display with a 144Hz FHD resolution, housed in a redesigned chassis available in Mecha Grey and Jager Grey. It is powered by the AMD Ryzen 5 7535HS processor, a 6-core, 12-thread CPU with a boost clock of up to 4.55GHz, and an NVidIA RTX 2050 GPU with 4GB GDDR6 VRAM. The laptop includes 8GB or 16GB of DDR5-4800 RAM, expandable up to 32GB, and 512GB PCIe 4.0 SSD storage. Cooling is enhanced by dual Arc Flow fans, five copper heat pipes, and four exhaust vents for improved airflow. It runs on a 4-cell 90Wh battery with fast charging, reaching 50% in 30 minutes, and offers Wi-Fi 6, Bluetooth 5.2, and multiple ports, including HDMI 2.1 and USB.
description:
Asus TUF Gaming A15 (2023) Overview:

Back in January, Asus refreshed the TUF Gaming A15 with the latest AMD Ryzen 7000-series processors and NVidIA RTX 4000-series GPU. You can finally buy this gaming laptops laptop in Nepal. So, let’s get into the specs, features, official price, and availability of the Asus TUF Gaming A15 (2023) laptop with Ryzen 7 7535HS & RTX 2050 in Nepal.

Design and Display

Although not as significant, Asus has also made changes to the chassis of the new TUF Gaming A15. The 2023 model is smaller than its predecessor and features distinct color options. Mecha Grey and Jager Grey feature two different finishes and logo placement. In addition, it has a single-zone Mini LED illuminated RGB keyboard and a four-way indicator above it. Opening the metal lid, you are greeted with a 15.6-inch IPS screen. Here, you can choose between 144Hz FHD and 165Hz QHD. This particular model is the former one.

Performance and Memory

This particular variant of Asus TUF Gaming A15 is powered by Ryzen 7 7535HS and NVidIA RTX 2050. It is a Zen 3+-based CPU with six cores, 12 threads, and a maximum boost speed of 4.55GHz. On the graphics front, you can choose from three NVidIA RTX 40-series GPUs. This one packs the RTX 2050 with 4GB GDDR6 VRAM and a maximum TGP of 75W, considering the 60W Dynamic Boost.Like last year, all the models come with a MUX switch, allowing users to bypass the integrated GPU for higher graphics performance in gaming. New to this year is the Advanced Optimus, which automates the whole process.

Cooling and Memory

To keep with the added power, the Asus TUF Gaming A15 (2023) comes with improved thermals. The colling setup includes dual Arc Flow fans with 84 blades as sharp as 0.1mm. This results in 13% more airflow compared to last year. In addition, the laptop has up to five copper heat pipes and four exhaust vents.As for memory, the laptops ships with 8GB or 16GB of DDR5-4800 RAM. The SO-DIMM slots are user-accessible, and you can expand it up to 32GB. Likewise, you get 512GB PCIe 4.0 SSD storage.

Rest of the Specs

Fueling the new TUF Gaming A15 2023 is a 4-cell 90Wh battery. With the fast charging support, it can go from 0% to 50% in just 30 minutes. Connectivity options on the laptop include four USB ports, one HDMI 2.1, one RJ-45, one combo audio jack, and a Kensington lock. The laptop has Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.2 for wireless connection. The audio setup includes two 2W speakers with Dolby Atmos and Hi-Res Audio.

The device boasts a 16-inch IPS display with QHD+ resolution and an impressive 165Hz refresh rate, ensuring smooth and vivid visuals. Display and Build

Chipset

Under the hood, 90 Lite features a MediaTek Dimensity 6020 processor. This midrange octa-core processor supports 5G and comes with Mali G57 MC2 GPU. The sole variant starts at 8GB RAM and 256GB of UFS storage. Honor 90 Lite ships with Android 13 with Honor’s Magic OS 7.1 skin on top.

title: Asus TUF Gaming A14 2024 (Ryzen AI 9 HX 370, RTX 4050, 16GB, 1TB, 14" 2.5K 165Hz)
short_description: The Asus TUF A14 is a compact gaming laptop featuring a 2.5K 165Hz display with G-Sync, powered by a Ryzen 9 HX 370 CPU and NVidIA RTX 4050 GPU. Its 12-core processor with an integrated NPU enhances AI workload efficiency, while the GPU offers up to 100W boost performance, though limited by thermal constraints. The device supports 16GB soldered RAM, upgradable SSD storage, and has a robust cooling system with ultra-thin fans. Connectivity includes USB 4, HDMI, and Wi-Fi 6E, with a 73Wh battery ensuring strong endurance for hybrid use.
description:
Are you looking for a compact gaming laptop? You’ll definitely love the recently launched Asus TUF A14 (2024) with Ryzen AI 9 HX 370 processor and NVidIA RTX 4060 dedicated GPU under its helm.

Asus TUF Gaming A14 2024 (A401WU) Overview

Design and Display

The Asus TUF A14 (A401WU) is notable for its compact design, measuring just 1.69mm thick and weighing under 1.5 kg. It is both portable and durable, thanks to a CNC-milled chassis with military-grade toughness, making it perfect for daily use. The device is available in a Jaeger Grey colourway with minimal bezels, featuring a 1080p IR webcam at the top.The 16:10 2.5K IPS display delivers sharp visuals, offers anti-glare protection, and provides a vibrant 100% sRGB colour range. More importantly, the Asus TUF A14 (A401WU) runs at a smooth 165Hz refresh rate, ideal for gaming. Additionally, with G-Sync support, the screen ensures fluid gameplay. The inclusion of a MUX Switch and NVidIA’s Advanced Optimus further enhances display performance, giving users the flexibility to switch between integrated and discrete GPUs for better efficiency.

Performance and the Rest

Under the hood, the Asus TUF A14 (A401WU) is powered by the AMD Ryzen AI 9 HX 370 processor and RTX 4050 GPU. The CPU is built on a 4nm node and features 12 cores and 24 threads. Moreover, it clocks at a maximum of up to 5.1 GHz on a single core. It also integrates a Neural Processing Unit (NPU), handling AI workloads efficiently. Although the Radeon 780M is there for graphical support, the dedicated NVidIA GPU will do all the heavy lifting with up to 100W boost power.However, thermal constraints in the chassis limit its full potential. The laptop’s cooling system relies on ultra-thin fans and heatsinks connecting both the CPU and GPU. Unfortunately, 16GB is the maximum RAM capacity you get on the Asus TUF A14 (A401WU. But the SSD is upgradeable, with support for up to 2TB. Connectivity includes two Type-C ports, two USB 3 Type-A ports, a full-sized HDMI, a microSD reader, and a headphone jack. Finally, with a large 73Wh battery and efficient Ryzen processor, the TUF A14 offers long battery life and hybrid usage, supported by Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3.

title: HiFuture HeliX
short_description: The HiFuture HeliX is a stylish, premium looking stemless in-ear bud with silicone tips, featuring a metallic finish and IPX5 water protection. It features touch controls for music and comes in Light Gray, Black, and Pink colors. The wireless stereo offers Soft Bass Sound and Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity but lacks Active Noise cancellation and call quality.
description:
HiFuture HeliX Overview:

Design

The HiFuture HeliX is a stemless in-ear bud with silicone tips. The earbuds themselves are claimed to feel stylish and premium, as they feature a metallic finish. In addition, they are stemless and IPX5 rated for water protection. And you can control the music with touch controls.The charging case takes a cylindrical approach. The HeliX's case resembles a container with a place for buds to rest on. The thing that looked cool on the teaser, at least for me, was the circular lid rotating to reveal the buds. You get to choose between Light Gray, Black, and Pink according to your preference.

Audio and Connectivity

This true wireless stereo provides you with HiFuture's Soft Bass Sound, along with Bluetooth 5.0 for connection. You won't find Active Noise cancellation here, in HeliX, and call quality is not mentioned. However, you do get an AAC codec for HD audio quality. Another thing missing is app support.

Battery

Moving on to the battery, the HiFuture Helix lasts for 5 hours. Moreover, the case adds 15 hours of fuel to the TWS. And that's it...Check out other HiFuture earbuds here.

title: Redmi Note 14 5G
short_description: Redmi Note 14 5G is the base entry in Xiaomis \"Redmi Note 14 lineup\". It comes with the MediaTek Dimensity 7025 Ultra under the hood. It comes in multiple configurations with up to 12GB RAM, and 256GB storage. Similarly, it features a 6.67-inch OLED panel on the front with the Corning Gorilla Glass protection. It comes with a 50MP primary + 8MP ultrawide + 2MP macro sensor combo on the back. Meanwhile, on the front, there is a 20MP shooter. Powering everything is a 5,110 mAh cell with 45W fast charging.
description:
Xiaomi has been well know to offer specs-heavy smartphones in an affordable price bracket. Similar is the case for the sub-brand Redmi. As such, Redmi Note 14 5G is the companys midrange offering for the year 2024.

Redmi Note 14 5G Overview

Design and Display

The Redmi Note 14 5G features a curved back panel with a larger camera cutout. Moreover, the camera island has a bit softer edge. The phone offers an IP64 rating, a reinforced internal design, and a Corning Gorilla Glass 5 for protection.On the front, we are getting a 6.67-inch OLED panel with FHD+ resolution. It boasts a peak brig refers rate of up to 120Hz and a peak brightness of 1800 nits. Furthermore, the display is capable of HDR10+ and a 100% DCI-P3 color gamut.

Performance

Under the hood, it comes with MediaTek Dimensity 7025 Ultra. It is an octa-core processor with a peak clock speed of up to 2.5GHz. The Redmi Note 14 5G comes in four configurations i.e. 6GB + 128GB, 8GB+128GB, 8GB+256GB, and 12GB + 256GB. Moving on to the battery, it packs a 5,110 mAh cell with 45W charging support. On top of that, this smartphone features Xiamomi HyperOS.

Camera and the rest

In terms of optics, the primary camera of the Redmi Note 14 5G is a 50MP OIS-enabled lens packed with a Sony LYT-600 sensor. Additionally, it features a 2MP auxiliary lens helping out with depth detection and a 16MP selfie camera.For connectivity, the Redmi 14 5G provides you a dual-SIM support with 5G cellular, dual-band Wifi 5, and Bluetooth v5.3 for wireless medium. Other than that, you will get a USB Type-C port and a 3.5mm headphone jack. Not only this, you will find an in-display fingerprint sensor for added security. title: Xiaomi 12
short_description: Xiaomi 12 was officially introduced with the more expensive Xiaomi 12 Pro, and is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 octa-core mobile silicon. It flaunts a 6.28-inch AMOLED screen with a resolution of 1080 x 2400 pixels. Furthermore, the Xiaomi 12 is one of the world's first phones to offer 12-bit screens capable of producing 68 billion colors. The phone runs on the Android 11-based MIUI 13 operating system and has Liquid Cooling technology to keep the device's temperature under control during high workloads.
description:
Xiaomi 12 Overview:

Here, we will discuss the full specifications, price, and availability of the Xiaomi 12.

Design, Display

Xiaomi 12 features a 6.28-inch AMOLED panel with FHD+ resolution. The panel supports a 120Hz refresh rate and 480Hz touch sampling rate. Furthermore, the Xiaomi 12 is one of the world's first phones with a 12-bit screen. This means it can display a whopping 68 billion colors.However, the smartphone should support Dolby Vision to enjoy the full benefits of 12-bit color. And, thankfully, you do get support for Dolby Vision along with HDR 10+ certification here. The screen is covered by Gorilla Glass Victus for protection against accidental drops and scratches.Design-wise, it has an AG Glass sheet on the back and the sides are made of metal. For a comfortable grip, the side edges are slightly curved on the back. Xiaomi 12 is available in three color options—Grey, Blue, Purple—plus a Special Edition with Wild Green Leather.

Performance

Underneath, Xiaomi has fitted in a powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chip. Like its Pro sibling, the company has included a vapor chamber cooling that covers 2600mm2 area. The smartphone is available with up to 12GB of RAM and up to 256GB of internal storage.

Camera, Others

Moving on, the smartphone houses a triple camera setup led by a 50MP Sony IMX766 primary lens with OIS. Following this is a 13MP ultrawide (123° FOV), and a 5MP telephoto lens. It also boasts a feature dubbed "CyberFocus," which is an advanced autofocus technology capable of identifying and tracking different sorts of subjects.Over on the front, there is a 32MP selfie shooter that is capable of recording 1080 60 fps videos.Fueling the Xiaomi 12 is a 4,600mAh battery that supports 67W fast charging. The phone ships with Android 11-based MIUI 13 out of the box.

description:
The MSI Sword 16 HX 2024 (B14VEKG) is the companys offering for the year 2024. It is a gaming laptop available in multiple configurations. Here, we will discuss a particular MSI Sword 16 HX 2024 with 14th Gen Intel Core i7-14700HX and NVidIA RTX 4050 discrete GPU.

MSI Sword 16 HX 2024 (B14VEKG) Overview

Design and Display

The MSI Sword 16 HX 2024 (B14VEKG) laptop is a gaming laptop that comes in a Cosmos Grey colour option. Additionally, it has a 24-zone RGB Gaming keyboard to complete the look. With its hefty hardware, it comes in a beefy frame. It can go up to 27.70mm in thickness and 2.3kg in weight.The front of the laptop has a 16-inch display with narrow bezels on the sides and a sizable chin that bears the companys name. Additionally, the IPS panel screen supports a 144Hz refresh rate and has a WUXGA resolution of 1,920 x 1,080 pixels.

Performance and the rest

The MSI Sword 16 HX 2024 (B14VEKG) delivers its performance with a combination of the 14th Gen Intel Core i7-14700HX processor and the NVidIA RTX 4050 GPU. The processor has 20 cores, 28 threads, and a 33MB L3 cache. Furthermore, it offers a clock speed range of 1.5 GHz to 5.5 GHz. Meanwhile, the discrete GPU comes with 6GB GDDR6 memory and peaks at 2,370 MHz.Other than that, this laptop comes with 16GB DDR5-5600 RAM for its memory and 1TB NVMe PCIe Gen 4.0 SSD for storage. If you need more memory, you can upgrade the MSI Sword 16 HX 2024 (B14VEKG) up to 96GB with dual-channel compatibility. Likewise, you can also expand the storage on this thing, thanks to an extra SSD slot. Moreover, this extra slot is NVMe PCIe Gen5 SSD support, which is one of the highlighting features of this laptop. Meanwhile, in the tank, you get a 65 battery with 200W charging capability.

short_description: The HP Pavilion 15 2023 (15t-eg300) is a decent offering from the company. Under the hood, it packs the 13th Gen Intel Core i5-1335U processor. description:
If you need a laptop that can manage a substantial workload with solid hardware, consider checking out the HP Pavilion 15 2023 (15t-eg300) with 13th Gen Intel Core i5-1335U processor.

HP Pavilion 15 2023 (15t-eg300) Overview

Design and Ports

The HP Pavilion 15 2023 (15t-eg300) sports a sleek and minimalist design, available exclusively in Natural Silver. Moreover, it is crafted with a sandblasted aluminium cover and keyboard frame, it weighs approximately 1.75 kg. The laptop features a full-size backlit keyboard, complete with a numeric keypad and a fingerprint sensor for enhanced security.At the forefront, youll find a 15.6-inch IPS LCD bordered by substantial bezels. However, its upgradability remains undisclosed by the company, urging potential buyers to consult with the retailer beforehand. Powering the device is a 41Wh 3-cell battery for extended usage.

description:
Are you a student or an office worker looking for a laptop that will serve you for years to come? Then you might want to take a look at the Dell Latitude 14 3440 2023 with Intel i7-1355U processor.

Dell Latitude 14 3440 (2023) Overview

Design and Display

Dell Latitude 14 3440 (2023) is a standard laptop that does not stick out design-wise. It comes in a Soft Charcoal colourway while weighing in at just over one and a half kilos. title: Level51 MB (14th Gen i5-14500HX, RTX 4050, 8GB, 500GB, 15.6")
short_description: The Level51 MB packs a punch with its i5-14500HX CPU and RTX 4050 GPU, delivering high-performance computing in a sleek design. Featuring a 15.6” Full HD IPS display, ample storage, and versatile connectivity, its a powerhouse for creators and gamers alike.
description:
Here is a quick overview of the Level51 MB, which comes with the latest i5-14500HX CPU and RTX 4050 GPU.

Level51 MB Overview

Design and Display

Level51 MB stands out as a creator-focused powerhouse, boasting a sleek design and gamery aesthetics. It has precise dimensions of 361mm x 241mm x 28mm and weighs approximately 2350 grams. Sporting a 15.6” Full HD IPS display, it offers a rapid 144Hz refresh rate and encompasses over 100% sRGB colors. This enables not only high-frame-rate gaming but also facilitates tasks like photo or video editing.

Performance and Storage

The Level51 MB is driven by a 14th Raptor Lake Refresh Core i5-14500HX CPU, featuring 14 cores, 20 threads, and a maximum turbo frequency of 5 GHz. Balancing desktop-level performance with portability, its an ideal choice. Presently, the Level51 MB is available for pre-order with an RTX 4050 Max P GPU, though higher configurations may emerge in the future. The GPU operates at its full 140W TGP, offering ample power for diverse requirements.Regarding memory, it comes equipped with an 8GB DDR5 stick by default, which can be upgraded either during purchase or later. For storage needs, a Gen 4 Lexar SSD is provided, with an extra storage slot available within the laptop. An additional 8GB of RAM or a 500GB SSD can be added for an extra cost of 6,000 rupees.

Battery Life and Connectivity

The Level51 MB features a modest 54Wh battery, complemented by a robust 230W AC adapter. Connectivity options include a DC-in port and a mini-display port directly connected to the NVidIA GPU. Additionally, there are HDMI and Type-C ports, though these are linked to the integrated graphics. Other ports consist of two Type-A ports, an additional Type-C port, separate headphone and microphone jacks, and an SD card reader. Positioned on the top bezel is a 720p webcam, while wireless connectivity is supported by WiFi 6E and Bluetooth 5.0.

title: Mivi DuoPods K4
short_description: The Mivi DuoPods K4 is available in four colour options and comes in an interesting dual-tone and dual-texture design. The drivers in these earbuds are 13mm and offer AI-ENC for clearer calls. Connectivity-wise, these earbuds come with Bluetooth v5.3 and offer dual-connection mode allowing it to be connected with up to two devices. The company also claims latency as low as 50ms on these earbuds.
description:
Mivi DuoPods K4 Overview

Design

The Mivi DuoPods K4 comes in a semi-in-ear design with a dual-tone and dual-texture finish. The bottom half of the stem has diagonal stripes while the upper half comes with a smooth glossy finish. Similarly, the upper half of the stem comes with touch controls. The earpiece also houses smaller speaker grills on the side.The charging case of the Mivi DuoPods K4 comes in an ovular shape and also has a dual-tone finish. The case features the company logo and four LEDs as the battery indicator. It also houses a USB Type-C at the base for charging. These buds are available in four colourways: Black, Light Blue, Pink, and Beige.

Audio and the rest

Dual 13mm drivers power the Mivi DuoPods K4 in terms of audio capabilities. Additionally, these earbuds feature AI ENC ensuring clearer calls. Meanwhile, for connectivity, they feature Bluetooth v5.3 with latency as low as 50ms making it ideal for gamers. On top of that, these buds also come with dual-connection mode allowing for it to be connected with two of your devices at once.In terms of playback time, you can get up to 50 hours of playtime from them. The Mivi DuoPods K4 also offer fast charging with 10 minutes of charge allowing you 500 minutes of usage. The company has not highlighted any dust or water resistance on these earbuds. Hence, we suggest consumers be careful with them.

title: Ultima Watch Magic
short_description: The Ultima Watch Magic is the second watch from Nepal's growing accessories company. This features a boxy smartwatch with rounded corners, a pin/buckle silicone strap, and IP68 dust and water resistance. The display has a 240 x 284 resolution and a 1.83-inch TFT LCD panel with a peak brightness of 500 nits. The watch offers over 200 watch faces and many smart features. By using Bluetooth V5.2, the Ultima Watch Magic allows for Bluetooth calling. Additionally, users can access every feature using the Ultima Smart app. The watch also supports Nepali as a language.
description:
Ultima Watch Magic Overview:

Design and Display

The Ultima Watch Magic comes with rounded corners. It has a pin-and-buckle silicone strap to strap around your wrist. Additionally, IP68 dust and water resistance are provided. Besides, all Ultima provides are two color options: Black and Copper.When it comes to the display, the Watch Magic ships with a fairly sharp 240 x 284 resolution, all within a 1.83-inch TFT LCD panel with 2.5D curved glass. This display is visible enough, as the screen maxes out at 500 nits of peak brightness. Furthermore, you can choose from more than 200 options for watch faces.

Fitness and Sports Mode

In terms of fitness, features such as heart rate tracking and a sleep tracker work automatically 24/7. However, other features are manual, such as SpO2, stress monitoring, etc. Moreover, the Watch Magic also ensures female health tracking. For sports enthusiasts, the smartwatch has been delivered with 110+ sports modes.

Bluetooth features

Here, Ultima's new Watch Magic is built with Bluetooth V5.2. This allows the company to add features such as Bluetooth calling. When paired with the integrated mic and speaker, you do not have to touch your phone to answer calls. Not only can you answer incoming calls, but you can even dial numbers using the smartwatch without the hassle of removing your phone from your pocket.Further, you can get notifications from your phone to show up on the watch, set reminders, use the watch as a camera shutter, control music playback, and the list goes on. All of this can be set up using the Ultima Smart app. In addition, this app also lets you view all your health and fitness data.

Battery, Charging, and the Rest

On a single charge, Ultima Watch Magic should last around 7 days. However, Ultima hasn't revealed the exact battery capacity. Even charging is fast, getting around a day's worth of charge in 10 minutes.  Other than that, Nepali is supported all across the smartwatch's interface.

title: Lenovo ThinkPad L13 Gen 3 2022 (12th Gen i5 1235U, 16GB, 512GB, 13.3" WUXGA)
short_description: The ThinkPad L13 series of laptops are business devices with compact form factors and security integrations. Lenovo ThinkPad L13 Gen 3 is an ultralight device with an efficient CPU meant for work-from-anywhere (WFA). The laptop is easy to carry, coming in at just around 1.26 kg and is powered by Intel 12th-gen Core i5-1235U, complemented by 16GB of DDR4 RAM and 512GB SSD.
description:
Lenovo ThinkPad L13 Gen 3 (2022): Overview

Here's a brief description of the build, chipset, and battery life of the Lenovo ThinkPad L13 Gen 3 2022 laptop with the Intel i5 processor.

Design and Build 

ThinkPad L13 has a hybrid build featuring an Aluminium top and GFRP (Glass Fiber Reinforced Polymer) plastic at the bottom. The chassis encloses a 13.3" WUXGA anti-glare display with 45% NTSC coverage. The L13 features an LED backlit keyboard, a Windows Precision touchPad, and a familiar Trackpoint. It is light at just 1.26 kg or 2.78 pounds. It is 305mm in width, 218mm deep, and has a height of 17mm.

Performance and Memory

ThinkPad L13 Gen 3 is powered by Intel's 12th gen Core i5-1235U processor. It has 10 Cores and 12 Threads. The chip has a base frequency of 3.3 GHz and a max boost frequency of 4.4 GHz.On the GPU front, you have integrated Intel Iris Xe Graphics. Battery and Connectivity

What powers the machine is a 46Wh Li-Po battery. You also get 2 USB Type-A ports and 1 HDMI port. A 3.5mm headphone/microphone jack is also present to meet your audio needs. On the wireless side of things, you get WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.1.

description:
Here’s a brief description of the design aesthetic, processor, and battery life of the Lenovo ideapad Slim 3i (2022) laptop with the Intel Core i5-12450H processor.

Lenovo ideapad Slim 3i (2022) Overview

Design and Display

title: Redmi Watch 3 Active
short_description: The Redmi Watch 3 Active is a sleek aluminum alloy smartwatch with a 1.83-inch IPS panel, 240x280 resolution, and 450 nits of brightness. It features health monitoring, sports modes, and Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity. The watch has over 200 watch faces and can last 12 days of usage, with a 289 mAh battery lasting 8 days for heavy usage. The watch comes with a magnetic charger for convenient charging.
description:
Redmi Watch 3 Active Overview:

Display and Design

To begin with, the Redmi Watch 3 Active delivers a large 1.83-inch IPS panel with a 240 x 280 resolution and 450 nits of brightness. There are over 200 watch faces to choose from for personalized designs.As for the design, this looks like it is made of aluminum alloy. The body is nearly rectangular, with curves around the corners. The Redmi Watch 3 Active itself is thin (10.94mm thick, and weighs 41 grams with a strap. Additionally, it has a 5 ATM rating, which means it can withstand pressures equivalent to ~50 meters, or 164 ft under water.

Features

You get what you see on all the smartwatches. The Watch 3 Active includes health monitoring features such as 24/7 blood oxygen, heart rate, sleep tracking, women's health functions, etc. Moreover, it has sports modes much like other watches, with over 100 of them if you count.Similarly, Xiaomi's Redmi Watch 3 Active connects to your phone using Bluetooth 5.3. Paired with the fact that it packs with a built-in microphone and speaker, you can use it to pick up calls as well as make them.

Battery and Charging

For being your normal fitness tracker and a watch, the Watch 3 Active can last you 12 days of usage. And for somewhat heavy usage patterns, its 289 mAh battery still sticks around for 8 days. In addition, the magnetic charger in the box can be used to fuel up the device.
